complaint_text:
Back into XXXX of 2010 during this mortgage crash me and my wife were part of this with our second home. We tried and did everything the bank ( specialized loan service ( SLS ) wanted us to do. They finally offered us a program called DEED IN LIEU instead of a foreclosure. we accepted this and they even paid us under their cash for keys program which is only given out for deed of lieu or short sales. 5 1/2 years later when we are applying for a new mortgage an open foreclosure is showing up on our credit report instead of deed in lieu from this bank SLS. After numerous talks with different departments within the company, faxes, written requests and a copy of out credit report so this error can be corrected on our credit report, me and my wife are getting nothing but a run around. I had XXXX different customer service reps and a dept manager say that our file looked messed up, that it should be reading one way but reads another way. They all said they do n't know where to begin. 

We showed them the proof, they saw the proof in their files. The manager even said a deed in lieu was started but never completed. They see the cash for keys check issued ( XXXX XXXX, 2010 ) and a copy of the deeds and verification of mortgage. We really need help with this and have no where else to turn. 

This is the only thing prohibiting us from obtaining a new mortgage. Our credit is outstanding except for this mark on our credit report. We can not get them to help us fix their error. We are at RISK OF LOSING THIS NEW HOME because of the wording in our credit report. Time is fast approaching for our settlement date. We waiting the 5 years for the XXXX, DEED IN LIEU time, only to be hit with this.

I checked my credit report and I am upset on what I found out. There are late payment remarked on it but I did not incur any late payments. Thoroughly investigate it and make a necessary action. Here are the details of the late payment accounts, company name, balance & date last reported : XXXX XXXX/ {$630.00} / XX/XX/XXXX XXXX XXXX/ {$0.00} / XX/XX/XXXX
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

Please notify me once the correction has been made, as it is essential that my credit report accurately represent my financial history. Thank you for addressing this issue promptly.

XXXX as it was suppose to. This happened XXXX months in a row in XXXX but I just now found out that I could dispute this problem that B of A caused me at that time and recently as well.

I was recently alerted to an account in collections to the sum of {$5000.00} ( est. ) that is not mine. In XX/XX/2020 I had the XXXX and went to the ER for XXXX and was released within a few hours. I received a bill of {$1200.00} after insurance coverage and paid it promptly. I never received any other bill but received scam-like calls asking for random and different amounts owed that were unprofessional and did not seem credible. Ive also received text messages and mail saying Ive been enrolled in a XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX  ( XXXX ), and Ive absolutely am not in school for anything medical related, nor any other type of schooling. I believe my information was compromised during that visit to the ER and believe this debt is Fraud-related.

complaint_text: I believe that the bank/company did not loan me any money. They did not deposit the promissory note that was assigned to them from the dealership. The bank/company recorded the promissory note as an asset on the books of the business and credited cash to balance the books. The alleged borrower got cash. likely the bank/company will likely avoid explaining the cash earlier credited was deposited. The deposit is a debit to cash and a credit to a bank/company liability like a checking account, demand deposit account or savings account. The new result is exactly what the Federal Reserve Banks have already admitted. There is a new company/bank asset and a new company/bank liability. The new asset came from the borrower and the bank/company liability means the bank/company owes money related to the new asset. The owner of the property is me ( the complainant of this inquiry ). The banks claim that they loaned me money to purchase the vehicle. Where did the money come from. I believe they created an account and deposited the cash and then paid for the property from that account. This is what I believe is an act of custodian or intermediary to the transaction.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: This is my XXXX complaint against my mortgage company. For this complaint, I called last XXXX to get information for a Deed in Lieu of Foreclosure. I was told by the agent that I had to attempt a short sale XXXX for XXXX before a Deed and XXXX could be considered. Speeding up on the same subject, about XXXX months ago I requested information for a short sale. The information provided had all work out options including Deed in Lieu. I read the information for a Deed in Lieu and it did not say anything about having to do a short sale. I called again and spoke to a representative and agreed with what the paperwork said. She tried to go back in the notes to see why he would tell me that but she said she said since my account transferred to a new system, she did n't have access to anything earlier than XXXX 2014. How convenient. She said I can still attempt a Deed in Lieu but since my house is already up for sale I just wanted to finish out this option first. After submitting the shortsale information, I received correspondence stating that they received my request for a loan modification and I will receive additional information for what is needed. I clearly filled out the information for short sale and not a modification. I added the information for my realtor and her contact information, giving permission to speak with her. Then I received a letter from an Attorney basically suing me and I had to respond to the Answer, which I did. I called last Wednesday and the lady at the law firm could not find anything for me, not even a file. She transferred me to XXXX which just happened to be a mailbox, I explained I just wanted to verify again that it was received. If not, then I can fax the information over. I did not receive a call back, letter or anything. What I did receive today was a Motion for Default Judgment because I failed to respond. I called the law firm again and they were closed. I called the mortgage company, and of course he had no information on file. He suggested I speak with the short sale department and explain the judgment to see what has happened. He transferred me and they were closed. I ca n't deal with them on my own anymore. I keep trying to do the right thing and just not walk away, and sell the house and not leave it empty, but I still keep getting the incorrect information. That is not fair to me at all. I am trying to do right and have a lot of things on my plate besides this and I am still getting screwed. I do n't have the money to hire an attorney but if I have to I will make sure Ocwen absorbs the cost. I have done everything I was suppose to do and I still get sued.

I had a mortgage with Ocwen and filed a chapter XXXX bankruptcy in 2012 and it was discharged. However, Ocwen is still reporting the account negatively after the bankruptcy and it is affecting my credit negatively which is against the bankruptcy laws.

I am formally disputing the late payment entries on my credit report XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX - {$990.00} XXXX XXXXXXXX - XXXX - {$1000.00} These entries are inaccurate and do not reflect my actual payment history. Despite my repeated attempts to have these discrepancies investigated and resolved, no meaningful action has been taken. I have provided all necessary documentation to support my case and have followed up several times, yet these errors remain. This lack of resolution has not only caused financial strain but has also significantly affected my mental and emotional well-being. The stress of dealing with these incorrect entries is overwhelming. 

Under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), I am entitled to a credit report that accurately reflects my financial behavior, including the right to have outdated or inaccurate information promptly corrected. I urge you to take immediate action to update or correct these late payment entries, as failure to do so is a violation of my rights under federal law.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
I am writing another complaint against Wells Fargo. This is complaint # 4. I do n't understand why Wells Fargo is trying to waste my time when I am merely trying to save my home. I have asked you to provide confirmation on who actually was the investor of this property. I have been told the FHA was the investor. Then, I was told Wells Fargo was the investor.This went on for 5 years. Now, XX/XX/XXXX, Wells Fargo 's lastadmission was that XXXX was the investor. Can you please stop wasting my time and give me an answer that is not full of lies? 
You may want to know why this is so important to me. The answer is simple. 1. ) I had an FHA loan. 2. ) I paid for mortgage insurance. 3. ) I should have been able to use FHA money through their Partial Claims. 4. ) The LENDER ( or investor ) has to initiate the partial claims paperwork. 
Wells Fargo REFUSED to initiate the paperwork stating that they were not the lender. That was a lie. Had Wells Fargo not lied to me, and filled out the paperwork for Partial Claims, this foreclosure would have been stopped. Now, they are saying I never submitted the paperwork needed. WHAT?????? Lie after lie, after lie. 
My last point of contact for Wells Fargo was XXXX XXXX. After I read XXXX ' answers to my questions, I thought I was on the show " XXXX. '' I could not believe the ridiculous answers I received. I submitted paperwork that contradicts everything in your answers.After contacting Wells Fargo and asking to speak to a supervisor, I was given another point of contact named XXXX XXXX. At first, he seemed very concerned with my issues and stated that he was going to do every thing he can to get to the bottom of this. I wanted to speak to XXXX again but, for some reason, he is never in the office and after leaving several messages on HIS PERSONAL VOICEMAIL, I have yet to hear from him. 
Now XXXX told me that if there were any improprieties, Wells Fargo would do what they could to resolve my issues and work with me to get my home back. He sounded so sincere that I actually believed him. Thank goodness my common sense told me to become a member of auction.com and to add this address to my saved list. So, I was a little upset when I received an email from XXXX that this property was available to bid on. Auction starts XX/XX/XXXXand is overXX/XX/XXXX. Starting bid is {$2500.00}. When I called XXXXon XXXX/XXXX/XXXX, to discuss this, his whole attitude changed and he stated that he NEVER said Wells Fargo would reverse anything. Then, after telling him I have the whole conversation on tape, he stated that he could no longer talk to me if I was recording him. The first thing you 're told when you call Wells Fargo, is that you are on a recorded line.What 's the differencebetween YOUR recordedconversation or mine? Maybe they want to edit their tapes later but ca n't if there 's another recording out there. Makes you wonder. 
So my question is, how are you looking for improprieties which could reverse this foreclosure and at the same time, put this property on the auction block? I do n't know if the " dual tracking '' laws would pertain to this but lets see what the OCC, CFBP, and THE Federal Trade Commission think about it. Remember, I have EVERY conversation recorded, just like you. Before you answer, you may want to go back and listen to your own recorded messages. 
Please stop the auction until you finish your investigation. I 'm trying to get my home back and it appears that you, Wells Fargo is doing everything in your power to circumvent my due diligence. Also, please find my mortgage modification packet from XXXX/XXXX/XXXX. That would be the packet submitted in court and handed to your Attorney, XXXX XXXX. This would be your first impropriety.

In an effort to pay my loan off in  XXXX  years, my  XXXX  daughters agreed to have a total of {$910.00} drafted from each of their checking accounts per month. This was in addition to my payment of {$940.00}. This totaled a minimum payment of {$1800.00} per month. Moreover, I agreed to make my payment every  XXXX  weeks thus making an extra payment per year. The necessary draft amounts to pay the loan off in  XXXX  years was calculated by the  XXXX   XXXX  mortgage loan  officer  who is no longer employed with the  XXXX , AL branch. As previously stated, he explained and we agreed that my checking account would be debited every  XXXX  weeks to make an extra payments per year, thus shortening the term of the loan. This coupled with my daughters ' extra monthly payments would ensure a five-year payoff. The date of the refinanced loan was   XXXX   XXXX   XXXX  , for {$100000.00}. The specifics of the loan include : annual percentage rate is 3.625,  XXXX   XXXX ,  XX -year loan.     I learned that the error had been made when I received information from  WF  that my escrow payment was inadequate and would increase in  XXXX .     When speaking with the resolution specialist, she stated that when I called to give the checking accounts from which to debit the mortgage payment and extra principle, that I did not explain adequately and also that there were documents that should have been filed by the mortgage specialist in  XXXX . I did explain and I have never had an issue with self-expression. The resolution  specialist  stated when I called her concerning the incorrect application of my loan payment that it was too difficult to go back  XXXX  years, but they could probably go back  XXXX  year. My question to her was why could n't the same procedure be utilized for both years since a dreadful life-changing error had been made. I expressed to her that it was our goal to have the loan paid off by the time I was at the retirement age of  XXXX  in  XXXX . If we do not get my money correctly appropriated, first, I will have to work longer and secondly, my children 's selfless effort to help pay the loan off in  XXXX  years will be all for NOTHING.     PLEASE HELP turn this situation into it 's intended positive outcome. Please contact me to clear up any ambiguity.     Finally, I just want to stress that I do not want anything free or anything that I have not earned. I just want WF to do what is right and I want to be treated like a valuable customer, I have never been late in paying a mortgage payment in the  XXXX  plus years as a homeowner, I have an exceptional  credit score  of  XXXX .     When I called to get help with this problem, I was told that my account was paid up to the year  XXXX  because of how the payments were applied. My question which is yet to be answered is, why would anyone choose to pay forward rather than apply extra funds toward the principle of their loan. I am at a loss to understand why anyone would throw their hard earned wages away in that fashion.

My credit report says that I owe {$85.00} for a Account charge off, dates late XXXX, reported XX/XX/24, XXXX last four numbers of the account number, date of account status XX/XX/24. I have looked thru my pile of mail in my box there ( over a yr. old ) there is nothing from this company. I do not know who this is or who they are collecting for. I have had in the past a collection agency that somehow got ahold of my credit report and tried collecting a charged off debt but I called the original creditor just to find out they did not send the account for collection. If I knew who they got this debt from I could call them for validity. I have filed a dispute with XXXX also. Thanks

I have submitted a dispute with TransUnion for reporting a Public Record Bankruptcy on my credit report and have nothing has been done to rectify the disputed information, nor provide verification of proof. On XX/XX/XXXX, I spoke with a representative XXXX that stated that my previous letters were noted however, no action was taken except to send me an updated copy of my report showing the exact same thing that was on there before. 
I sent certified dispute letters to TransUnion dated XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX and nothing was done. On XXXX, I had to start an entirely new dispute all over again. And per XXXX as of XX/XX/XXXX they had, had no verification that the public information being disputed by me was indeed correct. I had till XXXX, to receive a response from their investigation and pending the result will delete the derogatory information from my report. However, When I called to inquire how long before they removed the derogatory information, public record and the 2 derogatory information being reported they claimed that it will not be deleted and I can submit another dispute again. I 've submitted disputes XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX and each time I 'm told to submit new dispute all over again and wait 30 days. I think I have waited more than enough 30 days, and would like this issue rectified immediately.

I am overwhelmed and really need your help with investigating my student loan account balance and added extra fees with XXXX XXXX , XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX ( XXXX ) agencies. 

I have a number of student loans that I would like to make revolving payments on. However, it is extremely frustrating and overwhelming that my student loan total balance has increased from {$80.00} and tripled ( approximately 2 times the amount than the original balance ), resulting in me now owing {$150.00}. 

In XX/XX/XXXX, in the effort of trying to resolve my student loan balance, I entered into a student loan recovery program with XXXX XXXX XXXX ( XXXX ). The agreement was that I had to pay {$630.00} for nine ( 9 ) months. On the tenth ( 10th ) month the agreement was that the payment would be reduced to a more affordable payment, which was to be paid directly to XXXX and no longer to XXXX. 

Each time I tried to talk to XXXX about lowering my payment and after the 9th payment I continuously received the run around. Unfortunately, once I completed the 9th payment and the loan was sent back to XXXX, I was told that the payment could NOT be lowered and the {$630.00} will need to be continued. I told XXXX that I only agreed to the payment for 9 months knowing that it would be reduced on the 10th month. I advised XXXX that I could pay $ 200 monthly. XXXX would not accept a lower payment amount. 

Please know that I am fully aware that this is my student loan and it is my reasonability to repay the loan. However, because XXXX would not take a lower payment, as we were dealing with financial difficulty during that time, I was unable to continue the {$630.00} payments to XXXX. 

Now in XX/XX/XXXX XXXX continued to add fees to my balance, sold my account to XXXX XXXX , XXXX who ALSO STACKED on additional fees resulting in my student loan going form {$80.00} to now owing {$150.00}. When I called XXXX XXXX, XXXX and spoke with the collector of my student loan, I asked her what was the lowest amount that I could pay. She advised me that the payment was {$1800.00} per month. When I pulled out my calculator and multiplied {$1800.00} by 180 months equals to me actually paying back {$320000.00} when I only borrowed {$80.00}. You do the math as " THIS IS INSANE. '' To be honest, I was in shock where I actually almost fell off the chair. 

I told her that I could not pay {$1800.00} a month and I will need a much lower amount. She never asked me any questions regarding my expenses and nor did she provide me with an itemized statement as to where did all theses fees come from. Additionally, my XXXX tax return was garnished by XXXX and or XXXX XXXX, XXXX She was unable to provide me with an itemized statement as to where the funs were applied. Matter of fact, she simply advised me that there was NO room for negotiation and the payment amount is {$1800.00} per month, and became unresponsive on the phone and basically hung up on me. 

Next, I proceeded to call XXXX, hoping that I was gong to get some assistance. I spoke with a young man who started yelling at me as I was trying to explain to him my situation and how the loan has tripled ( 3 times the amount ) from what I originally borrowed. He told me in a very loud tone of voice that " this is your responsibility and you need to pay your loans. '' Please know that I am not denying that I need to take the responsibility to pay back my student loan but to be honest following my conversation with XXXX telling me that they would only accept {$1800.00} and the staff person at XXXX raising his voice at me over the phone felt extremely stressful, frustrating, and even more so disrespectful. 

To that end, I really need your assistance as this has become extremely overwhelming. Following research, I contacted your organization ( Consumer Financial Protection Bureau - CFPB ).

Chexsystem continues to report information on my Consumer Report after being notified its a result of ID theft and in violation of my request to block that information under FCRA Section 605B and 623 ( a ) ( 6 ). They responded that it was validated but how can an account that is NOT MINE and a result of ID Theft be validated????? I have never had a bank account in my entire life and use a payroll card for all my bills and finances.

I am aware that the business has late payment procedures in place, and I genuinely appreciate your compassion and understanding in this regard. Please walk me through the appropriate procedures if there is a formal process to follow or if any further information is needed. 
I appreciate you taking the time to consider this request. I value your efforts in assisting me in keeping my account information accurate.

complaint_text:
On XX/XX/scrub> 2025,

I received an email from Upgrade notifying me that my checking account had been suspended without warning. At the time, my account contained {$2400.00}. I was given no explanation for the suspension and was told by customer service that no action was required on my part and that I would receive an update within 90 days. Since that time, my direct deposit has posted to the account, bringing my current balance to {$5700.00}. I now have no access to any of my funds to pay for bills, groceries, utilities, and other essential living expenses. This is my only source of available income, and the continued hold is creating severe and immediate financial hardship.

The only unusual activity that occurred before the suspension was that I initiated two wire transfers to myself on consecutive days. Both transactions were fully verified and confirmed as authorized by me. Despite this, Upgrade has continued to hold 100 % of my balance without providing a reason or a specific resolution timeline.

I believe this indefinite hold on my account and failure to provide access to my own funds may constitute violations of federal consumer protection laws, including : Regulation CC ( 12 CFR Part 229 ) which establishes maximum permissible hold periods for deposited funds.

Electronic Fund Transfer Act ( EFTA, 15 U.S.C. 1693 et seq. ) which protects consumers rights to access their accounts and funds in a timely manner.

I have repeatedly requested an expedited review or at least a partial release of my funds, but Upgrade has refused. They have stated only that my case has been escalated but will not provide a timeline for resolution.

I am requesting that the CFPB assist in ensuring Upgrade either : 1. Provides a clear and specific explanation for the suspension and a definitive resolution date ; or 2. Releases my funds immediately so I can meet basic living expenses while their review is ongoing.

Every day this account remains frozen puts me at risk of debt, utility shutoffs, and inability to purchase food. This is not a minor inconvenience it is an immediate threat to my livelihood. I am urgently requesting the CFPBs intervention to ensure I regain access to my own money without further delay.

complaint_text: To whom it may concern : I had a loan with Nationstar Mortgage since 2010 I was selling my home and I missed 2 payments and had set up a repayment plan and paid the first of 3 installments. I had an offer on the house as it was for sale and talked frequently with Nationstar as we got closer to closing and even though I missed payment 2 of the payment plan I told them the closing date was just 15 days after the payment was due. Then XXXX XXXX from XXXX called to get payoff and all documents needed for closing, the day after that happened Nationstar all of the sudden put {$4700.00} in legal fees 5 days before closing after I had been in constant contact with them. No one from Nationstar or the Attorney themselves can justify what was done for the {$4700.00} XXXX also looked up my home and there was nothing started or posted about a foreclosure on my home. I have paid off this loan and am disputing with Nationstar about the fees but they are giving me the run around and are not providing any documentation as to what the fees went to. I admit I was behind but i was very open and honest with Nationstar and told them this was a done deal with the sale of the house and the way they conducted themselves and put the fees on right before closing was very questionable.

complaint_text: Hello, About almost XXXX years ago my husband and I lost our home that was financed by Flagstar bank. We tried for about a year to try to modify our home with unanswered questions. They asked for paper work, we sent it. They kept asking for the same information over and over and over. They seemed to want to help us but once they received everything they asked for they said it was too late. I have faxed papers over and over and over and even had different agencies trying to help me modifiy my loan. Nothing was done and my home was foreclosed on. We did not want to lose our home and tried everything in our power to try and save it. Whatever they asked we did. From papers being notorized to simple bank statements. they received it all. They kept sending the same request over and over and we kept sending everything. They did nothing. This bank had no intentions in letting us modify are loan and its plane simple and wrong.

XX/XX/XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX  XXXX XXXX, New York XXXX Social Security # XXXX DOB : XX/XX/XXXX I hereby make a ghost-letter attempt to a resolution on various credit items and/or items of public record that currently show on XXXX, XXXX, XXXX XXXX and XXXX respectively. My position is legal based upon sections of the Fair Credit Reporting Act as well as the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act. These laws are to make sure that a level and fair playing field exist to protect American consumers from abusive reporting procedures on credit reports, as well as illegal and deceptive collection practices. I stipulate at this time that are no condition am U making an identity theft claim or accusation, so I demand that policy be adhered to by all creditors and respective credit reporting agencies. 
Amended consumer rights Fair Credit Reporting Act Public Law 15 U.S.C. 1681 : https : //www.consumer.ftc.gov/articles/pdf-0111-fair-credit-reporting-act.pdf Fair Debt Collection Practices Act : https : //www.ftc.gov/enforcement/rules/rulemaking-regulatory-reform-proceedings/fair-debt-collection-practices-act-text On these subscribers that are reporting the affixed information, I am requesting full validation such as, original transfer rights to collect, confirmation of legal timeline to report on credit and/or collection procedures, validation of licensing requirements, posted bonding requirements, oversight on monthly payment histories, proper subscriber agreement compliance with credit reporting agencies, and overall compliance with all Fair Credit Reporting Act and Fair Debt Collection Practices Act bylaws as mandated by federal laws. If all of these requirements are not in order, then I have the legal right to request the deletion of this tradeline accordingly. I especially desire compliance under the 84-month timeline for deletion of negative information, with the deletion of the account details altogether. My dispute is quite specific in the exception area posted below : 605. Requirements relating to information contained in consumer reports [ 15 U.S.C. 1681c ], Section 609 of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), Disclosures to consumers [ 15 U.S.C. 1681g ] ; Section 610 ( a ) ( 1 ) [ 1681h ], and 611. 

CREDITOR CONTACT INFORMATION : SYNCB AMERICAN EAGLE XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, GA XXXX ACCOUNT # XXXX On these subscribers that are reporting the affixed information, I am requesting full validation such as, original transfer rights to collect, confirmation of legal timeline to report on credit and/or collection procedures, validation of licensing requirements, posted bonding requirements, oversight on monthly payment histories, proper subscriber agreement compliance with credit reporting agencies, and overall compliance with all Fair Credit Reporting Act and Fair Debt Collection Practices Act bylaws as mandated by federal laws. If all of these requirements are not in order, then I have the legal right to request the deletion of this tradeline accordingly. 

I am posting this dispute through the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, the governing body of the Fair Credit Reporting Act and the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act. Please respond to this dispute within 30-days as mandated within federal guidelines. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX

BANK OF AMERICA has stolen {$3000.00} of my money and will not give it back for more than a week. 
On XX/XX/XXXX I deposited a {$3000.00} check drawn on my checking/debit card account at the XXXX XXXX in XXXX. I deposited this {$3000.00} check into the Bank of America ATM in XXXX XXXX and the check was printed on my receipt with a 10-day HOLD. On XX/XX/XXXX I called my XXXX XXXX  to stop payment ( because I would have the bank issue me a cashiers ' check to deposit instead ). The XXXX XXXX informed me that the {$3000.00} HAD BEEN WITHDRAWN. 
I went into a BoA bank and was referred to a " risk assessment '' department and I called several different BoA phone numbers including the one on the card ( XXXX ). I got the same story from everyone : Bank of America will NOT GIVE ME MY MONEY UNTIL XX/XX/XXXX even though they got it two days ago! 
FCPB has just told me on the phone that BoA has 15 days to respond to this complaint. What a disappointment!

I have paid this account. I then received notice the account was paid off when I checked my credit report. I made 8 attempts over 2 hours today to call fingerhut. Each time I entered my last 4 digits of my social, an agent answered then while talking hung up. This happened each time I called back with the 8th call ending with me speaking woth XXXX who did the ae thing. I then called Experian who told me since I disputed akd the creditor agreed to the account I need to contact XXXX. I tried to explain I did 8 times with no help. I then went to the website and reset my log in info. When I logged in, the account state Midland Funding have the account. I called XXXX and the agent told me he did not care what I paid with XXXX, but I need to pay {$940.00} which in wrong. Midland Funding stated they sent a letter on XX/XX/XXXX and I confirmed I did not received it and asked if a copy could he emailed or faxed ; the agent told me " no, if you didn't get it that's too bad ''. 

This incorrect information need to be removed from credit because its incorrect.

Fay Servicing Company is using illegal practices to try to force me into foreclosure. The below statements all have documentation as support : -- My previous mortgage lender was XXXX XXXX -- Due to Covid impact on my income, I accepted an offer for a forbearance plan from XXXX XXXX in XXXX of XXXX. -- I did due diligence and was assured that several re-payment plans would be offered at the end of the forbearance. The forbearance was due to End on XXXX XXXX,, XXXX. All paperwork was done in time for the consideration of loan modification. -- My loan was sold to Fay Servicing on XX/XX/XXXX. -- I called Fay Servicing three times ( XXXX XXXX XXXX ) trying to resume payments on time and was put off; told that my information was not yet in their system. -- In a subsequent phone conversation I was told that they received my loan on XX/XX/XXXX. -- I called on XXXX XXXX, attempting to make a payment, which was refused, and I was given a link to an online application for assistance with a modification. I began the application process immediately. -- I called again on XXXX XXXX, to make a payment, which was again declined. -- I reached out to XXXX XXXX XXXX that day about a refinance and spoke with XXXX who confirmed that Fay is trying to force a foreclosure ; it is illegal to refuse to take a payment, and that Fay would know I can not refinance without 3 consecutive on time payments. -- I called numerous times between XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX and finally found someone who unwittingly took a payment for {$810.00}. -- On XX/XX/XXXX, I received a packet in the mail saying I was in default and foreclosure proceedings were beginning. -- I called beginning on XXXX XXXX, to make a payment and was told that only one person could take my payment : XXXX XXXX. I left messages for XXXX on XXXX XXXX and XXXX with no response. -- As of XXXX XXXX, I have spoken with XXXX twice and an unnamed woman once. Neither who will take a payment and neither who could track down XXXX. -- XXXX XXXX, I received a notice of default from Fay Servicing, postmarked on XX/XX/XXXX, dated on XX/XX/XXXX ; FIVE DAYS AFTER I made a payment. -- XX/XX/XXXX. I have spoken with XXXX at XXXX and have forwarded all paperwork. He says that XXXX is Double tracking which is illegal. They are using crossover dates, which create an impossible scenario for me to navigate. -- XX/XX/XXXX I am informed that I have been approved for a forbearance, and no payments are currently due. I forward this to XXXX at XXXX for clarification on this. -- XX/XX/XXXX. Called Fay servicing and after over an hour of transfers, I spoke with XXXX XXXX, who explained that the forbearance is for one month only and I am now allowed to pay whatever you can prior to XX/XX/XXXX, after which time no payments will be accepted. After the XXXX, I will be given an opportunity to re-apply, from scratch, for a new plan. I told XXXX I would like to make a payment this day and she said only an account manager can take my payment ; none of which were available and she told me to call back. I told XXXX, and I believe it was noted, that what is going on is clearly back-handed legal maneuver, and I refuse to be forced into foreclosure. -- XX/XX/XXXX. I have been on the phone, hours here and there, trying to make a payment. Have talked to several people but then am put back into a hold queue, supposedly for an account manager. I have left messages, none have been returned. It is literally impossible for me to make a payment with a live person and the website has now changed and I need a new account as my old one has been deleted? Note : All references relating to my particular account manager, XXXX XXXX at his number are added to a generic phone loop that does not go anywhere. It asks for account number, reason for call, etc. over and over and never ends up either with a person, or with the ability to make an online payment. I have never spoken with a XXXX XXXX, nor has he ever returned any messages that took hours to leave with various other people. -- XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX P.M. In person appointment with attorney, XXXX XXXX. He went over all of my paperwork and agreed that there were illegal practices occurring ; said he would write a letter, may end up going to court, kept all paperwork for copies. He suggested I hand mail a payment in, as I have it in writing that payments will be accepted until XX/XX/XXXX. I mailed a payment out the following morning ( Check # XXXX ) I regret not sending it certified. -- XX/XX/XXXX. Received from Fay Servicing, my un-cashed check, stamped received by them on XX/XX/XXXX. The check was refused due to the pre-foreclosure status. 

The company ( FAY ) responded to this complaint on XX/XX/XXXX. Fay Servicing 's response to my initial complaint fully supports that they are employing illegal tactics to try to force me into foreclosure, and it also proves them to be a corrupt and dishonest operation. These two quotes have been taken from their response, with an attached letter from them dated XX/XX/XXXX ( BEFORE their response ) which directly contradicts their claims. 

In your complaint, you state that Fay is attempting to move forward with foreclosure proceedings. 

Please be advised your loan has not been referred to foreclosure. 

The rest of their reply amounts to mostly confusing fluff, along with how to set up an online account which I did a long time ago and is unusable due to my FORECLOSURE STATUS that they continue to deny. The phone number they give is the same number in my complaint in which I am placed into a never-ending phone loop without any sort of resolution. I will allow their own letter ( attached ) speak for itself in regard to their blatantly dishonest and inaccurate response to my complaint.

I have sent Prestige Financial Services an Affidavit of Truth in XXXX regarding the statements that they have been sending me in the mail with the coupon attached. This lead me to actually understand what a bond and instrument really is. Which I found the legal definitions in XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX edition to be exact. This affidavit of truth has went unrebutted. I requested that they respond back to me via notarized mail only which is how I communicated with them. Yet they continue to send me the alleged statements in the mail and text my phone. I gave them 10 days in the letter to respond back which they did not. I then sent them over an Affidavit of Default stating that they have committed trust fraud through this TRUST transaction and that I am the living woman/soul of this alleged debt that they are stating that I owe. To settle this debt I then sent them a 1099A indorsed by me ( the beneficiary ), along with that I provided them with instructions on how to use the 1099OID,1040V, and1096. I have waited over 30 days for a response and still have not been successful with remedy. I took it upon myself to call and speak with someone. I spoke with XXXX who is the alleged supervisor over the account. I was asked why I " thought that they property was " abandoned ''. From my knowledge according to XXXX XXXX XXXX abandon mean to relinquish or give up with intent of never again resuming or claiming ones rights or interest. I questioned him about the alleged " loan '' ( which I could not seem to find in the legal dictionary ) that was said to have been given to me because I did not recall any alleged funds being placed in my hand nor account. I have been mislead with them attempting to use the words " loan, contract, and retail installment sales contract '' to confuse me. He stated that the funds was transferred over to the dealership ( XXXX XXXX ). I stated to him that the transferring of funds was never disclosed to me which violates Truth In Lending Act. I requested the 1099OID and an on/off ledger balance and was told that they can not provide me with this. They have failed to report the taxes on their " income '' that they have received. They have been compensated from the TRUST account also while receiving funds that I have sent through my checking account meaning they have been double paid. I also requested EVERYTHING in the file that they have with en legis name on it assumed to be me the living woman/soul. I have also sent XXXX XXXX the same notices which have went unrebutted. This has lead me to believe that that XXXX fraud has been committed and they have failed to withhold their fiduciary obligation unto me ( the living soul/woman ). They have willingly and knowingly failed to disclose unto me that any alleged funds were transferred over to the dealership. They have led me to believe that I owe such said amount on a vehicle that I am not sure if the dealership added on any additional fees. Which from my understanding the HJR192 autographed by President Roosevelt in 1933 clearly states that every obligation is to be discharged and backed by the United States.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text: I want to stress that I did not give written permission for these specific transactions to be included in my consumer report. At no point did I authorize these entries, and their presence on my report is unwarranted. Consequently, I am formally requesting that these accounts be blocked and removed from my report immediately. It is important to clarify that this request is not due to any error or negligence on my part. There has been no oversight or misunderstanding on my end. Instead, this issue arises solely from the fact that I did not explicitly authorize the inclusion of these transactions in my report. I am diligent about maintaining the accuracy and privacy of my financial records, and these unauthorized entries compromise that integrity. I trust that you will handle this matter with the urgency and seriousness it deserves. Please confirm the removal of these transactions from my report as soon as possible. Thank you for your prompt attention to this issue.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text:
I am writing to file a formal complaint against Equifax regarding fraudulent credit inquiries and an unauthorized address that appeared on my credit report. I have never lived at XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, NJ XXXX, yet this address has appeared on my credit profile without my knowledge or consent. 
I strongly believe that individuals who obtained my personal information have been using it to fraudulently open credit cards and loans. It appears they are receiving mailed credit offers to this address and using my identity to apply for credit. This has led to multiple unauthorized hard inquiries being placed on my credit report. 

Furthermore, I believe this activity may be related to the Equifax data breach in XXXX, during which my sensitive information including my full name, Social Security number, and date of birth may have been exposed. This breach has significantly increased the risk of identity theft for millions of consumers, myself included. 

Currently, the individuals committing this fraud appear to be actively making payments on the fraudulent accounts. Because of this, I have not yet filed a police report doing so prematurely may alert them and cause them to stop payments, which could damage my credit further and make investigation more difficult. I plan to file a police report once Ive secured my credit profile and can proceed strategically.

Despite this, I have not authorized any of the recent credit inquiries and am requesting that all inquiries made without my knowledge or consent be immediately removed from my credit report. I have attempted to contact Equifax directly, but I am seeking CFPB assistance in compelling a proper and thorough investigation under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), Section 611, which protects consumers from inaccurate and fraudulent reporting.

complaint_text:
These entries remain unverified and questionable. Despite multiple attempts to have these inaccuracies properly investigated and resolved, no meaningful action has been taken. I have submitted all required documentation and followed up repeatedly, yet the errors persist. This ongoing lack of action has caused undue financial hardship and has significantly affected my well-being. The XXXX  and XXXX toll of dealing with these unresolved discrepancies has been overwhelming. 
Under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), I am entitled to a fair and accurate credit report, including the removal of unverifiable or incorrect information. I urge you to take immediate steps to verify and rectify these items, as failure to do so constitutes a violation of my rights under federal law.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
Dear Sir/MadamOn XXXX XXXX XXXX after Wells Fargo sold the house located at XXXX XXXX, XXXX GA XXXX, I received this letter. 
First, from XXXX XXXX, XXXX to XXXX XXXX, XXXX, we reviewed your account XXXX times for possible payment assistance options. FHA guidelines require that you occupy the property as your primary residence. Your account didn '' t meet the guildelines since your account was not listed as your primary residence. 
My response was the bank executive customer recovery group lie. This property is listed as my primary residence. My driver license, my voter registration card, my utility bills, my car registration, my termite bound, my car insurance, and lawn care company, all have the same address. In addition, my tax return had the same address. Furthermore, I paid State tax in Georgia. The house was my primary residence. 

Second : I have submitted all requested documents for the modification and they are requesting new documents. 
The bank said that we are unable to initiate another review for available payment assistance options prior to foreclosure sale date of XXXX XXXX, XXXX, because we did not receive proof of occupancy. 
My response was the package had my XXXX Federal and State Tax returns. Also, included a copy of my driver license. If a utility bill was requested, I could have sent it tooThird : I requested that Wells Fargo rescinded the sale of XXXX XXXX, XXXX. 
Wells Fargo said that due to the outstanding items listed above, we require more time to resolve your inquiry, but will have a final resolution to you by XXXX XXXX, XXXX. 

Yesterday, XXXX XXXX, the bank representative, XXXX XXXX told me that the sale is final and she will send it in writing to my address XXXX XXXX which was the residence and the mailing address listed with Wells Fargo in the recorded conversation. 
I disagree vehemently with the bank action. As you can verify in their own letter they did not initiate a review of the XXXX completed Federal application submitted on XXXX XXXX, Moreover, they did not review the internal Wells Fargo own application for assistance. Their own appeal form which authorized the customer right to a review was denied. 

At this point, the bank has violated my right to a review of the Federal application HAMP. Then,. I requested to XXXX XXXX of Wells Fargo if there is any other way to save my house. There was no answer. The only reason I was fighting for my house was I removed money form retirement account to keep the house during the depression. I hope at CFPB an official will look at this complaint and stop any malfeasance of the bank to other minorities. The FHA guidelines were not followed in this sale. I have been locked out of the house for two weeks since XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX took possession without aneviction notice. 
In Conclusion, my lawyer has submitted all paperwork required for the modification. The bank still denied me due process to the right of a modification. I believe this is pure discrimination against me.

My mortgage was recently sold from XXXX XXXX to Mr. Cooper. My first payment to the company was on XX/XX/XXXX for the amount of XXXX. This was the same amount we previously paid to XXXX XXXX. On XX/XX/2024 the amount of XXXX was deducted from my account. After contacting Mr. Cooper I was told that they projected my property taxed to increase by XXXX XXXX. Which is double the amount I paid last year. I had informed them that this is not correct and that I received my tax assessment already this year and it was projected to increase by only XXXX percent. I informed them that I want another analysis to be done on my property and that I need to to be credited back for this mistake. They told me it will take 7-10 days to review my complaint and that they will credit it back if they find an issue, however I have a XXXX XXXX at home and after taking an additional XXXX XXXX  from my account it had put my family in a bit of distress. Furthermore, taking additional money and not notifying my via email or letter in my opinion should be illegal. I want this to be fixed immediately.

I noticed an old hospital bill on my credit report. I contacted the agency listed as the current creditor The Law offices of Mitchell Bluhm & Associates. The creditor had reaged the debt, which they claim was the original day they purchased the debt from the original creditor. Mitchell Bluhm & Associate refuses to amend the information on my credit report, and have caused harm to my credit score. I want the company to be penalized for unfairly impacting my credit report and score.

Paid a company through bill pay and another company deposited the check. My bank has denied my claim because I authorized the check but negating the fact another whole entity deposited said check. 8 MONTHS this has gone on. The check was for {$1500.00}. Ive struggled with this for XXXX + months. I live pay check to pay check. PLEASE HELP ME

My Bank of America has been restricted. I went to the bank to resolve the issues and XXXX me a number to contact. I have called the number and need verification of me. I was told to go in the branch and have them verify me in which I did. The issue I'm having now is, I can't get the the bank to withdraw my money in my account. I'm stuck trying to lay my bills and they're having me go back and forth with bankers online and at the branch.

I wired {$250000.00} from my XXXX XXXX business checking account to another company at Bank of America on XX/XX/2022 for a large qty of medical device products. On XX/XX/2022, I realized that the transaction was fraudulent and the paperwork provided to me regarding the inventory was fraudulent. I went to a XXXX XXXX branch on XX/XX/2022 and issued a wire recall for the full amount. 

Through countless phone calls over the course of XXXX and XXXX, the company that we sent the funds to surfaced and started to communicated with us. They instructed us that Bank of America had moved the funds into Bank of Americas Hold Harmless account due to the claims of fraud against them. They also explained on XX/XX/2022 that we needed to go back to XXXX XXXX and reissue the wire recall. It was explained that once Bank of America received the wire recall request, that Bank of America would request a Hold Harmless/Indemnification document from XXXX XXXX prior to returning our funds. 

On XX/XX/2022, I went back into a XXXX XXXX and reissued another wire recall for the full amount. Bank of America replied as described on XX/XX/2022 via XXXX XXXX requesting a Hold Harmless/Indemnification document to release my funds back to me. It is now XX/XX/2022, and I cant get XXXX XXXX to send the Hold Harmless document to Bank of America. I have called department after department, nobody will help me, and my business is suffering terribly. I need help getting my money back. 

I spoke with another gentleman that I found online that went through this exact scenario. He informed me that he filed a complaint with your organization and they allowed him to execute the Hold Harmless personally and the banks responded and resolved the issue in a very timely manner. Please let me know if you need anything from me as I am in desperate need of resolving this issue.

In accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act, the list of accounts below has violated my federally protected consumer rights to privacy and confidentiality under 15 USC 1681.

15 U.S.C. 1681, section 602 ( A ), states that I have the right to privacy.

15 U.S.C. 1681, section 604 ( A ), states : It also states that a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instruction.

15 U.S.C. 1681c ( a ) ( 5 ), section states : No consumer reporting agency may include in any consumer report any adverse item of information, other than records of convictions of crimes, which antedates the report by more than seven years.

15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) states : A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: Good morning, The details are described as such. My business has a supply store credit card through Comenity Capital Bank. I received a bill in XXXX in the amount {$370.00} and promptly paid this with check number # XXXX. They debited this amount from my bank on XX/XX/2022 as payment to this charge. They have continued to bill me monthly plus add a {$41.00} late fee on each statement, compounding these unwarranted late fees to total {$560.00}. I wrote a letter to the disputes department for this company including proof by my bank that the initial charge was in fact paid in full and in a timely manner. No one will get back to me. This company continues to affect my credit and credit score, which is unacceptable. This original charge was paid. Therefore there should be no outstanding charge nor any of these late fees. I am at a loss on what to do. My sincere thanks, XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

complaint_text: I SENT CEASE AND DESIST ORDERS TO CREDIT BUREAU SYSTEMS IN XXXX AND XXXX KENTUCKY. I ASKED THEM TO VALIDATE THE DEBT. I ASKED THEM TO PROVE THEY HAVE MY AUTHORIZATION TO ATTEMPT TO COLLECT ANY DEBT FROM XXXX XXXX. THEY SENT DETAILED BILL PAGES FROM XXXX XXXX ONLY. THIS IS A HIPPA VIOLATION BECAUSE THE BILLING SHOWS LINE BY LINE OF MY SERVICES RENDERED TO ME. THEY HAVE NO AUTHORITY BY ME TO HAVE HIPPA INFORMATION OF MY PRIVATE MEDICAL SERVICES.

On XX/XX/XXXX I enrolled into the XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Program which put ALL my student loans into CURRENT status and was to REMOVE any and ALL NEGATIVE/DELINQUENT OR DEROGATORY reporting on my credit reports. 

I pulled a copy of All Three of my credit reports yesterday and see that XXXX has it updated correctly, XXXX needs to remove an item but that EXPERIAN has it showing as a CHARGE OFF/DEROGATORY ACCOUNT IN COLLECTIONS! They state that it is more than 90 days late. 
They are violating my rights under 15 US C 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) which states that a information SHALL NOT BE INACCURATE on my report. 

They are violating my right to privacy under US C 1681 section 602 A as well as 15 US C 1681 section 604 A Section 2 which states that a reporting agency CAN NOT furnish my account with information WITHOUT any written instructions. 

Lastly and perhaps most seriously they are violating my rights under the FRESH START INITIATIVE which states Under The XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX in accordance with the Education Department states ( 3 ) The negative mark of default on borrowers credit reports will be removed. 

( 5 ) Credit Reporting Changes.Starting in XX/XX/XXXX, defaulted loans held by ED are reported as current rather than in collections to credit bureaus. For loans held by a guaranty agency, this shift begins in XX/XX/XXXX.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: I reviewed my credit report and noticed a fraudulent report. The account is false and is not mine. The account is hurting my ability to obtain credit and purchase a home for our growing family. I would like to have to account removed so I can regain my good financial standing with the credit bureaus.

complaint_text:
I am an elderly woman trying to get my loan caught up, trying to get a modification for the last 12 months with Wells Fargo. Every week they ask me for new stuff, after I send everything they ask. All of this faxing and overnighting paperwork has been very expensive and very hard for me. I have also spent over {$200.00} getting profit and loss statements from my son 's accountant, but they keep asking for more. I do XXXX sales as a side business to generate income besides my fixed income. I am only trying to save my house and they are making it XXXX. Here is the email last week I got from Wells Fargo asking for documents and I ca n't even believe it. My son wo n't be back for 2 weeks and I do n't know how I am going to find a ride all around town to get all of these things, when what I have already sent should have been plenty! I need some help Wells Fargo will not help me! 
Email from XXXX XXXX at Wells Fargo dated XX/XX/XXXX : ***MISSING INCOME DOCUMENTS** 1. Contact from borrower directly to obtain verbal clarification that she is requesting a modification. - MY XXXX TOLD ME THE RMA ALREADY SUFFICES AS PROOF THAT WE ARE REQUESTING A MODIFICATION, AS WELL AS MY HARDSHIP LETTER 2. Completed Request for Mortgage Assistance to be signed by the borrower at a Wells Fargo branch office and notarized by a Wells Fargo employee. This signed RMA must be faxed directly from a Wells Fargo Team Member in the branch. - I AM XXXX. THIS IS AN UNNECESSARY DELAY! 

3. Transaction history for the past 3 months for business transactions. This must be provided directly from XXXX. 
- I DO N'T EVEN KNOW HOW TO GET THIS! I CA N'T CALL XXXX TO HAVE ANYONE SEND IT DIRECTLY ... I DO N'T KNOW WHAT TO DO. MY COUNSELOR SAYS THIS IS NOT NECESSARY BECAUSE I PAID MY ACCOUNTANT EVERY TIME THEY ASK ME FOR A NEW P & L AND THAT DOES N'T WORK, NOW THEY ARE ASKING FOR THIS! 

Please help us. My counselor has tried very hard to help me get through this but we keep hitting a roadblock. I give my formal consent for Wells Fargo to speak with XXXX XXXX or XXXX XXXX at XXXX XXXX XXXX regarding this matter, I am attaching it in writing also as well as my ENTIRE packet of documents that were ever submitted to Wells Fargo. Thank you.

I am requesting that the late payment markings be updated to reflect my accurate payment history. Those payments were made on time. If there is any confusion, I suggest you contact me or the customer service representative of the said accounts. 
Accounts payment history is reflected as late payment on my credit report in violation of Federal Law. You are required under the FCRA to have a copy of the original creditor 's documentation on file to verify that this information is 100 % true, accurate & correct.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: We are now in our 2nd year and our 2nd attempt of trying to get a loan modification, Chase our mortgage holder has done everything possible in putting obstacles to getting it done, Including fraud and out right LYING

complaint_text: I tried to link my U.S. Bank account to XXXX so I could pay my credit card. I got locked out of my U.S. Bank account and they said I could not get back in for XXXX days and there was zero fix this is completely unacceptable.

I apologize in advance for the tone of this email, but it 's frustrating to have had my mortgage sold to a company that is unresponsive and seemingly disinterested. 

Early in XXXX I switched my home insurance companies and began paying through payroll deduction. I informed the mortgage company ( XXXX XXXX, XXXX ) ahead of time of the switch, which they never processed. I received in the mail a warning that my insurance expired and Stearns was purchasing a more expensive plan for me. I called to resolved and remind them of the change, which seemed to resolve the issue. A few weeks later I saw a payment from escrow for the full annual payment for the new insurance policy. I emailed and called to attempt to resolve, with no luck via either route. I have since been paying a higher monthly mortgage payment due to the still included escrow amount for insurance, as well as paying for the insurance via payroll deduction. I have now been receiving refund checks from my insurer for over-payment and my attempts to contact Stearns are ignored - i.e. my emails are " acknowledged '' but never replied to and I have not received a call from the company. I refuse to call again after being " transferred '' back to the auto-prompt multiple times. My calls literally go back to square one. 

Below is part of the email chain ( redacted ) I have ( a one-sided " conversation '' ) where I explain the issue as I did over the phone and suggest what actions need to be taken to resolve the problem. This has worked as well as calling the company ( i.e. It does n't ). 
" I emailed you multiple times over the past month to update my insurance and escrow. It 's finally recorded with you, but the monthly payment on my escrow has not been updated yet and you paid my home insurance in full from my escrow when I told you in each of my emails that it is now paid through payroll deduction on my end. Please recall the $ XXXX you paid to XXXX XXXX on XXXX/XXXX/XXXX, adjust my monthly escrow payment to reflect the fact that I now pay home insurance through payroll deduction, and recalculate what is needed to be kept in escrow. Please call me to confirm what work has been performed on your end when this is resolved. '' ( redacted prior email ) " After multiple email tickets over the past few months with no success, I just spent an hour on hold, being transferred, and hung up on multiple times via the number provided here. If I can not get assistance via email or phone, I 'm not really sure what I need to do to get assistance. If you have any questions, and because calling or emailing you had been fruitless in numerous attempts, please call me if you have any questions or need to speak with me to address the above. ''

Delete this account because you can not furnish any documentation that would verify ownership. Please provide documentation that the following account belongs on my credit report and that my rights have not been violated. In compliance to 15 U.S. Code 1692e ( 6 ) Debt collectors are legally obligated to adhere to 15 U.S. Code 1692e ( 6 ), which forbids them from providing false information or insinuating inaccuracies about the nature, amount, or legal standing of a debt. It is against the law to make deceptive statements or misrepresentations concerning the debt being pursued for collection.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

Equifax is the only Consumer Reporting Agency still reporting an inaccurate account on my consumer report. Account XXXX XXXX XXXX is an inaccurate account. XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX has failed to validate this account with the oringal contract with my signature. I have know knowledge of this debt, and I have no legal binding contract with XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX. XXXX  and XXXX  removed the account but Equifax has yet to remove this account which is a violation of the FCRA. Please be advised this is my THIRD WRITTEN REQUEST and FINAL WARNING that I fully intend to pursue litigation in accordance with the FCRA to enforce my rights and seek relief and recover all monetary damages that I may be entitled to under Section 616 and Section 617 regarding Equifax continued willful and negligent noncompliance. I have fully investigated my rights in this matter. Under the doctrine of estoppel by silence, Engelhardt v Gravens ( Mo ) 281 SW 715, 719, I may presume that no proof of the alleged debt, nor therefore any such debt, in fact exists. 
Despite two written requests, the unverified items listed below still remain on my credit report in violation of Federal Law. You are required under the FCRA to have a copy of the original creditors documentation on file to verify that this information is mine and is correct. In the results of Equifax first investigation and subsequent reinvestigation, Equifax stated in writing that theyverified that this item is being reported correctly? Who verified these accounts? Equifax have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my signature on it ) as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ). Furthermore Equifax have failed to provide the method of verification as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 7 ). Please be advised that under Section 611 ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA Equifax is required to promptly DELETE all information which can not be verified.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: I have XXXX " Former Addresses '' listed in California that are not mine. I have never been to California nor have I lived at either of these addresses. The XXXX addresses are : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX, CA XXXX, and XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, CA XXXX

Dear Equifax, I want to express my appreciation for providing me with the performance summary, as you are obliged to report only factual information. However, I would like to draw your attention to the stipulation in 15 US Code 1681 ( 2 ) ( a ) ( i ) of the Credit Reporting Act, which mandates the exclusion of my transactions from your reporting. It's essential to note that my payments are considered as transactions.

I kindly request a comprehensive investigation into this matter and ask that you furnish me with a detailed description of the so-called late payments that you have purportedly verified as legitimate. Furthermore, I wish to inform you that delayed payments are in direct violation of 15 US Code 1666 ( b ). If it is determined that these allegations are false, I urge you to promptly update my file to reflect " Paid as Agreed '' and " Never Late '' status. Additionally, I request that you transmit this updated information to all the credit reporting agencies to which you provide reports. 

This correspondence serves as a formal complaint against the inaccurate and incomplete information currently present on my credit report. Specifically, the notation regarding the late payment is incorrect. I implore you to conduct a thorough investigation and verify the accuracy of all data associated with this account, including notation dates and balances, whether they have been reported or not. Here are the details for your reference : XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX. 

I respectfully request concrete proof of this alleged item, particularly evidence demonstrating that these payments were indeed late. In accordance with consumer protection laws, I insist that if you are unable to provide such evidence or if you lack proof of these payments being late, you promptly amend my payment history to " PAAN '' status ( Paid as Agreed, Never Late ) and furnish a corrected credit profile to any creditors who have requested a copy of my report in the last six months.

Moreover, I am seeking an explanation of the procedure employed to determine the accuracy and completeness of the information. I am aware that this information must be provided within 15 days of the conclusion of your reinvestigation. Federal law also dictates that you have 30 days to complete this investigation. I understand that you are obligated to validate these items with the reporting creditor to ensure accuracy. Any information that the creditor can not verify should be promptly removed. I expect this process to be completed within 30 days of receiving this letter, or else the inaccurate information must be expeditiously removed. 

Kindly forward an updated copy of my credit report to the address specified above. I greatly appreciate your time and assistance in addressing this matter. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
Due to extreme hardship, I have repeatedly tried to work out a loan modification to keep my home, only to have Wells Fargo ( WF ) give me the runaround. My home is currently in foreclosure with a sheriff sale set for XXXX/XXXX/XXXX. I started working with XXXX XXXX a Foreclosure Prevention XXXX XXXX on XXXX/XXXX/XXXX. 

XXXX. During XXXX of my Loan Mods, XXXX XXXX, my Attorney, XXXX XXXX XXXX, was notified of a loan {$210000.00}, 2 % int, at XXXX yrs. I was told I did n't qualify, I did n't make enough money. I got a renter in XXXX XXXX, this added {$600.00} to my monthly income, I got a signed rental contract, money order stubs, rental deposits in my bank acct, this was all sent to WF. I repeatedly asked for this to be revisited, to get a copy of this loan in writing, along with how they figured the equation. I never received anything. 
2. WF did an XXXX on my home, stated it was worth {$290000.00} on XXXX/XXXX/XXXX. I spoke to my Home Preservation Specialist ( HPS ), XXXX XXXX XXXX about having an appraiser walk through my home. WF agreed on XXXX/XXXX/XXXX to have me pay for an appraisal. I got XXXX from XXXX CT Appraisals, a formal appraisal was done & stated its value is {$160000.00}, a difference of {$130000.00} from the AVM.I built it during the housing bubble & it has steadily lost value. 
3. I was advised to make 3 good faith payments of {$1800.00} starting XXXX/XXXX/XXXX - XXXX/XXXX/XXXX, which I did. I repeatedly told them this amount was not sustainable long term. During this time they were to review my modification. On XXXX/XXXX/XXXX I received a new loan mod of {$310000.00}, {$1800.00} mo, 4.125 % int, for XXXX yrs. My new XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX, pushed me to sign it. I did not. During the XXXX of XXXX I repeatedly called, asked him many questions, I wanted to be sent certain documents he said he would look into it, & call me back, he never did. I called him weekly. I was never given any info on how under a hardship they could come up with this new loan mod amount. 
4. On XXXX/XXXX/XXXX, I spoke to XXXX XXXX from WF. She informed me the appraisal was never looked at. It was received after the date that all of the XXXX XXXX paperwork was due. During that time, I was working with XXXX XXXX XXXX. He told me several times over the phone not to worry about the deadline, to get the appraisal done & all of the paperwork sent in. I sent it as soon as the appraisal was done. I was never made aware that the modification packet was turned in late. It was my understanding when I turned everything in, it would be looked at for review. This is what XXXX XXXX XXXX led me to believe. 
5. Over the phone, Apr XXXX, I was told of another modification {$220000.00}, 2 % int, XXXX yrs, a {$95000.00} forbearance, 30 % reduction that was offered in XXXX XXXX. This was the first I had heard of this, I never got anything in writing or over the phone in XXXX XXXX. I was notified in XXXX XXXX that I did not qualify for the loan, I did n't make enough money. My debt to income ratio was n't low enough. I was in the upper 30 % and needed to be at 31 %. They keep changing the % that I need to qualify, they wo n't share with me how they have come up with these numbers, so I can help figure out a solution. If I do n't qualify for these smaller, affordable loans, how am I to qualify for a loan that puts me in a 59 % loan to debt ratio? 
6. They are now saying they wo n't accept my renter, she does n't have mail sent to the home. In the year she has been renting, it has never been brought up. She has made the necessary address changes, but the new statements wo n't be available until the end of Apr XXXX. WF says they need this for proof of occupancy, & wo n't move this forward for review into the re-entry dept. Even though they wo n't accept her as a renter, they are saying they will keep the {$600.00} rental fee as part of my income, because they have proof that I am receiving this, a catch XXXX. How can they have it both ways and this be legal?

So not only are you all reporting false information it is also fraudulent information that must be removed from my report or we can go a step further and file a lawsuit and receive {$1000.00} per violation under my civil liability law.I would like to be treated fair and request that all accounts be removed from my consumer report being that they are third parties with NO business with me and will handle that accordingly as well. 

I know that under after any reinvestigation of any information disputed by consumer ( ME ) an item of the information is found to be inaccurate or incomplete or can not be verified the consumer reporting agencies shall promptly delete that item of information from the file of the consumer and if you are unable to provide me a copy of verifiable proof within 15 days after the reinvestigation you must remove these accounts below.

On XX/XX/XXXX i opened a dispute to dispute various unauthorized transactions. My phone, ID, and wallet with DISCOVER debit card in it was stolen. When I regained access to my account I disputed the charges. They refunded me for some and denied me for the rest and wont respond to my redispute. I never made those purchases and deserve a refund.

I filed bankruptcy in 2019. Prior to filing, I completed a loan modification with Loancare that was signed and accepted by them. It has been filed with the county records as well. Since 2019, Loancare has locked me out of my online account and my statements show I have {$14000.00} included in my bankruptcy which is their reasoning for locking me out of my account. The dollars they are referring to were added bank into my loan through the modification and is part of the county record. Loancare has not reported a single mortgage payment I've made since 2019 to the credit bureaus. I have emailed ( the only option Loancare offers me ) the bankruptcy department a request to correct this many times over the past two years with ZERO response. I included the recorded modification and emails between Loancare 's attorney and my bankruptcy attorney agreeing that the modification was in effect prior to my filing bankruptcy. As a result. Loancare did not ask the bankruptcy court to include a single cent in my bankruptcy. I also provided the bankruptcy court docs with my emails to Loancare. STILL NO RESPONSE! I'm only able to speak to representatives who tell me to send another email to the same bankruptcy department. This has been YEARS without a response and without a correction made. Since I'm locked out of my account online, I have to try for days and sometimes weeks to get through to make a payment as I'm only allowed to speak to the bankruptcy department. I need help!

Received a letter from debt collectors about a medical bill about a month and a half ago. I immediately called them. Talked with representative and when I asked for more information about what I needed to pay for, she only relied that it was a medical bill. I asked her to send me a letter stating what I was being charged for. I never received that letter. Today I received another letter stating that I need to pay.
Never heard of this company before and do not have a Contract with them.

In XXXX we made a payment using a wrong account number. We notified our mortgage company and we gave them the correct account number and the payment was cancelled from the first account and taken out of the second account. In XXXX we make our monthly payments as scheduled. Then a week later we were told we didnt make a payment and the money was reversed. Our bank send the Mr cooper documents showing we never received any money back for XXXX, however XXXX went ahead and pay then again until they fix the problem. XXXX we paid, everything was resolved then in XXXX after we make our payments theyre saying we owe over {$3000.00}. And no one can give an account for our payments. Even with documentation that money never refunds back into our account they have fixed the issue. We sent the message from their department that the problem was fix and nothing. Now they want us to pay another 2 months of mortgage when we already and its unfair. We asked to speak to a manager they say 48hrs its now 3 weeks.

complaint_text: To whom it may concern, My wife and I have just closed on our house and assumed a VA loan through Freedom Mortgage. After closing we tried to create our online account to access our loan information and manage our account but were unable to. After contacting Freedom Mortgage we were told that because we have assumed the loan we would not be able to ever access our own account due to the previous owners information being tied to the loan number. This is intentionally withholding information for a mortgage we have signed for and are now legally entitled to information about. This lack of access was never mentioned or disclosed before or during the assumption process.

This company is reporting as a debt owed to an apartment agency on my credit report. I have never lived in that state. During that time I was in college and did not get my first apartment until XXXX. I tried calling the apartment complex for more information but it seems they no longer exist. I asked the debt collector for proof such as ID provided but all I received was a lease which was not signed by me and a list of charges. I have not received any information in regard to who actually signed this lease and was living in the unit. They have also sent payment confirmations which I have went over with my bank and there are no charges for these dates! I have never made a payment from any of my bank accounts to this apartment. Most of the charges are reporting as returned. So its clearly identity theft because the person did not have intent on paying rent from the beginning. Returned charges show on my bank statements and there are none for this date and company. Anyone can sign a piece of paper with anyone name to get an apartment which is why I asked for some type of identification because from my understanding ID must be provided. It seems the lease started on XXXX and starting on XX/XX/XXXX there were return payments for ach. This isnt right. I have never owed an apartment complex. I was in college at that time. I am now trying to buy a house and this is killing me. I have tried calling the debt collector and all they offer is the option to make a payment. I should not have to pay for a debt I do not owe.
