complaint_text:
Complaint against FiServ Dear CFPB, Please find my complaint against FiServ and my demand to investigate their unlawful business practices and cease and desist their mail fraud and extortion racket acting on behalf of company with whom FiServ does not have connections and who did not authorized FiServ to send me these documents - XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ( former XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) I believe I have uncovered criminal acts conducted for profit and that the representations that were previously taken by me as true are not true. Specifically, I have been subject to claims by XXXX that were misrepresented to me that XXXX was either the owner or servicer of an unpaidloan. 

After conducting my investigation, I discovered that correspondence, statements and notices were sent to me not by XXXX but by another company, Fiserv who is a payment and ATM processor. Based onwhat they now admit, and my research, FiServ receives, processes, and accounts for payments from me and other homeowners, depositing the money into an account controlled by an investment bank that uses it not to reducethe balance of any claimed loan account, but as its revenue on top of 1200 % XXXX % from trades of my securitized identity on the open market. 

But it is XXXX whose name is used to present " evidence '' of the right to administer, collect and enforce the alleged loan. And it is a " representative '' ( robosigner ) XXXX XXXX who provides me false information that is intended to establish theexistence of XXXX business records in order to justify collection from me. 

For example, XXXX XXXX ( likely a fictitious name of an employee who most liklely works for FiServ ) during two and half years insisted that XXXX is buyer of my alleged obligation which is pooled in some XXXX XXXX XXXX here XXXX is a Servicer who collects my payments to handle it to XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  to distribute it to investors ( who is also claimed to be XXXX All these statements are lies since XXXX XXXX has absolutely no records about my alleged loan ; or any servicing by XXXX as well as any Trusts or loan accounts for my alleged loan. XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  deny its involvement in my transaction. It was confirmed to me by HUD 's FOIA officers twice - on XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX where XXXX XXXX specifically deny ANY knowledge about my transaction, including XXXXXXXX XXXX " servcing '' and " ownership ''. 

There are no XXXX business records related to receipt, processing, or disbursement of payments received from me. All of that data is input by Fiserv people and systems in collaboration with XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Fiserv work is not contractually governed by any relationship with XXXX.FiServ most likely does not have any relationship with XXXX at all ; and does not receive any data they mail to me from XXXX XXXX 

This enables investmentbanks who have no financial stake in the alleged loan to control and receive the money, instead of whoever is named as a claimant in any attempt to administer, collector enforce the alleged loan. It is the keystone in setting up an infrastructure of sham conduits to conduct debt collection activities on what is probably a non-existent debt -- - i.e., there is no company or person who loaned me any money or maintains a loan account receivable due from me to anyone. There are only reports issued by XXXX [ or FiServ 's employees who send me these reports ] that are claimed to be " servicer '' of activities never performed by XXXX. 

On XX/XX/XXXX Fiservs representative XXXX XXXX sent me following email : Dear XXXX XXXX, Thank you for your follow up letter. We have reviewed the information you provided. Please be advised that Fiservs only connection with XXXX XXXX here is as a print and mail vendor. Fiserv does not prepare, review, or edit any content from XXXX XXXX and only prints and mails what is provided. 
We trust that we have addressed all your concerns, but nevertheless, if you have additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. 

Thus, So, Fiserv admitted that that they are a print and mail vendor in connection with XXXX. But failed to disclose the nature of their connection with XXXX and did not say that they are print and mail vendor FOR XXXX or were hired by XXXX as their print and mail vendor. 

Moreover, Fiserv is implying that they take data from someone else and simply print it and mail it to me. 

But Fiserv is not saying that they actually received that data from XXXX. 

Fiserv is only saying that they do not prepare, review or edit any content from XXXX. 

I several times asked XXXX XXXX to verify if Fiserv receive content of these bills, forbearance, modification and letters from XXXX ; or were hired by XXXX. 

XXXX XXXX repeatedly refused to respond and only referred me to ask XXXX about contents of this data. 

I did not asked FiServ about content of documents they sent me. 

I asked about the source of this data and confirm that FiServ received it from XXXX. 

I also asked to provide me copies of any data Fiserv ever received from XXXX concerning my file for the purpose of printing and mailing ; and provide me name and contact information - direct phone number, business address and email address- for XXXXXXXX XXXX employee who provided FiServ my data which Fiserv printed and mailed to me? 

My last request to FisErv was under RESPA as XXXX, yet XXXX XXXX refused to respond, which is a flagrant violation of the law. 

I demand FiServ to provide me disclosures under RESPA about the source of this data and confirm that FiServ received it from XXXX. 

Provide me copies of any data Fiserv ever received from XXXX concerning my file for the purpose of printing and mailing ; and provide me name and contact information - direct phone number, business address and email address- for XXXX 's employee who provided FiServ my data which Fiserv printed and mailed to me?

XXXX ) that you, the TransUnion, Experian, Equifax credit reporting agency , block information appearing on my consumer credit report that is the result of identity theft and fraud within XXXX business days of you receiving this complaint. This fraudulent, inaccurate, and false information consists of a Accounts XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX amer.These accounts have resulted in several fraudulent hard inquiries and fraudulent collections appearing on my consumer FICO credit report. I've attached a list of the hard inquiries in question as well as a copy of the consumer FICO credit report maintained by you which shows the aforementioned fraudulent items. I do not recognize the aforementioned accounts, collections, or hard inquiries as reported. I am writing to formally dispute inaccuracies on my credit report that have resulted from a data breach, as detailed in the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and other consumer protection laws. In accordance with my rights under Section 609 of the FCRA, I am requesting a thorough investigation into the items listed below.

I believe that the following information on my credit report is inaccurate due to unauthorized access : Due to the recent data breach affecting my personal information, I am concerned that my credit report may contain unauthorized and fraudulent entries that could damage my creditworthiness. The Identity Theft and XXXX XXXX XXXX ( 18 U.S.C. 1028 ) gives me the right to dispute information I believe is the result of identity theft, and I would like to assert this right. 

I kindly request that you conduct a comprehensive investigation in accordance with Section 611 of the FCRA, which mandates that you must investigate my dispute within 30 days. Additionally, I expect to receive written verification of the findings of your investigation and, if applicable, an updated copy of my credit report.

Enclosed are copies of my identification, proof of residence, and any other supporting documentation demonstrating my claim. I have also included a copy of my credit report for your review.

Please address this matter with the urgency it requires, as the inaccuracies on my credit report could significantly impact my financial health. Should you require any additional information or documentation, do not hesitate to reach out to me at the contact details provided above.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

This request is made in accordance with several provisions of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) : 1. * * 15 USC 1681c-2 ( a ) * * : This statute requires consumer reporting agencies to block information resulting from identity theft. I request that all accounts fraudulently opened in my name be blocked immediately.

2. * * 15 USC 1681i * * : Under this section, I am entitled to dispute and request the deletion of any inaccurate or unverifiable information on my credit report. Please investigate and delete any such information linked to this breach.

3. * * 15 USC 1681e ( b ) * * : This provision mandates that consumer reporting agencies maintain reasonable procedures to ensure the accuracy of information. Given the breach, I request a thorough review of my credit report to identify and rectify any inaccuracies.

4. * * 15 USC 1681g ( a ) * * : I request access to my complete consumer report, as I have the right to understand what information is being reported and to identify potential inaccuracies resulting from this breach.

5. * * 15 USC 1681m * * : As required by this statute, please ensure that any negative information resulting from the breach is not reported inappropriately.

6. * * 15 USC 1681n * * : I reserve the right to seek damages for any violations of the FCRA resulting from this breach, should you fail to comply with my requests.

Please confirm the receipt of this letter and provide written confirmation of the actions taken regarding my accounts.

Additionally, I would appreciate an update on any measures you are implementing to protect my personal information.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. I look forward to your immediate response in 4 days.

I am writing to formally dispute certain entries in my credit report under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), particularly addressing the issues outlined in 15 USC 1681i ( a ) ( 1 ), 15 USC 1681i ( a ) ( 6 ) ( B ) ( 3 ), and 15 USC 1681i ( a ) ( 5 ) ( B ).

1. * * Challenge to 30-Day Response Time ( 15 USC 1681i ( a ) ( 1 ) ) * * : I request that you provide a response to my dispute within the 30-day timeframe mandated by federal law. It has come to my attention that this time frame may not have been adhered to in my case, and I require immediate clarifica

tion on this matter. 2. * * Challenge to Investigation Protocol ( 15 USC 1681i ( a ) ( 6 ) ( B ) ( 3 ) ) * * : Furthermore, I challenge the investigation protocols that have been employed in reviewing my dispute. I believe that the investigation did not adequately consider the information I provided, nor did it follow the procedures prescribed by law to ensure an accurate determination.

3. * * Challenge to Reinsertion Protocols ( 15 USC 1681i ( a ) ( 5 ) ( B ) ) * * : Lastly, I am concerned about the reinsertion protocols pertaining to any information that is found to be inaccurate or unverifiable. Should any information be reinstated, I expect to be notified in writing, with a detailed explanation and the appropriate documentation.

Given the significance of these issues on my credit standing, I urge you to take prompt action to rectify these concerns. Please provide me with a written response detailing how each of these matters will be handled and the steps that will be taken to ensure compliance with the protections afforded by the FCRA.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
I wanted a pay-off quote for my mortgage loan with Freedom Mortgage ( Loan # - XXXX ). So I went to their website and logged into my account to see if I can get it online. In their FAQs section they mentioned the process as below. 
-- -- -- -- -- -- -- How do I request the payoff amount for my loan? 
You XXXX contact our Customer Care department at ( XXXX ) XXXX to request your payoff amount. Freedom Mortgage Customer CarXXXX representatives are available to assist you Monday through Friday from XXXX XXXX and Saturday from XXXX XXXX Eastern Time. You may also send a request to XXXXXXXXXXXX or mail to Freedom Mortgage, XXXX. XXXX XXXX, XXXX, IN XXXX. 
Please be advised, we are not able to send a payoff quote to a third party without the borrower 's authorization. Please ensure the authorization is provided at the time of the request. 
-- -- -- -- -- -- -- So I sent an email request on XXXX to the email address mentioned above. There was no mention of any fee for this payoff quote request in their website. 

Since I did not get response, I called the Customer Service number provided above on XXXX and asked for Pay-off quote. The agent said they are working on it and I will get in couple of days. There was no mention of any fees for this payoff quote request during our conversation. They can check the call recording. 

On XXXX I received the payoff quote by email and in that email also there was no mention of any fee that would be charged for requesting payoff quote. 

On XXXX when I checked my Freedom Mortgage online account in the website, I see that there was a {$30.00} fee that was charged towards this payoff quote request. 

This is extremely unfair to charge me a fee when there was no indication on the website or I was told about this when I spoke with the agent on XXXX. 

I called Customer service on XXXX and they said they can not revert back the fee. Why should I pay a fee that I was not told or disclosed to me earlier? I feel deceived by Freedom mortgage charging fees without my knowledge and they told me it was because of XXXX XXXX charging Freedom mortgage. So how will I know what other third parties charge to Freedom and then I have to take the hit on this? There is no transparency and this is cheating borrowers. 

I would like CFPB to look into this compliant and have Freedom mortgage revert back the {$30.00} fee.

On my credit report it has XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Texas XXXX which is my ex husbands address with his new wife. I have never lived there. Also shows as working for XXXX XXXX, I 've never had them as an employer. I want to make sure my ex husband or his wife did not open up any forms of credit in my name. Anything with those XXXX pieces of information are not mine. Thank you!

In XXXX XXXX I paid off a collection in full to XXXX XXXX XXXX acct # XXXX and I have proof of receipt. I was told by the collection agency that this collection would be removed / updated as soon as this debt is paid off in full. I was not notified in writing within XXXX days of placing this debt back on my credit report. This is a violation of FCRA. As of XXXX XXXX, XXXX I pulled my XXXX, Transunion credit report and I saw that this account was still reporting as a negative item on my correct report and is affecting my credit worthiness. This account was permanently removed from XXXX, so I contacted the collection agency and I was told that they stop reporting this paid in full debt to credit bureau as of XXXX XXXX and that I needed to contact each credit bureau that it was being reported to. so I contact each bureau that 's its reporting on in writing and I received a letter from XXXX  stating this information has been verified and Transunion just sent out a credit report showing remained. complaint_text: I lost my job, my home, transportation EVERYTHING due to COVID 19! I just started working again in XXXX of 2020. I did not receive ANYTHING about this collection. I could not get to the gym to work out anymore nor could I afford to so I allowed the account to close due to no employment! I still have yet to collect stimulus funds! I never got my full unemployment benefits! I have struggled for months trying to get my credit up only for it to drop because I LOST EVERYTHING! I had a XXXX in XXXX! Look at it now! Because COVID 19 ruined my life!!!!! Yes I am still alive but I should not have to pay a debt I didnt know about because I couldnt even use the services! Please someone help me!!!!

I am writing to formally request debt validation for a collection account mentioned in a letter I recently received. Under my rights through the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ), I ask that your office provide clear proof that the debt is valid. This should include the name of the original creditor, the amount owed, a full payment record, and proof that I am responsible for this debt. 

I am making this request to ensure the information being reported is accurate and not the result of a mistake, fraud, or confusion. While waiting for proper validation, I ask that you pause all collection activity and reporting related to this account, as allowed by law.

complaint_text:
I am filing this complaint against Equifax due to its failure to enforce the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), specifically Sections 605B ( 15 U.S.C. 1681c-2 ) and 623 ( 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ), in relation to the reporting of inaccurate and inconsistent information from XXXX XXXX  XXXX XXXX continued inaction has resulted in financial harm, emotional distress, and significant damage to my credit profile. 

I was already disputing and requesting that XXXX XXXX validates the debt when i reported that my identity was compromised, impacting all my personal and financial/banking information. 

During this time : Equifax failed to block the XXXX XXXX account under FCRA Section 605B, even after being notified of identity theft and receiving supporting documentation ( FTC Identity Theft Report and disputes ). 

XXXX XXXX reported inaccurate and inconsistent payment statuses, such as showing XXXX as both on time and 30 days late and XXXX as 60 days late while payments were listed as paid but unavailable. These changes occurred nearly every week without any notice of missed payments. 

Equifax allowed unauthorized changes to my personal information, including the deletion of my real name, marital name, date of birth, and employer, while allowing incorrect addresses, including an address in Arizona where I have never lived, to be associated with my report. 

XXXX XXXX has also contributed to these violations by failing to notify me of any missed payments or validate the account. I believe XXXX XXXX is responsible for reporting the fraudulent Arizona address, further proving the account and their actions are fraudulent.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
This is additional information supporting complaint XXXX. 

XXXX claimed last week that my account had been rectified, but the numbers are not adding up. Since XXXX assumed my account for servicing on XXXX XXXX, the following big picture transactions have occurred : - Payments = {$43000.00} - Draws = {$23000.00} - Interest = {$5000.00} ( XXXX & XXXX only, I paid XXXX prior to transfer ) - The balance that was transferred to XXXX was {>= $1,000,000} - My current balance as of XXXX XXXX should be {>= $1,000,000} - TIAAXXXX shows my current balance as {>= $1,000,000} - There is {$4100.00} missing from my account, which coincidentally is the same amount as my XXXX statement payment amount due for XXXX XXXX. 

I still do not have an XXXX or XXXX statement from XXXX. I have provided a complete transaction history from today, as well as my XXXX statement showing the payment amount for XXXX XXXX. The transaction history is difficult to decipher, but I believe I Identified the errors, and highlighted them in red. I provided this information to XXXX last week, and have heard only silence in response.

I was victim of identity theft as a result of being XXXX  and did not have a physical address in 2012. Numerous accounts were open without my permission. The creditors calls and harass me daily for debt. I explained the set is not mines. They sent me some billing info with incorrect addresses and i explained are not mines. I was also told by the credit bureaus that my personal data was breached from the credit bureaus and i am still fighting that. I hired a credit repair company to help me with these disputes, as i am new to this. They are not coorporating and states that they are willing to take a settlement. I don't know what else to do so i am finally coming to you guys for some guidance please. I BELIEVE THERE ARE MULTIPLE ACCOUNTS PLACED WITH THIS COMPANY AND THEY ARE COOPORATING.

complaint_text: The Fair Credit Reporting Act ( 15 U.S. Code 1681 ) says ( 1 ) The banking system is dependent upon fair and accurate credit reporting. Inaccurate credit reports directly impair the efficiency of the banking system, and unfair credit reporting methods undermine the public confidence which is essential to the continued functioning of the banking system. So whenever there is a violation under the FCRA, it impairs the efficiency of the banking system. This is a violation of TILA US Code 1666B since I was never late. " I recently reviewed my consumer report and noticed an incorrect late payment record. I have always maintained timely payments on this account. Under the Fair Credit Billing Act ( FCBA ) and the Truth in Lending Act ( TILA ), creditors are required to accurately report consumer transactions and provide a mechanism for correcting errors in a timely manner. Please conduct an investigation into this matter, and if you can not provide documentary evidence of these supposed late payments, I demand these payments to be updated to on time as they should be as I was NEVER late. I expect these updates to be made promptly, in compliance with the law.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

I have never had an account with XXXX under the number listed. I also call this organization at XXXX XXXX And was informed that this debt is from 2008. complaint_text: I would like to make a complaint about Nationstar mortgage. They purchased my mortgage from Nationwide mortgage in XXXX 2011 and immediately claimed that I was not making my payments. I never missed a payment. They claimed this until the end of 2011, even though I made every payment that year through electronic transfer. My lawyer told them that we could prove payment, but they did not was to hear it. They started the foreclosure process in XXXX 2011. My lawyer worked with the mortgage company directly and even worked out a short sale with them until they got a lawyer involved who told us that no short sale will be allowed and my lawyer had to stop all contact with Nationstar directly. For the next 2.5 years we tried to get this situation resolved but to no avail. The lawyer did not care about the proof of payment and kept telling my lawyer he never received the proof even though it was sent to him multiple times in several different ways ( the same happened with Nationstar when we send them documentation showing proof of payment ). Our lawyer then told us to try to get a government refi loan and claim bankruptcy, so we did. We filed all the paperwork for the new mortgage, had a specialist help us fill out all the paperwork ( he even told us that we should be approved ), but Nationstar denied the loan application saying that it was n't applicable for this situation. We even told them once again about never missing a payment and that this whole situations was started because of a mistake on their end, but they denied any claims we made ( even with the proof ). Now we are going to lose our home due to nothing we have done wrong, my lawyer has washed his hands of the situation saying that he ca n't work with this company, that they are the worst company he has ever had to work with. So please help us, we really do not know what to do now.

For the last year to 1 1/2 years, my wife and I started concentrating on making more payments towards the principle, of our mortgage, every month. She pays in person at a local branch, and I tend to pay either online, or speaking to a person over the phone. I have never done automated payments. 

I recently started noticing that there is activity showing payment reversals in XXXX of this past year ( XXXX ). I contacted them on their XXXX customer service number provided, several times, to speak to representatives and ask them to explain. Neither of the 3 have been able to do that. So my wife contacted someone at a local branch, and we made an appointment on Saturday, XX/XX/XXXX, to go sit down and visit with one here. 

The dates include : XX/XX/XXXX - Payment Reversal {$460.00} XX/XX/XXXX - Payment Reversal {$0.00} - Unapplied Funds {$460.00} XX/XX/XXXX - Payment Reversal - {$160.00} ( principal ), XXXX ( Interest ), - {$230.00} ( Escrow ), {$530.00} ( unapplied funds ) XX/XX/XXXX - Payment Reversal {$0.00} - XXXX ( principal ), - {$80.00} ( interest ), - {$220.00} ( Escrow ), {$520.00} ( unapplied funds ) XX/XX/XXXX - Unapplied Funds - {$520.00} Representative, XXXX XXXX, was kind enough to sit through almost a half hour with a mortgage rep on the other end, who could not explain why the reversals were on our account. After almost an hour there, we ultimately told her not to worry about it, we would look for another avenue to get someone to explain it to us. She stated she did not know why the numbers did not work out and why their mortgage department could not explain. 

A co-worker told me about a Wells Fargo financial institution that wasn't a bank, on XXXX XXXX and I called. They told me they only deal with financial advising and to call the same original XXXX number where I had spoken to representatives the first time around. Which gets me to where I am now, frustrated, and with no one to explain why the reversals appear on my statements. 

Basically, every penny that we have paid towards our mortgage account, that is NOT the monthly payment of {$530.00}, should have been applied to the principal. That is all I am trying to ensure.

I never entered any agreement to do business with this company. They also sent me a notice in the mail in a thin envelope with CREDIT COLLECTION SERVICES on the first page. This is visible in person and also online when the post office scans the mail in daily. That is a violation. I know personally there are envelopes that ensure privacy. This is a sneaky way around the rule.

I made a payment through a verified checking account. The payment posted. 5 days later, I received an email stating that the payment had been returned code XXXX account or wrong name on account. I received an automated reply stating that if I needed further assistance to contact customer service to assist further. I emailed the letter for a XXXX time.I am seeking validation of debt through a full transaction audit.

complaint_text:
I am writing to file a formal complaint and dispute regarding an account allegedly held by XXXX XXXX, which is currently being managed by Sage Capital Recovery and reported to the credit bureaus by XXXX XXXX XXXX. 

I first became aware of this account when I reviewed my credit report, as I have no recollection of ever having entered into a lease or credit agreement with XXXX XXXX. Upon noticing this on my report, I immediately reached out to XXXX XXXX XXXX for clarification. They, in turn, directed me to Sage Capital Recovery, who is apparently managing the debt. 

As part of my dispute, I requested a debt validation from Sage Capital Recovery. The documents they provided, which I have attached for your reference, do not contain any signature, identification, or any form of proof that I ever consented to or authorized this account. The validation documentation lacks any evidence of my agreement to this debt. 

Furthermore, I would like to bring to your attention the consent order issued by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau against XXXX XXXX. This order permanently bans XXXX XXXX from offering or providing consumer leases and requires them to release all consumers from their existing lease agreements without further financial obligation. This order should logically encompass the account being reported in my name. 

Despite providing XXXX XXXX XXXX and Sage Capital Recovery with the aforementioned court order and disputing the legitimacy of this account due to the lack of proper validation, both companies have failed to take any action to remove this account from my credit report. This inaction has caused undue harm to my credit, and I believe it is in direct violation of my rights as a consumer under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ). 

As such, I am requesting the following : Immediate removal of this account from all credit reports : Due to the lack of proper debt validation and the application of the CFPBs consent order against XXXX XXXX, this account should not be reported. 

Investigation of Sage Capital Recovery and XXXX XXXX XXXX : Both companies have refused to remove the account from my credit report despite being presented with the lack of validation and the CFPBs enforcement order against XXXX XXXX. 

Appropriate penalties or corrective actions : I request that the CFPB ensure that both Sage Capital Recovery and XXXX XXXX XXXX are held accountable for their failure to act in accordance with consumer protection laws and the court order. 

I have attached all relevant documentation, including the consent order from the CFPB, the correspondence from Sage Capital Recovery, and the debt validation documents ( which do not contain any signature or evidence of my consent ). 

I would appreciate your swift attention to this matter, as it continues to impact my financial standing. If any further information is needed, please feel free to contact me at ( XXXX ) XXXX or XXXX. 

Thank you for your time and assistance. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXXXXXX
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text:
I previously submitted a letter addressing the inaccuracies and unfamiliar items on my credit report. However, it has now been over 30 days, and I have not received a response. It appears my disputes are being disregarded, which raises serious concerns. Under Section 611 ( a ) of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), credit reporting agencies are required to investigate disputed items within 30 days. If they fail to do so, these items must be removed from my report. 

As more than 30 days have passed, I expect immediate updates to my credit report reflecting the removal of these disputed accounts. Should this not be addressed promptly, I will be left with no option but to pursue legal action to resolve this issue, as the continued inaction has caused significant stress. 

Moreover, I was affected by the XXXX, XXXX, and TransUnion data breaches, which heightens my concern regarding the security and handling of my personal information.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: I am not receiving the correct APY amount on my available funds each month

Bank of America has intentionally sabotaged my account and the associated " Pay for Performance '' plan annual incentives, a minimum {$5000.00} value, I am now no longer eligible for due to the incorrect denial of a Home Affordable Modification Program ( HAMP ) of XX/XX/XXXX and the subsequent appeal, that to date, I have yet to be informed of the resulting determination made upon completion of the appeal review of XX/XX/XXXX in writing. 

Just to be clear, Bank of America has never written to e informing me of the resulting determination made upon completion of the XX/XX/XXXX appeal review and associated Appeal Report with documentation. In fact, Bank of America has represented to me I have been denied HAMP on appeal multiple times since XX/XX/XXXX by the various assigned dedicated single point of contacts ( SPOCs ). 

Additionally, Bank of America has charged my account for the balance due on the CalHFA XXXX Deed of Trust by adding that amount to the principal balance in XXXX and have been assessing interest on this amount as well since XXXX, but failed to forward payment on the CalHFA XXXX Deed of Trust to CalHFA or the State of California since XXXX and to date. It is unclear if Bank of America intends to forward payment in full on the XXXX CalHFA Deed of Trust associated with this account at this time, or reimburse me the total amount charged and assessed to the principal balance on this account to date, including interest. To date, I have not been reimbursed for any charges and fees, including interest, that have been erroneously associated with this account. 

Bank of America has committed fraud on a mortgage or Deed of Trust by misrepresenting and omitting material facts related to this account during the loss mitigation processes to date. Not only has Bank of America acted fraudulently, Bank of America has acted negligently by intentionally prolonging the modification process with the use and employment of stonewalling tactics designed to separate me from my home and property, however unlawful. 

91 ) Financial Sabotage ( on a mortgage or Deed of Trust ). 
92 ) Malicious Cedit Reporting. 

All previously mentioned resolutions are desired and mandatory and must include all associated dollar amounts related to this account including, but not limited to the total value of the Pay for Performance incentive plan.

Failures to correct my name and address ( as previously requested ) could easily impede the investigation of the aforementioned report by local and/or state law enforcement. 

I have filed multiple reports seeking the correction of my name and address. Although this is a purely ministerial request, the attached materials ( transmitted via USPS ), however, suggest an almost comical, concerted effort to do otherwise. 

What may seem comical to TransUnion, XXXX, XXXX, and/or others, however, may be criminal in the eyes of state and local law enforcement, so I need to alert the CFPB to the attached. 

In an abundance of caution, I am also attaching a report revealing a mistaken date of birth. Although I was conceived in XXXX, I was born in XXXX. Alerting the CFPB to this report seemed the easiest was to eliminate any Date Of Conception ( DOC ) XXXX constructs relying on the attached or similar documents.

complaint_text: I understand the importance of removing any incorrect accounts from my credit report in accordance with FCRA 605B. Could you please take a look at the documents? I've observed that some of the listed accounts seem to be inaccurate, which is worrying to me.

I am trying to send a purchase agreement to get reviewed to have a foreclosure sale postponed. I called XXXX to reach the assigned customer assistance manager He was not in. I was transferred 4 times to different people who did not know where I should send documents or the process. I was even told to call the foreclosure attorney who stated they have to get instructions from Bank Of America and that Bank of America should not have told me to call them Then I called back and reached an office in N Carolina and went back and forth with a rep named XXXX for 92 minutes as he could not find anyone to answer the question Then he said all managers were in a meeting .This was at XXXX XXXX and he said I would get a call back. No one called

On XX/XX/2023 I was sent an email telling me that my XXXX anti-virus protection was renewed for 3 years as per an agreement and that {$350.00} was debited from my checking account. I felt that {$350.00} was too much so I found a phone number to call them to cancel the transaction. I was told that the only way to get my money back was to do it online. I explained that I did not do banking online and was told that that would be the only way to get my money back. Of course, I wanted my money back, so I set my banking up on line while I was on the phone with them. Once my online banking was set up, I was told that I would have to enter the amount to be refunded. I entered XXXX, which somehow ended up being XXXX without the decimal point. The person freaked out on the phone and was flabbergasted and told me that I had just taken {$35000.00} from them. I explained that that was not my intent and I would gladly return the money. I was told that it could only be done through a wire transfer. I wanted them to have their money back so I got the information I needed from them and went to my Truist bank branch in XXXX and had the money wired to the beneficiary for which they gave me the information. I was also told to remain on the phone with them during the transaction which I did. This is one of the reasons that I do not feel that I was being protected by Truist bank. I would have hoped that being my bank for almost 30 years, they would have warned me about the possibility of this being a scam. While completing the wire transfer, it was never questioned about the possibility of this being a scam. Once the wire transfer was complete, I left and I spoke again on the phone with the person doing the scam. I was told by the scammer that since I was being so honest that they would clean by computer for free. I was asked to leave my computer on for the next XXXX hours. I was out of town on XX/XX/XXXX. 
On XX/XX/XXXX, I was contacted again by someone doing the scam regarding the cleaning of my computer. I truthfully do not remember what the conversation was, but it had me so frustrated with the process that I said I was going to go to my bank to see what was going on with my account. He tried tell me that the bank was going to freeze all my accounts if I did this and that I would not have any access to my account. Again, I was so frustrated with everything that I didn't care. I went to another branch of my bank in XXXX to explain what was going on. I spoke with the branch leader II Vice President, XXXX XXXX XXXX who does know me, and told him briefly what was going on. We sat down to looked up my account and he verified that there was an attempt to wire money, but it had been denied. He did tell me however that it looked like there was {$35000.00} transferred to my account. I told him that was not my money and that was why I did the wire to try to give the money back. I was told again that the wire transfer did not go through and it looked like I scammed the scammers and that everything was fine with my account. There was nothing else unusual. I also went back on XX/XX/XXXX and asked him to verify that there was nothing unusual going on with my accounts. I again was told that everything was fine and that I had an extra {$35000.00} in my account and that the wire did not go through. 

It was not until I didnt receive my bank statements in the mail as I usually would, that I went back to that same bank branch to have them printed out. XXXX XXXX XXXX did explain that since I opened my banking on-line that I was no longer receiving them in the mail like I had always done in the past. I asked him to print them out and sat down with him for about an hour to see if the money was still there. I was consistently told by XXXX that my money was still there and that it had just been moved around. I still was not seeing it and could tell that he was getting frustrated with me. After about an hour, I left to sit down with my statements and see what I could figure out. I concluded that the money he saw coming into my checking account was actually from other accounts that I have with Truist. This was verified when I sat down with another person, XXXX XXXX at the XXXX branch who went through my statements with me. At that time, I filed a fraud claim with the bank. Since then, I have been in touch with my broker and another member at the bank. I was then advised to file this police report and close all my current bank accounts and set up new ones, which I have completed. 
Since that time, I have received two letters in response to complaints that were made by branch members on my behalf. Both stating that my claims have been denied. One of the letters even said bases on the additional information you provided. I was never even contacted at that point to provided additional information. 
I have had no significant conversations with any branch members other than my investment broker, XXXX XXXX who works with Truist. On Friday, XX/XX/XXXX I received a phone call by someone from Truist. That was the first time since XXXX that someone other than a branch member team, or my broker had contacted me. That conversation was them telling me that they were sympathetic and there was nothing that they could do. I told him that I did not feel my bank had my best interests in mind during this entire scam, or fraud, and that they did nothing to protect me, whether it was when I was doing the wire, or checking about my account. I told them I was not going to let this go until I got my money back. I was told that they would report my complaint, yet again, to someone higher up in Truist.

I recently ordered copies of my credit everything looked good until I saw all thrse hard inquiries that was not mine I instantly called and had these disputed XXXX and they put a fraud alert on my credit report I then contacted Equifax and went through the online process of disputing these inquiriesin they just sent me an email saying to contact the creditors who furnish them with the information which I did before in they told me I need to take that up with the credit bureaus I also tried calling XXXX to dispute the inquiries in everytime im met with rude people that give me fake names transfers me all over the place even people hanging up so right now I dont know what to really think or do I was advised by XXXX to contact consumer financial since I was having such a hard time getting someone to help its always that stigma guilty until proven innocent

For roughly four months from XX/XX/XXXX, I have been in a constant cycle with USAAs fraud activity and security teams regarding disputes and unauthorized transactions involving my savings and checking accounts from losing {$10000.00} out of savings. During this time, I have repeatedly provided documents, evidence, and any information they requested to help resolve the situation. Despite many phone calls and assurances that certain actions would be taken, I often later discovered times that nothing had been done, requiring me to resubmit information and start the process over again.

After months of waiting, I was informed that my temporary credit would be reversed because they claimed no suspicious activity was found, even though there were clearly unusual patterns of withdrawals made from my account. Throughout this process, I also received an overwhelming amount of hand paper mail from USAA of disputes and temporary credits, adding to the stress. 

Most recently, after everything I have gone through and all the evidence I have provided, Some time on XX/XX/XXXX I was emailed that my account had suspicious activity causing me to go in a complete panic just for them to say the security team wanted me to change the password to my account making me very angry that they used that way to get my attention after all the stress of my account. Only two days later on the XX/XX/XXXX Unaware to find out that USAA froze my account, unaware why just for them to tell me that I am considered a high-risk customer and that they will no longer provide banking services to me. This has been extremely discouraging and frustrating, especially considering I have been a member for five years, beginning with my first job and saving every dollar I could. It is difficult to understand how, after years of responsible membership and a situation I did not cause, I could be labeled high-risk despite clear evidence that something was not right with my accounts.

In XXXX XXXX I received a loan from XXXX Mortgage XXXX Located at XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, CA XXXX. I am not sure when XXXX sold my mortgage to Deutsche Bank National Trust Co. But they end up with my mortgage without the right documentation. I was a victim of these unscrupulous practices. 

Since XXXX Deutsche Bank National Trust Co has been trying to foreclose my house. I have been requesting them, through XXXX, and now XXXX, TO PRODUCE THE NOTE and the Assignments of the loan. I have not being able to obtain NONE of these copies. 

FIRST : I want to see when Deutsche Bank National Trust Co obtained the NOTE. I want to make sure that they own this mortgage.

I have a copy of the NOTE, signed during the closing in XXXX, made to XXXX. I have never received the Assignments of this NOTE to Deutsche Bank National Trust Co. In fact, the copy of the NOTE received in XXXX, from the loan servicing XXXX, is a different document that XXXX sent me on XXXX XXXX.

How many more times does somebody need to be assigned to my case? How many more times can you say I 'm missing a documents. Yet Wells Fargo said they had everything they needed.

If they fail to do so, these items must be removed from my report.

As more than 30 days have passed, I expect immediate updates to my credit report reflecting the removal of these disputed accounts. Should this not be addressed promptly, I will be left with no option but to pursue legal action to resolve this issue, as the continued inaction has caused significant stress.

complaint_text: Popular Mortgage of XXXX XXXX has announced all over XXXX that they are offering relief for the hurricane by allowing customers to miss the next 3 months of mortgages, and loan Payments. This was automatic unless you were behind. Even when my mortgage has never been behind, I called to make sure my credit would not be affected. Although it wont, they are not telling people that they have to make up all of the payments in XXXX. This can potentially put many people in the streets. I for instance wold have had to make a prohibitive {$4000.00} payment in XXXX. This is a very irresponsible and fake announcement. They are taking advantage of people under such dire situation.

XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, Connecticut XXXX XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX XX/XX/year> XXXX XXXX XXXX. 
[ Subject : Cease and Desist Request under 15 U.S.C. 1692 ( c ) and Removal of Unverified Collection from Credit Report To Whom It May Concern, I am writing to formally notify you, XXXX XXXX XXXX, to cease and desist all forms of communication with me in regard to an alleged debt of {$300.00}, which you are currently reporting on my credit file. This request is made in accordance with my rights under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ), 15 U.S.C. 1692 ( c ).

This statute provides that once a written request is made by the consumer asking the debt collector to cease communication, you are required by law to stop all further contact, except for limited purposes outlined by the statute ( such as advising of legal remedies you may pursue ). 

Additionally, I formally dispute this debt and request that you provide complete and legally sufficient validation of the debt. Until and unless you can fully verify this account with original documentationincluding the original creditors name, itemization of the amount claimed, and proof of my responsibility for the debtyou are required to immediately remove this collection from my credit report under both the FDCPA and the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ). 

If you are unable to validate this debt, or if you fail to comply with this cease and desist notice, I will pursue all legal remedies available to me, including : Filing complaints with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ) Filing a report with the Federal Trade Commission ( FTC ) Initiating legal proceedings for violations of the FDCPA and FCRA Therefore, I request the following actions : 1. Cease all further communication with me immediately 2. Delete the {$300.00} collection entry from all credit reporting agencies ( Equifax, Experian, and TransUnion ) 3. Provide written confirmation that this account has been removed and closed 4. Refrain from selling or transferring this account to any other third-party collector This letter is being sent via certified mail with return receipt requested to ensure proof of delivery. I expect your written response within 30 days of receiving this notice. 

Thank you for your attention and immediate compliance. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX

complaint_text: I fell behind on my mortgage XX/XX/XXXX as a result of a significant piece of my income being removed. In XXXX XXXX XXXX started foreclosure procedures against me and at that time, I filled out the paperwork for a loan modification. I sent the hardship letter and all documents they requested. They approved the loan modification on a trial basis. I had to make XXXX payments in XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX XXXX. I did this by calling them as instructed, paid it over the phone, once cleared they provided me a confirmation number and I recorded that, as well as, the agents number. In XX/XX/XXXX during the last part of this modification, XXXX XXXX told me they sold my mortgage to Selene Finance. AS I paid the last of the three payments, I asked the agent, if they were going to send me my modified agreement and I was told no, XXXX XXXX would be doing that. I never received an introduction letter from XXXX, however I did receive an invoice showing that I owed in excess of XXXX. I sent them a letter, with all the documents requesting where I send the modification payments too, and asking where the documents were that I was told they would send. I received a letter from them stating they would look into it over the next XXXX days. I waited and waited. By XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX I sent them another letter, along with a check for close to XXXX to show I was holding the payments for them, I just needed them to send me the documents and tell me what else I needed to do for this modification. I pleaded with them. They sent me a letter and told me I was denied because I stopped making payments. Now my house is up for Sheriff sale on XXXX XXXX, XXXX - just XXXX days away. I feel like they duped me and they are n't honoring what they should be. In addition, I cant see where the payments I sent XXXX XXXX were ever applied either. I need help ASAP, I am about to lose my home and feel like I have no way out and on one on my side. Can you help me?

complaint_text:
Portfolio recovery is requesting money from me and I do not recall ever doing business or having them write me validating my financial obligation to them. Up to now they have not sent me anything validating this contract and they are reporting on my credit trying to strong arm me into paying money to their company. They are injuring me by reporting on my credit in return for me paying them money they have not validated. This seems like extortion I have asked for validation with no response. Today I request this with help of the CFPB for tracking purposes. I dont want to be strong armed into contracts with companies that will take advantage of consumers. 

Validate this debt 1 ) Please produce a contract bearing my signature to do business with your company 2 ) Send me an ORIGINAL contract 3 ) Copy of account payment history 4 ) The account statements from the original creditor 5 ) What is the balance I owe including original amounts, interest, fees and when was this account purchased 6 ) Did any credit bureau contact you regarding this debt? If so, which bureau? What was verified? 

I never received an opportunity to validate this alleged debt. I am requesting this information today.

Below is the email I sent to Collection Bureau of America on XXXX XX/XX/2019. I followed up with another email asking for a status on XXXX XX/XX/2019. Today I saw a collection note on my XXXX XXXX account. I originally got an letter per the USPS dated XXXX XXXX from CBA ( I live in the country and pay everything on line with automatic debits, so I don't open a stack of letters but every few months, I know, crazy ) and never received a phone call saying XXXX XXXX  was sending me to a collection agency for the {$4.00} for the water cooler rental. They now want {$250.00} for several months rent on the cooler, their fees and FULL price for a water cooler ( {$170.00} ) that I have probably paid {$700.00} in rental fees for over the last 10 years and have never asked for any maintenance on. 

Below is the email sent XXXX XXXX. 

To whom it may concern, I recently received a collection letter from CBA for XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. 

I have never received any positive communication from XXXX   XXXX about this account status. No phone call, no certified letter, no email receipt of confirmation about this issue. 

I thought my account was being paid with an automatic withdrawal that I had set up. It turns out that debt card was canceled due a bunch of XXXX debit cards being compromised about 10 months ago ( sorry, it's easy to overlook small charges of {$4.00} ). 

I have been a customer with XXXX  12-15 years. I have paid about {$5.00} dollars a month for a water cooler lease ( 12months X {$5.00} X 12 years = {$720.00} at least ) for that time. 

I will be happy to pay what I owe ( plus interest, but not the XXXX fee of {$38.00} ). If this isn't acceptable, I have a XXXX XXXX of over XXXX. I will be glad to take it up with Equifax and TransUnion if I have a collection item show up with them, or in small claims court if needed. 

Bottom line, I would be happy to continue to be a customer of XXXX  and pay them what I owe ( something like {$48.00} plus interest ) and continue to rent a XXXX XXXX XXXX water cooler for {$5.00} a month ( this seems like a win/win situation ). This would also gain them glowing reviews on their website from me! If XXXX  wishes to terminate our relationship totally, I still want to pay what I owe, per the amount mentioned in this paragraph and they are welcome to come retrieve their water cooler at my house, just like they dropped it off XXXX or so years ago. 

Thanks XXXX

On XX/XX/24, While I was at XXXX in the city of XXXX, I was approached by a young lady who claimed that her XXXX  baby was hungry, that her other XXXX children were hungry too and that she was pregnant. XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX and so she did not know how to get a job. She asked for money but I offered to pay for the baby food items. We both went to the till and I paid what was to me {$27.00} in total. After making payment for her items, I gave her the phone number for XXXX XXXX XXXX  where she could get XXXX XXXX help and also get food supplies for her family. I made sure that I stayed with her until she called the XXXX XXXX  and booked the appointment to go there the next day XX/XX/24. I gave her the receipt in case she needed to exchange the items and I went back into XXXX for my own shopping. 

However in the evening, I found that the amount charged for the baby items were {$260.00} plus and I contacted Chase back to report the fraud. The money was credited to my account. 

Few days after I got a call which I did not recognize and allowed the call to go to voicemail. In the voicemail, the caller said they were calling from Chase Bank and I called Chase to confirm if they had called me from that number and the gentleman that I spoke with said the call was not from Chase Bank and that I should be careful. 

Few days after the call with chase about the call that went to my voicemail, the money credited to me by chase, for the claim, was reversed. When I called to enquire, I was told that it was because I had rejected multiple attempts of Chase to reach me via phone calls and I explained that a Chase representative told me not to call back. I was also told that Chase had sent me a letter in the mail and I explained that I had chosen a paperless communication method with the bank and that I would have expected an email and not a mail. Unfortunately, the Chase representative seemed hostile and accusatory and so I requested to speak to a manager who then told me to get a receipt from XXXX to substantiate the claim. 

On XX/XX/24, I went to XXXX XXXX and was issued the transaction history which showed that the items purchased on XX/XX/24 were all returned at another XXXX store XXXX XXXX at XXXX on XX/XX/24. I was advised to visit the XXXX XXXX store and I did. 

At the XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX  ( XXXX XXXX XXXX ), the manager/XXXX  that I spoke with there ( XXXX who said I could identify him to anyone as XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX said they did not operate beyond XXXX daily and there could have been no return at XXXX ( I was made to understand that XXXX uses military 24-hour timing ). He said he decided to check the camera coverage at XXXX instead, but no one did a return of any baby items at that time. He asked me to go back to the XXXX XXXX to investigate further. 

When I went back to the XXXX store, the manager went to check the camera and confirmed that he saw myself and the lady for whom I purchased the item. He said he could see that I was distracted chatting with the lady and the camera showed her leaving with the items but that was all. 

I uploaded the transaction history onto the chase claim and submitted. A few days later I called to enquire about the claim and was told that the claim was rejected for the 2nd time and that there was no way of reopening it.

I logged on to see the claim and was surprised to see that Chase had captured a completely different reason for the claim. While I called over the phone to open the claim, and clearly stating it as a fraud with the full details provided, the comment inputed on the claim by Chase - Claim Reason - said " I returned or canceled this purchase but haven't been credited. '' I spoke with a Chase claim representative yesterday XX/XX/24 and he said the claim was being re-reviewed but I believe that was because I had informed one of the representatives that a I spoke with that I was going to report the denied claim to CFPB.

This company is reporting fraudulent inaccurate information on my credit report. I have requested that they provide the purchase agreement to show full ownership of such account and also other documents so l May review to see if this is actually an account that belongs to me

To Whom It May Concern : I have attempted to rectify an issue with Shellpoint Mortgage where they inaccurately reported my mortgage payments for XXXX and XXXX to be late. 

After five months if contacting Shellpoint regarding the matter, my credit was updated to reflect no missed payments. 

However, Shellpoint failed to provide appropriate documentation to have a XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX to update my accounts to have my credit cards restored which was terminated or lowered due to the inaccurate report. 

I have filed a report with The CFPB nd XXXX  which got them to fix my credit, but that was half the battle. The second part s the appropriate documentation to submit to XXXX and XXXX XXXX to restore my outstanding credit. Please see attempts below to resolve with Shellpoint. 

Email to President XXXX XXXX and Compliance Manager XXXX XXXX XX/XX/XXXX : Good afternoon all, Under advisement from an attorney who advised me to allow more time for Shellpoint to respond with corrections from a simple mistake, but you guys have failed to do so. 

Before involving the legal system, I have been advised to take measured steps as required by law to resolve the issue with Shellpoint. 

I received a letter from Ms. XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX, that still placed the blame on me, stating that if this happens again, Shellpoint will not be willing to take the necessary steps to correct the issue ( AGAIN, I HAD NO CONTROL OR FAULT IN A CODE THAT WAS PLACED IN YOUR SYSTEM ), and it also indicated that my account was late for XXXX. Again, one if those issues where I have no control in when Shellpoint sets up bi-weekly payments. 

I am currently working with XXXX XXXX, Human Relations/Fair Housing XXXX County in filing a complaint against Shellpoint Mortgage for failing to correct such a simple error and destroying my credit. 

I am also contacting a local advocate, XXXX XXXX, and her advocacy group called, XXXX XXXX XXXX, and plan to submit my evidence to the local media to investigate if there are others who are getting the same treatment from Shellpoint as myself. 

If the report to the XXXX, CFPB, multiple phone calls and emails to Shellpoint and Mr. XXXX, report to fair housing, negative reviews on social media, and potential media coverage, I will have made my case to secure legal and punitive actions against XXXX XXXX and Shellpoint Mortgage. 

Please respond to this email in a timely and appropriate manner. I received an email from Ms. XXXX regarding this issue. In the email from Ms. XXXX dated XX/XX/XXXX, I rejected her findings in the letter, and she has failed to respond. 

Please see the attached letter from Ms. XXXX, and I will itemize below the changes to the letter that I requested. 

Ms. XXXX indicates the Following : " Please take note that our transaction records indicate that the payment was rejected due to an error code of Customer Advised Not Authorized '' and should same error occur, fees will not be waived, and credit reporting will not be adjusted. '' -I XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX had no responsibility in the system being coded in that manner and I am requesting an investigation into how this happened. 

As of this correspondence, the account is past due XX/XX/XXXX for {$1000.00} -I XXXX XXXX is requesting that a new letter be drafted and this be removed as I indicated to Ms. XXXX that this is inaccurate information and requested that this be updated nor removed in a new letter. I feel that this was a smear still against the customer. I have to submit this information to XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX, which indicates that I am still delinquent in my responsibilities. Not sure if she is upset in correcting this issue or if she is upset for some other reason. Nonetheless, this was not necessary to be included in the letter. 

Ms. XXXX goes on to say : " Although we apologize for any inconvenience. New Rez has determined there have been no errors in the servicing of this loan. You have a right to request documentation supporting this determination ''. 

-I XXXX XXXX would like to request any evidence that supports that Shellpoint Mortgage did not error in servicing the loan. I would also like evidence that I contacted Shellpoint to unauthorize the payments. Please provide any written or verbal communication from me to Shellpoint making the request, and any verbal or written communication from the employee who made the changes. 

Kind regards, XXXX XXXX XXXX Communication from Ms. XXXX to me and my response below on XX/XX/XXXX. Ms. XXXX has failed to respond to my request. The attachment is what she sent me and has been attached to the complaint. 


Account Inquiry Response XXXX, XXXX to me 7 days agoDetails You have received 2 files. 
Use the secure links below to download. 


XXXX XXXX Regulatory Correspondence Specialist Compliance Homeowner Advocacy Shellpoint Mortgage Servicing ( P ) XXXX ( F ) XXXX XXXX Download Files Available until : XXXX XX/XX/XXXX Download File : XXXX ( XXXX  ) .pdf 210.88 KBytes, Download File : XXXX ( CFPB ) .pdf 211.38 KBytes, XXXX XXXX XXXX Hide details To : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Date XXXX XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX XXXX  Ms. XXXX, XXXX have reviewed the response made by the business in reference to complaint ID XXXX, and have determined that this does not resolve my complaint. 

This letter still lays the blame on the customer in the accusation that I contacted Shellpoint Mortgage to unauthorized the payment. It further states that if this happens again that Shellpoint will not update credit or remove NSF fee.

This is beyond my control and I will not accept this as an appropriate resolution to this matter. I want this issue resolved immediately, for all late payments to be resolved, for my missing mortgage payment to be returned with interest for the time held, and guaranteed auto payment will continue in the future.

complaint_text: I am filing this complaint to demand accountability for the blatant disregard of my rights by the credit bureaus, who have willfully ignored their obligations under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), specifically 15 U.S.C. 1681c-2, Section 605B. As a documented victim of a data breach, with proof of compromised personal information, I provided the required evidence and formal identity theft report to have fraudulent entries removed from my credit file. Despite my compliance, the bureaus have refused to block the inaccurate information, resulting in severe damage to my financial standing and personal reputation. This is a clear and unlawful violation of consumer protections, and I demand immediate corrective action by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ). If these egregious violations are not addressed promptly, I am fully prepared to initiate litigation to hold the bureaus accountable and recover full damages for the harm inflicted upon me.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: I was checking my credit report and noticed a debt collection I am not aware about. I have not received any letters in the mail nor phone calls.

My name is XXXX XXXX and I am reaching out to you, because I have an issue with the way my credit utilization is being reported. My score was approximately XXXX as of XX/XX/2023 and my score is XXXX. The credit bureau stated that my credit utilization was XXXX XXXX which is incorrect. I only charged XXXX XXXX of one of my credit cards. My other credit cards all have a XXXX balances. Per the information I received as to how to calculate your credit utilization ratio to determine your credit utilization is a follow : 1. Add up the balances on all your credit cards.

2. Add up the credit limits on all your cards.

3. Divide the total balance by the total credit limit.

4. Multiply by 100 to see your credit utilization ratio as a percentage. 

Based on this, I am using XXXX XXXX of my credit. How can my score go from XXXX to XXXX within 1 month solely based on my having a higher credit card balance on one card and no balance on all other cards. I am starting to think this is purposely happening. Some of my family is experiencing the same issues. Based on research, as long as you stay below 25 % of your credit card usage. Your score should not go down. 

Not only that, my son is an authorized user on my card, which now has decrease his score by XXXX points. 

I would appreciate your assistance in this matter, so that my score can go back to XXXX where it was. I will end up contacting my attorney regarding this, because this is not right. 

I have attached my credit score history so that you can see.

Subject : Formal Dispute Regarding Failure to Provide Proper Disclosure under FDCPA Section 805 ( e ) ( 11 ) Dear : MIDLAND CRED - XXXX ___I am writing to formally dispute the manner in which y

our company has communicated with me regarding an alleged debt. Specifically, I believe that your communications have violated the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ), Section 805 ( e ) ( 11 ), which requires that debt collectors clearly disclose : During the initial communication, that they are attempting to collect a debt and that any information obtained will be used for that purpose. In subsequent communications, that the communication is from a debt collector. Your [ specify : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. ], dated [ XXXX XXXX XXXX ], did not include the required disclosure. As you may know, failure to comply with this section constitutes a violation of federal law and may result in legal consequences. I request that you : Immediately cease further communication with me unless proper disclosure is provided. Provide written confirmation that you have corrected your practices in compliance with FDCPA regulations. Cease all collection activities on the alleged debt until you provide validation of the debt in compliance with Section 809 of the FDCPA.

complaint_text:
CHIME locked my account and denied me access to my money because I had my phone and wallet stolen... I reported it to CHIME, and they required a STATE ID or DL to unlock.. in OKLAHOMA where I was living at the time, it can take up to 90 days to receive a new or replacement stat ID or DL... I paid for a replacement through the " TAG '' agency in XXXX & CHIME would not accept the Temp. paper DL I was issued... I sent pics of my old exp. CA DL, my birth certificate, my SS card, my XXXX health card, my pay stubs, my work badge, took selfies holding up dates etc ... CHIME did not care and would not accept anything other than a " hard copy '' of my ID or DL.. Im on XXXX and my payments were still going to the CHIME account.. I had no phone and could not change profiles, emails, addresses etc.. on anything... I lost my home and ended up homeless on the streets cold and hungry because CHIME was unreasonable with verifying who I was... XXXX member service rep would tell me to submit my birth certificate along with the temp ID and then the other wouldn't accept it... THIS WENT ON FOR OVER A MONTH... I am on XXXX for a mental issue and I attempted XXXX bc I was cold and hungry and nobody would help me, not even my job .... I had over XXXX in my account and CHIME nor SERVICE OKLAHOMA ( DMV ) would move an inch to help XXXX I ended up losing my job after 10 yrs ... my family started a XXXX campaign to raise money to get me back to CA because I don't know anyone in Oklahoma .... 
finally back in CA, I was able to get an ID at the XXXX in 7 days ... .I unlocked my account, but CHIME would not expedite a card for me to use ... I had to wait XXXX days to get it... I had to move money and use XXXX or XXXXXXXX XXXX and after 6 hours of being unlocked CHIME again locked my account .... then a week later, CHIME closed my account because of the " bad language '' I used with the reps from overseas ... .CHIME owes me close to XXXX and is making me wait 45 days to get a " closure check '' ... ... .several reps told me they were having the check " express mailed '' to me..... but now they will not give me any tracking info and I think they have stolen my money ... .. they caused me to almost kill myself over this .... in OK I was in the hospital behavioral unit 5 times and the police contact was constant because I had nothing and no one to help... .I was able use another homeless mans phone to log into XXXX and find a friend who then contacted my son .... I took a greyhound back to CA... with no job now I have no health coverage and my mental health is suffering without XXXX ... CHIME is a huge reason for this ... ... i hate them with every ounce of feeling I have! can you help me?

XXXX, XXXX SOC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Attention to AFNI : Your company have violated FCRA 615 ( f ) ( 15 U.S.C. 1681m ( f ) ) ( f ) Prohibition on sale or  transfer of debt caused by identity theft You have not responded to my request to provide me with an investigation report. 
I need this resolve, under the Fair Credit Reporting Act, these disputed items may not appear on my credit report if they can not be supported by any evidence ( 1 ) In general No person ( company ) shall sell, transfer for consideration, or place for  collection a debt that such person has been notified under section 1681c-2 of this title has resulted from identity theft. 
( 2 ) Applicability The prohibitions of this subsection shall apply to all persons collecting a debt described in paragraph ( 1 ) after the date of a notification under paragraph ( 1 ). 
( 3 ) Rule of construction Nothing in this subsection shall be construed to prohibit -- ( A ) The repurchase of a debt in any case in which the assignee of the debt requires such repurchase because the debt has resulted from identity theft ; ( B ) the securitization of a debt or the pledging of a portfolio of debt as collateral in connection with a borrowing ; or ( C ) the transfer of debt as a result of a merger, acquisition, purchase and assumption transaction, or transfer of substantially all of the assets of an entity. 
A person that furnishes information to any consumer reporting agency shall have in place reasonable procedures to respond to any notification that it receives from a consumer reporting agency under section XXXX of this title relating to information resulting from identity theft, to prevent that person from refurnishing such blocked information. 
The reference items are listed below please take this matter very serious AFNI I have report your company to consumerfinance.gov As a form of record and I am prepare to sue your company Example In re XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX Telephone Consumer Protection Act Litigation, Case No. XXXX, in the U.S. District Court for the XXXX  District of XXXX Stop collection proceedings against me Signatures on applications and accounts Investigators report XXXX, XXXX SOC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

complaint_text:
Seneca Mortgage Services is a predatory company and my case is the smoking XXXX. Their business model can be outlined in three very simple steps : 1 : Buy delinquent mortgages from upstanding banks In my case, my loan was purchased from XXXX after I fell behind on my payments while experiencing a physical hardship that made it impossible for me to work. 
2 : Make sure the consumer FAILS at a loan mod or repayment program. 
This is something I DID NOT FAIL TO DO. All of my payments were made, in full, and on time. However, this is the " smoking XXXX '' I mentioned earlier. 
3 : Send the failed mortgages to Sheriff Sale so they can make money on the sale of the property. Self-explanatory. 

While on vacation, a letter notifying me of my property going up for Sheriff Sale was placed on my door. I did n't panic because I knew all payments were made. 

Basically ... they EVEN tried their three step plan on me. On a loan that was no longer delinquent, or had ANY OUTSTANDING PAYMENTS. 

If they tried this on me ... they 're trying it on everyone. PLEASE HELP STOP THEM.

This consumer reporting agency as defined by law has violated my rights under the FCRA for not assuring me 100 % possible maximum accuracy. Every automated complaint that comes back says items are verified when they have not done a reasonable investigation of the items in question Pursuant to 15 U.S. Code 1681e - Compliance procedures section ( b ) says whenever a consumer reporting agency prepares a consumer report it follows reasonable procedures to assure maximum possible accuracy of the information concerning the individual about whom the report relates. To my understanding, the only investigation that credit reporting agencies do is a simple communication with the E oscar system to request verification. Verification could be as simple as a phone number address and name all of which are public information and is not the maximum possible accuracy which would mean that you are in violation of the FCRA. 
These are the Inaccurate tradelines that I disputed that have not been removed or investigated properly. 

XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports

This is my final notice regarding your ongoing noncompliance with federal credit reporting laws. I previously disputed the accuracy and legitimacy of several items on my credit report, yet your agency has failed to act in accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ).

Your violations include : Failure to validate the debt as required under 15 USC 1692g ( Section 809 ( b ) ).

Continuing communication after a certified cease-and-desist request, violating 15 USC 1692c ( Section 805 ( c ) ).

Harassment under 15 USC 1692d ( Section 806 ).

Recently, I received notice that your investigation was complete, but the disputed accounts remain on my credit report. These accounts are not only inaccurate but were never authorized by me. No valid contract exists, and I have not provided any written consent for the reporting of these accounts, as required under 15 U.S. Code 1681b.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
I am writing to formally dispute the accounts and inquiries listed on my consumer credit report, as referenced below. These entries are the result of a data breach or fraud, and I request a thorough investigation into their legitimacy. Additionally, I demand verifiable proof, including my signature or electronic signature, to validate these actions. 

This letter is being sent directly by me, not through a third party, and I ask that you carefully review the information provided. I did not authorize the actions reflected in my credit report. Their presence constitutes a violation of my consumer rights under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), specifically : Section 605B : Blocking information resulting from identity theft or fraud [ 15 U.S.C. 1681c-2 ]. 
Section 604 : Permissible purposes of consumer reports [ 15 U.S.C. 1681b ]. 
After contacting the companies involved, I confirmed that these actions were initiated without compliant validation or original proof. The accounts and inquiries in question are factually inaccurate because I never authorized them. These entries are a direct result of a data breach or improper reporting of my consumer information by creditors or third-party data furnishers. 

I respectfully request that you take immediate action to investigate these matters and remove the unauthorized entries from my credit report. 

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. I look forward to receiving your response within the required timeframe.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

The Capital One employee stated she would file a credit bureau dispute. Instead I received collection letters and calls with threatening law suits. 


This unresolved matter : 1. Has interfered with me in purchasing a home and an automobile as a creditworthy customer 2. Lowered my creditworthiness and FICO score. 



To assist me in resolving this matter : 1. Im writing to request a copy of my Capital One Statements for the above account XX/XX/XXXX-XX/XX/XXXX.
