complaint_text:
I am writing to dispute the account referenced above. I have disputed this account information as inaccurate with you, and you have come back to me and stated you were able to verify this debt. How is this possible? Under the laws of the FDCPA, I have contacted the collection agency myself and have been unable to get them to verify that this is indeed my debt. 

I enclose copies of my requests to the collection agency, asking them to validate my debts, and the receipts showing that I sent these letters certified signature request. This debt is not mine and I was given no evidence of my obligation to pay this debt to this collection agency. 

The FCRA requires you to verify the validity of the item within 30 days. If the validity can not be verified, you are obligated by law to remove the item. There is a clear case of unverified debt here, and I urge you to remove this item before I am forced to take legal action. 

In the event that you can not verify the item pursuant to the FCRA, and you continue to list the disputed item on my credit report I will find it necessary to sue you for actual damages and declaratory relief under the FCRA. According to this regulation, I may sue you in any qualified state or federal court, including small claims court in my area. 

While I prefer not to litigate, I will use the courts as needed to enforce my rights under the FCRA. 

I look forward to an uneventful resolution of this matter. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  IL XXXX
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
Please be advised this is not a refusal to pay, but a notice sent pursuant to the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FCRA ) 15 U.S. Code 1692g stating your claim is disputed and validation is requested. 
Please understand that this letter is not a request for verification or proof of mailing address. This services as an explicit a request for VAILDATION made pursuant to the above-mentioned Title and Section. Im requesting that your office provides me with competent evidence that I have any legal obligation to pay you.

Im also informing Eastern Revenue Inc., that if your office has reported invalidated information to any of the XXXX major credit bureaus ( XXXX, XXXX, or XXXX ) this action may constitute fraud under both Federal and State Laws. 
Due to this fact, if any negative mark is found on any of my credit reports by Eastern Revenue Inc or the company you represent, I will not hesitate in bringing legal action against and your client for the following : violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act, violation of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, and Defamation of Character ( per se ). 
If Eastern Revenue Inc, can provide the proper documentation as requested in the following Declaration, I will require at least 30 calendar days to investigate this information, during which time all collection activity shall CEASE and DESIST. 
Also, during this validation period, if any action is taken which could be considered detrimental to any of my credit reports, I will consult with my legal counsel for suit. This includes any listing of information to a credit reporting repository that could be inaccurate or invalidated. 
If Eastern Revenue Inc., fails to respond to this validation request within 30 calendar days from the date of your receipt, all references to this account must be deleted and completely removed from my credit file, and a copy of such deletion request shall be sent to me immediately.

The Following information is required. Please fill om the form below in its entirety.

1. Name and address of Alleged creditor : 2. Name on file of alleged debtor : 3. Alleged Account # : 4. Address on file for alleged debtor : 5. Amount of alleged debt : 6. Date this alleged became payable : 7. Date of original charge off or delinquency : 8. Was this debt assigned to a debt collector or purchased? ___No ___Yes 9. Amount Paid if debt was purchased : 10. Commission for debt if collection efforts are successful : Please attach copies of the following : Agreement with your client that grants Eastern Revenue Inc., the authority to collect this alleged debt.

Signed agreement Debtor has made with Eastern Revenue Inc., or other verifiable proof Debtor has a contractual obligation to pay Debt collector.

Any agreement that bears the signature of Debtor, wherein agreed to pay Creditor. 
All statements while this account was open. 
Have any insurance claims been made by any creditor regarding this account? 
__Yes __No Have any Judgements been obtained by any creditor regarding this account? 
__Yes __No Please provide me the name and address of the bonding agent for Eastern Revenue Inc. , in case legal action becomes necessary : Date : ___________ Authorized Signature of Creditor You must return this completed form along with copies of all requested information, assignments of other transfer agreements, which would establish your right to collect this alleged debt within 30 calendar days from the date of receipt of this letter.

Your Claim can not and WILL NOT be considered if any portion of this form is not completed and retuned with copies of all requested documents. This is a request for Validation made pursuant to the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act.

Please allow 30 calendar days for processing after I receive this information.

complaint_text:
To Whom it May Concern ; This is in reference to the Consumer Report sent by your Company via mail dated XXXX, XXXX. While checking the above report, it came to my notice that your Company has furnished an account on my report. 

According to 15 USC 1692a ( 2 ), the term Communication means the conveying of informa- tion regarding a debt directly or indirectly to any person through any medium.

As per the literal interpretation Any medium includes any oral, written, electronic, or other medium. Therefore, furnishing of the Consumer Report ( bearing information regarding the al- leged debt ) by the Company will amount to Communication as per Fair Debt Collection Prac- tices Act ( FDCPA ).

Pursuant to my rights as per 15 USC 1692c ( c ) I am hereby providing you formal notice to cease any further communications regarding this account immediately. This includes but not limited to telephone calls, emails, social media, or any Consumer Reporting Agency.

Any further contact by your Agent or Company, except a communication confirming your ac- knowledgment of this letter, is in violation of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). 

If you do not cease communication a lawsuit will be commenced against you.Remove this account from my consumer report asap Thank you for your cooperation
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
On XX/XX/2024 at XXXX XXXX., I attempted to deposit {$300.00} in cash into the drivethru outside ATM of the JP Morgan Chase bank located at XXXX XXXX XXXX in XXXX XXXX, XXXX This particular drive-thru ATM has had numerous problems and issues making deposits over the past couple of years that I've been noticing. I've even had the ATM stop working midway through my transaction and after 5 minutes it spit my money back out and the screen read that the atm was temporarily out of service and I had to go inside to use the ATM to make my deposit.. 

On XX/XX/2024 when I attempted to deposit {$300.00} into the drivethru ATM, it started to flip out again and eventually it returned several bills to me that I ended up having to pick and dig out of the money puller because it wouldn't spit the money all the way out. This ended up being exactly {$25.00} in {$1.00} bills that the ATM returned to me..Next, the ATM stated on the screen that if I wanted to continue with the deposit that two additional bills would be returned to me. So I said okay I'll just take the rest inside to deposit because this ATM machine is flipping out again. 

After waiting nearly 5 minutes to get the two bills returned to me and hearing all kinds of mechanical movings going on inside the machine, the ATM eventually just printed out a receipt and said thank you like everything was fine, only i hadn't been returned the 2 bills that the machine stated would be returned.. 

The receipt ends up stating that I had a cash deposit of {$240.00}, and after accounting for the {$25.00} cash that was returned it would make it $ XXXXSo I was missing exactly {$40.00} which was the 2 bills that the atm stated would be returned and never was before the transaction was finalized and that would have been 2 {$20.00} bills... 

Never having gone thru this before, I had no idea how to correct this problem but contact the bank the next morning which was Monday XX/XX/2024..After calling this particular Chase Bank, they immediately gave me an XXXX number to call which handled all ATM issues and I eventually ended up putting in a claim for this {$40.00} that I was missing.. The operator who I was talking to didn't seem to understand what I was saying so I repeated myself several times that my entire deposit which should have been {$300.00} ended up turning into only {$240.00} deposit after the ATM spit out {$25.00} in {$1.00} bills and never returned the two additional bills that it said it will return but ultimately didnt.. 

So at the end of the day my account is short {$40.00} and since I put this claim in they ended up putting in a temporary credit for the entire XXXX I didn't ask for them to return {$300.00} to me, I asked for the return of the {$40.00} that i was shorted.. 

Now on today XX/XX/2024 I get an email that I have a notice in my online checking account concerning this claim. And it stated that their calculations are correct that my entire {$300.00} was deposited and thats impossible since i had {$25.00} in my pocket that was returned to me by the ATM as well as the {$40.00} thats still missing..The receipt clearly shows only {$240.00} was deposited and I was returned {$25.00} all in {$1.00} bills and that's a discrepancy of XXXX 

This is what I stated or had my son state for me on the recorded line since I have hearing problems..They advised that they were recording the conversation and if they were recording this then they can go back and play this over..I never said I was missing {$300.00} I was missing {$40.00}. And now they're saying they're going to withdraw the entire {$300.00} out of my account on or before the XX/XX/2024. 

They never should have credited my account the entire {$300.00} in the first place because I didn't ask for that, I asked only for what I was missing which was {$40.00} which was those two bills that the ATM never returned and the ATM also did it's normal routine of breaking down right after it didn't return those two bills. I am not going to allow this bank to take {$40.00} from me because they can't find their error. It shouldn't be my burden to prove this ATM 's error when I'm sure whoever went out and serviced that particular ATM would have clearly seen that money was probably jammed in that ATM somewhere.

My husband had a loan with Seterus, and was in the middle of making trial payments to have the loan modified when he passed away XX/XX/XXXX. I wanted to assume the loan, and completed all paperwork to send to Seterus. There was an issue that took several months to resolve, as Seterus wanted me to have the home go through the Probate process before they would review the assumption application. I explained that I already owned the home since I was on the deed, and should n't have to pay the expenses of Probate since I own the home. This took Seterus several months to review, and finally send me a letter that they agree the property does not need to go through Probate - that i must have been " misinformed '' by someone at Seterus. Once this issue was resolved, i had to resubmit many of the documents since they were considered " out of date '' by Seterus. I did as they asked, and they sent a letter dated XX/XX/XXXX that they had received all the documents from me they needed and were reviewing for the assumption and I should receive an approval or denial in about 30 days. We are just a few days short of it being 60 days now. I have been calling each week since the 30 day point to see where we stand - and each person I speak to says there are no notes that reflect it 's even being worked on. This situation has been " escalated '' in Seterus system twice in XX/XX/XXXX - without any forward movement to the " escalation ''. I received a letter via XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX that Seterus was " responding to our request '' and had assigned XXXX XXXX with " Consumer and Government Affairs '' to our case. The letter said to reach him with any questions, and gave his number. I have since called XXXX XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX - I left voicemails each time, and have not received one return phone call or message. I called the general customer service line on XX/XX/XXXX and spoke w XXXX XXXX who reviewed all notes, and agreed that the review did not appear to be moving forward, and got her supervisor XXXX XXXX involved. I spoke with XXXX and she said she would contact the " Assumptions Department Manager '' that day, and have them call me that day. I never heard from anyone ( XXXX or Assumptions Manager ) .I asked XXXX for her direct line and called her on it on XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX - and left voicemails each time stating I had never heard from the Assumptions Department Manager - and I still have not received one return phone call or message from XXXX . I called the general customer service line today, XX/XX/XXXX and was advised there are still no notes or evidence that the review is moving forward. I want this process completed so that I can move forward with my life, and I 'm concerned that Seterus is taking so long, they 'll tell me my paperwork is out of date again.
Upon reviewing my credit report, I have identified inaccurate accounts that need reporting and correction through your company.

To whom it may concern ; I am writing in regard to the above referenced accounts and transactions. 

This is not a refusal to pay, but a notice that this account is disputed. 

Under the laws of the ( State of Iowa ) UCC 9.506 and State RISA and MVISA statutes a deficiency can not be claimed unless all of the required notices were properly and timely given, and all of the allowable redemption and cure time limits were adhered to. 

Please provide copies of the legal notices and proof of the commercially reasonable manner of the resale of the subject vehicle.

complaint_text:
I obtained a mortgage through XXXX XXXX XXXX. Amerihome Mortgage is now the service provider. I have added additional funds to my monthly payments to reduce the principal in advance. Each time Amerihome has applied the additional funds as an ADVANCE payment to the next months payment. In essence, they are making me pay my interest in advance. 

I have now spoken to them five times. On the first event, they did rectify the issue and applied the payment to the principal. However, for the subsequent months, despite my calling and their assurances that the funds would be reapplied they have not done so.

Despite the multiple previous written requests, the unverified item listed below still remains on my credit report in violation of Federal Law. You are required under the FCRA to have a copy of the original creditor documentation on file to verify that this information is 100 % true, accurate & correct.

In the results of your first investigation and subsequent reinvestigation ( s ), you stated in writing that you verified that this item is being reported correctly? Who verified this account? You have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my signature on it ) as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ). Furthermore, you have failed to provide the method of verification as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 7 ). Please be advised that under Section 611 ( a ) ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA you are required to promptly CORRECT or UPDATE all information which can not be verified.

You have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my signature on it ) as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) Disclosures to consumers [ 15 U.S.C. 1681g ] ( ( a ) Information on file ; sources ; report recipients. XXXX, Equifax, and XXXX shall, upon request, and subject to 610 ( a ) ( 1 ) [ 1681h ], clearly and accurately disclose to the consumer. If the consumer to whom the file relates requests that the first 5 digits of the social security number ( or similar identification number ) of the consumer not be included in the disclosure and the consumer reporting agency has received appropriate proof of the identity of the requester, the consumer reporting agency shall so truncate such number in such disclosure. & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) Procedure in case of disputed accuracy [ 15 U.S.C. 1681i ] ( a ) Reinvestigations of Disputed Information. If the completeness or accuracy of any item of information contained in my file at XXXX, Equifax, and XXXX are disputed by the consumer and the consumer notifies the agency directly, or indirectly through a creditor, the Bureaus shall, free of charge, conduct a reasonable reinvestigation to determine whether the disputed information is inaccurate and record the current status of the disputed information, or delete the item from my file in accordance with paragraph ( 5 ), before the end of the 30-day period beginning on the date on which the agency receives the notice of the dispute from the consumer or creditor Furthermore, you have failed to provide the method of verification as required under 15 USC1681i ( a ) ( 7 ). Please be advised that under 15 USC1681i ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA you are required to promptly REPAIR all information which can not be verified. 

XXXX  XXXX XXXX XXXX Date Opened XX/XX/2014 Balance {$0.00}.

I am writing to formally file a complaint against my mortgage servicer, Cross Country Mortgage, regarding significant issues with their website and payment portal. 

In XXXX, 2024 my mortgage was transferred to Cross Country Mortgage. I had no issues with my previous servicer 's payment system. However, I have encountered multiple problems with the new servicer 's website. 

Firstly, the payment portal only displays the last four digits of the bank account number. My bank increments the middle digits, not the last four, which if i'm being honest has caused the confusion in the first place since I can not verify the account number on the servicers website. Recently, I started using a separate account that coincidentally ends with the same last four digits. 

In XX/XX/year>, I deleted the old bank account information I was making payments with and added the new account details. After making a payment using the saved information, the wrong account was charged. I immediately contacted the servicer to report a potential backend system issue, as I had deleted the old account and entered the new one. The servicer conducted an investigation but determined it was not their fault. I accepted this conclusion as a mistake on my end. 

To avoid further issues, I deleted the saved account and added the new one again when making both XXXX and XXXX 's payments. However, during XXXX 's payment cycle, I decided to use the saved payment information, believing it would be safe. Unfortunately, the old account was charged again, indicating a recurring problem with the servicer 's backend system. 

As a result of these issues, I have incurred {$60.00} worth of NSF ( Non-Sufficient Funds ) fees this year, with each instance costing {$30.00}. This is causing financial harm and undue stress. 

I have formally requested the servicer provide logs of my saved payment entries and the corresponding values, but they have refused to do so. I believe there is a backend database issue causing my saved payment information to be overwritten at some point. However I can't verify whether it's right or wrong account since it only shows the last 4. I servicer also can not verify my current saved information either. 

I am requesting the CFPB 's assistance in resolving this matter. The servicer 's refusal to provide the requested logs is unacceptable, and their system 's deficiencies are causing significant inconvenience and financial harm. 

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

The contrast between my consistent on-time payments for this account and the distress caused by the inaccurate late payment entry is stark. Maintaining punctuality has been my unwavering commitment, and this inconsistency is weighing heavily on my mental well-being, disrupting my sleep and peace of mind. With utmost respect, I urgently request the immediate correction of my account, stressing the urgency of this matter.

complaint_text:
I had Home Equity Line of Credit with XXXX  XXXX XXXX which was modified on XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX I received a letter from XXXX  XXXX XXXX notifying me my loan was sold to Specialized Loan Servicing. On XX/XX/XXXX I received a letter from Specialized Loan Servicing notifying me of the transfer of the service of my loan to them. I received a statement dated XX/XX/XXXX for my first payment with an interest rate of 2 %, that is the interest the loan had with XXXX  XXXX XXXX. I did not received an statement for XXXX, when I check the Specialized Loan Servicing website it showed my payment to be {$140.00}, which was the right amount with an interest rate of 2 %, which I made on XX/XX/XXXX.On XX/XX/XXXX I still have not received an statement, I went on the website and it showed my payment for the month of XXXX to be {$340.00}. I called customer service and was told my loan had a variable rate. My loan had a fixed rate of 2 % until XX/XX/XXXX, and after that a fixed rate of 4.25 % .On XX/XX/XXXX I called XX/XX/XXXXXXXX XXXX and they faxed a copy of my note to Specialized Loan Servicing, I also emailed a copy of my note, and sent it by regular mail USPS , and also send a letter requesting Specialized Loan Servicing to send me a copy of any and all documents they had to determine the interest rate of my loan.As of today XX/XX/XXXX I have not received any documents. On XX/XX/XXXX I checked the website again and the amount was still {$340.00}. I called customer service and was told they received my loan documents but did not know why the payment due still showed {$340.00}. I sent a payment for {$150.00}, which is more of what the payment should have been on XX/XX/XXXX and it was cashed on XX/XX/XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX I called customer service again and asked to speak with a supervisor, was told none was available but I will get a call back, I did not received a call back. On XX/XX/XXXX I called customer service and asked to speak with a supervisor, was told none was available and I was going to get a call back. I did not receive a call back. On XX/XX/XXXX I checked the website and it shows I owe {$520.00}. I called customer service and was told the amount is {$190.00} from XXXX ( the {$340.00} minus the {$150.00} payment I made ) and {$320.00} for XXXX.I asked to speak with a supervisor and again was told none were available and I would get a call back, I requested a copy of the phone conversation since it was being recorded but was told I could not have a copy since it was an internal document, also I asked for a phone number for headquarters and was told the company headquarters was in XXXX. 
Specialized Loan Servicing bought the loan from XX/XX/XXXXXX/XX/XXXX XXXX with a fixed rate, they can not change the terms of the loan. Please I ask your assistance with this matter, I do not what else to do. Thanks.

I am currently attempting to modify an existing XXXX mortgage ( HELOC ) that will be maturing around XXXX/XXXX/2016. The loan is currently serviced by Specialized Loan Servicing LLC or SLS. I 'm attempting to get an extension of the maturity date of the second mortgage since my home is currently underwater in order to avoid a foreclosure or short sale. In the 10 years I 've had this mortgage I 've never once been late, on this second or the first. I began the process of modifying/extending my second mortgage nearly 7 weeks ago with essentially no progress being made during that time, even though I have provided SLS with all the documentation they have requested thus far. I have sent them my pay stubs 5 times now, with each time SLS claiming they either did not receive them or claiming they were unreadable. I receive no feedback from my single point of contact when there is a problem with any of the paperwork, with the responsibility being on myself to constantly call them to status my paperwork. I do not necessarily have a problem calling them to stay on top of things, but the problem with SLS is that they do not answer in bound calls. When I call my single point of contact, XXXX ( Teller ID XXXX ), all I get is an option to arrange a call back. Call backs typically happen two days later, which results is big delays. The biggest issue I 'm facing is that as this process gets drawn out by SLS, paystubs and other documentation become stale and then needs to be resent. On Thursday XXXX XXXX I had my last conversation with XXXX, where she informed me once again that the paystubs I faxed in were hard to read. Prior to that, I had overnighted the paystubs at my own expense, with one time them being lost and the other them becoming tale due to the inaction of SLS in advancing my request. During this last conversation, I expressed my frustration with both her and SLS. She informed me that she is currently assigned over XXXX accounts/clients and does n't have the time to call me back or stay on top of my file. At that point, I requested a call back from a supervisor. As of today, XXXX XXXX I have still not received a call back from her supervisor. In addition, I have called numerous times requesting a call back from XXXX but have not received a call back from her or anyone else at SLS. I am growing frustrated and scared because my loan maturity is now only 4 weeks ago with no sign that SLS is capable of advancing my request. Please help!!!!

I checked my credit report and a company called Choice Recovery , Inc was on my report. It stated account placed for collection opened XX/XX/XXXX in the amount of {$1000.00}. The credit bureaus showed the name of this company and the address. I disputed this with XXXX and XXXX, and both marked it as a valid debt. On XX/XX/XXXX I sent a certified letter to Choice Recovery, inc. asking for proof of what they are saying I owe them. I used the address that was listed on my credit report by both credit bureaus. I did not receive a response so I sent another certified letter to Choice Recovery , Inc. on XX/XX/XXXX. Today, XX/XX/XXXX I received my 1st certified letter back, which was dated XX/XX/XXXX, stating that it was not deliverable to this address. How can these credit bureaus report this as a valid debt when the address they are reporting is not a deliverable address? I'd like to file a complaint against XXXX, XXXX and Choice Recovery , Inc., as all three agencies have failed to provide any proof of this debt and have violated my consumer rights and have damaged my credit.

Experian XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX Subject : Dispute of Late Payment Reporting Capital XXXX # XXXX Dear Experian, This letter serves as a formal dispute regarding the late payment reported on Capital XXXX which you recorded as late in Your response to my previous dispute indicated that the information was { accurate/verified }, yet my initial request did not ask for validation or accuracy confirmation. 

According to 15 U.S. Code 1666b - Timing of Payments, a creditor XXXX not treat a payment on a credit card account under an open-end consumer credit plan as late unless reasonable procedures are in place to ensure that each periodic statement, including the required information under 15 U.S. Code 1637 ( b ), was mailed or delivered to me at least 21 days before the due date. 

Furthermore, under 15 U.S. Code 1681e ( b ), consumer reporting agencies are required to follow reasonable procedures to ensure maximum possible accuracy of the information they report. I requested documentation that you are legally required to possess in order to report my payment as late. 

As per 15 U.S. Code 1681i - XXXX in XXXX of XXXX XXXX, a reinvestigation is required when a consumer disputes the accuracy of reported information. If the furnisher of the information can not provide sufficient evidence to support the reported late payment, the information must be deleted from my credit file. The legal precedent set by XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ( XXXX XXXX at XXXX ) clarifies that if a furnisher can not verify the disputed information with sufficient evidence, it must be reported as can not be verified and removed. 

It has been over 30 days, and Experian has failed to provide the required evidence demonstrating that the reported late payment is accurate. In accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), I am requesting that the late payment entry be deleted from my credit report. 

Requested Action : Please delete the late payment entry associated with : Creditor : Capital XXXX Account Number : XXXX Reported Late Date : XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX If you are unable to verify this information in accordance with the law, I request immediate removal of the inaccurate entry. Please provide a response within 30 days as required under the FCRA. 

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. I expect your cooperation in ensuring my credit report reflects accurate and verifiable information. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
XX/XX/XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX  XXXX Date of Birth : XX/XX/XXXX SS # : XXXX Experian XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX  XXXX Subject : SECOND DISPUTE OF INCOMPLETE AND INACCURATE INFORMATION & REQUEST FOR COMPLIANCE WITH THE FAIR CREDIT REPORTING ACT ( FCRA ) To Whom It May Concern, This is my second formal dispute regarding incomplete and inaccurate information reported by your agency on my consumer report, which has resulted in my denial of employment and an adverse action against me. The inability to obtain employment due to this adverse action has crippled me financially and caused severe damage to my mental health. 
I was advised by a legal friend that under 15 U.S.C. 1681a, Section 603 ( k ) ( 1 ) ( B ) ( ii ), this can be considered an adverse action. Despite my previous request, the matter remains unresolved. The Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ) require that all reported information be accurate, verified, and legally permissible. I am demanding immediate compliance with the FCRA, specifically emphasizing the following legal provisions : 1. 15 U.S.C. 1681e ( b ) Maximum Possible Accuracy The FCRA mandates that consumer reporting agencies ensure the maximum possible accuracy of the information they provide. The continued presence of inaccurate information in my report is a clear violation of this statute, causing harm to my employment opportunities. Your failure to correct this error after my initial dispute is unacceptable. 
Furthermore, the XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX in XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX reinforced that credit reporting agencies must ensure factual accuracy and avoid presenting information in a misleading manner that could adversely affect the consumer. Reporting technically accurate yet misleading information violates the FCRA 's requirement to " follow reasonable procedures to assure maximum possible accuracy. '' 2. 15 U.S.C. 1681n Civil Liability for Willful Noncompliance Given your failure to comply with the FCRA after my first dispute, I am now seeking punitive damages as permitted under this provision. If this issue is not resolved immediately, I will pursue legal action to recover damages for your willful noncompliance.

Requested Actions To rectify this matter, I demand the removal of the inaccurate and incomplete items/accounts listed below : 7. 15 U.S.C. 1681e ( b ) Duty to Ensure Maximum Accuracy XXXX Account Number : XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 


8. 1681i Procedure in Case of Disputed Accuracy- INCOMPLETE AND INACCURATE INFORMATION XXXX XXXX Account Number : XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 


9. 1681i Procedure in Case of Disputed Accuracy- INCOMPLETE AND INACCURATE INFORMATION XXXX  XXXX Account Number : XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 




1. The following personal information is incorrect Account Number : NAME : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX 2. 15 U.S. CODE 1681B - PERMISSIBLE PURPOSES OF CONSUMER REPORTS XXXX XXXX Date of inquiry : XX/XX/XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 


3. 15 U.S. CODE 1681B - PERMISSIBLE PURPOSES OF CONSUMER REPORTS XXXX XXXX XXXX Date of inquiry : XX/XX/XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 


4. 15 U.S. CODE 1681B - PERMISSIBLE PURPOSES OF CONSUMER REPORTS XXXX XXXX Date of inquiry : XX/XX/XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 


5. 15 U.S. CODE 1681B - PERMISSIBLE PURPOSES OF CONSUMER REPORTS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Date of inquiry : XX/XX/XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 


6. 15 U.S. CODE 1681B - PERMISSIBLE PURPOSES OF CONSUMER REPORTS XXXX XXXX XXXX Date of inquiry : XX/XX/XXXX Please remove it from my credit report. 


Legal Liability and Damages for Non-Compliance If this incomplete and inaccurate information is not removed or corrected as per FCRA requirements, I will have no choice but to : File a formal complaint with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ), Federal Trade Commission ( FTC ), and my states Attorney Generals office. 
Pursue legal action against the furnisher and credit reporting agencies under : 15 U.S.C. 1681n Willful noncompliance ( Statutory damages up to {$1000.00} per violation, plus punitive damages ).

15 U.S.C. 1692k FDCPA violations ( Actual damages, statutory damages up to {$1000.00}, plus attorney fees ). 
Additionally, I am sending this letter via certified mail to protect my rights and document your response. 
Final Demand I expect written confirmation within 30 days verifying that these accounts have been permanently deleted from my credit file. Additionally, I demand an updated copy of my credit report reflecting this removal, and that you send a copy of the updated report to all who inquired on my credit in the last 6 months. 
Furthermore, I am keeping a careful record of your actions, including your Method of Verification ( MOV ). I do not consent to E-OSCAR or any means of automated verification. 
Failure to comply will result in immediate escalation, including legal and regulatory action. 
Thank you, Sincerely, XXXX XXXX
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

On XX/XX/year>, I mailed a dispute letter to TransUnion via USPS certified mail, tracking # XXXX, requesting an investigation into inaccurate items on my report. Additionally, I disputed incorrect personal information listed on my credit report. 
I included a copy of my photo ID, social security card, and recent bill with my current address to help TransUnion verify my identity and address. 
I received a response from TransUnion dated XX/XX/year>, stating : We recently received a request that included your information, but it didn't appear that you or a properly authorized third party sent it to us. We take the privacy and security of your data very seriously, so we won't process requests unless they come directly from you or an authorized third party. 
According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), if the completeness or accuracy of any item of information in a consumer 's file at a credit bureau is disputed by the consumer, the bureau must conduct a reasonable reinvestigation to determine whether the disputed information is inaccurate. 
It appears that TransUnion has violated my consumer rights by not conducting a reasonable investigation upon receipt of my dispute, which they are required to do under the FCRA I am including a copy of my dispute letter sent to TransUnion, along with TransUnions response, as proof.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

Under 15 USC 1602p the term unauthorized use, as used in section 1643 of this title, means a use of a credit card by a person other than the cardholder who does not have actual, implied, or apparent authority for such use and from which the cardholder receives no benefit.

Under 15 USC 1692e, this is false and misleading representation. A debt collector may not use any false, deceptive, or misleading representation or means in connection with the collection of any debt. Without limiting the general application of the foregoing, the following conduct is a violation of this section : ( 1 ) The false representation or implication that the debt collector is vouched for, bonded by, or affiliated with the United States or any State, including the use of any badge, uniform, or facsimile thereof. 
( 2 ) The false representation of ( A ) the character, amount, or legal status of any debt; or ( B ) any services rendered or compensation which may be lawfully received by any debt collector for the collection of a debt. 

This is unacceptable behavior. My rights have been violated. the account need to be deleted TODAY.

complaint_text:
I filed a proper dispute with Equifax on a reported judgment that was never recorded. My credit report is allowed to show ONLY " Judgments of Record. '' I disputed this judgment with Equifax , sent Certified mail ( tracking # XXXX ) on XXXX/XXXX/2016, on the grounds just stated. Equifax received my dispute on XXXX/XXXX/2016 according to USPS tracking information. My dispute results are dated XXXX/XXXX/2016 where Equifax states that the results for the judgments are : 1. ) We have verified that this public record is reporting correctly. 

I have checked with my XXXX County Clerk of Court, as well as checked the recorded instruments myself, and there are NO RECORDED JUDGMENTS that exist for me ( proof is attached ). In my dispute letter, I asked Equifax to provide Method of Verification if somehow they verified any existence of recorded judgments for me. I received no Method of Verification, and also the Clerk of Court has no way of verifying the " non-existence '' of a recorded document. 

It is clear that Equifax has not properly investigated this matter within the few short days that it took to read my dispute letter and update my credit file. 

Please note, The XXXX County Clerk of Circuit Court records, indexes and permanently stores ALL recorded judgments with real estate records ( land, deeds, etc ) for XXXX County. The county has no record on file matching what appears on my credit file. 

I have also included a printout from the XXXX County website which shows the website used to search XXXX County public records ( XXXX ) is the valid source to find these documents. This list shows all of the public records that exist in my name, none of which is the judgment being reported in my credit file. I have also included the letter originally sent to Equifax , the credit report with disputed judgments, the USPS tracking ( # XXXX ) showing the timeframe between the dispute being received and the results being sent, and the results of the Equifax dispute. Please delete this judgment from my credit report. 

Please use the proper resources provided by the XXXX County Courts to research Recorded Documents/Instruments, as an automated verification with a third party, or using lists of case files are not thorough investigative actions in researching valid Recorded Documents. 

XXXX County Register 's Office at ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX County Land Records website is XXXX ( Clerk of Court will verify that judgments are in fact listed here with real estate records and deeds if you call or email XXXXXXXXXXXX to inquire ). 

Thank you very much for your time resolving this matter. 

XXXX

I contacted Select Portfolio LLC ( who have held my original mortgage for 9 years ) to try and refinance through the HARP LOAN process. This request was to be completed within 3 months. During this time, Select Portfolio lowered my payments ( to {$820.00} ) while I was pursuing a career in XXXX and XXXX at XXXX College and XXXX College ( XXXX ). After completing the schools, Select Portfolio resumed my original note payment of {$1500.00} per month. I also have a {$190.00} per month HOA payment. I can not make these payments ( even though I rent to XXXX person for {$400.00} per month ). complaint_text: Dear CFPB, I hereby file a complaint/dispute against Select Portfolio Servicing , Inc. on behalf on the grounds of violating my Consumer Protection Rights under the law of the FDCPA and FCRA. On XX/XX/2016 I spoke to XXXX XXXX XXXX of SPS regarding the short sale of XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, IL. in a recorded conversation I was faced w/a nasty attitude and told me it was set for foreclosure. I then called back on XXXX/XXXX/16 along with my realtor XXXX XXXX of XXXX XXXX and spoke w/XXXX who then transferred me to a XXXX XXXX, Loss Litigation & her Supv. XXXX XXXX of SPS in a recorded conversation that said the short sale was denied because my attorney 's office along w/my realtor did not get proper change of buyer forms in by XXXX/XXXX/16. This was untrue as all of this information was submitted accordingly. They went on claiming that we could not close and have a short sale in which I was entitled to {$10000.00} under the HAFA which is in writing. Proof of funds was there by XX/XX/2016. My attorney 's office ( at that time ) also called SPS & explained everything was presented accordingly. SPS continued to give all of us the runaround purposely. SPS kept pursuing " Cash for Keys for {$3000.00} instead ''. Prior to this, SPS had faxed to XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX, Realtor that the Short Sale had been approved by XXXX XXXX XXXX, Senior Vice President of Select Portfolio Servicing, Inc., and all they needed at that time was hardship letter which was submitted XX/XX/2016. For approximately 2 weeks I did not hear anything from SPS and neither did my realtor since XX/XX/2016. Then I received multiple letters DATED XX/XX/2016 but not RECEIVED UNTIL XX/XX/2016 postmarked XX/XX/2016 ( pre-dated on letter ) that SPS and their attorneys XXXX XXXX XXXX had scheduled another Foreclosure date of XX/XX/2016 instead of a Short Sale although SPS would tell my realtor differently as she spoke to several different individuals at SPS and had her resubmitted paperwork including current utility bills for a short sale. I went into the hospital on XX/XX/2016 to have a procedure as I am a XXXX XXXX. On XXXX I called and finally got this alleged XXXX XXXX at XXXX XXXX and tried to explain to him I was in the hospital which was relayed by my realtor, I was disputing the foreclosure and wanted to know what I could do since I was told they needed 38 days for a Short Sale, XXXX XXXX was very nasty and short with me and said it was nothing for me to do but to accept the " Cash for Keys for {$3000.00} '' ), I told him this was wrong because I did not even received all XXXX letters until XX/XX/2016 and that was LESS THAN 30 days notice for me the consumer and property owner notification of a foreclosure and it was n't fair and violated my consumer rights. He said he did not care and that was not his concern or problem and SPS would give me 30 days to vacate and kept saying it was my realtor 's error in which it was not as different ones gave her the runaround and told her a short sale could be pursued. I asked to speak to XXXX XXXX 's Supv he REFUSED to allow me to speak to his Supv named XXXX XXXX. I asked for XXXX XXXX ext. again I was REFUSED by XXXX XXXX, Relationship Manager of SPS and was very nasty. I spent a hour on the phone with SPS in a RECORDED conversation. I told him that SPS was Extortionists and I wanted to file a suit in Federal court he told me he did not care and do what I have to do. I told him that records from SPS needs to be subpoena and recorded conversations as well because SPS gives the consumer, the realtor and attorney the runaround when trying to get a resolution of the situation for a delay and extra time for the short sale. XXXX XXXX told me again, he did not care and do what I had to do. I wish that an Investigation of deceit, fraud, mishandling, fake people can be open up by the Federal government on SPS. I just need more time for Short Sale.

To the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau : CenterState Bank participated in fraud. CenterState Bank is now SouthState Bank. I have been trying to collect this fraud claim since 2012 and since then they had a big merge with another very wealthy bank. They merged during the pandemic smoothly with ease and made them even more wealthy. I tried many, many times to report this to them and have the appropriate action but they chose to protect the participants of fraud. They have refused since 2012 to re-imburse me for fraud, even though their bank clearly has a fraud policy of restoring the victim funds. There are several involved in this fraud including bank employees. There are two bank managers, two lawyers involved and three employees who all obstructed any investigations. They split up about {$250000.00}. They embezzled in just 32 days {$92000.00}. I have every document and every cancelled check and every forged signature. 

I was the only signer on this account and not responsible for fraud, but this was covered up, so they refused to give back my money stolen by fraud. They circumvented law enforcement investigations. 

The bank policy is clear. The victim is not responsible for fraud. This has been my premise from the beginning. I had no signers on this account except me and only me. I was the only signer on the signature card. 

This bank destroyed me and my family while protecting embezzlers. They went way out of their way to protect their two bank managers and perpetrators who devised several fraud schemes. Even to the point of threatening me with charges and jail time for asking for my money back that was supposed to be protected by bank policy. This bank created a life-altering hardship that changed the course of my life. The money stolen was my life savings. I can not emphasize enough the destitution and destruction this bank caused. 

One attorney is so powerful that he protected all the perpetrators and obstructed justice. He prevented an investigation, covered for the two bank managers and protected the embezzlers. Three of these individuals committed Identity Theft by stealing my identity as well. One of the bank managers was convicted in a Federal Court for other unrelated bank fraud. 

One of the bank managers lived next door to me and participated in a home burglary while I was away. This bank, CenterState bank, even participated in mortgage and deed fraud in separate instance which I will be reporting. 
This bank manager told me that I called the bank via phone and added signers to this checking account. She said I called and added debit cards for employees as well as added check signers-by phone. I dont know of a bank anywhere where you can verbally call the bank and put a check signer on an account or authorize debit cards to employees over the phone. If this was done, it was not me and I would have never allowed it. 

I did not call this bank and add a check signer to this or any checking account nor did I call to add any debit cards. If I wanted someone to be a signer to my account I would have gone in with that person with the correct identification. They know this and I know this. This claim is ridiculous and fraudulent. This is their only defense except threatening the arrest of me the victim. What would be the point of having a signature card? What would have been the point of me signing the signature card when I opened this checking account? Under this banks excuse is that anyone could call the bank and add themselves as a check signer. 

They used their considerable influence to keep anyone from being prosecuted then used threats to keep from being exposed of bank fraud and mortgage fraud. After I delivered all the documents, evidence and witnesses enclosed in the screen shot their attorney threatened to have me arrested. This was their latest Obstruction of Justice. 
After I compiled a massive list of witnesses, interviews, documents, actual forgeries and an investigation by a private investigator I submitted it all to the bank. I did this during the pandemic. Their response was they were going to have me charged and warned me to be silent and Govern Myself Accordingly which is a threat. This is from a bank where I deposited hundreds of thousands of dollars. I weighed whether I should file this complaint under multiple and continued threats by the bank, but I have done nothing wrong. I am a crime victim.

( BofA ) has unlawfully allowed my mortgage debt to be assumed and giving the appearance my home and property is to be sold at auction on XXXX XXXX, XXXX at XXXX against my protests and openly nortorious adverse possession public claim. complaint_text:
On XX/XX/XXXX at approximately XXXX XXXX I received an email Withdrawal Notification from Navy Federal Credit Union informing me that {$380.00} was withdrawn from my EveryDay Checking account. Shocked, confused and upset, I contacted NFCU to inquire about and resolve the issue. After several attempts at trying to speak with someone, I was connected with XXXX, who in turn supposedly transferred me to another department for assistance. After being transferred I waited nearly XXXX mins on hold ( without the previous agent coming back to the phone to do a courtesy check ) before finally disconnecting from the call. 

However, soon it dawned on me that the withdrawn funds is the exact amount of a recently submitted claim regarding disputed debit card transaction ( XX/XX/XXXX ) with the merchant XXXX. On Tuesday, XX/XX/XXXX, I received an email from NFCU- Requesting Additional Info : " We could use your help! Strong documentation will greatly assist us in recovering the {$380.00} that may have been charged to your debit card in error by XXXX. '' First of all, with regards to that email and in response, I never indicated to NFCU nor did I indicate it anywhere in my dispute claim that my card was charged in error. What I did state, however, was that I was very dissatisfied with the transaction and provided in depth details surrounding my expectations and results from the service transaction not being met with this particular entity. Secondly, when they sent me that email, I responded to it within 2 days of having received it providing them with the additional information they requested including communications and other supportive evidence and documentations for my claim. I had not heard back from them regarding that claim or my submitted documentation until this recent Withdrawal Notification email I received from them. Funds were unjustifiably, wrongfully and unfairly withdrawn from my checking account. Not only was the business paid in- full for their services at the time of the transaction ( XX/XX/XXXX ), I was never issued a full refund for the transaction by this business. I only received a {$21.00} credit from them after having discovered I had been overcharged for the service. So how dare they double withdraw the amount from my account to give to a business that was already paid. Furthermore, NFCU has never issued me any temporary credit for the withdrawn dollar amount this disputed claim. I have absolutely no record of NFCU ever issuing me a temporary credit for the disputed transaction in the amount of {$380.00}. So, how do you justify a withdrawal in which there was no temporary credit issued for it in the first place? Make it make sense. 

I've noticed that NFCU has definitely changed for the worse with regards to their integrity, dignity, fairness and seemingly now non-existent respect and exceptional customer service to and for all. I've noticed now with this institution that after you've identified yourself via phone with your personal information and or if you're one with multiple disputed transactions and or complaints against a merchant and or NFCU you get treated differently by their phone agents. I guess I am considered an at-risk, problem member, meaning no one cares to really assist you and you find yourself not being helped at all, placed on hold and or transferred and waiting on hold for the next available phone agent for an unusual extended period of time ( without the previous agent coming back to the phone to do a courtesy check ) before you finally decide to disconnect from the call.

I have no doubt this recent withdrawal was done out of spite and with malicious intent. And not to mention there has also been other fairly recent unexplainable, suspicious activity and incident involving this institution in which my in-person check deposit at my local branch was not deposited into my checking account as requested. It was only after I contacted them via phone, that I spoke with a very helpful, mature and seasoned, emphasis on seasoned, representative who went above and beyond to help me by contacting the branch office I visited where I made the deposit that was able to finally get some resolve. And even though, I was contacted by a branch " manager '' regarding the incident, who by the way admitted no explanation nor wrongdoing on their parts, I am convinced that a fraudulent and suspicious activity regarding my bank deposit and checking account had taken place. In fact the helpful agent that I spoke to via phone regarding the incident advised me that if I had not contacted NFCU about the incident that the alleged " clerical error '' would not have been discovered and my funds would not have been recovered. That along with the fact that they were able to pull the surveillance footage from the day of my visit to confirm my in-person check deposit. 
I am truly convinced that this incident along with other recent communications and other highly unfavorable and unsatisfactory dealings with this institution, that they are forcing me after 25 years of loyalty to them, that it is finally time to walk away and bank with a more respectable institution that does not operate under bad, shady and discriminatory business practices. As I stated earlier, the money that was withdrawn from my checking account was done so wrongfully and unfairly. There was and is no absolutely no justifiable reason for this institution to have withdrawn that money from my checking account. Absolutely none. Like I said I had never been issued a temporary credit for the aforementioned dispute transaction, nor have I received a full refund from the merchant for that disputed transaction. Therefore, I want my funds credited back to my checking account immediately.

i just ran a credit report on myself, and could not print an online copy due to what seems like identity fraud. I have seen on my report from equifax that someone has opened a mortgage loan as well as a a car loan and credit card under my information, when I have n't done this.

Hello, I noticed inaccurate accounts and information on my credit report and contacted the 3 credit bureaus about it ( Equifax, XXXX, and XXXX ). I sent letters asking them to validate these accounts and never received anything in the mail or email from this. It has been well over 30 days and I never received any information and the accounts are still on the report. I also sent letters to these three companies to validate this debt or remove them and they still have not been removed. I know that according to the law they have 30 days to validate or delete it. I have not heard from any of the companies. I sent certified letters and copies of my Identification to show that this is me inquiring about my report but nothing. Can you please help with this issue?
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
I am distressed to inform you that you have included inaccurate information in my credit profile and have failed to maintain reasonable procedures in your operations to ensure maximum possible accuracy in the credit reports you publish. Credit reporting laws require that bureaus report only 100 % accurate credit information. YOU ARE VIOLATING FCRA REGULATIONS AND UNITED STATES FEDERAL LAW.

Please block and remove all erroneous information from my credit report and send me an updated copy.

Under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), this disputed item may not appear on my credit report if it can not be supported by any evidence.

15 U.S. Code 1681n - Civil Liability for Willful Noncompliance, 15 U.S. Code 1681o - Civil Liability for Negligent Noncompliance, and 15 U.S. Code 1692k - Civil Liability : I am entitled to monetary compensation due to your multiple violations. Specifically, under FCRA 15 U.S.C. 1681i ( 6 ) ( Notice of Results of Reinvestigation ), a consumer reporting agency must provide written notice to a consumer of the results of a reinvestigation within 5 business days of completion. Failure to do so constitutes a violation of my rights.

Additionally, as per FCRA, a " consumer report '' excludes any report solely detailing transactions or interactions between the consumer and the reporting entity. Including late payments or derogatory statuses constitutes an infringement of 15 U.S.C. 1681a ( d ) ( 1 ).

Accounts listed below in green color highlighted and tag as in violation under 15 U.S. Code 1666 ( b ) billing error are inaccurate late payment history, must be updated to paid on time as never been late as agreed.

( 4 ) The creditors failure to properly reflect a payment made by the obligor or a credit issued to the obligor.

( 5 ) A computation error or similar error in the creditors accounting on a statement.

This is a clear violation of the United States Code Law ( TILA, 15 U.S. Code 1666 ( b ) ). These accounts must be updated to reflect " paid on time. '' Any continuation of providing negative information required by section FCRA 605B ( 15 U.S.C. 1681c-2 ) And Accounts listed below in yellow color highlight text accounts in status of Charge off that is tag FDCPA Section 807 Violation Misleading False Reporting together with incorrect personal information Must be deleted Immediately!.

Collection Accounts listed below in yelow color highlighted that is tag as in violation Under 15 U.S. Code 1681b Permissible purposes of consumer reports i never gave you any written consent to report anything on my consumer report no consent is a violation of U
S Law. Instruction : As a consumer by law this account must be deleted immediately!

Items listed below that is tag as Unauthorize inquiries that's Violated the United States Code Law 15 U.S.C. 1681 ( c ) ( 1 ) ( A ) ( B ) ( i ) ( 3 ) FURNISHING reports in connection with credit or insurance transactions that are not initiated by consumer. Must be deleted in my credit report.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: I had an outstanding medical bill of {$790.00} that was sent to collection with Merchants CR. I called them on XX/XX/XXXX to pay this bill and the representative I spoke to told me that XXXX ( who the medical bill was from ) was offering me a settlement for {$600.00} so long as I paid it within 30 days. I agreed and set up a payment plan of three payments of {$200.00} using my credit card. The first payment was charged to my credit card on XX/XX/XXXX, the day that I set up the payment plan. The second payment was charged to my credit card on XX/XX/XXXX and the third was charged on XX/XX/XXXX. However, on XX/XX/XXXX I called Merchant about a different medical bill that I had paid through the doctors office to see if it had come out of my account and while we were on the phone, the representative I was speaking to mentioned that I still had an outstanding balance of {$790.00} from XXXX. I told him that I had already set up a payment plan and that {$400.00} had already been charged to my credit card. He had no record of this anywhere and I ended up having to fax them a copy of my credit card statement to prove that the money came out. It took them until Friday the XXXX to finally resolve the issue. The woman I set up the payment plan with had applied my money to someone else 's account, but they didn't know whose so essentially they lost my money and their accountant had to go and find it. When they called to tell me that they had located my {$400.00} and applied it to my account, I mentioned that I still had another payment of {$200.00} that was scheduled for XX/XX/XXXX and asked if this was going to be applied to my account or if it was still set up to be applied to someone else 's account. They assured me that they fixed everything and that the final payment would be applied to my account and then also told me that I owed another {$36.00} because the settlement was actually for {$630.00} even though the woman I spoke to told me it was only for {$600.00}. I disputed this and told them that the woman set the payment plan up for {$600.00} and that is the amount I agreed on, therefore that is the amount I'm going to pay. They said that was fine and that they'd take off the {$36.00}. Fast forward to last Friday, XX/XX/XXXX. I called them just to make sure everything was good to go and that my balance was settled. They told me that I still owe {$230.00}. I told them that we had already disputed the extra {$36.00} and that the last {$200.00} had already come out of my account XX/XX/XXXX. They said they have no idea where the last {$200.00} is and assured me they would fix it and asked me to give them a call a back Monday or Tuesday. I just got off the phone with them and when I called they said the same thing : " The {$400.00} we received for your account, but it looks like you still owe {$230.00} ''. It was like the person I spoke to Friday had no recollection of the conversation we had just had. He'd done nothing to try and fix the issue and told me he has no idea how this happened and that his accountant who was able to find and apply the first {$400.00} to my account is out on vacation. This has been going on for over a month now. I've had to take time out of my day at work to call them several times because they keep losing my money. If I hadn't called them last Friday to check and see that all my accounts were paid off, they still would've had me owing {$230.00} to them that I do not owe. No one there seems to know what's going on and none of them seem to know how to fix this issue. Every time I think that it's finally fixed, it turns out that it isn't. I do not trust this company with my money. I still have no idea where my last {$200.00} is and it has been a huge stressful hassle to figure out where the first {$400.00} went.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text:
I was the victim and I'm not sure why the CRA is not complying with the law. The other bureaus have followed suit. Im very confused as to why this one seems to ignore my requests. The bankruptcy which is being reported to my credit report is inaccurate. The case which youre reporting as valid & accurate is actually incorrect. 
I never had a case tried or seen. There was NEVER A JUDGMENT. No judgment means there was never a case. A judge never saw a case so how is one being reported. 
Please see this account is removed from my file at once. 
Bankruptcy XXXX XXXX dismissed Reference # : XXXX PLEASE DELETE!! TU have already removed this account from their records. There was an error present & they were able to find it. I'm confused how you've verified it while the other bureaus have removed. Please delete this from my file. It is inaccurate, erroneous, incomplete or unverifiable.

Hello, Firstly I hope that whoever this message finds does that with them experiencing good health & spirit, and I thank them for using their time assisting me with my current issues. I have to tell you the story starting back in XXXX leading up to our current standing, that's really how long this situation has been kicking me down. In XXXX I started helping someone I had considered a friend and trustworthy by offering him somewhere to stay until his luck turned around. 
His name was XXXX XXXX, I met him at the pool at our apartment complex. He explained how he had recently gone thru a breakup ; he got kicked out of her home that he'd lived in for over a year and now had been sleeping in the Apartment laundry room. I offered him a place on our couch and we went on about life, he didn't have a laptop so I'd let him use mine. He managed to get a job and work for XXXX weeks, my cellphone was due for an upgrade so i sold him my old phone. 
On XX/XX/XXXX my gf, son and daughter went on a camping trip in western NC and XXXX had lived with us for a while without any incident so we thought nothing of it. The trip itself is meant to be a break from " data '' so it wasnt weird to not have talked to anyone until Monday, when we arrived home a bigger picture was made clear. XXXX was gone with my old phone, was my laptop, and some debit cards, and we couldnt find him. The timing was no coincidence as I had gotten my VA benefits on the XXXX, but with the laptop he had managed to change my direct deposit to an account he had setup. Then with money I had aside in my Bank of America, my XXXX, my XXXX XXXX  and my XXXX  account he transferred, cashed out, and just got it anyway he could. I had never been in a situation like this so I was in uncharted territory, he was playing on my emotions really just buying as much time as he could until I had to call someone. The authorities have basically said they will do their best and do what they can but I know thats a hopeless route I don't want to travel, I don't even know his real name. 
I called Bank of America as soon as I found out what happened and disputed the transactions, I've never underwent their dispute process but had seen its " XXXX Liability '' tagline numerous times in ads on their page/app. I disputed the transactions on the XXXX and was instructed to call back after all the charges were final, so that's what I did. The representative I spoke with seemed to be challenged regarding the situation, and it's fine if that was the case, at least shes trying. I've tried to assist and provide my notes but the local branch employee stopped replying to me. Since that day I have checked my dispute status daily, diligently watched my inbox, spoke with a local branch employee who said I had messages to respond to which didn't exist when I checked. I was also told I would need a new debit card for the disputes to be paid out to since the account had to be closed, which ended up with me getting XXXX debit cards somehow. I have gotten no guidance, no support, nothing at all, XXXX communication despite me trying. 
I am a service connected XXXX veteran so I'm on a fixed income, and any cushion I did have was gone after XX/XX/XXXX. It is now XX/XX/25 and my circumstance hasn't changed, and yes I was informed that the process could take up to 40 days but they always say that. I basically haven't had any income since XX/XX/XXXX at this point and the strain on my life/wellbeing is adamant. So here I am tossing up a XXXX XXXX after some research on how to proceed, and I am not necessarily asking for the credits ( I certainly wouldn't turn it away ). Some kind of something would be acceptable instead of just feeling insignificant and forgotten. 
Thanks again for assisting me and giving me your time, I've always felt as though time is undervalued and underappreciated as a gift or gesture. It is after all the one thing we can all give but never get back. 

Best Regards, XXXX XXXX XXXX Bank of America XXXX ID XXXX Account ending XXXX

The company   XXXX   XXXX   is trying to verify our account and has not done so in a timely matter therefore keeping us from accessing borrowing money from them. They 've been trying to access our account since  XXXX   XXXX  it is now  XXXX   XXXX  and they have the option of us contacting the bank or filing a complaint so that we can be able to borrow the funds.

On ( XX/XX/2022 ) I sent a letter regarding inaccurate accounts, bankruptcies and unknown things on my credit report. To this day over 60 days later I have not received a response yet. feel like i'm being taken advantage of and being ignored of my disputes. Section 611 ( a ) it is plainly stated that failure to investigate these items within 30 days gives a reason to immediately remove those items from my credit report. It has been over 60 days so they should be deleted promptly. I demand these accounts be deleted immediately or I will file for litigation due to the stress you caused me. My information was also impacted by the XXXX data breach and XXXX have got into the hands of the wrong person.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
I applied for a modification and was recently denied due to Nationstar mortgage is using debts that I do n't have against me. I asked about the denial and they informed me that I do n't make enough money versus the debt I have, when I asked them to breakdown my debts one of the Representatives stated that since you did n't provide a detailed breakdown of expenses we will generate our own expenses. I stated that I did so and it was already confirmed received and the gentlemen stated on XX/XX/2016 well it does n't matter because we generate our own even if you did It 's up to the underwriter 's discretion. That makes absolutely no sense so I called back and spoke to XXXX at XXXX and was again informed that I was declined due to income versus expenses. She was a lot nicer and provided more information. I was told that Nationstar 's underwriter stated that my water and sewer bill was {$450.00} a month when she sees that the financial breakdown of my expenses says {$65.00} and something called other for {$1500.00}, I asked what that other was for and she said no one knows but the underwriter and because they said other is {$1500.00} and water & sewer is {$450.00} then it stands. 
I am so appalled that a financial institution that has received bailout money to help me with a Government modification can disregard facts and make-up debts to decline homeowners. I am not going to allow Nationstar to make me a victim and let me lose my home.

I had a heloc inXX/XX/XXXX with Bank of America. In the amount of {$56000.00}, of which I received ONLY {$25000.00} in XX/XX/XXXX. 
The HELOC reached a high balance of {$100000.00}, I believe, unbeknoweth to myself prior to XX/XX/XXXX. I learned of this error high balance upon speaking with a BOA representative while attempting to correct the item with the credit bureau. 
This item was on the file with the credit bureaus, in error, exceeding the seven year statute, from XX/XX/XXXXthru XX/XX/XXXX. 
I had great difficulty having this fraudulent act removed from my credit file. 
BOA charged off the account in XX/XX/XXXX, and sold the account to a collection agency, who I spoke with and are attempting to collect on an outdated account. 
The property was sold at XXXX County auction for one year unpaid property taxes, which was the equity for the {$56000.00} BOA HELOC. 
I never received a BOA bank statement concerning my HELOC deposit into my BOA checking/savings account, nor did I receive any deposit interest on the {$25000.00} that I initially received in the BOA HELOC, which possibly accrued interest adding up to over {$1000.00} per month for years, I received no withdrawal statements from BOA amounting to over {$81000.00} in transactions. 
I received a letter from BOA stating thefts from accounts at BOA and mine may have been affected in XX/XX/XXXX. 
In XX/XX/XXXX my BOA account had Overdraft fees for checks written on my account amounting to over XXXX XXXX dollars in less than one month, this did not include the amounts of the checks, which I know not, who wrote the checks, because I received no bank statements from BOA and I had an all time consuming fire in XX/XX/XXXXallegedly caused by a XXXX recalled fan motor. 
A successful Civil tort was pursued by XXXX  on my and XXXX  behalf of which I received XXXX proceeds for my demolished home insured by XXXX XXXX XXXX. 
Identity theft of myself by a BOA employee and fraudulent monetary gains activity, I suspect in this Bank of America matter.

PRIOR COMPLAINT : I closed on a property at XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX IL XXXX. Us bank much to my horror purchased my account. I was unable to setup autopay because of an existing secure credit card I opened about a year prior and had been unable to close or access the secured funds, even after repeatedly contacting them. Due to this card I couldnt access either account. I finally got a copy of this credit card to actually utilize my own funds theyd refused to return for a year. However, after receiving the card I couldnt make a payment to it online and couldnt get a statement sent to me, knowing I still had about XXXX $ credit I closed the account hoping this would clear up mortgage drama plus I cant pay an account they wont give me payment information on. They then held that account open until finance charges applied so they wouldnt have to return any money to me. On XXXX XXXX I went to pay my mortgage and they said I owed almost XXXX instead of XXXX. I said I dont have XXXX I have XXXX. I went from department to department explaining I do not owe the taxes, clearly there has been an error. In the state of XXXX I do not pay property taxes which is why I bought a home here and not Indiana. I am a 100 % Permanent and Total Service Connected XXXX ( medically retired ) veteran. That entitles me to XXXX property taxes. I said Id clear it up I still wanted to pay mortgage. They refused. They refused to correct the issue, they refused to take the mortgage payment. I contacted the state of IL and went to XXXX office to submit form and copy of ID proving my status. They stated theyd clear it up. I have all 3 past due mortgage payments. Now theyre stating I owe almost XXXX for this years taxes- again, I dont owe them. This is the law. ALL paperwork was provided in order to write the loan WITHOUT property taxes to get it to clear closing. In the meantime it has come to my attention that this loan should never have been approved. I am missing disclosures from the seller, the hvac collapsed, the window doesnt shut and is stuck open, there is no heat, the foundation wall crack that was repaired is leaking, there is a profound mouse and electrical problem the seller had to have known about. I want to return this house in a deed in lieu of foreclosure. I am suing the parties involved in this sale and us bank for negligence and breach of contract. I NEVER refused to pay my mortgage. I have never not been able to pay my mortgage and I can prove this because I am using the money to move out. By failing to accept my payment over a tax bill I provided proof I do not pay AT CLOSING, and then push me into foreclosure while waiting to prove I do not owe taxes us bank has failed their end of this financial obligation and contract in what appears to be a breach of contract. It WILL be cleared up by the state that I do not, in fact, owe taxes. Also- us bank technically would be owing me money over this had they not chosen to refuse the mortgage payment. Likewise I couldnt escape the home from XXXX had they not been so blatantly ignorant. I was always transparent- I am being so now. They FAILED to honor their agreement and are forcibly foreclosing on me in the process when the money was always available to make the payments. Please assist
