complaint_text:
I have lived in my home for 30 years and am in danger of losing it at auction due to the actions of my lender Caliber Loans. I have endured extraordinary hardship and have slowly rebuilt my life and situation. However, Caliber has refused to open a review of my current financial situation, has not assigned a case manager or dedicated contact and has told me the only options is to short sale or reinstate the loan in full, which is not possible. I do n't understand how they can refuse to even CONSIDER working with me or helping me or looking at my current financial situation, which has changed considerably since my last review. They received millions in bailout dollars, I thought they were supposed to look at my information and give me a chance. 

I refinanced into this loan in 2007. A little over a year later when my wife turned XXXX she decided to take off and go on the road as a XXXX, abandoning me and the kids. XXXX. There were long periods of unexplained absences and several months later I had divorce papers drafted. XXXX At that time I had been taking care of the kids and making the mortgage payment since she had deserted us six months earlier. However the police came and we went to court. I could not afford an Attorney and my wife was granted XXXX as well as control of the house. I was forced to leave the house and my kids and had to move into an apartment. My employer found out about the XXXX and I lost my job as well. I eventually found a job XXXX and had to XXXX in my spare time to sell it in order to keep myself fed. I obviously was not in a position to make the mortgage payment. 

During that time my wife never made the mortgage payment, and let the house, the lawn and the pool go. I started my own company doing right sizing -- I am brought in to save them money and have slowly built this up into a good income source. I fought the XXXX and was eventually able to get back into the house and was able to get wife out and divorce finalized. I tried to put my life back in order XXXX step at a time. I contacted XXXX to see what could be done and at XXXX point I was apparently offered an interest only modification. I found out about this after the fact, I did not see the paperwork until the offer had expired and I suspect that my ex wife who was still lurking around at that time had something to do with that. 

I have tried since then to re-engage with Caliber and have not made any progress. My business and income have continually increased and now my son who lives in the house is working as well and contributing his share. If Caliber were to actually take the time to review me for all retention options, something they are REQUIRED to do due to their acceptance of government bailout funds they would see that I fit into guidelines for assistance. Their continued refusal to even give me a seat at the negotiating table is outrageous.

ATTN : Risk Management Officer To whom this may concern, I XXXX XXXX permit TRANSUNION, EXPERIAN, EQUIFAX to investigate my credit report for 100 % accuracy 15 US Code 1681e ( b ). This is a DEMAND TO COMPLY LETTER with written instruction related to I the consumer Under 15 U.S. Code 1681b ( a ) ( 2 ). Under the Fair Credit Reporting Act has been established by Congress, your agency 's role to me the principal, A consumer, is to adopt reasonable procedures to uphold the need to ensure that your grave responsibilities fairness, impartiality, and respect for my right to privacy must be maintained for maximum accuracy. Under 15 U.S. Code 1681e et seq, you may not procure or furnish a consumer report without following 15 U.S. Code 1681b ( a ) ( 2 ) as my written instructions. There has been a violation of these reasonable procedures because as I showed within my attachments there has been inaccurate and unverifiable information removed from another consumer reporting agency and has not been removed from your system. You should be aware your failure to maintain your reasonable procedures for maximum accuracy has resulted in a conspiracy that deprived me of my right under the Truth in Lending Act subsection 1602 ( f ) to extend new credit for me. This deprivation of my rights is a federal criminal violation under 18 U.S. Code 241. I am well aware that the reasonable procedures requiring each consumer reporting agency to compile and maintain consumer files nationwide shall establish and maintain a notification system jointly with other such consumer reporting agencies under 15 U.S. Code 1681b ( e ) ( 6 ).

Understand this is NOT a dispute letter as there is nothing to dispute. I am DEMANDING you, the agent, follow your fiduciary responsibility to me and REMOVE/DELETE the following information from my consumer file. This has been an egregious failure to follow your very own reasonable procedures required by the Fair Credit Reporting Act. 
With the Metro 2 Compliance standard letters, you will see my identifying information and my consumer report from TRANSUNION, EXPERIAN, EQUIFAX which shows this inaccurate and unverifiable information. 
However, these accounts are reported to the reporting agencies. This should not exist. To maintain the maximum possible accuracy, you must have joint systems to notify each other of this incorrect information as consumer reporting agencies. This violation and failure to maintain your reasonable procedures for maximum accuracy are false and misleading reporting. This information is also incorrect and falsely reports Metro 2 fields that do not match Transunion, Experian, and Equifax. I demand these accounts be removed from the consumer report by your consumer reporting agency for the federal law violation of failure to maintain your reasonable procedures for maximum possible accuracy and violation for failing to promptly delete the items of information as required for treatment of inaccurate or unverifiable information according to 15 U.S. Code 1681i ( 5 ) ( A ). 
REMOVE/DELETE the following accounts. 


REMOVE these accounts UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY, DELETE these accounts for violation of 15 U.S. Code 1681e, Failure to maintain reasonable procedures, 15 U.S. Code 1681b ( e ) ( 6 ), FDCPA Violation of 15 U.S. Code 1692e False and Misleading reporting, Violation of 15 U.S. Code 1681i ( 5 ) ( A ). Deprivation of Rights 18 U.S. Code 241.

I am demanding my remedy for your willful noncompliance with each violation of the law.

? Violation of 15 U.S. Code 1681e- {$1000.00}? Violation of 15 U.S. Code 1681b ( e ) ( 6 ) - {$1000.00}? Violation of 15 U.S. Code 1692e- {$1000.00}? Violation of 15 U.S. Code 1681i ( 5 ) ( A ) - {$1000.00} Total Amount Due : {$4000.00} I am well aware you have no legal standing in court and numerous cases of case law illustrate that the consumer reporting agencys failure to maintain reasonable procedures is grounds for a suit and judgment in favor of the plaintiff. I am not afraid to take legal action to cure my injury brought by each company. 
l am demanding that you immediately remove this transaction from my report as it violates my rights as a federally protected consumer under Title 15 Chapter 41. I understand that you must notify me within 30 days and provide me with an updated copy of my credit report. Your willful noncompliance has civil liability under 15 U.S. Code 1681n et seq. 
CC : Registered Agent CC : XXXX XXXX : Privacy Compliance Officer CC : CFPB CC : XXXX XXXX : XXXX XXXX XXXX  XXXX : Federal Trade Commission XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

complaint_text:
This mortgage was originated with XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX in the fall of XXXX, in order to reduce my mortgage interest rate with XXXX at the time that was more than 7 %. My experience with XXXX I was victimized three times. 
1. XXXX withheld one of my payments without posting it and then reported me to the credit bureau for being late. 
2.XXXX  to increased my mortgage payments because the XXXX XXXX XXXX Department of water , claimed that I owed them a {$10000.00} as I was disputing the charges with the XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX water Dept. I had to take out a loan to pay the bank or have a {$1000.00} mortgage increase. 
I have a single family home but my bill was sometime {$700.00} but this stopped was I had them installed a new water meter. My water bill since average {$200.00}.

So as I started this new account I always paid my mortgage a month ahead. Through automatic deductions 1. Freedom mortgage have held my automatic deductions payments at one time just like XXXX but they could not report it to the credit bureau.

My mortgage, however call for me to pay my own taxes and insurance : 1. I call the XXXX XXXX XXXX Department of finance,  they informed me that my tax payments were on time. 
I mailed my XX/XX/XXXX tax payment in XX/XX/XXXX, the was paid on XX/XX/XXXX approximately. So the city have started a new pay by phone system.

My next tax payment is due in XX/XX/XXXX And my insurance is paid until XX/XX/XXXX My next mortgage payment should be XX/XX/XXXX, but my bank changed it to XX/XX/XXXX for an increase of nearly {$400.00}.

I am requesting for them to remove from my credit bureaus ASAP.

complaint_text:
In response to the SPS replies of late, 1. " SPS is a mortgage servicer '' does not say that SPS is or ever was " servicing '' my alleged unpaid loan account. This is an obvious attempt to avoid making the assertion that they should be making and instead replacing it with an implication. Their response implies that they have been servicing your payments and making distributions to your creditor. If that is not true, then their statement is irrelevant. 
2. I object to the assertion that SPS is the company that performs any functions with respect to physical receipt, processing, depositing or disbursement of funds in relation to any account bearing my name or any unpaid loan account on the ledger of any creditor. And they don't say that they do represent such a creditor or that they do perform such functions. If they mean they do other things that technically complies with the definition of " Servicer '' then they should say what they mean or not say it at all, since that is irrelevant to the question of validation of the debt. 
3. " servicing of your account was transferred to SPS from XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX ''. They do not state that XXXX was performing the aforesaid functions of a servicer either. AND it fails to respond to my question or request for documents, to wit : if the servicing was transferred this " misunderstanding '' could be cleared up potentially by presenting the agreement between XXXX and SPS. Under representations and warranties, the issues would be clearly stated as is required in all documents involving banks. Neither of them assert that they represent as agent any creditor who maintains an unpaid account due from me. 
4. " SPS services the account according to the terms of the enclosed Note and Deed of Trust that were signed at origination. '' This is untrue unless they are willing to assert that they are in the business of accreting payments from me and that they have received payments from me and deposited those payments to the benefit of a creditor or otherwise distributed the funds for the benefit of a creditor. 
5. " we have also enclosed your Home Affordable Modification Agreement, SPS Transaction History, XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  Account Activity Statement, Corporate Advance History, Escrow Disbursement History, and Fee History. '' This is not relevant without an assertion and corroboration of the existence of an unpaid receivable account owed to some identified creditor who will acknowledge both the debt owned by them and their appointment of XXXX or SPS as their agent. A copy of the ledger certified by the alleged creditor is what I am asking for, not some random report run by remote financial technology companies. 
6. " Please understand that servicing rights and duties are established by contract between the Noteholder and the servicer. '' This is only true if the noteholder is the owner of the underlying debt. The servicing contract has not been produced. Normal servicing contracts would have the principal ( creditor ) warrant ownership and authority over the asset that is being managed by the servicer. 
7. " As the servicer, SPS is responsible for enforcing the Deed of Trust and Note on behalf of the Noteholder. '' This statement is untrue. It is not responsible nor even authorized to enforce unless selected and appointed to do so by an identified creditor who affirms ownership of the debt and the appointment of SPS to enforce it. This is exactly what I have been asking to receive and they keep evading the question. 
XXXX. XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  successor trustee to XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, successor in interest to XXXX XXXX XXXX as trustee, on behalf of the holders of the Washington XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX is the Noteholder of the account, and SPS is the mortgage servicer. '' SPS can not be the mortgage servicer, unless it is acting as the agent of a creditor who can produce an authorized officer or employee to affirm the ownership of a debt owed by me to that creditor. XXXX XXXX is not the successor trustee to XXXX XXXX XXXX, unless it was authorized to do so by the party who created the trust, along with the consent of the beneficiaries of the trust. The trust agreement in which XXXXXXXX XXXX was originally named, can not possibly qualify XXXX XXXX as a successor trustee under the terms of the trust agreement. My argument with this is that, regardless of whether or not the trustor agreed to the change of trustee, and regardless of whether or not this change could've been ratified by the beneficiaries, no such agreement or consent was ever given. ThereforeXXXX XXXX XXXX has no right to be operating as the trustee for the alleged trust. ( which doesn't own the debt anyway ). Since neither the trust agreement for this particular trust, nor any evidence of consent or authorization by the trust, or beneficiaries, is even referenced, this statement is pure nonsense designed to provoke the reader into implying or inferring that these formalities have been satisfied. Remember that the trust itself, even if it exists, it's just a legal fiction based on following the formalities required by statute. Lastly, the reference is not to XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  or even XXXX XXXX being a trustee for a trust. it is an assertion that they are trustees or agents for certificate holders. Once again the attempt is to provoke the reader into implying or inferring that the certificate holders are beneficiaries. But without any doubt that the certificate holders are not beneficiaries of any trust. XXXXXXXX XXXX owes no fiduciary duty to any certificate holder and in litigation, XXXX XXXX has repeatedly and successfully defended against lawsuits filed by certificate holders asserting that XXXX XXXX  owed any duty to them. 
9. " While there is no recorded assignment to provide to you at this time, the mortgage assignment is tracked through the Mortgage Electronic Registration Systems ( MERS ) electronic registry. MERS tracks the ownership and servicing of some mortgage loans in the United States. '' The statement is not only untrue, it is blatantly fraudulent. There is no recorded assignment because the XXXX was never purchased, sold, or even assigned on paper. This grows out of false claims that XXXX XXXX  has mostly abandoned. When it acquired the assets of XXXX XXXX  on XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX illegally took the position in courts across the country that every loan that had been originated by XXXX XXXX, was owned by XXXX, even though those loans were all subject to claims of securitization just like my transaction. The only public records that exist in our system of government and laws are the public records that are maintained by public authority. They are trying to tell me that a private entity is an acceptable substitute for public records. This goes one step further than the usual fatal deficiency in claims made. Usually, there is at least a fake assignment. In this case, they admit that no such assignment can be produced. Considering the time in which they have been able to perform research and do diligence, it is reasonable to require a court to make a negative inference. : that a new purchase and sale of the underlying obligation, note or mortgage has ever occurred. They are attempting to launder the title to lien.

complaint_text:
I disputed several inquiries both with the original company and the credit reporting agencies, none of the original companies responded to my letters. XXXX letters were sent 30 days apart and none responded. Credit Bureaus refusing to remove the listings. 
AMERICAN EXPRESS XXXX/XXXX/2016

I purchased my house in XXXX of 2019. I signed the contract with agreement to the established predetermined payment. I recently received my mortgage payment and discovered it had increased by {$400.00} p/mo. No explanation, or previous notification was provided. After making numerous calls to the lender, as well as the tax collector 's office, I finally discovered that the lender made an error at the time of the sell by underestimating the annual property tax. 
The lender is now charging me an additional {$200.00} p/mo. for the corrected property tax amount. This I understand. The part I am not in agreement with is the additional {$200.00} p/mo. that they are now charging me to compensate for the loss they incurred this past year as a result of their error. 
Thank you in advance for your time and consideration with this matter.

I am currently in the process of buying a new home and have found out that this collection is drastically affecting my credit score and the debt is actually not mine. I called ProCollect today and the collection is actually associated with my ex-wife 's address ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Tx XXXX ). Had I known at the time that it would affect my credit so much or that it was actually my ex-wife 's debt not mine ( see attached divorce decree ) as she was awarded the home in XXXX of XXXX and the collection is from XXXX of XXXX and it hit my credit report in XXXX of XXXX, I would not have paid the small bill. 

Below is the a copy of the collection from my credit report, this is drastically affecting my credit score for a debt that I actually didn't owe ( but did pay to save myself time and because my business keeps me very busy ) and now could cost me thousands in finances costs to purchase a new home. I request that the collection be deleted from my credit report.

To Whom It May Concern, I am submitting this formal complaint regarding a fraudulent debt reported by XXXX at XXXX and XXXX failure to properly investigate and remove this disputed account from my credit report. 

Issue Summary : XXXX at XXXX is attempting to collect on a debt I do not owe for alleged damages they have failed to substantiate with any proof. 
I formally requested an itemized list of charges and receipts from the apartment complex in XXXX and again in XXXX to verify the validity of this debt. 
Each time, the apartment complex failed to provide proof and eventually ceased communication while still reporting this debt to collections. 
I have disputed this account multiple times with XXXX, yet they continue to report it, despite the lack of supporting documentation from the original creditor. 
All other credit bureaus ( XXXX and XXXX ) have removed this fraudulent debt, confirming that it is invalid. 
Requested Resolution : I am requesting that the CFPB : Investigate and require XXXX at XXXX to provide verifiable proof of the debt, including an itemized list of charges and supporting receipts. 
Ensure XXXX permanently removes this fraudulent debt from my credit report, as they have failed to verify its legitimacy. 
Hold XXXX  at XXXX and XXXX accountable for violating my rights under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). 
This ongoing issue has caused unjust harm to my credit score, and XXXX failure to remove this disputed debt is a clear violation of consumer protection laws. If this matter is not resolved promptly, I will escalate further legal action as necessary. 

I appreciate your urgent attention to this matter and look forward to your response.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

Now its placed back on their again in XX/XX/2017 as if i was just late with my payment, this was corrected by me and all applicable statements and proof that this account was no longer in these creditors were not in this status was provided to them in XX/XX/XXXX. My payments are current and the date that they have listed on the account as last paid is also incorrect. The last payment made on both of these accounts were in XX/XX/XXXX. This is not correct on my credit and its painting a negative image to my name as if i was XXXX payments behind with both of these creditors. Please see attached for XXXX im locked out of XXXX and unable to get credit history for submission.

As the result of a single button-press in their XXXX app to receive more information, Wells Fargo enrolled me in a forbearance program for my home equity line of credit. 

I pushed a button in their XXXX app to learn more about payment assistance for my home equity line of creditseemed like a good idea given the uncertainties at the time. Next thing I know, I received a number of letters in the mail stating that they had approved a forbearance and that they were suspending my ability to draw on the remaining {$60000.00} available credit in my account. I did not skip any payments ( in fact, I made a {$5000.00} principal payment just after pushing the button ), and have a flawless record of on-time payments on this and all of my other accounts over my entire adult lifetime ( XXXX years ). My credit rating is PERFECT. 

I immediately phoned WF and spent weeks talking to more than 10 different people. Several of the people agreed to cancel the forbearance and restore my ability to make withdrawals, but in the end the forbearance was cancelled before it went into effect ( good ) but they said I would have to submit my two most recent income tax returns and re-qualify for the full line of credit before my draws could be reinstated ( not good ). I also asked WF to reverse the {$5000.00} payment I had just made. They did not refuse but kept stalling me until it was too late. According to WF, because I applied for a forbearance ( I merely wanted more details ), that indicates that Im having financial problems ( Im not ), and they dont want me to get further in debt. How someone with their assumed " financial problems '' can make a {$5000.00} principal payment I don't know. Im lucky, I have other assets I can draw on. But someone who doesnt have other assets and was negatively affected by the current COVID-19 crisis would almost certainly be forced into foreclosure were their access to {$60000.00} of available credit to suddenly disappear. Perhaps thats the goal. In my case, Wells Fargo could take possession of a $ XXXX house for $ XXXX and keep the difference. Seems like a tidy profit opportunity to me. 

Adding insult to injury, my credit report still reflects {$180000.00} in available credit for this loan, even though Im locked out of $ XXXX of it. This essentially prevents me from obtaining a smaller line of credit to replace the frozen {$60000.00}. Whats more, as I pay down the balance, the amount of available '' credit ( which is actually frozen ) will continue to rise, so my borrowing ability will likely be hindered for the next 20 years or until the HELOC is paid off.

To Whom It May Concern : This letter is a formal dispute regarding the major inconsistencies found in the reporting of my XXXX XXXX XXXX credit account. The information presented on my credit report is contradictory and demonstrates inaccurate reporting by the data furnisher ( XXXX XXXX XXXX ) and the consumer reporting agencies. 
Key Findings and Discrepancies * Contradictory Account Status : Open vs. Charged Off * The current details of my account ( Image XXXX ) present it as open and active. It shows a current balance of {$63.00}, a credit limit of {$1200.00}, and recent payment history for XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX. The primary alert states, " You have missed a payment on this account. '' * However, a recent change to my report ( Image XXXX ) explicitly states that between XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX, a remark for " Charged off account '' was removed. 
* Discrepancy : These XXXX statuses are mutually exclusive. An account can not be both open and actively reporting monthly payments while also being " charged off. '' The fact that my account was reported as charged off just days ago is in direct conflict with its current presentation as an open, active account. This strongly suggests that the reporting is fundamentally inaccurate. 
* Inaccurate Reporting Following My Consumer Dispute * My credit report shows that a remark was recently added to the account : " Consumer disputes- reinvestigation in progress '' ( Image XXXX ). This is correct, as I did initiate a dispute. 
* Following my dispute, the " Charged off account '' remark was removed ( Image XXXX ). 
* Analysis : While a change was made as a result of my dispute, the outcome is still inaccurate. Instead of correcting the account to show a {$0.00} balance and closed status or deleting the account entirely, it has been modified to appear as a standard open account with simple delinquencies. The underlying negative information remains, but in a new, equally confusing and inaccurate context. 
* Violation of " Maximum Possible Accuracy '' * The FCRA requires that CRAs follow " reasonable procedures to assure maximum possible accuracy '' of the information in reports. 
* The combination of conflicting information ( open vs. charged off ), the confusing changes made after my dispute, and the remaining delinquencies creates a misleading picture of my account 's actual status and history. An account that was severe enough to be charged off should not suddenly appear as a standard open account with a couple of late payments. This reporting fails the standard of maximum possible accuracy. 
* Potential Mathematical Inaccuracy in Payment History * The account details ( Image XXXX ) state, " You've made 75 % of payments on time. '' * My account was opened in XX/XX/XXXX, which is a XXXX period. The visible history for XXXX shows XXXX on-time payments and XXXX missed payments. 
* To achieve 75 % on-time payments over XXXX  months, I would need approximately 6.75 on-time payments ( XXXX \times 0.75 ). Even if my first XXXX payments were on time, that would be XXXX on-time payments out of XXXX total, which is 77.8\ %. If only XXXX of the first XXXX were on time, that would be XXXX out of XXXX, or 66.7\ %. The 75 % figure appears arbitrary and is another example of inaccurate data being reported on my account. 
Legal Framework : My Rights Under The Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) My rights in this situation are protected by the FCRA. The key provisions are : * 15 U.S.C. 1681i ( FCRA 611 ) : This grants me the right to dispute inaccurate information on my credit report. The CRA must then conduct a " reasonable reinvestigation '' within 30 days.

* 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( b ) ( FCRA 623 ) : This places duties on the furnisher of the information ( XXXX XXXX XXXX ). Once notified of my dispute by a CRA, they must conduct their own investigation. If they find the information is inaccurate, incomplete, or can not be verified, they must notify all CRAs to which they reported to permanently delete or modify the information.

complaint_text: I contacted Chase Mortgage company to report I would have a difficult time paying my mortgage for that month due to family medical issues. There web site says contact us if you are going to have problems paying your payments so that they can help. When I called I was told there is no program for a person missing one payment and that it would hurt my credit but would not cause me to lose my house if I worked on paying it back. Due to the ongoing medical issue I was unable to make the XX/XX/XXXX payment and I called again, they said they could help once I fill out a packet they were going to send me and that I could lose my home if it 's not paid in 5 months. I got the packet and it was so overwhelming I thought I was buying a house all over again, not user friendly and for a man who 's wife has been in and out of the hospital during the course of this process it was next to impossible for me to get this done when I count on my wife to do this stuff for me when I 'm at work. So I have filled to have a chunk of my retirement released from a XXXX plan, I have since been trying to pay my XX/XX/XXXX mortgage payment and the first time on XX/XX/XXXX they provide a confirmation number and said it would be taken out. After about 5 days and the money not coming out I call to find out what happened and they told me it was returned for NSF but there is no indication of that on my account and the money was in the account, another payment was scheduled with conformation number XXXX, this payment did n't come out I called back and set up another after complaining that I feel my bank is setting me up to lose my home they assured me that 's not the case and that the money would come out XX/XX/XXXX confirmation number XXXX this money still has not come out of our account. I get a letter on XX/XX/XXXX stating that if I do n't pay my outstanding balance by XXXX that they will start the foreclosure process. I 'm doing everything I can to make this right and have tried from the day I found out I would n't be able to pay my mortgage payment, I am a professional who is employed with the same employer for 2 years and make XXXX a year I just need some help for the family issue we had. I owe the money and any penalties that go with that but I need to be able to work something out.

Subject : Request for Removal of 30-Day Late Payment Due to Nationally Declared Disaster Dear Sir/Madam, I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing to humbly request your assistance regarding a financial hardship that occurred during the nationally declared disaster in XXXX, which I addressed with XXXX. My intention is to seek your understanding and compassion in addressing a 30-day late payment that has continued to cause a significant financial burden. 

During the declared disaster in XXXX, our household was severely impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic. Several members of my family, including myself, XXXX XXXX XXXX, which led to an inability to work and maintain regular income. As a result, despite our consistent efforts to manage our finances responsibly, we fell behind on one bill payment during this challenging time. 

The 30-day late payment, which occurred during this period of extreme hardship, was an isolated incident in an otherwise impeccable payment history. The account in question has since been paid off, and I have continued to uphold responsible credit practices. However, this single late payment has had a lasting negative impact on my credit report, affecting my ability to secure financial stability for my family. 

I am appealing to your sense of fairness and humanity to consider the extraordinary circumstances that led to this oversight. The COVID-19 pandemic was a time of unprecedented struggle for many, and I believe that showing compassion and understanding in such situations aligns with the principles of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau . 

I kindly request the removal of the 30-day late payment from my credit report as a gesture of goodwill and recognition of the hardships faced during the nationally declared disaster. This adjustment would not only alleviate the ongoing financial burden but also allow my family and me to move forward from a time we would prefer to leave behind. 

Thank you for considering my request. I sincerely hope for a favorable resolution and am willing to provide any additional information or documentation that may be required. 

Yours faithfully, XXXX XXXX

I have sent police reports ( see attachments ) to collection agency and creditor but none have responded regarding this. So I'm reaching for you guys help which I desperately need to REMOVE this account from my credit report. Immediately! This has affected my life so negatively. I need this removed As Soon As Possible.

complaint_text: I noticed on my credit report that the bureaus transunion and XXXX are reporting that Ive been late towards my XXXX credit card numerous times. Today XX/XX/XXXX, I spoke to a representative in the XXXX credit department to correct the information stated and it was confirmed to me that there has only been XXXX late payment back in XX/XX/XXXX. I am disputing that my credit report should update the proper information regarding late payments made so the courtesy to increase my credit scores can be provided

XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX, OK XXXX Date of Birth : XX/XX/XXXX SSN : XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX Date : XX/XX/XXXX TransUnion Consumer Solutions XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, PA XXXX XXXX : XXXX Dear Sir/Madam : Upon reviewing my credit report, I have identified certain incorrect information that needs to be corrected immediately. Below, I detail the inaccurate information that should be removed, as well as the correct information that should be reflected in my credit report : Incorrect Information to Be Removed : Incorrect Name ( XXXX ) : XXXX XXXX ; XXXX XXXX XXXX ; XXXX XXXX XXXX Incorrect Address ( es ) : XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX, OK XXXX XXXX XXXX WAY ; XXXX, XXXX XXXX ; XXXX WAY XXXX, OK XXXX XXXX Information to Be Reported : Full Name : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Correct Date of Birth : XX/XX/XXXX Correct Social Security Number : XXXX Correct Address : XXXX XXXX Way, XXXX, OK XXXX Current XXXX : I have attached a copy of my government-issued identification and a utility bill to substantiate the accuracy of my correct personal information. This documentation should help expedite the verification and correction of the information in my report.

Additionally, I believe that these informational errors may be affecting my credit score and could potentially result in unjust credit denials or misrepresentations of my identity, with the risk of associating me with fraudulent activities.

Request for Investigation and Procedures Pursuant to Section 611 ( a ) ( 6 ) ( B ) ( iii ) of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), I request a detailed summary of the procedures used to verify the accuracy of the information on my report. This summary should include all steps taken during the reinvestigation.

Additional Request Please note that any automated response generated through the e-OSCAR system will be considered insufficient to resolve this dispute. I demand a thorough manual investigation and a personalized response addressing each of the points raised, in full compliance with applicable legal requirements. 
I also request that all phone numbers listed on my credit report be removed, as I have been a victim of unsolicited robocalls. Additionally, I would appreciate confirmation of receipt of this dispute and periodic updates on the status of the correction, using the mailing address provided above. 

Request for Correction I request that you promptly correct this information, as these errors can harm my credit history and misrepresent my identity. Pursuant to Section 611 of the FCRA, I request the removal of any inaccurate or negative information from my credit report, and I expect to receive an updated report reflecting these corrections within 30 days, as required by law. 

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

complaint_text:
I have requested information on this debt and have sent out emails/ letters requesting proof of this debt with not response from the collector whom keeps calling me. The original name of the collector on my credit report is LVNV FUNDING LLC CARE OF RESURGENT CAPITAL SERVICES L.P XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX after review on their website they change their name to Resurgent Capital Services XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, SC XXXX. I have submitted a copy of the letter which I have sent to them at the bottom. To Whom It May Concern : Be advised this is not a refusal to pay, but a notice that your claim is disputed, and validation is requested. Under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ), I have the right to request validation of the debt you say I owe you. I am requesting proof that I am indeed the party you are asking to pay this debt, and there is some contractual obligation that is binding on me to pay this debt. This is NOT a request for verification or proof of my mailing address, but a request for VALIDATION made pursuant to 15 USC 1692g Sec. 809 ( b ) of the FDCPA. I respectfully request that your offices provide me with competent evidence that I have any legal obligation to pay you. At this time, I will also inform you that if your offices have or continue to report invalidated information to any of the three major credit bureaus ( XXXX, XXXX, XXXX XXXX ), this action might constitute fraud under both federal and state laws. Due to this fact, if any negative mark is found or continues to report on any of my credit reports by your company or the company you represent, I will not hesitate in bringing legal action against you and your client for the following : Violation of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act and Defamation of Character. I am sure your legal staff will agree that non-compliance with this request could put your company in serious legal trouble with the FTC and other state or federal agencies. If your offices are able to provide the proper documentation as requested in the following declaration, I will require 30 days to investigate this information and during such time all collection activity must cease and desist. Also, during this validation period, if any action is taken which could be considered detrimental to any of my credit reports, I will consult with legal counsel for suit. This includes any listing of any information to a credit-reporting repository that could be inaccurate or invalidated. If your office fails to respond to this validation request within 30 days from the date of your receipt, all references to this account must be deleted and completely removed from my credit file and a copy of such deletion request shall be sent to me immediately. It would be advisable that you and your client assure us that your records are in order before I am forced to take legal action. 
CREDITOR/DEBT COLLECTOR DECLARATION Please provide the following : Agreement with your client that grants you the authority to collect on this alleged debt. 
Agreement that bears the signature of the alleged debtor wherein he/she agreed to pay the creditor. 
Any insurance claims been made by any creditor regarding this account. 
Any Judgments obtained by any creditor regarding this account. 
Name and address of alleged creditor. 
Name on file of alleged debtor. 
Alleged account number. 
Address on file for alleged debtor. 
Amount of alleged debt. 
Date this alleged debt became payable. 
Date of original charge off or delinquency. 
Verification that this debt was assigned or sold to collector.

Complete accounting of alleged debt. 
Commission for debt collector if collection efforts are successful. 
Please provide the name and address of the bonding agent for COLLECTIONAGENCY in case legal action becomes necessary. Your claim can not and WILL NOT be considered if any portion of the above is not completed and returned with copies of all requested documents. This is a request for validation made pursuant to the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act. Please allow 30 days for processing after I receive this information back. 

They have not responded to my claims and or ownership of the collection they have on my credit report.

I am trying to rectify the payment issue with my mortgage company, Freedom Mortgage. In 2018 my husband filed bankruptcy, but I did not. He also did not include the mortgage in the bankruptcy when it was filed. For the past 5 years every time I would call I was told that no one could speak to me because the account showed a bankruptcy. Back in XXXX of this year my husband paid the XXXX mortgage and didn't make another payment until XXXX. Around this time we were in the process of switching insurance companies because our current one was no longer writing policies in Louisiana. We found another insurance company, XXXX XXXX and the policy amount was XXXX. Freedom sent a check from my escrow account to XXXX, but I eventually found a cheaper insurance company. Another check was sent to the new company in the amount of XXXX. I received the XXXX back from XXXX XXXX and called Freedom to ask about what I should do with the check. I was told that I needed to mail it back to freedom so they could put those funds back into the escrow account because the account was showing negative XXXX + XXXX the amount for both insurance premium. I sent the XXXX back to Freedom. I called Freedom back to see if they had received the check and that it needed to be applied to the escrow. I was told that even they could not speak to me because of the bankruptcy, even though the bankruptcy wasn't in my name. They applied the XXXX the missing payments and increased my monthly payments from XXXX to XXXX to included the XXXX that the escrow was missing. I called and finally got someone else to talk to me and asked if they could just back date the mortgage payments that were made with the escrow money and I would just make the missing mortgage payments out of pocket. Well, they backed the payments up and reapplied the XXXX to the escrow but my monthly payments didn't decrease back to XXXX. They have the XXXX back in escrow but still charging me for it in my monthly payments. They are getting the money twice and I don't think its right. I am now behind on my mortgage by over XXXX and it shouldn't be that much. Once that put the XXXX back in escrow my payments should have decreased back to XXXX. I am aware that I owe for the months that they backed the XXXX off but my payments shouldn't still be XXXX. I have called and now I can get someone to talk to me because after 5 years they have now figured out that I wasn't the one that filed bankruptcy. I just want to be charged what I actually owed.

complaint_text:
This is not a duplicate complaint and I'm representing myself, by myself. 
This credit dispute is being submitted as a new evidence dispute. The accounts that are being disputed, does not belong to me. The below is my sworn statement concerning these credit issues. 

It is my sworn statement that, I declare under penalty of perjury ( under the laws of the United States, if executed outside of the United States ) that the foregoing is true and correct to the best of my knowledge. Further, I certify that I am qualified and authorized to file this dispute. I also understand that knowing and a willful misstatement of omissions of material facts constitutes a federal criminal violation punishable under 18 U.S.C. 1001. Additionally, these misstatements are punishable as perjury under 18 U.S.C. 1621. 
The trade line listed below is item currently within my credit file, and none of these are related to any transaction that was made by me. It is my official statement that someone and/or several people have opened this account and made transactions on this account without my knowledge or authorization, my personal information has been used to obtain goods, services, or money : and the person ( XXXX ) responsible for creating this account. 

I have filed a report with the Federal Trade Commission, which I have enclosed within this dispute package. The law says that you must block these accounts while being investigated, and I expect that you will do so. 
In accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting act. The list of accounts below has violated my federally protected consumer rights to privacy and confidentiality 15 USC 1681. Account name : XXXX XXXX Account Number : XXXX 15 U.S.C. 1681 Section 602 A. States I have the right to privacy. 15U.S.C 1681 Section 604 A Section 2 : It also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instructions. 15 U.S.C. 1681c. ( a ) ( 5 ) Section States : no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information Any other adverse of information, other than records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years. 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any information relating to any consumer reporting agency if the person knowns or has reasonable causes to believe that the information is inaccurate.

According to the FAIR CREDIT REPORTING ACT FCRA 611 ( 15 U.S.C. 1681 ), Procedure In Case of Disputed Accuracy. Reinvestigations of Disputed Information 1. Reinvestigation Required ( a ) In general. Subject to Subsection ( f ), if the completeness or accuracy of any item of information contained in a consumers file at a consumer agency is disputed by the consumer and the consumer notifies the agency directly, or indirectly through a reseller, of such dispute, free of charge, conduct a reasonable reinvestigation to determine whether the disputed information is inaccurate and record the current status of the disputed information, or delete the item from the file in accordance with paragraph ( 5 ), before the end of the 30-day period beginning on the date on which the agency receives the notice of the dispute from the consumer or reseller.

I am well aware of my rights as a consumer. The Fair Credit Reporting Act requires that you, the credit-reporting agency, report accurate and/or correct account information within my credit file. My credit issues are very specific, this account doesn't belong to me. This means that you are reporting incorrect account information within my credit report. It is with this in mind that I request that this listed account and items be BLOCKED and DELETED!

Please note, only Transunion has reported this fraudulent account on my report.

complaint_text:
BMO Harris Bank conversion of Loan Servicing to XXXX XXXX  XXXX which took place XX/XX/20 - XX/XX/20 XXXX Written notification, sent by mail, was received less than 14 days in advance as is required by law. 
The letter was printed on XX/XX/20 but was not received until Monday XX/XX/20. 
This only allowed 10 business days to find an alternative. 

I did not wish to work with XXXX due to their numerous negative reviews. 

2-They could have emailed me about the conversion 14 days in advance, but did not. They emailed me a " reminder '' TWO DAYS before the conversion on XX/XX/20. 
They have emailed all my statements in the past, so they had this information and could have used it but chose not to. 

3- I paid the Payoff Amount on XX/XX/20, this included the 17.23 interest due. 

4-On XX/XX/20 XXXX sent a statement billing me a second time for the 17.23 interest. 
The statement even shows that I paid the 17.23, yet they are demanding it again. 

5- XX/XX/20 I used the BMO Harris `` Contact Us '' form to request correction of their billing error. I gave them detailed information including account numbers. No response. 

6- XX/XX/20 I used the BMO Harris `` Contact Us '' form to request correction of their billing error. I gave them detailed information, including account numbers and statement copies. No response. 

7- XX/XX/20 I sent a letter by mail to request correction of their billing error. I gave them detailed information, including account numbers and statement copies. I asked them to close my account and reflect this was done at my request and signed the letter. No response. 

8- XX/XX/20 I emailed Mr. XXXX XXXX CEO of Harris , to request correction of their billing error. I gave detailed information, including account numbers. I asked him to close my account and reflect this was done at my request. 
No response. 

9-I tried calling the 800 number several times over several days and all it does is loop from one voice menu to another. It is impossible to reach a person. 
There are likely understaffed, as they have numerous jobs posted on XXXX, XXXX, etc. 

XXXX has a horrible track record and mostly negative reviews. 
I do not want these people to destroy my good credit. 

It is appalling that from XX/XX/20 through today, XX/XX/20 there have been no responses in any way shape or form regarding my communications. 
Isn't it a law that there must be a response within 5 days?

If I owed money they couldve just taken the money I owed instead of being ok with me being late to the place my children and I lay our heads. I barely use this account and now I will never use it.

complaint_text: XXXX XXXX I have several inquiries on my credit reports some of which are duplicates of at least XXXX different dates that someone had tried to use my information to open an about. As well as a new collections account that i have absolutely no idea about nor did i ever authorize anyone to use my information for anything at all.

I am in the process of disputing a transaction for {$740.00} with Citibank NA. This transaction was charged to my bank twice, and disputed twice. I was given a provisional credit for the first dispute. When I filed the second dispute, I also created a stop payment, which prevented the funds from being removed. Because of the stop payment being in place, and the funds not being removed, I did not receive a second provisional credit. Citibank, however, debited {$740.00} from my account on XX/XX/2019. When I spoke with them about this, I was told they were removing the provisional credit from my account for the second dispute. I tried to explain to multiple representatives and supervisors I never received a provisional credit for this, and they were taking my bill money. 

I am required to be given proper notice before they remove funds from my account, and I was given none. They are claiming they sent me a letter, but this letter was never received. If they had of in fact sent me a letter, I would not have been on the phone with them for three hours today being ran around in circles after the fact. I'm supposed to trust Citibank with my money, however, when I put my bill money in my Citibank account, they help themselves to it without notice. I am not being placed in a financial hardship as a result of them stealing {$740.00} from me without notice. They were not supposed to take this money, as no credit was given a second time. They were also supposed to notify me, they did not do this. As a result, I can not pay my bills. They refuse to return the money and give me a proper notification of removal at another date.
I found inaccurate and incorrect data on my credit report and this wrong information should not be on my credit report.

complaint_text:
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, WA XXXX XXXX Account : XXXX This letter is regarding the account listed above, which you claim is a collection that I have with your company. This is a formal notice that your claim is disputed. I am requesting validation, made pursuant to the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). 

Please note that I am requesting validation ; that is, competent evidence bearing my signature, showing that I have ( or ever had ) some contractual obligation to pay you. Specifically, I am requesting that you provide a copy of the original contract with my wet signature as evidence of the alleged debt. If you can not provide such documentation, you are required to immediately remove any and all negative marks from my credit reports ( including Experian, XXXX, and XXXX ) related to this debt. 

Be aware that any negative mark found on my credit reports from your company or any company that you represent, for a debt that I do not owe, is a violation of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ) 807 [ 15 USC 1692e ] and the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ). Therefore, if you fail to validate this debt as required by law, you must request that all credit reporting agencies delete the entry from my credit file. 

Pending the outcome of my investigation into any evidence that you may submit, you are instructed to take no further action that could be detrimental to my credit reports.

Failure to respond within 30 days of receipt of this certified letter will result in small claims legal action against your company at my local venue. I will be seeking up to {$5000.00} in damages for the following : 1. Defamation 2. Negligent Enablement of Identity Fraud 3. Violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ) You will be required to appear in a court venue local to me, since you are clearly doing business in my area. For the purposes of 15 USC 1692 et seq., this Notice has the same effect as a dispute to the validity of the alleged debt and a dispute to the validity of your claims.

Please note that this notice is an attempt to correct your records. Any information you provide will be collected as evidence should any further legal action be necessary. This is a request for information only, and is not a statement, election, or waiver of status. 

Furthermore, if you are unable to provide the requested evidence ( the contract with my wet signature ), please submit a copy of this letter and all related correspondence to the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ) portal, and ensure that any negative credit reporting is immediately removed.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
Multiple inaccurate and unverified accounts are being reported on my credit profile, and I have formally disputed them with the credit bureaus. These accounts are not mine and the credit bureaus have continued to publish and furnish these items without providing me with any proof, validation, or original signed contracts. 

I have already sent dispute letters directly to the bureaus and requested investigation, but they continue to report these items despite my notices. These unverifiable items are harming me financially and causing damage to my credit standing. The information being furnished is not backed by any documentation showing I authorized or opened these accounts. I am attaching supporting evidence to show that these items remain unverified, inaccurate, and not connected to me. 

Im filing this CFPB complaint because the bureaus have not corrected the issues after being notified, and these accounts should have been removed since they can not be validated.

complaint_text: Our loan was sold to SLS after being with XXXX ( and very happy ) for almost 13 years. We had applied for a modification with XXXX and we were told all the paperwork would be sent to SLS to finish processing. I received a letter from SLS that XXXX items needed to be changed to the SLS document for further review. Items were emailed the same day, XXXX. On XXXX, I received a letter that nothing was reviewed since I did not send the items in on time. I called SLS and she stated that they had both items but the signature was in the wrong place. I had called 2 times and spoke to a person since sending the documents in. I was told everything was being processed in underwriting and that they would get back to me. On XXXX/XXXX/16, I called SLS and the automated system told me that my workout status was approved and they were finalizing the paperwork. When I questioned the Rep about that call she stated that the automated system was not always right and that I should be calling and speaking to a person every time. But, I had spoken to TWO Reps and none of them told me there was an issue with my paperwork. I asked if I could send in the ONE piece of paper that had the wrong info on it and I was told " No, you need to send a whole new packet into us to process again. '' I asked why no one called me to let me know that the packet was wrong since I had received information re : the missing paperwork. I was told that it was my responsibility to call and follow up. But, I did, so if I did my job, why are they not doing theirs?!

I have written this company twice asking for debt and they have not shown me anything verifying that I owe them. They sent me an invoice with a totally different company name saying that this was proof. The invoice that they provided is not accurate because I have never had an account with   XXXX   XXXX   XXXX   but they are trying to collect for   XXXX   XXXX  . The account is well over 10 years old and they are still trying to collect on it. Cavalry Portfolio just purchased this account from another collection agency.

A complete modification package was submitted to Bank of America on XXXX XXXX XXXX. XXXX XXXX Bank of America employee XXXX confirmed all documents were received, sale date scheduled for XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Bank of America stated that the file has been opened and will get assigned to an SPC. On XXXX XXXX our office spoke to XXXX who stated the file is still under review nothing is needed. The sale date for XXXX XXXX was postponed until XXXX XXXX. Our office continued to call on a weekly basis.On XXXX XXXX Bank of America stated XXXX things were missing, page XXXX of RMS section XXXX needed to be filled out and a letter of explanation with regards to a rental property/supporting bank statements. On XXXX XXXX Bank of America stated that there is no relationship manager assigned yet and did n't know why. On XXXX XXXX our office called in and escalated an issue. We spent 4 hours on the phone with regards the negligence that had been taking place with the file. Documents were requested, they were sent in, but yet the file went nowhere. We were then informed the file was closed on XXXX XXXX. We had never been given a deadline with regards to the documents. It was very apparent that this file had internal issues with regards to B of A 's lack of processing. On XXXX XXXX a manager, XXXX XXXX, with regards to the escalation from the previous day stated a postponement request was placed the file was reopened. He stated that a case manager was getting assigned. He confirmed there was nobody ever signed because the files fell through the cracks. We resent a modification package again just to be safe. There continued to be numerous issues within Bank of America with regards to XXXX XXXX 's file. A single-point-of-contact never became assigned. We were eventually told a letter went out to XXXX XXXX ( please see attached ). The letter only stated there was an outstanding issue, but did n't indicate what the issues was. The letter stated he needed to reply in writing which he did on XXXX. The letter XXXX XXXX sent stated the following - '' I understand there is an outstanding issue on my account preventing my loan modification assistance. Please advise with the outstanding issue is as i have a sale date set for XXXX XXXX. '' He was never informed of what the issue was. He was never even informed this letter went out on XXXX XXXX until we open this escalation. We were then told that another one of these letters was resent out, to which he replied the same way. Bank of America continuous negligence and discrimination against XXXX XXXX is very apparent. XXXX XXXX called in to B of A on XX/XX/XXXX and brought up the letter and Bank of America told him that there are no issues, they just want their money. It is repulsive that B of A is refusing to review a qualified homeowner for home retention options. There is no tangible reason for them not to open the file and assign an SPC. They have given our office the run around for months as we have spent countless hours on the phone trying to make sense of the " issues '' .. B of A denied the workout request based on inaccurate information and refused to take remedial steps to provide a qualified a solution to save the home. B of A held onto the file for several months, refusing to offer any indication of the file 's progress until there was little time to save the home.. By refusing to disclose details about the modification process, B of A is able to deny request at will without any accountability. The events described above are just a sample of the practices that are taking place at B of A.. We are demanding a work out solution are XXXX XXXX will assert his legal right and name B of A as a defendant in civil court.

I've contacted mr. Cooper via phone and chat now well into double digits and every time it's just more lies and deceit. My insurance company ( XXXX XXXX  ) threatended to cancel my policy due to lack of payment bc mr. Cooper didn't pay it out of my escrow account as promised. I contacted those XXXX and they told me we sent a check, oh well that its been a month and might bc lost. 

I kept getting jerked all around to departments without help. I was told that the payment was stopped and that they would send a new check. Finally, the check made it to XXXX in time before losing all of my insurance but then the first check is still lost. mr. Cooper refuses to cancel it and now my escrow account has a negative balance. They refuse to help of pay me the money that they stole from me. They haven't verified anything with me and just steal my hard earned escrow money. 

Additionally, they overpaid my yearly tax amount XXXX XXXX as well. I have letters proving the amount and they overpaid that w/o asking me before hand or verifying anything. They keep blaming XXXX XXXX and now the county- telling me that its my problem and figure it out with them. Meanwhile, my escrow account has a negative balance and I can't afford to pay for anything going forward because of them.

I have XXXX derogatory payment status ' on my credit report from XXXX student loan. XXXX broke the student loans into XXXX groups and gave them over to XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX. I have since paid off both the XXXX XXXX AKA " XXXX '' and XXXX XXXX. Those loans showed PAID but the original loans from XXXX are still showing on my credit report as Negative. 
It is my understanding that once a loan is sold to another company, the original loan can not remain on your credit. Basically, I 'm getting dinged twice on the same debt. Meanwhile when I call XXXX, they tell me they have no loans assigned to me as they 've been " sold ''. I contacted Experian after filling a dispute online only to have the dispute come back and say that due to my privacy settings, I ca n't file the dispute " online. '' What?! Now I have to order one of their credit reports for {$20.00} just to have a copy to send in. It 's insane. 
I was denied an auto loan because my credit had too many non payments on it. However, XXXX of the derogatory " non-payments @ are from XXXX. 
It sounds as though Experian dropped the ball and needs to clear those original XXXX loans off my report. Otherwise, they are costing me over {$2500.00} on my auto loan that I'n trying to get a lower interest rate on. 
Thank you.

The bureaucratic responses are XXXX. PA does allow people to access boxes with the documentation I have provided to them. This is just the bank treating customers as nothing more than a number and harassing me

Complaint Details : Issue : Discover is reporting a debt on my credit report despite no longer owning the debt, in violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ).

Description of the Problem : I am filing this complaint against Discover Financial Services for unfair and deceptive credit reporting practices. The company is reporting a debt on my credit file, even though they no longer own the account.

Under FCRA ( 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( a ) ), furnishers of credit information must report only accurate and complete information. If Discover has sold, transferred, or assigned the debt, they no longer have the legal right to report it as an outstanding obligation under their name. 

Additionally, under FDCPA ( 15 U.S.C. 1692e ( 8 ) ), misrepresenting the legal status of a debt is a deceptive practice and a clear violation of federal law. 

Since XXXX, I sent a formal dispute letter to Discover requesting debt validation and proof of ownership. However, they have failed to provide sufficient documentation proving that they own the debt or have the authority to report it. 
I have proof they received payment and the balance was zeroed out and requested a payoff letter. 
Despite my dispute, Discover continues to furnish inaccurate and misleading information to credit reporting agencies, which is damaging my credit and causing financial harm. 

Resolution Requested : 1. Immediate removal of the inaccurate debt from all credit bureaus ( XXXX, XXXX, and XXXX ) if Discover can not provide verifiable proof of ownership.

2. Correction of all misreported account information per FCRA and FDCPA guidelines. 


3. Monetary compensation for damages caused by Discovers false reporting, including loss of credit opportunities. 


4. CFPB investigation into Discovers reporting practices to determine if this is a pattern of misconduct affecting other consumers.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text:
My mother passed away in 2007 and left me her home in her Will. I paid the mortgage and had NO problems with the previous Lender. Then, the loan was transferred to Seterus 3 yrs ago. 
At the time of transfer, Seterus requested we submit various documents to them related to my inheriting the house from my mother in 2007. **EVEN THOUGH THE PREVIOUS LENDER HAD HAD ALL THESE DOCUMENT SINCE 2007 AND TRANSFERRED THEM TO SETERUS. ** I submitted ALL the requested documents to SETERUS 3 years ago : My mother 's Death Certificate, My mother 's WILL, The Court papers, The DEED ( recorded at the County ) showing mine and my wife 's names on the DEED, The Marriage Certificate, Confirmation of the Successor 's ( My ) relationship to the deceased borrower ( My Mother ), All these documents requested by Seterus were sent 3 years ago and WE RECEIVED WRITTEN CONFIRMATION THAT THEY WERE RECEIVED BY SETERUS. 
We told Seterus at that time that we did not have enough money for closing costs on a loan, nor was our credit high enough to refinance. **THEY TOLD US THIS WAS ALL WE NEEDED TO DO. WE 'VE BEEN PAYING THE MORTGAGE FOR A FEW YEARS NOW. 
Now we just received ANOTHER letter requesting the SAME documents ( above ) that they CONFIRMED RECEIVING 3 years ago!!! 
1. WE JUST WANT TO KEEP PAYING THE MORTGAGE. 
2. WE DO *NOT* WANT TO FORECLOSE 3. WE WANT TO KEEP THE HOUSE. 
3. WE NO LONGER WANT TO PURSUE OR REQUEST A LOAN MODIFICATION. IT HAS TAKEN TOO LONG ( 7 MONTHS!! ) WITH *NO* ACTION from Seterus, REPEATED REQUESTS from Seterus FOR DOCUMENTS that SETERUS HAS ALREADY CONFIRMED RECEIVING, FALSE OFFERS OF ASSISTANCE, SETERUS NEVER ALLOWING US TO SPEAK WITH SOMEONE IN THE LOAN MODIFICATION DEPT, DESPITE DOING NOTHING WITH OUR LOAN MODIFICATION FOR SEVEN MONTHS ... ... 
ALSO WE HAVE READ HUNDREDS OF COMPLAINTS ON CONSUMERFINANCE.GOV ( CFPB ) FROM SETERUS CUSTOMERS who have been offered FALSE Loan Modifications, been FORCED to add many years to their existing loans, and had their credit further destroyed. Seterus continues to VIOLATE THE FEDERALLY-MANDATED REGULATIONS SET IN PLACE TO PROTECT CONSUMERS. 
We are scared TO FALL VICTIM TO THE SAME FRAUDULENT, CREDIT-DESTROYING, POSSIBLY ILLEGAL, CUSTOMER-HARMING, UNETHICAL POLICIES THAT XXXX OF SETERUS CUSTOMERS HAVE BEEN VICTIMS OF. WE ARE SCARED OF SETERUS AND THEIR FEDERAL-LAW-BREAKING PRACTICES. WE WISH WE COULD DROP THEM BUT ARE UNABLE TO BECAUSE WE ARE IN TRUE HARDSHIP AND WE DO N'T HAVE THE FINANCES OR DECENT CREDIT NEEDED TO REFINANCE. 
We have been through harsh medical and financial HARDSHIP in the last 5 years. We can not handle any additional hardship imposed by Seterus , inc . 
WE BELIEVE SETERUS IS USING FRAUDULENT POLICIES TO AVOID ASSISTING ITS CLIENTS IN NEED / HARDSHIP. 
SETERUS HAS ALREADY RUINED OUR CREDIT, RATHER THAN ACTUALLY HELP US, DESPITE BEING IN TRUE HARDSHIP, BOTH MEDICALLY AND FINANCIALLY. MY WIFE IS XXXX AND WE ARE CONTACTING THE ADA TO SEE WHAT ASSISTANCE THEY MIGHT OFFER, LEGALLY OR OTHERWISE. 
We will also file complaints with Fannie Mae and other owners of the Loan, as well as Federal and State agencies that regulate mortgage lenders. 
***WE WANT TO*** *** CONTINUE PAYING THE MORTGAGE *** *** KEEP THE HOUSE *** *** NOT FORECLOSE *** *** SETERUS HAS THE DOCUMENTS LISTED ABOVE. THEY CONFIRMED RECEIPT OF THOSE DOCUMENTS 3 YRS AGO. AND DOCUMENTS LIKE DEATH CERTIFICATES AND WILLS AND DEEDS DO NOT HAVE EXPIRATION DATES!!!! We do NOT need to send in any more forms or documents. *** **** WE DO *NOT* WANT TO CONTINUE WITH THE LOAN MODIFICATION PROCESS. *** WE WILL CONTINUE PAYING THE MORTGAGE AS IT IS. 
WE WILL CONTINUE TO ASK OUR FAMILY FOR HELP AND WE WILL CONTACT THE ADA for HELP IN DEALING WITH THE MORTGAGE / NEW MORTGAGE, ETC, AS MY WIFE 'S SERIOUS ILLNESS & XXXX ARE ONE OF THE MAIN REASONS WE ARE NOW IN FINANCIAL AND MEDICAL HARDSHIP.

A few months ago, around XX/XX/2018, the amount of {$1900.00} was taken from my Bank of America checking account. It was through 2 separate transactions, one of {$400.00} and other of {$1500.00}. Bank of America claims that Im responsible for these transactions since apparently my debit card and pin were used for them. I did not make those transactions, I did not take that money out of the account, I did not use that money!!! I needed that money to pay my bills, which are all set up for autopay so there would be no reason for me withdrawing that money!! I have no history of defaulting payments, nor bankruptcy, nor anything! There are many things that couldve happen in this case, like the people that I used to share the house with back then having access to all of my personal information and belongings. I no longer have contact with them since I moved out of the house when some of my stuff went missing. I was also thinking that maybe the card couldve got cloned, so I canceled it and ordered a new one just in case. I honestly dont know why or how this happened to me, I dont know what else to do to prove that this wasnt me. The bank requires documents proving my innocence, but there is no such thing! How to you prove through documents that you got robbed?? I have no idea! Please help me, thank you

Not only you are taking your sweet time getting this resolve you are charging me a tremendous amount. I would like the late fee waived off my account. Looking at my credit SPS still have not updated my credit report. It seems that your company it setting up for failure. Please contact me once the outcome has been taking care of.This is the letter that I sent to your company and so I decided to file for another modification I have a steady job so does my wife and I was denied for the modification. I want to keep my home and make it affordable.

complaint_text:
On XX/XX/2019, I received notice from my insurance company ( XXXX XXXX XXXX ) that my insurance payment due from my mortgage company was past due in the amount of {$990.00}. 

I then tried to call NewRez - my mortgage lender who had recently bought my loan from XXXX XXXX. In trying to call NewRez, I " experienced '' their VRU phone menu for the first time. It took me over a half hour to talk to a person, after getting hung up on 3+ times in multiple different transfers. When I finally talked to an agent and they tried to transfer me to the Insurance department, I was hung up on again. 

When I did finally talk to someone, I was put on hold for over 30 minutes and no one ever came back to get me off hold. I can not believe that this company is allowed to function as a company when they can't even figure out how to answer a phone call. I am so frustrated that I had no choice in who my mortgage was being sold to and that I have no choice to move my mortgage away from NewRez - a company whom I did not select. I should have a means of moving my mortgage to a company that I choose to work with without having to refinance. 

Companies that can not execute on the basic functionality of answering the phone and talking to a customer should be shut down.

complaint_text:
I am writing to formally dispute the late payment entries currently listed on my credit report. I have repeatedly attempted to have these discrepancies reviewed and corrected, yet no significant action has been taken. Despite submitting all required documentation and following up multiple times, the inaccuracies remain unresolved. 
This prolonged issue has caused ongoing financial strain and has negatively affected both my credit standing and overall well-being. The process of addressing these errors has been not only frustrating but also mentally and emotionally exhausting. 
Under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), I have the legal right to a credit report that accurately reflects my financial history. This includes the timely correction or removal of outdated, incorrect, or unverifiable information. I am therefore urging your office to take immediate and appropriate action to update or delete the reported late payment entries in question.

complaint_text: I called and spoke with a CFPB Representative on XX/XX/XXXX regarding the above complaint filed with CFPB. We spoke at length about my problem with a Reverse Mortgage Agreement entered into with Wells Fargo Bank in XX/XX/XXXX that was transferred to XXXX XXXX the first of XX/XX/XXXX. At the time of Initially applying for a Reverse Mortgage through Wells Fargo real estate representative XXXX XXXX, located in XXXX XXXX, Idaho, on or about XX/XX/XXXX, I went through a training session with a Community Action representative in XXXX, Idaho, in order to acquire the loan. Before the loan could be implemented, the training certificate had already expired. I had gone to California for a visit. Wells Fargo was in a rush and required me to sign the loan in California, though the property was in Idaho. They sent a notary to my friend 's house to get my signature on documents, who failed to show me the details of each page I was required to sign. Though the home I own is on five acres, in the process of acquiring this loan on my home, I was goaded into providing an additional parcel of land of another five acres. This additional land is a separate tax entity and is not included in the tax payment on my land. Regardless the loan documents were drawn up to include 10 acres. Taxes are always paid as a separate entity. The appraiser appraised my home and verbally told me the appraisal was {$370000.00}, an appropriate amount of the reverse mortgage was never funded, and the additional amount of land Wells Fargo would own was tacked on later. I endured the situation through the recession, but near the end of XX/XX/XXXX Wells Fargo notified me that another company, XXXX XXXX, would be taking over my reverse mortgage.

I paid high rate on line of credit Wells Fargo never told me that all payments were interest only when it come time to payoff the account they charged extra this is just wrong when I contacted corporate they still denied a refund

I am filing a complaint against TransUnion for improper credit reporting and deceptive practices violating the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). 

This agency has reported a collection account originally from XXXX, but they have falsely re-aged the debt to XXXX, making it appear newer. This is a clear violation of FCRA XXXX ( c ), which limits how long negative information can be reported. The agency has misled credit bureaus and lenders by altering the date, negatively impacting my credit score and financial opportunities. 

Additionally, I have not received proper debt validation as required under FDCPA XXXX. When I disputed the inaccurate reporting, the agency failed to correct the false date or provide legitimate documentation proving the correct date of the first delinquency. This deceptive practice constitutes unfair and misleading debt collection tactics under 15 U.S.C. XXXXe. 

I request that the CFPB investigate this agency and require them to : XXXXCorrect the reporting to reflect the accurate date of delinquency. 
XXXXCease deceptive re-aging practices to misrepresent debts. 
XXXXProvide validation of the alleged debt with accurate records. 
XXXXRemove the account from my credit report if they can not verify the correct date. 

I have attached supporting documentation, including credit report entries, prior disputes, and any correspondence showing their failure to comply. This re-aging of debt is a serious violation, and I request immediate corrective action.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: We sold our home on XX/XX/XXXX. Dovenmuehle confirmed a substantial escrow check that would be coming to us. We did not immediately 'change our address with Dovenmuehle ', which means that our check would be sent to the sold home, then forwarded to our new residence - long story, short, we've never received the original escrow check. On XX/XX/XXXX, I contacted Dovenmuehle, and proceeded with the change-of-address process, sending a signed copy by mail, AND submitting by scan/email back to their XXXX email address, as requested ( copy of change-of-address form and email, attached ). At the same time, Dovenmuehle was to send out a new escrow check. Two weeks later, I contacted Dovenmuehle to get an update on our change-of-address and disbursement of new check the representative apparently contacted their escrow department and confirmed that the change-of-address had been processed, and the new escrow check would be mailed-out sometime between XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX. I contacted Dovenmuehle on XX/XX/XXXX, and the representative placed me on hold to apparently contact the escrow department again, but upon her return, could/would not confirm whether or not the escrow check was actually, physically, mailed out in fact, she kept telling me that it would most likely be mailed-out the first or second week of XXXX, XXXX. When I asked to speak with a live supervisor or manager, she forwarded me to a voicemail. FYI, that as of XX/XX/XXXX ( 92 days after closing ), we have yet to receive the original, or replacement, escrow check.
