The loan servicer refuses to provide past escrow accounting starting from the origination date of my loan. They refuse to send me my money if there are overage disbursements. They have only sent me reports dating back to 2020.

XXXX XXXX XXXX obtained a copy of my consumer report under false pretenses I never gave them written consent to obtain my consumer report. On XX/XX/2021 they pulled my consumer reporting causing my score to drop tremendously. They used my identifying information without my consent to obtain a copy of my consumer report from Equifax. That is identity theft pursuant to 15 usc 1681 ( a ) ( q ) ( 3 ). The term identity theft means a fraud committed using the identifying information of another person, subject to such further definition as the Bureau may prescribe, by regulation. Pursuant 15 USC 1681q, Any person who knowingly and willfully obtains information on a consumer from a consumer reporting agency under false pretenses shall be fined under title 18, imprisoned for not more than 2 years, or both. XXXX XXXX XXXX obtained my consumer report under false pretenses and without written consent. This unauthorized inquiry damaged my consumer report and they are now Criminally and civilly liable. Pursuant 15 USC 1681n ( B ) in the case of liability of a natural person for obtaining a consumer report under false pretenses or knowingly without a permissible purpose, actual damages sustained by the consumer as a result of the failure or {$1000.00}, whichever is greater ;
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: Citizens Bank has been knowingly infringing upon my right to privacy by sharing my information with third parties when I NEVER gave them permissible purpose to do so. The accounts in dispute are a result of identity theft. These accounts do not belong to me, but were verified. It is impossible to verify these accounts on my behalf because I am the original creditor and consumer and I'm the only person who could verify any debt. Also, debt means any alleged obligation and we all know pursuant to 18 usc 8 all obligations are securities of the United States. I need to you to cease and desist all collection efforts or else I will be forced to litigate. You are criminally and civilly liable for infringing on my consumer rights pursuant to 15 usc 1611, 15 usc 1640, and 15 usc 1692k.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text:
There is a judgment on my credit report that was dismissed. It should not be showing up. Attached is a copy of the documentation direct from the XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Courts XXXX. 
I have written a few times but the credit bureau will not remove it. Please help, I am unable to get a mortgage approved because they will not fix it.

After getting behind on my mortgage my home loan was sold to Shellpoint. I paid off the legal fees and missed payments and got out of foreclosure, and since them I've been making my payments on time yet I've accrued many months of missed payments and associated late fees. It seems to me that there is a processing error on Shellpoint 's part of which I have never been notified, and I am finding it impossible to pay them the amount that I owe. 

Last month I twice tried to pay off the outstanding payments. The first time ( XX/XX/XXXX ) I assumed I had cleared up the problem by paying {$5300.00}. I noticed, however, that my " regular monthly payment '' had increased to reflect the amount that I owed in late fees, as opposed to my agreed upon monthly payment of {$1700.00}. Ten days later I noticed the balance hadn't changed. I once again ( XX/XX/XXXX ) attempted to pay off the balance and once again I assumed that I had settled the problem. 

Today ( XX/XX/XXXX ) I received a notification that {$6900.00} was going to post to my account and logged in to see that my payment history indicated immediate refunds of the amounts I had paid when they originally posted and did NOT deduct them from the supposed balance I had accrued despite my having been up to date on my monthly payments. 

I am now trying to pay and receive an error message and they won't accept any amount in payment. I can not figure out why they won't post my payments to my account and it feels as if there is a predatory ignorance that will result in the foreclosure of my home. 

Additionally their customer service phone number is entirely automated, with the option to speak to a representative hidden behind a many seconds long pause at the end of a many options long automated menu. Other options that intuitively feel like they'd lead to a representative instead g to extremely unhelpful dead ends. For example there's an option for the phone system to tell you a phone number to call for customer service which happens to be the number you called in order to hear that bit of information. Combined with the opaque payment process and lack of transparency in servicing my loan, the walls that are put up through the customer service process makes the whole system feel designed to interfere with one 's ability to pay their mortgage on time, ultimately ending in foreclosure due to corporate incompetence. Please help me.

I am writing to file a formal complaint against Equifax, a consumer reporting agency, for their failure to comply with the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and rectify a violation regarding the reinsertion of previously deleted material into my credit report. 
On XX/XX/year>, I sent a letter to Equifax notifying them of the reinsertion of XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX into my credit report without proper certification of accuracy and notification to me, as mandated by FCRA Section 611 ( B ). Despite waiting for 35 days after sending the letter, Equifax has failed to remove the reinserted account from my credit report, continuing to violate FCRA regulations. 
Equifax actions have caused significant inconvenience and potential harm to my credit profile, impacting my ability to access fair credit terms and financial opportunities. Despite my efforts to resolve this matter directly with Equifax, they have neglected to take appropriate action, demonstrating a lack of accountabilitv and compliance with federal consumer protection laws.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: I submitted a short sale package in XXXX 2014. US Bank has not given me an answer to my request. I believe a year is more than enough time for US Bank to review and give me an answer.

According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act 15 USC 1681 section 602a states " There is a need to insure that consumer reporting agencies exercise their grave responsibilities with fairness, impartiality, and a respect for the consumers right to privacy. '' XXXX is a consumer reporting agency and I am the Consumer. I have the right to make sure my private information isn't shared which is backed by 15 USC 6801. Hyundai Capital America is a financial institution by definition under that title. 15 USC1681 section 604 a section 2 states that " In general Subject to subsection ( c ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : in accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates. '' Hyundai Capital America is the financial institution and the Consumer reporting agency XXXX do not have my consent to furnish this information and they surely do not have my written consent. Any and all consent to XXXX and Hyundai Capital America, whether it be verbal, non-verbal, written, implied or otherwise is revoked. Hyundai Capital America and XXXX never informed me of my right to exercise my nondisclosure option. Not only that 15 USC 1681C ( a ) ( 5 ) states '' Except as authorized under subsection ( b ), no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information Any other adverse item of information, other than records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years. '' This account is an adverse item they are reporting again without my permission which is against the law. Every consumer reporting agency shall maintain reasonable procedures designed to avoid violations of section 1681c of this title and to limit the furnishing of consumer reports to the purposes listed under section 1681b of this title. XXXX is not maintaining reasonable procedures. Also 12 CFR 1016.7 states that " A consumer may exercise the right to opt out at any time. '' I am opting out of your reporting services. I also sent an opt out letter to Hyundai Capital America, in which they have not responded to. The law states that the company has 21 days to respond and they have not, as of yet.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
I have been victimized by my mortgage lender and as a result I am now facing foreclosure. I purchased my home in XXXX and was misled by the people at XXXX who talked me into a mortgage loan with an introductory interest rate of 9 % that would eventually adjust up and could go as high as 15.62 %. When it came time to adjust my payment went up almost {$400.00} a month but somehow I was able to hang on. I paid that outrageously high amount of interest for 6 years and eventually it was too much and I applied for a modification. I was grateful that I received a modification and my rate was lowered to 2 % in XXXX. I paid as agreed on this for over 2 years. 

However, my loan is now with DiTech and I am facing foreclosure. I work as an XXXX and I ran into some issues a couple of years ago with the company I was working for and I had to switch to a different company. As a result of this change, I lost out on a lot of income and was struggling financially. I missed my mortgage payments for a couple of months while I got back on my feet. I reached out to DiTech to make a payment and to see what could be done to get everything sorted out. I was shocked when they refused to accept my mortgage payment. I was even more shocked when they told me that they would not be able to offer or even consider any type of modification or repayment plan or anything because I already had a " good rate ''. They stated the only way I could fix this was to reinstate the entire delinquent amount, which was not possible at that time. However, I was only three months behind at that time and DiTech could have easily put me into some type of forbearance agreement or repayment plan instead of shutting the door on me. They also could have put the late payments back into the balance of the loan and just increased the term or something. Instead they refused to consider any options, refused to look at my current financial circumstances and decided to serve as judge, jury and executioner and move me straight into foreclosure. 

I know that the government programs allow consideration for a second modification if something bad happens to the homeowner. But DiTech is completely shutting the door on me. They merged with Greentree Mortgage and I know that this company received XXXX of dollars in bailout funds. After making all of this money from me with an outrageously high interest rate for so many years one would think DiTech would at least give me the time of day and the opportunity to resolve this matter. Instead they have harshly turned their back on me and I want to file a formal complaint against them.

complaint_text:
On XX/XX/year>, at approximately XXXXXXXX XXXX, I went to a Wells Fargo branch to cash two payroll checks issued by my employer. I presented valid identification and fully cooperated with the transaction. 
Despite the checks being legitimate payroll checks, Wells Fargo employees subjected me to excessive and discriminatory scrutiny lasting approximately 20 minutes. During this time, employees : Conducted unspecified extra security procedures without explanation Questioned me audibly and publicly in front of other customers Claimed they could not find the name of the signer of the check, despite the checks being valid Ignored my offer to have the employer or business owner contacted immediately for verification Made a sarcastic and dismissive remark, which was humiliating and inappropriate Other customers in the branch were not treated in this manner. I was effectively treated as suspicious or dishonest without legitimate justification, causing public embarrassment and emotional distress. 
After this incident, I filed a complaint with Wells Fargo. A corporate representative named XXXX contacted me and stated that Wells Fargo would investigate the matter. However, I was never contacted with the outcome of the investigation, and no explanation, apology, or remediation was provided. Wells Fargo appears to have closed the investigation without informing me, demonstrating bad faith handling of a discrimination complaint. 
This conduct reflects disparate treatment, hostile customer service, and failure to follow fair banking practices. The public nature of the questioning and the dismissive remarks caused humiliation and emotional harm

I submitted a dispute letter for the XXXX XXXX XXXX account on XX/XX/2023. I have just checked my credit report and I see that the account is not marked as disputed. This is a violation to have misleading information and inaccurate information about the consumer. I have also asked for this account to be updated. There are still several sections that is not reporting accurately. 
According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act- A debt collector may not use any false, deceptive, or misleading representation or means in connection with the collection of any debt. Without limiting the general application of the foregoing, the following conduct is a violation of this section ; 15 U.S. Code 1692e False or misleading representations ; Communicating or threatening to communicate to any person credit information which is known, or which should be known to be false, including the failure to communicate that a disputed debt is disputed. 
According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act - Every consumer reporting agency shall maintain reasonable procedures designed to avoid violations of section 1681b and to limit the furnishing of consumer reports. Whenever a consumer reporting agency prepares a consumer report it shall follow reasonable procedures to assure maximum possible accuracy of the information concerning the individual about whom the report relates. Also, the XXXX XXXX XXXX account number is not reporting the same for all 3 credit bureaus. These violations have caused damages in my family 's life. I would like this account to remove. 
Here is my account information to us during the investigation into this matter. 

Transunion Account Name : XXXX XXXX XXXX Account number : XXXX Reason : inaccurate information and failure to update XXXX Account Name : XXXX  XXXX XXXX Account XXXX : XXXX Reason : Inaccurate information failure to update and account number is not same. 

XXXX Account Name : XXXX  XXXX XXXX Account Number : XXXX Reason : Inaccurate information failure to update and account number is not same.

complaint_text:
I have a mortgage loan with Loancare. I was financially impacted by the COVID pandemic and for that reason, Loancare approved a forbearance plan between XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX. The forbearance plan allowed me not to make the monthly payments for four months - XX/XX/XXXX through XX/XX/XXXX, without any late fees being assessed. However, these four payments would need to be made after the forbearance plan expired. 
While Loancare was processing the forbearance, they waived two late fees of {$21.00} each assessed for the XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX payments. 
In mid XX/XX/XXXX, I notified Loancare through their website that I was ready to get out of the forbearance plan. Between XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX, I made the four payments for the months of XX/XX/XXXX through XX/XX/XXXX online through the Loancare website. However, when the time came to make the payment for the month of XX/XX/XXXX, the website didn't allow me to make it, so on XX/XX/XXXX, I called Loancare and made the XXXX payment by phone. The representative who helped me said the problem with the website may have been caused by the forbearance, but the forbearance was being removed from my account, so going forward I should be able to make the payments online as usual. 
On XX/XX/XXXX, I had to go out of the country to attend a funeral. Before leaving, I tried to make the XX/XX/XXXX payment online, but the website still didn't allow me. On XX/XX/XXXX, while I was out of the country, I received an email from Loancare advising my mortgage loan had been removed from forbearance. So, I tried to make the XXXX payment through their website. However, I couldn't access their website at all. I was able to pay all my other bills online from another country - even my electricity bill - but I couldn't even access the Loancare website! 
On XX/XX/XXXX, just after returning to the U.S., I proceeded to make the XX/XX/XXXX payment online, but at first had problems accessing the Loancare website. The website kept telling me a security code was sent to my phone, but I didn't receive any code. That happened about four times, so I called Loancare. However, after being on hold for more than 30 minutes, someone hung up on me. 
I called Loancare again and while I was on hold, I made a few more attempts to access their website. I finally received a security code on my phone, which allowed me to login to the Loancare website and schedule the XX/XX/XXXX payment. However, a late charge of {$21.00} had been assessed for the XXXX payment. 
Meanwhile, I was still on hold with Loancare and finally a representative responded. I explained the situation and requested the late charge of {$21.00} assessed for the XXXX payment to be removed, since I was unable to access the Loancare website while I was out of the U.S., and I couldn't call Loancare while being in another country. The representative confirmed their website can't be accessed while being in another country. However, he denied my request. He said two late charges had already been removed in XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX and he wouldn't be able to waive any more. I told him those late charges were removed due to the forbearance, but that didn't make any difference. The representative still denied my request to remove the late charge for XX/XX/XXXX.

complaint_text: I 'm a victim of identity theft and someone else has been trying to open account in my name and I have some inquiries on my credit report I only have XXXX account with municipal credit union but it has XXXX inquiry from them XXXX/XXXX/2016 do n't belong to me and the company by the name of XXXX XXXX have XXXX inquiries on my credit report when I only supposedly should have XXXX from XXXX/XXXX/2016 belong to me

On XX/XX/XXXX PennyMac loan services purchased my 30-day old mortgage from XXXX XXXX that originated on XX/XX/XXXX. The original loan with XXXX XXXX came with all of the supporting documents including a Flood Certificate (Standard Flood Hazard Determination Form SFHDF, FEMA Form XXXX) indicating the insured property was in Flood Zone-X and NOT in a Special Flood Hazard Area.The day after PennyMac purchased my loan from XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, they sent me a letter claiming that "they received a change in the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) map for my property" and that because of the FEMA Map change, my property was now in the Special Flood Hazard Area Flood Zone-A. As such they claimed that Flood Insurance was required immediately. PennyMac provided no proof of a FEMA map change and instead insisted on Flood Insurance coverage for the property which they claimed was now in a high-risk Flood Zone-A because of the map change. The letter claimed that they would force lender-placed flood insurance on my property if I did not provide Flood Insurance or a FEMA Letter of Map Amendment (LOMA) within 45 days.There were numerous calls to PennyMac during XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX (XX/XX/XXXX) asking for proof of a FEMA map change. The official FEMA website states that the map for my property (XXXX) was effective on XX/XX/XXXX and there have been no revisions since XX/XX/XXXX. PennyMac was never able to offer any proof of a FEMA map change for my property-because it does not exist. The XX/XX/XXXX PennyMac letter was pure fraud as the FEMA map had not been changed since XX/XX/XXXX.  The lender forced flood insurance is very expensive and PennyMac offered no remedies other than providing a LOMA statement from FEMA. The LOMA process at FEMA is long, expensive, and complicated. I had to hire a surveyor and it cost me $XXXX for an elevation survey and supporting documents to obtain the LOMA. The LOMA was received from FEMA on XX/XX/XXXX, but PennyMac has refused to fully refund the $XXXX premium on flood insurance they forced in XX/XX/XXXX. The remaining flood insurance premium yet to be refunded is $XXXX.What is even worse, I was never billed for the forced flood insurance, instead PennyMac re-directed additional monthly principal loan payments I made to an escrow account they created which was not part of the original note terms. Further, they have changed/increased my monthly loan payment amount to cover future flood insurance premiums even though the flood insurance was cancelled on XX/XX/XXXX will never be needed. While I have made at least thirty calls to PennyMac over the last five months, my last call was to their corporate headquarters in an effort to remedy this issue. In XX/XX/XXXX I spoke to Ms. XXXX XXXX (XXXX X-XXXX) in their Escalations Department who claimed to be able to help but she never called back and has failed to return my numerous voicemail messages.

This situation has completely turned my life upside down. I discovered someone used my information to open accounts and damage my credit, and its been an emotional and financial nightmare. Every time I try to explain to the credit bureaus or the companies involved, Im met with silence or excuses. Im not just a number Im a real person trying to recover from something I didnt cause. Please help me get these fraudulent items removed so I can rebuild my life and protect my future.

complaint_text: The mortgage company XXXX was the originator of my home mortgage. Early this year my loan, alone with a large group was sold to another lender, NewRez llc. No information was provided from the new lender, to include a new account number, payment book, or how to reach the lender. We continued to make the XXXX payment to XXXX, via the payment book we have used previously. A few days later we, on our own initiative, found and contacted NewRez to determine our account number and how payments are processed. The representative indicated all payments, during the interim of the transfer of the mortgages, would be sent from XXXX to NewRez. Subsequently, we have received calls on a daily basis. We made payments as outlined in our mortgage agreement and the transfer of the mortgage was a unilateral decision. Moreover, each call is more aggressive in nature and they, NewRez, refuse to work with XXXX to transfer the most recent payment from XXXX to NewRez.
Upon reviewing my credit report, I have identified inaccurate accounts that need reporting and correction through your company.

complaint_text: I 'm a vimtiam of identity theft and someone try opening account in my name XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX/XXXX/2016 and XXXX XXXX XXXX/XXXX/2016

The purpose of this letter is to file a complaint about deceptive practices and discrimination initiated by Lakeview by XXXX. Specifically, Lakeview by XXXX has made an error which increased my monthly payment by XXXX dollars and has offered no resolution or taken accountability for the financial situation that they have put me. 
The error was made on my escrowed taxes for the year of XXXX which has negatively impacted me both financially and emotionally. The total error which impacted my escrow negatively was {$7400.00}. 
I was recently notified through mail on or around the beginning of XX/XX/XXXX that my escrow was short by {$7400.00}. The shortage was to increase my monthly payment by nearly a XXXX dollars a month with an effective date of XX/XX/XXXX. 
Since receiving this letter I have called numerous times to Lakeview by XXXX and have been told the following with no follow up communications from Lakeview by XXXX. 
XXXX. During my first call to Lakeview by XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX, I was told that the XXXX XXXX XXXX notified XXXXLakeview that XXXX was 1XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX verification form. I never received notification from Lakeview by XXXX or the appraisal district of this change. During the same phone call, I was transferred to a member of an escalation team who then said there was no form or documentation in my file. If this response was true, I would have received a letter from the appraisal district regarding the changes to my tax exemption status. During that same call, I requested a copy of the XXXX party verification document and for it to be noted that I am requesting it sent to my residence by mail. Even though I was just told that the document did not exist, I made the request for it to be mailed to me because if the call is recorded, then the call will reveal that the prior representative was providing false information. I never received a copy of the document requested. At the end of that call, I was told that this was going to be sent to an escalation team who would then get back to me by Friday, XX/XX/XXXX. No one did. 
XXXX. On or around the XXXX of XXXX, I took time off from work and went to the XXXX XXXX XXXX and to the office in XXXX TX XXXX While at the XXXX XXXX XXXX they stated that the only documents they have is my initial request for my homestead exemption application. Nothing else was in my file. I was then told to go to the XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX for any other questions. I then asked for an extension of my time off due to having to go to another office. At that office they provided me with tax bills that were issued to XXXX/Lakeview and were paid by Lakeview by XXXX XXXX. Neither office has any letter that was to go to me or my mortgage company stating that I was tax exempt or reversing their decision for me to be tax exempt, which is what Lakeview by XXXX has responded to me as their position in this matter. 
XXXX. About a week went by when I called Lakeview by XXXX to let them know of my visit to the appraisal district and that the document your representative was in my file was not in my file with the tax office. Your representative lacked candor in this matter and misrepresented the company with unsubstantiated rhetoric. 
XXXX. These transpired days after I needed to pay an additional {$1000.00} a month for my mortgage payment and the thought of the increased payment caused me XXXX  and stress. When I called again, I was transferred to someone on the escalation team who said that they can try to help me get the shortage of the escrow spread out over the next XXXX years. I said that the increase was unaffordable on my single monthly salary. I communicated to the companys representative this was an administrative error made by YOUR company and I wanted a plan I could afford to request it be spread over 3 years. 
XXXX. Shortly after my call, I received a letter stating my mortgage was increasing close to {$510.00} a month instead of {$1000.00} because the escrow shortage was spread over XXXX years. My request for a three-year spread was denied with no explanation. I strongly believe that if the escrow shortage was able to be spread over XXXX years that my payments would be more affordable for me. 
XXXX. I called again to let them know that the XXXX year spread for my escrow shortage was not what I requested as a remedy to resolve this situation. It is my position on this matter I need to be accommodated as a customer. This has caused me financial hardship due to the administrative error made by Lakeview by XXXX. I was told again my concern would be sent to an escalation team and that someone would be contacting me. 
XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX spoke with someone after not receiving a response from Lakeview by XXXX after XXXX weeks lapsed and was told that my request was denied. I asked to speak to someone regarding the same matter. I explained my situation and how it was never resolved with any answers or call back from anyone. During this call I was told that once again the issue was going to be escalated. They told me that the outstanding escrow which was an administrative error can be placed at the end of my note through the process of a mortgage counseling review and that it would be escalated. I was also told that because this was an administrative error made on the part of Lakeview by XXXX that I would not need to apply for this request as usual as I was put in this financial hardship because of Lakeview by XXXX error. 
XXXX. I then received XXXX letters in the mail dated XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX stating that they received my application for a Loss Mitigation review. The second letter stated that my application for the review was missing all necessary documents to proceed with which I was told I wouldnt need this because it was an administrative error on Lakeview by XXXX part. The letters I received contradicted the conversation I had with the person on the phone. 
XXXX. On or about XX/XX/XXXX after receiving this information and getting responses from your representatives with verbal promises that never came to fruition I called and asked to speak to a supervisor and to record the call. When the first representative came on the line, I was told that the call was being recorded. I mentioned that I too was recording the call. Immediately I was told that I could not record the call on my end. I requested to please be transferred to a supervisor. Over an hour later I spoke to a gentleman named XXXX who said he was a supervisor. Discussing my issue once again he mentioned that my case had been closed. I said XXXX calling regarding the same matter that has always been the same matter since XXXX. Theres been no resolution made to close the case. XXXX changed focus only on finding out why my status was changed to XXXX XXXX XXXXx exempt. During this conversation he says, I see here looking at the notes that we spoke with XXXX at the XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX who said I was XXXX XXXX XXXX. I said that is weird, so we have gone from a missing XXXX party verification form now to a call saying to change my homestead exemption tXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  XXXX, Lakeview by XXXX XXXX  representative on this matter, provided no last name and said he had no call back number or extension. He stated he would call me back once he received a response from a department that holds correspondence letters to see if they can provide him with a copy of this XXXX XXXX verification form previously mentioned. XXXX called back at XXXX XXXX that evening to let me know that someone had responded to his request for the information and once he receives it, he will call me back. It is now Wednesday, XX/XX/XXXX and I have not received any notification via phone call, email, or mail.

complaint_text:
i have been working with ocwen loan servicing to avoid foreclosure on my home. after mediation, our hamp modification deal was for me to make XXXX modification trial payments of XXXX due XXXX/XXXX/15, XXXX/XXXX/15 and XXXX, due respectively. when that is satisfied we are to enter into an agreement that includes - according to an email from XXXX of ocwen -1 ) Interest rate of 2.0 % 2 ) Term of XXXX XXXX ) Modified unpaid principal balance of {$400000.00} ) Principle reduction of $ XXXXXXXXi have made those XXXX trial payments. 
however, the paperwork from ocwen outlining the new deal does not say they are offering principal reduction but does include a principal DEFERMENT with a balloon payment at the end of the life of the loan. it also includes a stipulation that i pay roughly {$1200.00} a month into an escrow account from which ocwen will pay municipal property taxes ( ok ) and homeowner 's insurance, although i have sent them a faxed copy and a hard copy of my homeowner 's insurance policy. 
i strongly believe ocwen 's attempt to manipulate the language of our agreement to change the meaning of our agreement is devious and fraudulent. their own representative offered a principal REDUCTION, not a deferment, and their legal representative was present at our modification meeting and signed the agreement that called for principal REDUCTION. 
thank you for your assistance in this matter.

complaint_text: On XX/XX/XXXX, I was contacted by Nationwide Recovery regarding an amount owed of XXXX from a hospital visit on XX/XX/XXXX. During the phone call, I did not remember a hospital visit of XX/XX/XXXX. I advised the representative ( who was extremely rude ) that I would contact my XXXX XXXX XXXX ( XXXX   XXXX ) which he became very upset and did not want me to contact them. I contacted my Insurance Company to verify. I was told by my Insurance company that they did not pay the co-pay of XXXX and that it was my responsibility. I have GAP coverage that pays copays so I contacted the original creditor for XXXX XXXX XXXX ( XXXX Hospital ) and paid the amount online on XX/XX/XXXX. They sent me a receipt and my insurance company sent me a claim summary. I was told by XXXX at hospital billing that this account will now be closed and that the collection agency will be informed in 24 hours. I then submitted the claim to my GAP insurance XXXX so that i can receive reimbursement. I received a call on XX/XX/XXXX from Nationwide Recovery. It was the same manager who I spoke to on XX/XX/XXXX. I let him know that this account was paid directly to the original creditor. He became very upset that I did not pay through them. I explained that i had to pay it through the original creditor in order to be reimbursed. He reported the account to the credit agency out of anger the next day even though when he asked me for the receipt number, I provided it to him. This is very unethical. Even though the account was paid the representative still reported the account. They also received notification the account was paid from hospital billing on XX/XX/XXXX.

I am submitting this complaint regarding Wells Fargos inaccurate calculation of my mortgage loan balance, principal, principal and interest ( P & I ), escrow shortage, and monthly payment, as well as the mishandling of my case by their executive office representative, XXXX XXXX ( Wels Fargo Executive Office Representative ) assigned to my initial complaint ) My concern is the principal listed as XXXX as of XX/XX/XXXX, I made an extra payment of XXXX for 6 months ( total XXXX ), my principal should have decreased, instead it went up XXXX Loan Type : XX/XX/XXXX Adjustable-Rate Mortgage Interest Rate : 7.12 % as of XX/XX/XXXX Term Remaining : XXXX years XXXX. Incorrect Principal, Interest, escrow shortage and Loan Balance On XX/XX/XXXX, Wells Fargo sent me a payment change notice effective XX/XX/XXXX, showing : Principal : {$260.00}, Interest : {$610.00}?? ( Wells Fargo online listed as XXXX ) Escrow : {$270.00} XXXX : {$1100.00} However, Wells Fargos online system showed interest as {$580.00}, which matches my actual loan amortization schedule. The incorrect use of {$610.00} instead of {$580.00} led to an overstated monthly payment. 


Between XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX, I made extra payments of {$300.00} each month toward principal ( total of XXXX ), yet my principal balance increased instead of decreasing. This indicates Wells Fargo misapplied my payments or used incorrect balances and interest accruals in their calculations. 
Despite this, the servicer calculated my principal as {$280.00} for monthly payments and escrow, and my loan balance decreased from {$100000.00} ( XX/XX/XXXX ) to {$99000.00} ( XX/XX/XXXX ). After my regular payments in XXXX, XXXX, and XX/XX/XXXX ( {$1200.00} each ), my balance only decreased to {$98000.00}. As of XX/XX/XXXX, my XXXX is 6.5 %, principal portion {$290.00}, interest {$530.00}, escrow {$380.00}. 



XXXX. Escrow Shortage Miscalculation On XX/XX/XXXX, Wells Fargo reported an escrow shortage of {$1400.00}. 

After I switched homeowners insurance on XX/XX/XXXX, lowering the premium from {$1300.00} to {$880.00}, and deposited escrow refund of {$290.00} toward escrow on XX/XX/XXXX, the shortage should have been calculated as {$730.00} ( XXXX ) XXXX the difference between the previous and new home owners insurance Wells Fargo, however, continued to XXXX {$980.00} as the shortage in their system and subsequent recalculations. 

XXXX. Incorrect Monthly Payment Recalculation On XX/XX/XXXX, Wells Fargo issued a new payment notice showing a total monthly payment of {$1200.00}, which was based on : Principal of XXXX instead of XXXX Interest of {$610.00} ( incorrect ; should be {$580.00} ) Escrow shortage of {$980.00} ( incorrect ; should have been {$730.00} ) Because these figures were wrong, the total payment of {$1200.00} was miscalculated. 



On XX/XX/XXXX, Wells Fargo issued another payment change notice with a new interest rate of 6.5 %, showing : Principal : {$290.00}??? Why principal went up with the lower APR rate of XXXX from 7.12 %?? 
Interest : {$530.00} Escrow : {$380.00} calculated with inaccurate escrow shortage of XXXX instead of escrow shortage of XXXX XXXX : {$1200.00}??? 

This new payment was also based on the incorrect escrow shortage of {$980.00}, so it remains inaccurate. 


XXXX. Mishandling by Wells Fargo Executive Office Representative XXXX XXXX from the Wells Fargo Executive Office was assigned to my case. He : Insisted that {$610.00} was the correct interest amount, despite internal records showing {$580.00}. 
Asked me to send a screenshot from my online account to prove it. 
Claimed the {$290.00} payment was applied to the escrow shortage, but used the incorrect {$980.00} shortage in the recalculation. 
Sent multiple irrelevant documents, including XXXX calculations, even though I requested a recalculation only for XXXX, the year my insurance changed. 
Was unprofessional and unhelpful, refusing to accommodate reasonable scheduling for calls. 
Promised that the extra funds I paid would be refunded, but no refund has been issued. 

I have attached supporting documents, including escrow analyses Payment change notice for XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX Done by XXXX XXXX, Lending Operations Senior XXXX XXXX page of most recent calculation by XXXX XXXX XXXX pages with the confirmation numbers for additional monthly payments of XXXX XXXX page of premium homeowners insurance change notice, active on XX/XX/XXXX Thank you for your assistance in ensuring Wells Fargo corrects these errors and provides accurate account information. 






and correspondence with XXXX XXXX.

complaint_text: Please help. I filed a dispute with the credit reporting agencies about a balance still being reported as outstanding, after it was cancelled and forgiven by Chase. Also I received a XXXX from Chase for tax reporting, but now Chase is saying that I still owe them even though they issued me a XXXX with a code ( g ) of no further collections. I am reporting this as income for the year 2015. So I 'm confused. I thought that once the XXXX is issued that Chase would show the balance as XXXX on my credit reports, but now they are saying that I still owe them and have to report it as income. So I 'm confused. If I have to pay taxes for the XXXX issued amount by Chase, should n't the balance be reported as ( XXXX ) XXXX balance on my credit reports and is it correct to be reported as a debt and as income? I see this as double reporting. So I do n't understand. If you could help me with resolving this issue it would be greatly appreciated.

FCRA XXXX, I think, requires the elimination of any incorrect accounts from my credit report. Could you review the documents? There are some inaccuracies in the listed accounts regarding reporting, including incorrect amounts and dates.

complaint_text: I am formally disputing the collection account your company is reporting under I.C. SYSTEM, INC ( Original Creditor : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) account # XXXX. I do not recognize this account, and I was never notified about it prior to seeing it on my credit report. I have never received any letter, notice, or validation from your agencyno explanation of the alleged debt, no itemized breakdown of the amount, and no proof that you have the legal authority to collect on it. Under Regulation F of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( 12 CFR 1006.34 ( b ) ( 5 ) ), I have the right to receive a complete validation notice that includes the name of the original creditor, a full breakdown of the balance, and evidence of your right to collect this debt. You failed to provide any of these. This also violates 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( a ) ( 7 ) ( A ), which requires you to notify me of my right to dispute the debt before reporting it. Additionally, furnishing unverified information to the credit bureaus without my consent violates 15 U.S.C. 1681e ( b ) and 1681b of the Fair Credit Reporting Act. I am demanding that you immediately provide me with all of the following : ( 1 ) a complete validation notice, ( 2 ) a copy of any signed agreement bearing my signature, ( 3 ) a detailed breakdown of the alleged balance, and ( 4 ) documentation proving your authority to collect on behalf of XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. If you can not provide these, then the account MUST BE PERMANENTLY DELETED from all consumer reporting agencies. Reporting unverifiable and unauthorized information is harmful, unfair, and illegal. I expect a written response confirming the results of your investigation and immediate removal of this account from my credit file.

I, submit this formal complaint against Equifax, TransUnion, and Experian for their continued and willful violations of federal consumer protection laws under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). These violations include the unlawful reinsertion of previously deleted accounts without proper notification, failure to ensure maximum possible accuracy, failure to investigate disputes within the mandated time frame, failure to provide verification details upon request, and failure to validate debt prior to reporting. 

Background & Violations My credit reports contain fraudulent accounts and unauthorized inquiries that the Bureaus have failed to properly investigate and address despite multiple disputes and supporting documentation. Additionally, these Bureaus have removed fraudulent accounts and unauthorized inquiries only to reinsert them without proper validation, constituting an egregious violation of 15 U.S.C. 1692g ( a ) and ( b ).

Furthermore, I sent a certified dispute letter to all three credit bureaus requesting verification details, including contracts, signatures, and all relevant documentation for these accounts. Despite more than 15 days passing, I have not received any response or documentation from any of the bureaus, which constitutes an additional violation of federal consumer protection laws, specifically : 15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) : Failure to investigate disputes within the required 30-day period.

15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ( 5 ) ( B ) : Failure to provide notice and certification before reinserting previously deleted information.

15 U.S.C. 1681e ( b ) : Failure to ensure maximum possible accuracy.

15 U.S.C. 1692g ( a ) ( 4 ) : Failure to provide verification of debt, including original contracts and signatures, upon request.

15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ( 6 ) ( B ) ( iii ) : Failure to provide specific details on dispute findings. 

Related Lawsuits & CFPB Actions The CFPB has actively taken enforcement actions against the credit bureaus for similar violations, further demonstrating a pattern of noncompliance. These legal precedents reinforce the validity of my complaint : Experian Lawsuit ( XX/XX/XXXX ) : The CFPB filed a lawsuit against Experian for failing to properly investigate consumer disputes regarding credit report inaccuracies. The lawsuit alleged that Experian allowed erroneous information to reappear on reports, impacting consumers ' credit, employment, and housing access. The CFPB seeks to halt Experian 's misconduct, provide redress, and impose penalties. 
TransUnion Settlement ( XX/XX/XXXX ) : The CFPB, alongside the FTC, reached a {$15.00} XXXX settlement with TransUnion and its subsidiary, TransUnion Rental Screening Solutions , Inc., for failing to ensure the accuracy of tenant screening reports. The agency charged that TransUnions inaccuracy potentially hindered consumers ' ability to secure housing. TransUnion agreed to pay {$11.00} XXXX in restitution and a {$4.00} XXXX civil penalty and implement enhanced accuracy measures. 
Equifax Lawsuit ( XX/XX/XXXX ) : The CFPB filed a major lawsuit against Equifax for repeated violations of the FCRA and deceptive practices that misled consumers regarding credit report accuracy. The lawsuit highlighted that Equifax knowingly reported incorrect information, failed to correct disputes in a timely manner, and continued to allow erroneous reinsertion of previously deleted data without proper consumer notification. The CFPB is seeking financial penalties, injunctive relief, and systemic reforms to prevent future violations. 
These actions underscore the CFPBs commitment to enforcing the FCRA and ensuring that consumer reporting agencies uphold their obligations. My case mirrors these past violations, and I urge the CFPB to take similar action against Equifax, TransUnion, and Experian. 
Fraudulent Accounts & Unauthorized Reinsertions Disputed Account Details and Demands 1. XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX ( Account : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Violations of Law : FCRA : 1681e ( b ), 1681i ( a ), 1681g, 1681s-2 ( b ), 1681i ( a ) ( 5 ) ( B ), 1681c ( a ) FDCPA : 1692g ( a ), 1692g ( b ), 1692e ( 8 ), 1692d GLBA : 6801 ( b ), 6802 ( a ) Metro 2 : Format violations and inaccurate payment history FDUTPA : 501.204 ( 1 ), 501.203 ( 3 ) ( c ), 501.976 ( 11 ) DEMAND : IMMEDIATE REMOVAL AND PERMANENT BLOCKING of this tradeline under FCRA 1681c-2 . 
XXXX XXXX ( Account : XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  Violations of Law : FCRA : 1681e ( b ), 1681i ( a ), 1681g, 1681s-2 ( b ), 1681i ( a ) ( 5 ) ( B ), 1681c ( a ) FDCPA : 1692g ( a ), 1692g ( b ), 1692e ( 8 ), 1692d GLBA : 6801 ( b ), 6802 ( a ) Metro 2 : Format violations and inaccurate payment history FDUTPA : 501.204 ( 1 ), 501.203 ( 3 ) ( c ), 501.976 ( 11 ) DEMAND : IMMEDIATE REMOVAL AND PERMANENT BLOCKING of this tradeline under FCRA 1681c-2 . 
Unauthorized Inquiries ( Remove Immediately ) Entities : XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX : Conducted without written authorization or permissible purpose Violations : o FCRA 1681b : Lack of permissible purpose o FDUTPA 501.204 : Deceptive inquiry practices Incorrect Names, Addresses, and Employers : Incorrect Address : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Violations : o FCRA 1681e ( b ) : Failure to ensure accuracy o FDUTPA 501.204 : Misrepresentation through false data Request : REMOVE ALL INACCURATE PERSONAL DATA IMMEDIATELY.

Demands for Resolution Immediate Removal and Blockage : Remove and block all fraudulent accounts and unauthorized inquiries from my credit file across all three bureaus. 
Ensure that these accounts and inquiries are not reinserted without proper validation as required under 15 U.S.C. 1692g ( b ).

Written Confirmation : Provide written confirmation of the removal of these accounts and inquiries along with updated copies of my credit reports.

Thorough Investigation : Conduct a full investigation into how these fraudulent accounts and inquiries were recorded without my consent. 
Provide findings in writing, including all requested verification details, such as contracts and signatures. 
Compliance with Identity Theft Protections : Implement fraud alerts and provide me with identity theft resources as mandated under 15 U.S.C. 1681g ( e ).

The continued noncompliance by Equifax, TransUnion, and Experian has caused significant financial harm and distress. The reinsertion of fraudulent accounts and inquiries without proper validation exacerbates these violations. Given the CFPBs history of legal action against these credit bureaus for similar misconduct, I urge immediate enforcement action to ensure compliance with federal law and provide appropriate remedies under 15 U.S.C. 1681n and 1681o for willful and negligent violations. 
Your intervention is necessary to ensure these Bureaus are held accountable and that my credit report is permanently corrected.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
My lender ( Rocket Mortgage ) thinks I don't have homeowners insurance, so they they placed a XXXX policy on my property and used my payment towards my mortgage to pay for the added XXXX policy when in fact : I HAVE ALWAYS HAD HOMEOWNERS INSURANCE. IT HAS NEVER LAPSED, AND I HAVE REPEATEDLY SENT THEM PROOF. Their lender-placed policy resulted in unwarranted additional charges that have caused a significant financial burden. I have been bombarded with late notices, phone calls, text messages, and emails, even though I have never been late on a payment and have consistently maintained my homeowner 's insurance policy. 
Actions Taken To date, I have submitted my valid homeowner 's XXXX Declaration page multiple times via the following methods : Website Upload : I uploaded the document under your website 's " My Documents '' section. 
Email Submission : I emailed the document to the address provided by your representative over a week ago. 
Fax Submission : I faxed a copy directly to one of your customer service representatives.

Despite these efforts, I have been repeatedly informed that the document was either not received or deemed invalid due to " incorrect dates. '' This is inaccurate, as my insurance policy is active and valid. Furthermore, I received a confirmation that my emailed document was received, yet it was rejected without valid justification. 
XXXX and XXXX XXXX In my interactions with your representatives, I have : Spoken with more than six individuals, only to be transferred repeatedly without resolution.Been given contradictory and unreasonable explanations, including an assertion that my computer may have a virus. This mismanagement is not only unacceptable but has also caused me significant financial and emotional stress. The constant barrage of late notices, phone calls, text messages, and emails, despite my consistent payments and insurance coverage, has taken a toll on me.

This debt collector engaged in abusive, deceptive, and unfair practices of the FDCPA which it prohibits. They furnished this account that we didn't agree upon and I didn't sign an agreement on. A legal contract is signed by XXXX parties and I did not participate in any of it. More so, they didn't follow the proper procedure in notating my dispute of the account, which is a direct violation of 15 USC 1692e ( 8 ), which makes this unfair practices. According to the FDCPA Im entitled to XXXX dollars per violation and clearly they violated my rights. 

I demand this company to delete this account from all XXXX credit reporting agencies and compensate me for the violations or I will have no choice but to forward this to my litigation attorney who has advised me that the fact that they didnt notate my account on my credit report as consumer disputes as a violation that I am able to sue them under.

complaint_text:
A few months ago I received a letter from Wells Fargo stating that they were willing to provide me a modification to avoid foreclosure. I responded to the information requested by Wells Fargo by provided them my financial and employment information. I have submitted documentation to Wells Fargo on over ten ( 10 ) occasions and called Wells Fargo re-entry team over 30 times. Wells Fargo seems satisfied with the financial and employment information that I provided them but Wells Fargo still keep requesting more and more information every time I provided them the information they previously requested. 

It seems like Wells Fargo has a stalling and circular system that is in place to pretend that they are helping, but not help at all. I have provided Wells Fargo sufficient information to make a decision whether or not they want to provide me with a mortgage modification. I have sufficient income for a mortgage modification and pay my mortgage. I will very much like Wells Fargo to make a decision because I do n't see how this wait, hold, and stall process is helping anyone. 
Furthermore, Wells Fargo needs to take its Fiduciary duties seriously and act in Good faith and provide fair dealings with me its customer. I am qualified for a Mortgage Modification. I have provided sufficient information to Wells Fargo to provide me a Mortgage Modification. Wells Fargo seems very unwilling to Modify my mortgage because it is more profitable for Wells Fargo, as a Servicing Agent, to benefit if my property is Foreclose than if Wells Fargo Provide me a Mortgage Modification. 
Wells Fargo need to fulfill its legal Fiduciary duties and provide me and my Family a Mortgage Modification because I am qualified and I have sufficient income to pay my Mortgage if my Mortgage is modified.

I received my credit report and noticed that a fraudulent account is appearing, Please investigate and delete this. It's not mine. 

I command you to delete the accounts listed below : Account Name : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX 
Account XXXX : XXXX. 

I request that you reinvestigate the completeness of every piece of information and if it's not accurate, please remove it from my credit report. 

Based on consumer law, 15 U.S. Code 1681iProcedure in case of disputed accuracy, if you can not verify the accuracy of the information within 30 days, please remove the account from my credit report. 

Thank you for your time and consideration in this matter. I look forward to hearing back something positive.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
Collection agency IC System of XXXX  XXXX, MN claims in XX/XX/2019 that I owe {$370.00} which they say is overdue for cable service provided by their client XXXXXXXX The account, # XXXX, is for a location in XXXX, NY. I explained to IC System that this account can not be mine, since I live in California, have never been in XXXX, NY and have never had or authorized cable service or any other service in XXXX, NY. I asked IC System if they had a social security number or drivers license number associated with the account and they did not have that information. They stated that they had my name, XXXX XXXX, to which I responded that this is not an uncommon name. I told them this was clearly a case of mistaken identity ; however they would not listen. 

The larger problem is that IC System is the second collection agency to harass me about this same XXXX account. 

In XX/XX/2019, XXXX XXXX XXXX of XXXX, TX sent me a collection notice for the same amount and the same cable account number. I called both XXXX XXXX XXXX and XXXX at that time. Neither would cancel their claim. Instead they demanded that I either pay the amount or spend hours of my time in completing their data package, including trips to our police station, while offering me no evidence of why they were billing me other than that they had my name. The fact that XXXX recognized that I have long had a valid cable account with them at our home in California which is fully paid up and has had no late payments ever, did not deter them. XXXX XXXX XXXX then filed notices with the three major credit reporting agencies. I sought the advice of our ID Theft insurance company who helped us get this reversed and ultimately get my credit rating restored.

complaint_text:
I recently received a correction regarding my mortgage payments due to an error caused by SPS. However, I noticed that an additional charge of {$XXXX} in monthly statement was added to my principal under the description " XXXX XXXX. '' This charge was never authorized, and I believe it is unfair for me to bear any cost resulting from SPS 's own mistake. According to TILA ( Truth in Lending Act ) and RESPA ( Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act ), mortgage servicers are not allowed to impose unauthorized fees. 

I request the immediate removal of this {$XXXX} charge from my principal and a written confirmation of the correction. 

Please provide a written response regarding this matter.

A storm ripped through Maryland, downing a tree on our house. Several holes were put in our roof and many of the tiles were damaged. We had to have the entire roof replaced. Because of the cost of repairs, XXXX issued a check with both our name and our mortgage company 's name. We had to give them the check along with a notarized form signed by both our contractor and us. The check was for {$6800.00}. 

We submitted all of the paperwork to Embrace Home Loans 3 weeks  ago. The work has been completed and we still can't get our mortgage company to release the money. 

The issue, they say, is because we didn't all sign the form on the same day. 

Here 's what happened. 

We signed and the notary notarized it. 
The next day, the contractor left his work-site to sign it. and the ( exact  same ) notary notarized it. 

Finally, the notary notarized it at the end, showing that everything had been overseen and notarized by the same notary. 

Embrace says they can't accept it because it was notarized on different days by the two parties. We explained that our contractor is very busy and both my wife and I have full time jobs. In order for all of us to make it there on the same day, we would have to take even more time off work ( than we already did ) which will cost all of us more money. 

Bottom line is, the work has been completed. Everything is done. But, Embrace Home Loans is holding the money hostage. My lawyer friends say there is nothing about the notarized document that should allow them to keep the money. Worse yet, they have already cashed the check.

I opened an account in XX/XX/year>. I made a deposit via XXXX XXXX weeks after opening account. Logged in online and changed my debit card PIN number after receiving a generic one that I knew I couldnt remember. The next day, I try to log on and it says Ive been locked out due to too many log in attempts. I called and was told there was a 72 hour hold on my account, there was no information to follow. I called everyday over the next 4 days and was told the exact same thing. I called today and was told I had to wait another 72 hours. I explained, I live in Texas. Its 95 degrees and my power was shut off because I do not have access to my funds in that account that was intended to pay the bill. All the representatives were defensive and continued to read from a script. I even recorded my call, thanks to XXXX. I truly hope Citibank is sued and closed because this is unethical and unfair for consumers. If I did something wrong, I could understand but I did nothing wrong. The representatives claim the hold is for my protection. Thats just ridiculous.

XX/XX/2019 From : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, IL XXXX To : MERCHANTS CREDIT GUIDE XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, IL XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX Subj : Please Verify Debt Below Account Number : XXXX Original Creditor : XXXX XXXX Balance : {$150.00} Dear MERCHANTS CREDIT GUIDE, This is to inform you that I've recently pulled my credit report and noticed that there's a collection from your agency on my credit report. I have never been notified of this collection. However, this letter does not imply that I refuse to pay this debt. Rather, I would like to dispute your claim. 

As per the FDCPA, I have the right to request a validation of this debt. I request you to prove that I am indeed the party who is by contract obligated to pay off this debt. 

I hope you are aware of the fact that reporting any invalidated information to major credit bureaus may constitute defamation of character, as negative listing on credit report does not allow me to enjoy the benefits of good credit. In addition, you must also be aware that until you validate this debt, you can neither continue collection activities nor report this information on my credit report. I'm sure your legal staff will agree that non-compliance with this request is likely to put your company in serious legal trouble with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ) and other state/federal agencies. 

Please attach copies of the following documents : 1. Agreement with your client that authorizes you to collect on this alleged debt.

2. Agreement that bears signature of the alleged debtor wherein he promises to pay the creditor.

3. Complete payment history on this account so as to prove that the debt amount you wish to collect is correct. 

Thank you for your time, XXXX XXXX

I discovered an unauthorized and inaccurate collection account on my credit report from Equifax Information XXXX XXXX XXXX with XXXX XXXX, account number XXXX. This account does not belong to me, and I have no knowledge of its origin. I formally disputed this account with the credit bureau, requesting verification and removal based on my rights under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), specifically Sections 611 ( 15 U.S.C. 1681i ), 609 ( 15 U.S.C. 1681g ), and 623 ( 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ), as well as the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ), specifically Sections 809 ( 15 U.S.C. 1692g ) and 807 ( 15 U.S.C. 1692e ). 
Despite my formal dispute and request for a thorough investigation, Equifax Information Service LLC has continued to report this account without verifying its accuracy or providing me with documentation supporting its validity. This violates my rights under the FCRA, as credit bureaus are required to conduct a reasonable investigation and must not report inaccurate or unverifiable information. Notably, failure to comply with these requirements has been underscored by precedents such as XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX 
This inaccurate information is damaging my credit score and affecting my financial standing. I believe that the credit bureaus failure to properly investigate and respond to my dispute is a direct violation of the FCRA, causing me unnecessary harm.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
XX/XX/2024 I did attempt to close only my primary account at BECU XXXX branch and remove my name from a non-equal joint account associated with my daughter. At approximately XXXX to XXXXXXXX XXXX I worked with an XXXX lady who helped me accomplish closing my primary savings and checking account. I was issued a cashiers check and she assured me that I had nothing more to do with BECU twice because I asked if I was on my daughters account still and the rep said " no. '' However, while attempting to cash my check at the teller counter, I was asked for my accounts code word. Which I replied, " I don't have an account anymore I just closed it. '' The teller went and got her manager and found out I was still tied to my daughter 's separate and primary account. I was then led to XXXX XXXX who removed me from her account, he did not close her account so I was told. Over the years I have had no access to her account but only to transfer funds into it and that is all. I have never had a debit card to her account, nor access to her debit card. She is the primary owner of her account. 

On XX/XX/2024 my daughter contacted me asking me, " why '' I closed her account? That is not what I did, nor what I understood as having had happened. I called BECU and was connected to a rep that was seemingly reading from a script a narrative that was fraudulently false about our accounts and what type of accounts they were. The BECU rep on the phone said ourjoint account was me as anequal owner with my daughter. That is a lie. Then he said that he could see that I was refused a withdrawal of the fund 's moments later by the bank teller at the counter. Another lie that did not happen. I began to get irate over the phone, because for years this kind of misuse of my account and the details of it changing and even being used by other people has gone on for quite some time. I stopped online banking all together with BECU because of someone who is not me, accessing my online passwords locking me out of my accounts, denying bills to paid automatically, and even my secret code words were being changed. The rep on the phone brought into question the nature of the joint account being equal, which it was not. I could only transfer funds into not take away and that is it. My daughter and I both understand this to be the case. Angry at the discrepancy the phone rep alerted me to, I left work to go to the bank. When I arrived at BECU of course the account reverted back to a not equal ownership joint account and everything appeared as it should have. The XXXX XXXX XXXX bank manager had assured me that I needed to have my daughter come in to fix the problem with her debit card that was cancelled. Something I did not initiate or do, nor understand was being done. 

So what script was the phone rep working from and who was supplying disinformation about the nature of my account and its status with my daughter being of equal ownership? What is the purpose of this narrative? This representative of BECU fictionalized the description of the business that I initiated, and even the services I was provided. Why is it a necessity to change what actually took place and replace it with a false narrative about a sequence of events that never took place, seemingly for some nefarious secret reason. And this has been going on for years with my account and the abuse I have endured is from the abusers working inside BECU 's discriminatory practices they have used to sincerely hate and discriminate against me. 

I have been denied any recourse to have my online and technological complaints investigated at all. On top of being a victim of robbery by their ATM 'S, do they have to victimized me even more, stealing my money, changing my account information at will, allow criminals to enjoy using my account to make charges to my account that I did not receive goods or services for, despite me not being an online shopper and asking them to help me get to the bottom of it. The only way this information of mine could be escaping is from untrustworthy bankers employed with BECU themselves. It was THEIR atm 's that stole XXXX 's from my cash deposits XXXX dollars, at three different locations. I can prove how much money I received and deposited but BECU never even asked during their so called " investigation ''. This indicates to me complicity with the pirates enjoying their free reign of thievery. Like the discriminatory institution they are, they lied straight to me and said what happened to me never happened to me as they STOLE {$300.00} dollars with their crooked Atm 's and never reimbursed me. BECU seemingly enjoys gaslighting me on top of their other technological abuses and robberies that they ALLOWED to continue to happen to me. This type of financial institution abuse & gaslighting needs to be recognized and outlawed! And those within their ranks of their tech division and their rogue software engineers who think they are so smart, smarter than everybody, need to go to prison for their dishonesty and untrustworthiness.

complaint_text:
In accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act, the list of accounts below has violated my federally protected consumer rights to privacy and confidentiality under 15 USC 1681, caused defamation of my character and emotional and physical stress : XXXX XXXX XXXX - XXXX, XXXX BANK XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, Unknown - XXXX XXXX U.S.C 1681 section 602 A states I have the right to privacy.

15 U.S.C 1681 Section 604 A Section 2 : It also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instructions. 
15 U.S.C 1681c. ( a ) ( 5 ) states : no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information : Any other adverse item of information, other than the records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years. 
15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) states a person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate. 
The reporting of these accounts is a violation as I have not given written consent to furnish, my privacy has been violated and I have reason to believe the data reported is inaccurate since they do not match across any consumer reporting agency. DELETE THESE ACCOUNTS FROM MY CONSUMER REPORT. 
Please send me an updated report upon completion of my request. 
Sincerely, XXXX XXXX

complaint_text: I have supplied Equifax with evidence, several times, that both of my tax liens have been paid. They have still not updated my credit report. Equifax is the only reporting service showing these liens in an unpaid status.

I had set up an online payment at the beginning of the month and when it didnt deduct from my account, I logged into online acct. to find that the loan had been " paid '' with {$0.00} balance but no more info. I called to figure it out and was sent in to a prerecorded loop that never led to a human or answering system.

While I have been happy with the treatment and handling of my case by Mr. Cooper representative, I have significant concerns with the way the InsuranceClaimCheck representatives have handled my account. OnXX/XX/2020 I experienced a water line leak in my home and completed the documentation required to get my homeowners insurance to cover the losses related to the damage. These damages necessitated the removal of the back wall to the studs, removal of all flooring all the way to the concrete slab, removal of base cabinets, removal of dishwasher, removal of counter top, removal of sink and dishwasher, removal of drywall between kitchen utility room, removal of all flooring in utility room, removal or window framing, and removal of interior door and door frame. From XX/XX/20 to now the entire back wall, false dividing wall, flooring, cabinets, countertops, dishwasher, sink, garbage disposal, door and window frames, and insulation have been removed ( as shown in pictures below ). I have had a demolition and drying service come in and remove all water damaged materials and set up dryers for four days. The damage from the leak resulted in complete loss in my kitchen and have left myself and my daughter without a functioning kitchen for nearly 4 months as we have no other source of running water we have had to do dishes in the bath tub and utilize the sink in our only bathroom of all cooking and cleaning, as well as having no cabinets or countertops surface for storing dishes and food and no way to adequately prepare food items. 
Their incompetence and mis information has resulted in significant delays in my ability to repair my kitchen and make my home functioning for me and my daughter. I was given misinformation regarding the insurance check from one of your representatives, who stated I just needed to mail the check and an overnight return mailer to get it endorsed. I spent over {$50.00} in shipping costs following his instructions. The misinformation also resulted in a two-week delay in getting accurate information on how to get funds released. I spent hours on the phone with various representatives to try to get funds released and was moved from representative to representatives, this delay resulted in over a month delay from when my insurance company mailed me the claim check to me getting the money to make the significant purchase needed cabinets and installation. This delay then resulted in the cabinet order being placed at the end of XXXX and being impacted by the COVID 19 closures. I am now in the process of again being moved from  representative to representative in the attempt to get the remaining funds released so that I can purchase and order the countertop so it can be installed with the cabinets and my kitchen plumbing can be restored. This misinformation, mishandling, and incompetent practice has resulted in untold harm to my family due to the compromised living situation, along with making implications that I am mishandling the insurance funds. I have presented receipts totaling {$5300.00} for repairs and materials up to this point, more then the funds released and I am still told to additional proof is needed to release funds my insurance company has provided for me to finish this repair. I am a single mother and have lived in my small home for over 12 years with my daughter. We only have one working sink in the bathroom and have been forced to do dishes in the bathtub and live amongst boxes on the ground and exposed pipes for nearly 4 months due to the mishandling of this case and the ignorance of the representatives at XXXX. I have requested an inspection, as well as uploaded all required documents, as of XX/XX/2020 and expect that the inspection fee will be waived and funds will be released within the next 7-14 business days so that I can get the countertop ordered and installed when the cabinets are being installed. There is no other sensible resolution at this time, and I hope to have follow up communication regarding the situation and resolution from a representative at Mr. Cooper.

complaint_text: I understand the importance of removing any incorrect information from my credit report according to FCRA 605B. Could you please review the attached documents? I've observed discrepancies in several accounts, which is quite concerning to me.

Since then, I have not been allowed to pay online and the one time I sent a check ( sent XX/XX/XXXX, deposited ( XX/XX/XXXX! ) before the due date and they held onto it for weeks until it was late. It takes 45 minutes to an hour to make a phone call to them, only to be hung up on. They suggest I sign up for automatic deduction, but I honestly do not trust this company anymore.

complaint_text:
CREDIT COLLECTION SERV XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX I checked my three credit reports and found an assumed collection account from CREDIT COLLECTION SERV with different opening dates, balances, first date of delinquency, balance due, and/or last date of activities for this same exact account number. I have never had an account with this company nor any record of any type of first notice of debt including rights to dispute from this company. And if I, by chance, even though I have no recollection nor tangible record, naively spoke with a representative of this company over the phone about this debt, I was not informed by that representative that I had a right to dispute this debt nor a specific timeframe to do so. 

15 USC 1692g 809. Validation of debts ( a ) Notice of debt ; contents states that within five days after the initial communication with a consumer in connection with the collection of any debt, a debt collector shall, unless the following information is contained in the initial communication or the consumer has paid the debt, send the consumer a written notice containing ( 3 ) a statement that unless the consumer, within thirty days after receipt of the notice, disputes the validity of the debt, or any portion thereof, the debt will be assumed to be valid by the debt collector. XXXX XXXX XXXX definition of the word receipt is- a writing acknowledging the receiving of goods or money ; proof, evidence. I never signed nor received any type of acknowledgement receipt from a mailing service for any mail from this company. I am familiar with the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). Had I signed a receipt of notice for the proper and legal documentation from this company, I wouldve immediately responded asking for lawful verification of debt or copy of court ordered judgement well within the lawful 30 days allotted. After receiving my response letter with receipt, this company would have to legally cease from collection attempts and remove the account from my credit reports until their proof of verification is sent back to me. This company has reported to my credit reports without observing the FDCPA laws. My credit has been impacted adversely because of this companys irresponsibility. 

My credit reports also show that CREDIT COLLECTION SERV has provided this alleged account with inaccurate information. The FCRA requires that all data reported from the credit reporting agencies, creditors, or furnishers on a consumer 's report be 100 % ACCURATE, 100 % VERIFIABLE, and 100 % TIMELY. This means no data can be reported that can't be legally PROVEN to be 100 % accurate. I also understand that XXXX XXXX under {$500.00}, a paid XXXX XXXX, a collection less than a year old, or having a past due balance found on a collection account should not be listed on consumer credit reports. My XXXX, XXXX, and XXXX credit reports all show different and inaccurate open dates, balances, first date of delinquency, balance due, and/or last date of activities for this same exact account. 

This is erroneous and flawed reporting that is listed on my credit reports. Not only did this company not follow lawful FDCPA communications protocol, but it has also broken FDCPA False or Misleading Representations protocol as well. A debt collector, in collecting a debt, may not use any false, deceptive, or misleading representation. Specifically, a debt collector may not falsely represent the character, amount, or legal status of the debt, or of any services rendered, or compensation he or she may receive for collecting the debt. A debt collector may not communicate, or threaten to communicate, false credit information or information that should be known to be false, including not identifying disputed debts as such. Each of my 3 credit reports show different information instead of them all showing the exact same information. This is considered a false and misleading representation that this company has submitted to the credit reporting agencies.

Please remove this account from my credit reports immediately. It is not my duty to provide evidence that this alleged debt is not mine. It is the obligation of the debt collector to provide evidence that they can lawfully collect on any alleged debt, accurately report to the credit agencies, and follow all FCRA and FDCPA laws. As of today, they have been unsuccessful.

I have contacted Credit Bureaus on numerous occasions to have these inaccurate information that's hurting my score, however they are refusing to remove the information stating that items come back validated even though the information is incorrect. 

PLEASE CHECK ATTACHED LETTERS.
