List of accounts below has violated my federally protected consumer rights to privacy and confidentiality under 15 USC 1681. 

I looked at my XXXX, Equifax XXXX XXXX credit report on XX/XX/year>2025 and noticed some things are incomplete and not accurate. And according to the fair credit reporting act Whenever a consumer reporting agency prepares a consumer report it shall follow reasonable procedures to assure maximum possible accuracy of the information concerning the individual about whom the report relates according to 15 USC 1681 ( e ) ( b ).

And according to 15 USC 1681 5 they are suppose to do this ( 5 ) Treatment of inaccurate or unverifiable information ( A ) In generallf, after any reinvestigation under paragraph ( 1 ) of any information disputed by a consumer, an item of the information is found to be inaccurate or incomplete or can not be verified, the consumer reporting agency shall ( i ) promptly delete that item of information from the file of the consumer, or modify that item of information, as appropriate, based on the results of the reinvestigation; and ( ii ) promptly notify the furnisher of that information that the information has been modified or deleted from the file of the consumer.

And according to 15 USC 1681s-2 they are suppose to not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
I have had MULITPLE problems with Wells Fargo. I have been a customer since XXXX. The most recent problem began at the beginning of XXXX, XXXX. I had opened a new business checking account with another online company. I linked my Wells Fargo savings account with this online business account at another bank. Test deposits were confirmed by Wells Fargo. When I tried to transfer money out of WF into the new online account, I kept getting an error message ( transfer was denied to " protect '' my account ). I noticed the transfer limits were much lower than the amount allowed to another online bank account I had. So I tried the lower amount. I received a call from WF fraud protection. I confirmed all of my info with that person. She said I should now be clear to make the transfer up to my low limit. She said this was often done with new linked accounts, but that I should not have any future issues with ACH transfers to that account. She said it could take an hour. I tried XXXX hours later. Would not work. I tried the next day. Would not work. 

Over the course of the next XXXX weeks, I spoke with more than XXXX PEOPLE at Wells Fargo, from lower level reps to supervisors, to XXXX different people at the " customer advocacy office '' for WF, who eventually recommended filing a complaint on my behalf to the " LineofBusinessExecutiveOffice ''. I filed more complaints because no one got back to me. I spoke with supervisors who spoke with the " technical '' department, and no one could figure out why I could not transfer any money to my business checking account. NO ONE at Wells Fargo, more than XXXX people including several higher ups could tell me why I could not transfer my own money to my own business checking account. I was able to transfer {$250.00} eventually ( the limits are $ XXXX and $ XXXX ). 

I have not been able to transfer a single dollar more than that now for over a month. " XXXX XXXX '' from " XXXX of XXXX XXXX XXXX '' finally replied after a couple of weeks. She had left a voicemail after I missed her call. I called right back and left her a voicemail to call me again. She did not. A week later, I called and had to speak with someone else to try and reach her. She finally replied after a week. She could not figure out the problem. She said she needed to look into it. So another week passed, and she left another voicemail. I called her back the same day and left her a voicemail saying to please call me back. I also replied to her email in the WF secure messaging saying I left her a voicemail and to please call me back. This was a week ago now. " XXXX '' has refused to reach out to me again. Additionally, she was not professional and was a bit rude the time I did talk to her, often speaking over me. She was pretty dismissive of the whole issue. But now, no one will reply back to me, and no one can solve the problem. The last email I got from XXXX " XXXX '' said I should remove the business account and try again... to just start over. 

The " customer service '' at Wells Fargo has been horrendous. Not a single person has been able to tell me why I can not transfer my own money to my own, linked business checking account. It's been over a month now. And the " top level '' customer complaint office has failed to reply back to me now after a week, after I have left a direct voicemail on the rep 's direct line a week ago and also replied to her email a week ago. 

I am trying to run a new startup business, and I can not send another single dollar to fund my business checking account from my WF account. And the fact that the highest levels of Wells Fargo " customer service '' refuse to reply to me makes it all even worse - exponentially. 

I don't think Wells Fargo values my business with them after 14 years. I have wasted roughly XXXX hours of my time with this latest issue alone ( phone conversations with over XXXX people, being on hold, writing emails, filing complaints, etc., and it has cost me an ENORMOUS amount of frustration. WF is hindering my ability to run my business. And they simply say " you can try again '' in their latest attempt to resolve this. Wells Fargo will have to decide what it wants to do to keep me as a customer. 

I am pretty shocked at the level of incompetence, and I'm completely ready to close my Wells Fargo accounts.

I am horrified at the trap I 've fallen into at this stage of life and returning to the XXXX Agency has not provided any relief - just embarrassment and finger pointing t at me that I accepted the deal and that I have to seek relief and guidance elsewhere. 
I am in much dire straits and distress then ever before.

complaint_text: In XX/XX/XXXX I contacted Freedom Mortgage to see if I could have my PMI removed. I was told I'd pay {$150.00} for a BPO and it would be removed if it qualified. Then I received a letter stating it wasn't eligible for BPO review until after XX/XX/XXXX because I needed to pay 2 years on the house. In XX/XX/XXXX, I again requested a BPO review by secure email. I received a response stating that I would need to pay {$450.00} for an appraisal. When I called, I was told that the fee is {$150.00} and it must be a typo, but then the agent looked further and said that West Virginia is the only state that Freedom Mortgage requires a {$450.00} appraisal and not a {$150.00} BPO. Additionally, Freedom Mortgage states that even if I pay my mortgage down to 80 % of original value, I will have to pay {$450.00} appraisal fee before they will remove the PMI. Why is WV the only state that must pay significantly more to remove PMI? And once I've met 80 % of my original purchase price, how is it not contrary to the Homeowners Protection Act to have to pay {$450.00} for an appraisal just to avoid paying additional PMI?

complaint_text:
Subject : Escalated Complaint Regarding Inaccurate Reporting of Cancelled Debt by XXXX XXXX To Whom It XXXX Concern, I am filing this escalated complaint regarding the inaccurate and misleading reporting of a charged-off account by XXXX XXXX ( Account ending in XXXX ) on my credit report, despite the issuance of a Form XXXX documenting the cancellation of this debt. 

Key Issues and Violations XXXX. Failure to Remove Cancelled Debt from Credit Reports : XXXX XXXX issued a Form XXXX for this account, indicating that {$3200.00} was cancelled as of XX/XX/year>. According to IRS regulations, a XXXX signifies the cancellation of a debt, which should also be reflected in credit reporting. However, the account is still being reported as charged off and outstanding on my credit report, which is inaccurate and misleading. 
XXXX. Violations of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) : 15 U.S.C. 1681e ( b ) : Credit reporting agencies are required to ensure maximum possible accuracy in their reports. Reporting a debt as both cancelled and charged off is inherently contradictory and fails to meet this standard.

15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( b ) : XXXX XXXX  has not taken reasonable steps to correct or update inaccurate information following my dispute. 
XXXX. Misrepresentation of XXXX XXXX : The issuance of a XXXX constitutes an identifiable event of cancellation, as outlined in IRS XXXX XXXX. Therefore, continued reporting of the debt as outstanding or charged off misrepresents its legal status, potentially violating the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA, 15 U.S.C. 1692e ). 
XXXX. Harm to XXXX : This inaccurate reporting is materially harmful to my creditworthiness and ability to secure credit, as the account continues to appear derogatory despite the cancellation. 

Requested XXXX I respectfully request that the CFPB : XXXX. Investigate JPMCB CARDs compliance with FCRA and FDCPA regulations. 
2. Require JPMCB CARD to instruct credit reporting agencies to remove or update the reporting of this account to reflect the debts cancellation.

3. Provide written confirmation that the inaccurate information has been corrected or removed from my credit report. 

Supporting Documentation To support this complaint, I have attached : A copy of my initial correspondence to JPMCB CARD requesting the XXXX form. 
JPMCB CARDs response, including the issued XXXX form. 
My credit report showing the continued reporting of this account as charged off. 

Contact Information Full Name : XXXX XXXX Address : XXXX Hacks XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, TN XXXX Phone Number : XXXX Email Address : XXXX Please address this matter promptly and provide a resolution within the mandated timeframe for investigations. I reserve the right to pursue legal remedies under applicable consumer protection laws for any continued inaccuracies. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
My mortgage was recently transferred to Freedom Mortgage. Recently I got an email about HELOC and I thought by clicking on it I would see general information about the product ( IE what rate might I get ). I've asked for them to confirm receipt, and none of them have responded. 

I feel harassed by the company the holds my mortgage, which is extremely unfair because I have no control over who my mortgage is serviced by, and if I could stop being a customer I would. My client submitted a request for short sale to Penny Mac in XXXX and we were told the file had been submitted to the investor for a decision in early XXXX. We had a ratified contract on the property in XXXX and were told to hold it until we received the Approval to Participate ( ATP ) which is the FHA letter allowing the seller to participate in the pre-foreclosure sale. Approximately 10 days later we were informed that the property has a foreclosure sale date of XX/XX/2017. When I confronted the contact at Penny Mac he said he is just informing us of the sale date and that the review was still pending. After several days I emailed him to get the status of the ATP and was told they will not issue the ATP since there is a sale date scheduled. I explained we had an offer on the property and asked him why he told us not to submit the contract. His response was the investor initiated the foreclosure faster that they thought it would be. I immediately sent in the offer and closing disclosure and requested he send it in for review. I asked for an update and he is no longer returning calls or emails. I have called his manager 3 times and not received any return calls. My client was depending on Penny Mac to handle his request in a timely manner and give him consideration on his offer and they have completely dropped the ball. This company has drug the process on and allowed the home to go into foreclosure when they had the ability to move the file in a timely manner and keep the foreclosure process from being initiated

These unauthorized inquiries are not only concerning but also damaging to my financial reputation. It has come to my attention that certain inquiries have been made on my credit report without my consent or knowledge. I want to emphasize that I have no association with these inquiries and have never authorized any entity to access my credit information in this manner.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

I can not purchase a vehicle due to this reporting on my credit and this was not a reflection of my personal payment history.

complaint_text:
Equifax is refusing to block fraudulent information on my credit file as legally required by FCRA Section 605 ( b ). 

They sent me a letter with the following statement : '' Please be advised that Equifax, at this time will not block the information subject to the submitted identity theft and Or police report you provided as part of your dispute. We are contacting each creditor directly to verify the account On your behalf. We will also forward a copy of documents you have provided to each creditor for their review. " I sent the, all required documents, including my ID Theft Report as detailed on XXXX. 

They are providing no explanation regarding why they have refused to block the information and placed all of the fraudulent items into their XXXX-day dispute process. This has been an extremely frustrating process and I do n't know how else to recover from this ID Theft.

I am writing to have the following information removed from my credit file, the items that I need deleted are going to be attached in a word document. I am a victim of identity theft. I have multiple accounts and inquiries that I DID NOT apply for listed on my credit report. I ask that these items be deleted so my credit report will only show accurate information. I reported the theft of my identity to the Federal Trade Commission and have enclosed copies of the report. I would like these items deleted from my credit report as soon as possible. Please XXXX this information from my credit report, pursuant to section XXXX of the Fair Credit Reporting Act.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: In the quiet humdrum of everyday life, a sudden jolt shattered the tranquility : I had become a victim of identity theft. Like a thief in the night, unseen hands had stolen my personal information, plunging me into a bewildering maze of uncertainty. With each fraudulent transaction and unauthorized account, the breach of trust cut deep, leaving me grappling with the unsettling reality of a violated identity. Yet, in the midst of chaos, a glimmer of resilience emerged, a resolve to reclaim what was rightfully mine and restore the harmony stolen by unseen adversaries. These are the following accounts need to be removed :
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: You have reported inaccurate and unauthorized accounts on my credit report, which is a violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( 15 U.S. Code 1681i ) requiring a proper reinvestigation of disputed items, and 1681e ( b ), which mandates maximum possible accuracy. These false entries are damaging and unjust, especially since Ive never opened or authorized these accounts. If you fail to investigate and correct this, I may pursue legal action under the FCRA and FDCPA ( 15 U.S. Code 1692e ) for deceptive and misleading reporting.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: I have contacted Capital One Auto Finance, several times since XX/XX/XXXX, as well as contacting the credit agencies to inform them that there are duplicate credit inquiries on my credit report. I have asked both to remove the duplicate entry. It was reported on my credit report as of XX/XX/XXXX. All I am asking is for the duplication to be removed ; however, the lending agency has ignored my previous requests.
My name is XXXX XXXX there is no third party involved in the filing of this complaint and this complaint has not been made in error.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: WITHOUT MY WRITTEN CONSENT, XXXX and Early Warning Services has UNLAWFULLY shared personal information pertaining to my credit and have violated Federal Law as well as the Fair Credit Reporting Act. According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act, 15 United States Code 1681 section 602 a states " There is a need to ensure that consumer reporting agencies exercise their grave responsibilities with fairness, impartiality, and a respect for the consumers right to privacy ''. XXXX XXXX Solutions have not abided by these reasonable procedures. I have repeatedly instructed them to discontinue violating my privacy and they have failed to abide by their lawful agreement and ensure the fairness of me as the consumer. IT IS MY RIGHT to OPT OUT of their reporting of my information and their LAWFUL DUTY to discontinue reporting it. 15 United States Code 6801 states " It is the policy of the Congress that each financial institution has an affirmative and continuing obligation to respect the privacy of its customers and to protect the security and confidentiality of those customers nonpublic personal information. '' XXXX is a financial institution by definition under that title. 15 USC 1681 section 604 ( 2 ) also states that " any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : in accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates. '' As it relates to XXXX XXXX XXXX  I NOW REVOKE ALL WRITTEN, VERBAL, NON-VERBAL, ASSUMED and UN-ASSUMED or IMPLIED consent to furnish my personal credit information. Any and all consent to any creditors whether it be verbal, non-verbal, written, implied or otherwise is revoked. 15 USC 6802 ( b ) ( c ) states that " A financial institution may not disclose nonpublic personal information to a nonaffiliated third party unless the consumer is given an explanation of how the consumer can exercise that nondisclosure option. '' XXXX XXXX never informed me of my right to exercise my nondisclosure option. Finally, 15 U.S. Code 1681 ( e ) states ''Every consumer reporting agency shall maintain reasonable procedures designed to avoid violations of section 1681c of this title and to limit the furnishing of consumer reports to the purposes listed under section 1681b of this title. Under that explanation, XXXX XXXX XXXX and Early Warning Services are not abiding by those very reasonable procedures. So, per FEDERAL LAW, specifically 12 CFR 1016.7 which states that " A consumer may exercise the right to opt out at any time '', I am opting out of your reporting services. Discontinue your unlawful practices and provide WRITTEN confirmation that the above instructions have been carried out.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
Chase closed my personal checking account and credit cards without prior notice in XX/XX/2023 and froze my assets for approximately a month. When Chase finally released my funds back to me Chase withheld {$19000.00} saying a certain XXXX deposit into my account from a third party LLC ( the " third party '' or the " Originator '' ), which I received regular quarterly distributions from for the past three years, did not belong to me due to the Receiver Name on the ACH not matching my name on the checking account. The XXXX of the XXXX made an error titling the Receiver Name which should have been for myself personally. 

Chase ( compliance department ) said due to my account being suspended/closed the Originator of the ACH would need to request an ACH reversal through their bank ( XXXX XXXX Bank ) to get the funds back from Chase. The Originator requested an XXXX reversal for the amount of the deposit mentioned above which Chase subsequently rejected. When I contacted Chase again to ask them what needs to be done to recall the funds from my account Chase said the third party 's bank would need to submit a letter to Chase outlining the deposit and request an XXXX reversal. The third party 's bank submitted two ( 2 ) letters to Chase requesting the funds be returned, both which we denied ( see attachment ). Alternatively, Chase has given me no solution or option to work with the third party and their bank to amend the Receiver Name on the original XXXX deposit into my account which would allow the funds to be released to me, the rightful owner. 

After multiple calls with Chase spanning multiple hours, Chase has lied and failed to provide me an answer how to release the funds that are still in my personal checking account.

I have sent multiple request and I feel like Im being ignored. I sent letter after letter highlighting these inaccurate items caused by identity theft. The other bureaus recognized these items as inaccurate and deleted them. I sent proof of that and still not answer. FDCPA Section 807 clearly states that inaccurate items must be deleted. I have asked for verification and still as of today over 180 days later no verification. No original contract, no personal information, no who did you speak with to verify. I demand these inaccurate items be removed immediately. These are violating my right and I have no other choice to proceed to legal action. This is a direct violation of 15 us code 1692. My information was also impacted in the Equifax and XXXX  data breaches.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: I sought a mortgage modification starting in XXXX after my wife and co-loan maker left our family house for her own home. She stopped paying all household expenses and in the past XXXX years my take-home income was reduced significantly as my family sought to start a business. Chase advised us to jointly apply for the modification but acknowledged via numerous conversations with us that my wife did not reside in our home nor was she paying any household expenses. My wife, at Chase 's request furnished Chase the lease on her new home and bank statements which all corroborated that she did n't live in our family home nor pay any household expenses. I and in fact, both my wife and me, indicated that the mortgage relief was to be only on my finances b/c she had no intent to pay anything further for our family home. Chase took over XXXX months to deny us for any loan modification on the basis that we made too much money! They said I could appeal but I strenuously objected b/c they made their determination on both my wife and my income and to " appeal '' that finding would be futile b/c with our combined income -- we probably do make too much money. But my issue was why they would include her after numerous discussions and evidence submitted that we were separated and more important -- my wife did n't intend to contribute to the household in any way. Further, in my original request, while we filled out the application at their insistence, my goal was for a forbearance for a few months while we tried to resolve our marital affairs. In parallel, I maintained keeping my mortgage current by liquidating every retirement account that I have and vigorously explained in every conversation with Chase that I could not allow my mortgage to be late. The nature of my work with the XXXX requires a clearance and financial distress indicators could impact my employability and the status of my firm to do business with the XXXX -- in essence ensuring my financial insolvency. The most important thing in this process was not so much the decision that Chase reached but that they reached a decision expeditiously. At this writing, I have been in the " appeal '' process for XXXX weeks and the newly assigned rep has yet to review the basics of my file and he stated on XXXX XXXX conversation that I should have filed an app by myself with my wife having signed a quitclaim deed. WE ASKED THAT QUESTION NUMEROUS TIMES IN THE ORIGINAL APPLICATION and original rep refused to answer that question. But to add insult to injury, he tells me that if I want to be reviewed solo then I MUST REAPPLY. Chase 's lack of appropriate and timely processing of my family 's request is literally forcing us into foreclosure but I struggle to keep my mortgage current b/c of the adverse professional ramifications. In close, our house is at least $ XXXX upside down and our mortgage is a negative ARM -- XXXX other major drivers for seeking a modification. Again, it is not so much the decision that Chase makes it is the intransigence to recognize that forcing me to re-apply when we made our situation clear from the outset, is enormously unfair and a potential destructive hardship to our family. But after my last dealing with the Chase rep, it was clear that he, personally, refuses to even review my file in a timely fashion and despite his assurances that he will do so and despite my vehement request, even to escalate my case to a superior. He advised me that I can not expect escalation despite his not reviewing my case file since he 's been assigned it XXXX weeks ago and that I have " no further recourse. '' I 've attached Chase 's " decision '' & you will see that they used our combined income ignored all the conversations, data and facts related to my wife NOT paying any household expenses and her taking her salary to pay for her new home [ where mathematically she could n't pay for both homes ].

I have observed that you have listed an alleged debt on my consumer report without any prior communication. I demand that you provide the 1099c for this account. It is unjust to report this account and have it displayed on my consumer report. I have enclosed my complaint letter for your review, and I expect a careful examination of its contents. If this matter is not addressed appropriately, I will pursue legal action against your organization.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: My mortgage company went from XXXX to XXXX XXXX XXXX to Green tree and has been nothing but Inconsistent communication. As I have tried to establish some form of reasonable payment I have been tossed around like trash. If I was given different deadlines and always tried to reach them, leaving messages asked for a return call. It never happened. My payments were anywhere from XXXX down to XXXX and XXXX with ARM of XXXX % interest. This has been all over the place from the start, My home has been underwater for some time now, My husband and I have even walked from the home after filling Bankrupsy back in XXXX and returned after a year and half when given false hope the bank would work with us, not to mention the company that they had monitoring our home when we left, appeared to have taken all the copper piping. When Green Tree sends you paperwork, often you will recieve several copies from basic mail, XXXX, Certified. With messages to call, or will have unidentified people walking around your house snapping pictures and leaving notes on your door to URGENT! call Green Tree, and when you do, end up leaving messages with no return. I do n't want to loose my home, but this company is not really there to help. This process has taken my trust, my money, my serenity, with no desire to help ones that need it most.

I am a victim of identity theft. I am writing to request that you delete the following fraudulent inaccurate information from my credit report. Someone has used my personal information to obtain loans and credit cards. I have no idea how the theft took place. I also have no knowledge of any suspects. I did not receive any money, goods, or services as a result of identity theft. Please let me know if you need any other information from me to block this information from my credit report.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
In or around XXXX XXXX I contacted my lender Wells Fargo to refinance. I had recently divorced and wanted to remove my husband 's name from the mortgage and obtain a more realistic rate due to my hardship. I have XXXX children XXXX in XXXX and XXXX in XXXX. I am trying to keep life as stable as possible. I am working XXXX jobs to do so. 
On XXXX XXXX, XXXX I received the first notification from Wells Fargo assigning me with a home preservation specialist XXXX XXXX and her phone number.All documentation requested was submitted via fax as referenced in XXXX/XXXX/XXXX letter. From XXXX until XXXX I have been on the phone multiple times a day, multiple days of the week responding to requests of more information. Needed more profit loses, needed 2 weeks of pay stubs, then wanted another 2 weeks of pay stubs. The underwriter always was requesting more specifics. I would give 3 months they would ask for another 3 months. My XXXX taxes were submitted to them, the underwriter then wanted my XXXX taxes broken down into monthly increments. Throughout that time frame XXXX XXXX was not available other individuals would answer her extension, you get whoever answers the phone, when I would reference I spoke with XXXX, or XXXX or whoever no one ever knew who these people were, my file would also not reflect that I spoke with those individuals, the file was never updated. I would have to explain my situation over and over again. Most times I would ask the agent to read the notes in my file ; in most cases I would be told there were no notes. On one occasion the information that was in my file was foreclosure information from another Wells Fargo borrower. On numerous occasions I would fax additional requested information, when I would follow up to insure it was received I would never hear back to weather it was received, or they did n't have it etc. They would also state they sent information to me and I would never get it, one time the sent it to my ex-husbands house. I requested my name to be changed back in XXXX. My divorce decree and my XXXX taxes where the first batch of information sent to them. 
XXXX/XXXX/XXXX letter received confirming receipt of required my documents and that it would take 30 days to review from XXXX XXXXwas all put in place. I never received anything in writing with the terms of this modification, nor do I know the formula used to establish rate. She also told me at this time that XXXX payment was skipped and that the modification would begin XXXX/XXXX/XXXX. 

At this time I contacted the State of Maine and XXXX XXXX called me back. I explained my situation over the past months and concern over accepting the modification. She encouraged me to call XXXX and request the formula the underwriter used, XXXX stated that they did not have to give out that information, I asked for a supervisor, XXXX answered I explained I was working with the State and was requesting the formula, he stated " are you threatening me with a lawsuit '' laughing. I asked for his supervisor he would not pass me on. He told me to put request in writing, I did. 
XXXX Executive Mortgage Specialist Customer Care and Recovery Specialist is who contacted me in response to my request. On XXXX XXXX, XXXX I received a letter from him stating they verified an error on their part did not occur. This letter is riddled with errors. The total monthly income is not consistent with numbers that I submitted. What is the child support number supposed to be? No matter how you add the wage, child support, business it does not equal the total monthly income as referenced in his letter. XXXX XXXX I contacted XXXX and told her I was n't going to accept the modification and I was going to continue to pay my normal mortgage.

I notice XXXX that there was a collection account showing on my credit report from Amsher Collection Service. I called them to find out what this was about as I have not received any notification of any collection account. I was told that they can not give me any information that I needed to speak to XXXX XXXX 's office, that he was the attorney handling this matter. I called the law office and asked them about this debt. They said it was for a wireless provider XXXX and I told them that I never had a XXXX  account that I have XXXX XXXX XXXX  and before that XXXX and that they were under my dad 's account. They asked me if I know XXXX XXXX and I said yes and they said the account was under that company name. I told them I am not liable for any of those debts and I have never been notified in writing or called about this debt and the only way I found out was that I applied for a mortgage. They insisted and very rudely told me they did and tough luck. I asked for proof that I am personal liable and they have not produced this to date. How can they just placed a collection account on my credit report without notifying me and/or validating that I personally owed the money? Before a collection company can put a debt on my credit report, they are legally required to send me a written " validation notice '' within five days of their first contact with me, which details the amount owed, the original creditor, and your right to dispute the debt, which is mandated by the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). I contact them in early XXXX, two or three times, I can find my notes. Now I just received on XX/XX/XXXX a letter from them about the debt. How can they have this placed on my credit report before contacting me. They said I had until XX/XX/XXXX to dispute the debt, which I did and mailed back to them. On the phone when I called them I asked about just paying this to get it off my credit report. They said if I paid the full amount they would give me a on time courtesy and remove the account. I didn't trust them and I asked for this in writing and they said they won't do that but our conversation was recorded. I asked can I record this and they said no I just need to trust them. How can I trust anyone that can be so deceptive and lie to me and then say just pay it and it will be removed. If I owe the money, I will pay what I owe before it could have been added to my credit report. But they never contacted me nor have they provided proof I personally owe the debt. I asked multiple times to speak with a supervisor and they tell me no one is available they will call me back and they never have. Please help.
Bank of America had been charged me fee each 25 days instead of a month for about 8 years and had charged over many times

complaint_text:
On XX/XX/XXXX we received a Notice of Cancellation from XXXX for nonpayment of premiums originally by XX/XX/XXXX in the amount of {$1700.00} for our policy effective XX/XX/XXXX through XX/XX/XXXX. The new due date would be {$1700.00} if paid by XX/XX/XXXX and we would not have a lapse in coverage. I contacted the insurance department on XX/XX/XXXX and learned that our Insurance renewal due date was showing as XX/XX/XXXX in the system so even though the renewal bill was received timely by Flagstar it was not paid. 

I investigated further as to why they would have an incorrect date for our insurance and examined my Flagstar transaction history. I noticed a payment made to XXXX in the amount of {$1400.00} on XX/XX/XXXX for a policy number that did not appear to be ours. I then went and reviewed my XXXX account transaction history and confirmed that my premium in the amount of {$1300.00} had been paid at closing on XX/XX/XXXX and credited to our XXXX policy as of XX/XX/XXXX. No other payments were credited to the account from Flagstar. I contacted Flagstar customer service who then transferred me to the Insurance Department. 

The representative I spoke with advised that the bill paid in XX/XX/XXXX was for the prior owner of our property. She stated that the renewal bill had our address listed but contained the account number for the prior owner and had the names of the prior owners. Because the address matched our property address the payment was issued from our escrow account. She advised the check had our loan number written on the check however, XXXX has confirmed that the check did in fact have the prior owners loan number written on the check. XXXX has advised that Flagstar will need to contact them in regards to curing this error as the policy is active and they can not refund the amount to me or Flagstar or transfer the funds from their account into mine. 

We paid a {$3500.00} shortage on XX/XX/XXXX covering this payment made to XXXX that was not ours to pay. Our insurance premium was not timely renewed and caused an increase in our premium. I would like to know how this happened as it is very evident that there is a lack of controls with validating insurance renewals and properly updating accounts. Pursuant to RESPA 1024.17 ( k ) ( 1 ), If  the terms of any federally related mortgage loan require the borrower to make payments to an escrow account, the servicer must pay the disbursements in a timely manner, that is, on or before the deadline to avoid a penalty, as long as the borrower 's payment is not more than 30 days overdue. Flagstar has failed to timely pay our insurance renewal and has fraudulently taken funds from our escrow account and paid someone else 's premiums creating a deficiency and shortage in our escrow account that should not have occurred due to their failure to reconcile and accurately account for our escrow line items.

Specifically, the accounts listed XXXX - XXXX - This is paid as agreed and should not be reporting negatively on my report.are closed but still show late payments. These reports are unjust and create significant obstacles to accessing credit and financial opportunities.

On XXXX OneWest Banks Mitigation department told me to write up a settlement offer for 10 % of the amount they wrote off in XXXX of XXXX. I submitted a settlement offer of {$6000.00} along with bank statements, pay stubs, XXXX XXXX, bank statements and tax returns. I was told this process would take 30 days or less. I was assigned XXXX XXXX ( XXXXXXXXXXXX ) as my settlement agent. Since XXXX it 's been a absolute roller coaster trying to get this resolved with little to no communication. I was told in XXXX of XXXX my loan was charged off for the amount of {$61000.00}. I was told they would review my packet of information and there would be a resolution within 30 days.

XXXX I sent XXXX XXXX an email ( XXXXXXXXXXXX ) with more information on my current situation, there was no response to my email. 
XXXX - I sent XXXX XXXX an email to follow up to see if she needed anything from me, there was no response to my email. 
XXXX - I sent XXXX XXXX an email to follow up to see if she needed anything from me, there was no response to my email. 
XXXX - XXXX XXXX emailed me and said she would order the XXXX. 
XXXX I emailed XXXX XXXX to get the contact information for the XXXX company so I could expedite the process, there was no response to my email. 
XXXX The realtor hired to write up the XXXX called me and stopped by my house at noon to take pictures of our house. He stated he would submit his XXXX to the 3rd party company contracted by OneWest Bank with a RUSH on the XXXX to get to OneWest by Tuesday, XXXX XXXX. 
XXXX I emailed XXXX XXXX that the realtor submitted the XXXX on XXXX XXXX and she should be receiving it that day. 
XXXX - XXXX XXXX emailed me and stated she hasnt seen the XXXX and to try reaching out to her on XXXX XXXX for next steps. 
XXXX I called in to the XXXX number and was told the XXXX arrived on XXXX XXXX and the settlement package would be submitted to XXXX XXXX supervisor along with the XXXX to get final approval. 
XXXX I emailed XXXX XXXX and asked where are we at with the process and the settlement offer, there was no response to my email. 
XXXX I emailed XXXX XXXX and asked where are we at with the process and the settlement offer, there was no response to my email. 
XXXX I emailed XXXX XXXX and asked where are we at with the process and the settlement offer, there was no response to my email. 
XXXX - I called in to the XXXX number and was told the XXXX was not received into the system and this process could now take more than 30 days. 
XXXX I opened a complaint with the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau as well as sending complaint emails to CIT Bank and OneWest Bank, all encompassed a detailed timeline of events seen in this document. 
XXXX ( XXXX ) I emailed XXXX XXXX and asked where are we at with the process and the settlement offer. 
XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX me an email stating she is busy and will get to my email when she has time. 
XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX me, This has been sent for a decision, however please note that the person who reviews these files is not back in the office until after the first of the year and thus I may not hear back until after next week. 
XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX of XXXX XXXX called me and asked if he could help I walked him through my timeline and situation. He asked me to email him the timeline as well as XXXX contact information.

XXXX ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX emails me that he has taken this issue to his manager to help me and he also left a message for XXXX .

What 's frustrating is this morning ( XXXX ) at XXXX XXXX is telling me it will take another two weeks and by XXXX today they have rendered a full decision to make me pay the full amount versus accepting my settlement offer or negotiating of my offer. 

The other issue I have is they wrote off {$61000.00} in XXXX of XXXX and now they are demanding {$63000.00} due to all of these miscellaneous fees and charges. On XX/XX/XXXX, I sent a letter to the United States XXXX  Court asking do they report bankruptcies to anyone. Therefore, how did the credit bureaus edify my bankruptcy as 100 percent accurate if this is the case? They never conducted a fair investigation according to the United States Code 15 USC 1681.

Code Compliance 15 USC 1681, section ( 3 ) ( E ) states : The term " investigative consumer report '' means a consumer report or portion ; thereof : in which ; information on a consumer 's character, general reputation, personal characteristics, or mode of living is obtained through personal interviews with neighbors, friends, or associates of the consumer reported on or with others with whom he is acquainted or who may have knowledge concerning any such items of information. However ; such information shall not include specific factual information on a consumer 's credit record obtained directly from a creditor of the consumer or from a consumer. 

- They violated my rights numerous times - The credit bureaus violated my given rights under 15 USC 1681 - According To 15 USC 1681 ( Section 602 A, states that I have the right to privacy ) - According To 15 USC 1681 ( Section 604 A, Section 2 : It also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instructions.

- According To : 15 USC 1681s-2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
To Whom this May Concern : This was a line of credit my mother applied for, My mother has my same name. 

My name : XXXX XXXX Deceased mother : XXXX XXXX XXXX Before my mother passed   away I was in title. 

Although I finished paying the principle on my mortgage since XX/XX/XXXX, ( as reflected in Exhibit A- Wells Fargo statement attached ) Wells Fargo is continuing to place lender placed insurance on my account, they did as of XX/XX/XXXX which is unheard of I paid my loan off years early. If my principle balance is at XXXX then I am not a risk to them, I should not be charged lender placed insurance. I was totally paid off until in XX/XX/XXXXthey placed lender placed insurance and then when i called them they told me not to make any payments until they worked on a resolution, I have been waiting for that resolution since XX/XX/XXXX and its now XX/XX/XXXX.They are trying to place another policy effective XX/XX/XXXX. When I am at a XX/XX/XXXX balance on my principle. I can not get anyone to insure my home because of the Hurricane Irma Damaging my roof. The damage is not was not large enough for Fema to cover, but bad enough for no one to want to cover me. I didnt want to make a claim against the insurance because, I have never made a claim on my home and I was going to try to take care of this. But because they continue to place the lender placed its making the balance of insurance fees that I owe larger and larger, not allowing me to receive the title to my home. I need your Influence to go to bat for me. What the bank Wells Fargo is doing to me after I paid off my principal is totally unfair. They are mis-handling my account in 5 different ways. 

1. They are placing lender-placed insurance after my principal was already paid off. If I am at XXXX principle, I pose no risk to them. ( Please see Exhibit C- letters from them stating they are continuing to put this on ) 2. The second thing they are doing incorrectly is after I've been with the deceased department for over 10 years when I finally paid the principal balance off ... they are now switching my account to a new Department ( please see Exhibit D ) and this department is changing the whole rules of the game therefore what I was told and promised by the old apartment is void compared to the new Department. Just to elaborate the old apartment told me to fax them a letter stating that since I paid my principal balance off I could have these fees removed and I did and they remove the fees now the new Department put the fees right back on. When I'm trying to pay this off. Furthermore that new department has me waiting over 4 months for an answer and they also after the old Department said that my principal balance was XXXX the new Department is saying that I owe a XX/XX/XXXX payment. 

3. The third thing they're doing incorrectly it's sending me letters telling me that I'm going into foreclosure telling me that they're placing lender-placed Insurance again which I don't understand because my principal balance is paid!!! These letters make me lose sleep. And they placed it in XX/XX/XXXX after I paid off my principle and they plan on placing it again in XX/XX/XXXX. 

4. The fourth thing is I've totally lost trust in this bank because about five years ago they were purposely losing my payments I would walk into a Wells Fargo and make a payment and XXXX hope that I kept my receipt because if I didn't they would say I didn't make my payments. About 5 years ago I requested help from Congress and they assisted me and they audited them and they changed their tune real quickly and found all my payments. The fact that they lost by payments when I was so close to being paid off made me think that they were purposely trying to take my house and foreclose on me. 

5. The fifth thing that they're doing incorrectly is they have their representative XXXX XXXX whose phone number is XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX extension XXXX XXXX XXXX this person has had me waiting for resolution for over 3 months. He called me yesterday only to say that they are continuing to place Lender placed insurance and he still has no resolution that the anticipated resolution date was XX/XX/XXXX. ( Mind you I put my formal complaint with him Since XX/XX/XXXX ) Since then, I've called him every other Monday and what he tells me is he'll give me an answer in 10 days that they're waiting to drop the paperwork. He has told me this over four times/ for 3 months ... I believe that's a bit much. He told me not to make any payments until they come up with a solution. But they have dragged it out 3 months. 

I can't even sleep at night thinking that these guys are going to pull some kind of scheme and try to foreclose on me for fees I don't understand why they continue to put lender-placed insurance I don't understand why they moved my account to another department after I've been with the deceased  department for 10 years now this new Department doesn't know that I dropped {$7000.00} at one time they don't know my payment history they're just trying to collect and these fees but their fees they're not principle. So as a company Wells Fargo I know they're huge but the deceased department has helped me and telling me one thing and then they the new Department is changing the rules as if it were a new ball game, when I'm clearly at the end. The deceased Department told me : that I could pay off my principle balance and any fees once I paid off my principal balance those fees I could pay off at my own terms ... once paid off I can receive the paperwork. Furthermore the deceased Department invited me to fax them over a request to take off these fees and I did, I dont have that paperwork but it was faxed in XX/XX/XXXX to the insurance department and they took off the fees! yet the new department put them back on. 

Yet this new Department put the fees right back on. They often send me letters that they're placing new lender-placed insurance. They just sent one on XX/XX/XXXX when in actuality they already placed lender-placed Insurance in XX/XX/XXXX but they can't because I paid off my principal in XX/XX/XXXX. I can't even sleep at night I stay up worrying about being so close to pay my house off and these people pulling a fast one on a normal citizen like me. To the old department I'm totally paid off on principal and they took off fees the new Department said that I still owe one more payment and they put on a whole new set of lender-placed insurance on me..My concern is that I was totally paid off in XX/XX/XXXX and I have the receipt that says XXXX balance ( attached to this email ) on the principle but they transferred my account to this new department they said I still owe one more payment in XX/XX/XXXX ( where that came from count be explained ) they're incorrect they keep making me wait ... I've been waiting for 4 months, for a resolution ... I've been waiting for an answer on this and every time I call which I call every other week on a Monday they tell me they don't have an answer, but they will in 10 days and it's been since XX/XX/XXXXthat I've been calling and now we're going into XX/XX/XXXX so what are they trying to do they said I only order payment for XX/XX/XXXX but I don't want to think that they're making me try to go to foreclosure for fees I don't trust this bank I need XXXX XXXX strength I need your help. I know that her influence will get their attention and get them to do what they should be doing. They've been having me hanging on for 4 months without an answer and it's not fair I need her to intervene but I need to fully explain to her while my case is relevant. 

Attached you will find. 

Exhibit A letter from Wells Fargo ... that proves my principle balance is paid off. As of XX/XX/XXXX and then it  also shows the small fees for about XXXX Exhibit B Attached you also find a letter where they are stating that they can help if I'm going into foreclosure ... that's the letter that makes me not get sleep. complaint_text: Not getting any response XXXX are XXXX XXXX reflecting ph calls

Recently, I did an investigation on my credit report and found several items on there to be inaccurate. 
Under 15 U.S. Code 1681e ( b ) Accuracy of report Whenever a consumer reporting agency prepares a consumer report, it shall follow reasonable procedures to assure the maximum possible accuracy of the information concerning the individual about whom the report relates.

15 U.S. Code 1681i ( 5 ) Treatment of inaccurate or unverifiable information ( A ) In general if, after any reinvestigation under paragraph ( 1 ) of any information disputed by a consumer, an item of the information is found to be inaccurate or incomplete or can not be verified, the consumer reporting agency shall-i ) promptly delete that item of information from the file of the consumer, or modify that item of information, as appropriate, based on the results of the reinvestigation; and ( ii ) promptly notify the furnisher of that information that the information has been modified or deleted from the file of the consumer.

complaint_text: We were trying to get a loan modification through Nationstar Mortgage. Every time we sent in the documents they requested they would say they did n't receive them, they were incorrect, or they needed more documentation. It was very hard to get anyone to give you an answer about your status. It was just always ... send more documentation. Just after XXXX in XXXX of 2015 we were out of town so we sent our brother up to check on the house only to find our doorknob ripped off and another lock put on with a lockbox. It took several attempts to get Nationstar to tell us that they had hired a company to go in and secure the home. The only thing is that they did it completely illegally. They had not foreclosed and taken possession legally. Then even more ridiculous is the fact that Nationstar then gave us the code to get in to our home. When we entered the house we quickly found it to be very cold even though the thermostats were set high. While trying to figure out what the issue was with the heat we noticed that every door in the house had been opened, and not only that but cupboards, and even personal dressers and drawers had been gone through. We went to the utility room and found that they had shut down the boiler that heats all XXXX sq ft of our home and this was in XXXX in the XXXX in Ut. After the cops arrived we went through the home together and had found that both of our wedding rings had been stolen along with XXXX that we had collected. There very well could have been other things missing but these were blatantly obvious and very personal! Nationstar quickly said they were not responsible because they had hired the other company. Lawyers have told us that they are totally liable because they are responsible for sending them to our home but the only hope they gave us was to file a civil law suit. We obviously do n't have the money for an expensive law suit as we were already working on trying to save our home. I find it very disturbing that these companies are so disorganized, manipulating and operate outside of their legal rights without any repercussion! We tried to get a modification offer for almost a year and they never offered one. We had told them we would opt for a deed in lieu, or a short sale before we would let the home foreclose but shortly after we pushed the legality of their actions we received a foreclosure notice to sell on the XX/XX/XXXX.We had to hire a lawyer to try to help us get it stopped and they were as deceptive with them as they were with us. In the end we had to borrow almost {$200000.00} in family money to save our home from foreclosure and now we are right back in the same mess we started in. We even contacted the county courthouse that was supposed to be over the sale, and it was only stopped 2 days before the sale, but the courthouse said they did n't know anything about a sale on that day. But they all seemed to know about a foreclosure auction on the XXXX of XXXX. I do n't know what they were up to or what they had cooked up but the whole thing seemed questionable to us. Our lawyer also requested a payoff in writing for reinstatement that we could count on before we paid all of that money but we could n't get them to email, fax or send XXXX in any form. We finally had to pay blindly hoping that the amount they quoted was correct. As soon as the banker wired the money they told our lawyer that they missed the amount by {$1200.00}. We were passed the payoff for the day and it took a XXXX way conference call to get it straight but we spent the night wondering what they would say the next day. Every step of the way with this company was frustrating and unprofessional. They also filed a foreclosure notice back in XXXX so that they could slam the lid whenever they wanted but when we asked about it they constantly told us we were in a modification not a foreclosure.

XXXX XXXX Colorado XXXX, CO XXXX XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX NY XXXX Subject : Cease-and-Desist Notice for Account # XXXX Dear ConServe I am writing to formally bring to your attention a matter of great concern regarding my account, as depicted in the attached picture/documentation. It has come to my attention that certain activities, unauthorized by me, have been taking place within the mentioned account. 

I hereby demand an immediate and thorough investigation into this matter as it raises serious legal and ethical issues. As per my rights and responsibilities as an account holder with XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, I expect prompt and appropriate action to rectify this situation. 

Activities that I have not authorized or been a part of include : XXXX. [ Describe unauthorized activity in detail ] Photo/Documentation attachment : [ Add any supporting evidence, such as screenshots or pictures, if available ] Allow me to emphasize that this account is under my sole ownership, and I am the only individual authorized to conduct transactions on it. Therefore, any transactions carried out without my explicit consent are considered illegitimate and must be reversed or nullified at the earliest. 

I kindly request that you immediately cease and desist all related operations on my account until a full investigation is conducted and a resolution is reached. In addition, I wish to be informed of the steps being taken to rectify this matter and secure my account from further unauthorized activities. 

Please ensure that all communication regarding this issue is conducted in writing and directed to the address provided above. Furthermore, I request that all necessary documentation pertaining to this case be provided to me in a timely manner. 

I trust that XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, an institution known for its commitment to customer service, will promptly investigate this matter and take all appropriate actions to resolve this situation. Failure to do so XXXX result in further legal remedies being pursued, should it become necessary. 

I look forward to your immediate attention to this matter and appreciate your cooperation in resolving this dispute promptly. 

Yours sincerely, XXXX XXXX

XXXX, a division of BOKF, NA ( the " Bank '' ), is the trustee for a Special Needs Trust ( the " Trust '' ) which was established for the care of a XXXX injured individual ( the Decedent ) who XXXX away suddenly and unexpectedly in XXXX XXXX. The Bank is in regular communication with the father and caretaker of the Decedent ( the Caretaker XXXX, and knows the Caretaker gave up employment opportunities and dedicated himself to the care of his now-deceased son for the last decade. The Bank knows that the Caretakers sole income was a stipend he earned as Caretaker, which the Trust stopped paying after the XXXX of the XXXX. The Caretaker is the primary beneficiary of the Trust.
The Bank has unfairly and unreasonably delayed closing the Trust and disbursing the remaining funds to the beneficiaries of the Trust. The Bank has also refused to reimburse the Caretaker for trust expenses the Caretaker paid out of pocket over the last decade. The Bank misled the Caretaker by indicating it would reimburse his expenses after paying a healthcare lien, yet the lien was paid in  XXXX XXXX and the Bank has not reimbursed the trust expenses paid by the Caretaker. 

In addition, the Bank refuses to communicate with the Caretaker about basic daily administrative items such as vehicle and home insurance for Trust assets. Caretaker lives in a home owned by the Trust and drove a vehicle owned by the Trust until he was forced to report it as a planned non-operational vehicle based on a lack of communication from the Bank about auto insurance. 

The Bank is unreasonably and wrongfully delaying disbursement of the Trust proceeds to the beneficiaries. It is unfairly maintaining control of Trust assets and has made deceptive representations about reimbursing the Caretaker. The Bank is required to file a final accounting in order to dissolve the Trust, has not done so over nine months after the XXXX of the Decedent, and ignores all inquiries about when the document will be filed. 

In fact, in the last communication it had with the Caretaker, via e-mail on XXXX XXXX, XXXX, the Bank admitted it was having difficulty complying with California regulations because it was unfamiliar with California law, stating, I am trying to get this wrapped up as quickly as I can, but am not as familiar with navigating the California rules as I am with Kansas or Missouri. As such, it appears the Bank is misleading consumers by offering services in numerous states when it is unqualified to do so in a competent manner.
I have submitted disputes to you and did not get a response within 30 days, and you are required by law to do so. Please investigate my disputes, thank you.
primary_category: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:
I am a homeowner in Massachusetts who has tried for over 2.5 year to work with my lender on both a modification and a short sale. There are serious issues with SLS on both accounts. There is NOW an AUCTION on my property on XXXX XXXX, this year. 

I was not given proper notice, the certified mail informing me of the sale did not arrive until after I spoke with my point of contact, who had informed me that there was still time to pursue a modification. 
The resolution process switched from a short sale to a modification. 
As of XXXX/XXXX/XXXX I was informed that there was no sale date scheduled. 
Although all documents are received by SLS and underwriting has started I am told that the date of sale leaves no time to evaluate my situation. 
SLS has been unable to contact me directly as the phone numbers on file were incorrect SLS has not had an up to date appraisal and is seriously overvaluing the property. 
- SLS has turned down XXXX qualified offers for a short sale I was never approved for the modification, so in XXXX of XXXX we decided to sell our family home. From XXXX of XXXX until XXXX of XXXX, we had submitted XXXX offers on our property from different buyers. In each case SLS REJECTED the offer saying it was too low. The highest offer was {$110000.00}. Our house is our family home, but needs work. The first counter we got from SLS was {$180000.00}. The next counter was {$150000.00}, and now in XXXX of XXXX I 'm being told the lowest they will accept is {$130000.00}. They are saying this last amount without having stepped foot inside this home since last XXXX. 
Where is the regulation on valuations? Why is it we can show proof our house can not fetch the value they want and they are allowed to force a homeowner to foreclosure? At what point over a period of almost two years does the lender realize the home value is not worth their required price? Why are n't we as homeowners allowed copies of their valuations? We are required to get an appraisal to get a loan, so why are n't we privy to valuations when they foreclose on our homes? If their valuation is being used in the determination to foreclose then I feel a citizen I have a right to that information and ANY information being used to make a determination to foreclose upon me. 
I have tried unsuccessfully for over two years to work with SLS, and before them XXXX XXXX XXXX. My loan was sold from HUD to some XXXX party investor, who has made it very difficult to sell. If my loan was still backed by HUD I would at least be given a copy of the appraisal, and they have clear guidelines as to what they will and wo n't accept for short sales. Since my loan has been sold, I have had no assistance with SLS. I will be forced into foreclosure, and I was never offered a Deed in Lieu, which is no better than the foreclosure, because there is no regulation on lenders over proper valuations. 


Respectfully XXXX XXXX

This is a complaint agains t Ocwen Loan Servicing ; I am sure y ou get many. On the  XXXX  of  XXXX , they sent me an  XXXX  page letter regarding my escrow account. complaint_text: I am a Widow who has asked for assistance, never received it and I am now being harassed by Citi Mortgage. I have a relevant case of extreme hardship due to the passing of my husband. Prior to his death I had never been late ever with my mortgage or had any problems. With my husband now gone my finances have changed drastically. I have been asking for assistance from Citi Bank/City Mortgage since 2012 but they have and continue to deny me help. I cooperated with them fully providing them with all the documents they asked for each month including my prior tax documents that showed our combined salaries and what it had become after his death, I also provided my paystubs and his death certificate. The loss of a spouse is not only the greatest grief but the loss of income is truly a great hardship. They played the usual game and waited 7 or 8 months to deny me. I asked again recently and I was denied again. I needed my loan modified to a smaller payment so that I could keep up the payments, I did n't have far to go to finish paying off the balance. Because Citi denied me help in order to keep up the payments, I used my savings to supplement my income. Now my savings is almost gone and there is nothing left to supplement. I am not behind, not even one month but now I am being harassed by Citi Mortgage each and every week. I have to pay them at the end of the month but I am not behind. I only owe them a total of {$9300.00}, my monthly payments are {$300.00} and would have been able to keep money in my savings to brace against an emergency had I received assistance from Citi Mortgage XXXX where I have a home equity loan would have worked with me. It is only though greed and calloused, mercilessness that institutions play with the lives of those who fallen on hard times. It is a shameful embarrassment the way they are coldblooded and cruel. The only thing I can do is to pay my bills as best I can and City will have to wait to get it until I have it to send. Each week they send me threating letters of foreclosure and modification forms which I will not fill out, I know from past experiences, they have no intentions of helping me with anything but out of my co-op if I ca n't pay rather than work with me towards a solution. I am being harassed. The mistreatment I 've received needs to be exposed and I 'm telling my story. Shame on them.

I opened a checking account at US Bank XXXX XXXX XXXX - XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, IL. XXXX ) on XX/XX/year>. I went into the bank and asked to talk to a personal banker so I could open up a checking account. I was approached by a young lady by the name of XXXX. I told her I wanted to open up a checking account and would like to get this promotion bonus of {$400.00} but it says it needs to be done online. XXXX looked at my phone and said ok sounds good I can do this at my desk on my computer and I replied it says online only and she replies it doesn't matter I have the promo code right here and I said perfect that works for me. In order to get the {$400.00} bonus you had to make direct deposits totalling {$5000.00} within 90 days of the account being opened and once you met that criteria you would receive your bonus within 60 days. I met the criteria in XXXX of XXXX  basically around 55 days it took me. I waited a week never got my {$400.00} bonus so I called the US Bank complaint line and they said I would receive it at the end of the calendar month so I was like OK but still never received it. I then proceeded to call the bank and talk to XXXX and she told me she had to resubmit it again and I was like ok. I waited some more time and called the US Bank complaint line again and they said the form they submitted was declined and to go into the bank and talk to the manager so I did. I was approached by the branch manager ( XXXX XXXX - direct line XXXX ) and she walked me to her desk. She said that it was supposed to be opened up online and I was like your employee ( XXXX  ) told me it didn't have to be and her response was I know she did this is why I'm going to escalate this problem to my boss ( XXXX XXXX - XXXX ) so she can override this and get your bonus approved since this has happened before. I was like OK because this isn't my fault this is on US Bank NOT ME!!! I was then sent an e-mail from XXXX stating that she was very frustrated like I was and was going to try one last avenue for the approval. I was then sent another e-mail from her stating she couldn't get the approval because it was supposed to be done online. This is an absolute JOKE and NO WAY should US Bank be able to get away with this. I did EVERYTHING the personal banker ( XXXX  ) told me to do and met the necessary criteria and I deserve my {$400.00} bonus. PLEASE HELP!!! 

XXXX XXXX XXXX

complaint_text:
Dear TransUnion, I am writing to dispute the following information that appears on my TransUnion consumer report : On XX/XX/XXXX a collection for {$110.00}, owed to XXXX XXXX XXXX was added to my Transunion credit report. On XX/XX/XXXX I requested varification, from XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, proof bearing my signature, stating that I have ( or ever had ) some contractual obligation to pay them. The " request letter '' was received by XXXX XXXX XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX I received a copy of a XXXX bill from XXXX XXXX XXXX dated XX/XX/XXXX in the amount of {$92.00} not the reported {$110.00}. As per the Federal Trade Commission opinion letter from XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, " a printout ( or copy ) of a bill or itemized document does not constitute verification ''. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, I opened a despute challenging the validity of the collection reported by TransUnion and requested the method of account verification. On XX/XX/XXXX I received a letter from TransUnion which outlined their investigation methods. TransUnion then marked the account as verified, never stating their method of verification this account. 

XXXX XXXX XXXX has failed to produce any competent evidence showing a contractual agreement bearing my signature, was made either between myself and XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, or myself and XXXX, therefore the collection information reported by you is false and I demand that this negative and incorrect information be removed from my credit report immediately.

complaint_text:
I set up an online Ally back account on XX/XX/19. 
I attempted to deposit a check into the account on XX/XX/19. 
I received an email stating that the check was missing info on the Pay To : line. 
I resubmitted the check the same day. 
I received an email on XX/XX/19 stating that : We weren't able to complete this Ally Bank eCheck DepositSM because of one of the following reasons : The check contains an alteration on the front of the check The check had been previously deposited at another institution The check is from a financial institution located outside of the U.S. 
Please obtain a new check to scan and submit it as you normally would. 
The next day I tried to access my account and was told it had been fraud locked. 
I called the number provided XXXX and waited 45 mins on hold to speak to a Loss Prevention agent. He proceeded to tell me that I was trying to deposit a fake check and they would not be reopening my account. He stated there was nothing I could do and I had to wait until their investigation was over. 
I waited a week with no response. I called back 3 different times and left messages with no response. I shut by direct deposit off as soon as I realized they were not going to reopen my account. By this time two {$100.00} deposits had been made into the account from my employer. They didn't reject these deposits even though the account was frozen. 
I now have {$200.00} dollars sitting in a frozen account and the bank is flat refusing to allow me access to my money or even return my phone call.

on XX/XX/ I deposited a dividend check online at my bank, Navy Federal Credit Union, in the amount of {$2.00}. The bank failed to deposit the check correctly through the clearing house and the check was rejected. Under the guise of a " bounced '' check the bank charged {$15.00} and directed me to contact the issuer in a refer to maker. 

The maker, XXXX, a major stock broker, was extremely confused. Thier investigation found that NFCU had incorrectly routed the check and they reissued a new check. 

NFCU charged me {$15.00} for the bounced check due to their mistake.

Capital One has been underpaying interest on old grandfathered accounts. They are claiming that new ( identically named ) accounts have needed to be opened since 2019 to obtain higher market rates. So they are stealing huge amounts of customer interest by not updating interest rates in a rising interest rate environment. An old account with XXXX the balance is making less than half the interest of a newly opened account. At XXXX across various accounts for the last several years they have stolen thousands of dollars in interest from me. This is XXXX XXXX - level unethical behavior. I read today there is a class action on this beginning as well.

Wells Fargo is my mortgage holder. I have been trying to modify my loan through the home preservation program since XX/XX/XXXX. It is always the same thing, " we have all the documents we need, they will be sent to underwriting ''. Without fail I am then contacted ( sometimes ) by email or letter that additional documents are needed ; as well as the original documents which now ( according to them ) has expired. My " specialist '' never returns my calls or emails.

Subject : Complaint Regarding Disputed Debt Collection Practices by Viking Client Services and XXXX XXXX XXXX Dear Sir/Madam , I am writing to file a formal complaint against Viking Client Services and XXXX XXXX XXXX regarding an erroneous debt collection claim that violates the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ). 

Details of the Complaint : - Amount : XXXX - Debt Collector : Viking Client Services -Date of Incident : No details were mentioned in the letter from Viking Client Services XXXX But the claim was regarding a rental vehicle. 
- Creditor : XXXX XXXX XXXX On XX/XX/XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX, I contacted XXXX customer care and was informed by a representative that I did not owe any outstanding debt. I returned the vehicle in perfect condition on the past few occasions when I rented a vehicle through XXXX, and no additional charges were mentioned at the time of return ( receipts of payments attached ). 

Despite this, Viking Client Services has contacted me, claiming that I owe XXXX a debt. This claim is incorrect and may result from a clerical error or miscommunication between the entities involved. Furthermore, I have not received any communication from XXXX XXXX XXXX regarding any outstanding payment, which leads me to believe that the debt is not legitimate. 

Additionally, the letter from Viking Client Services does not provide any details about the charge, such as the nature of the alleged debt or any specific transaction details. This lack of information further complicates my ability to verify the claim 's validity. I have requested verification of the debt from Viking Client Services but have not received adequate proof to substantiate their claims. 

I am concerned that this erroneous debt collection attempt is not only causing undue stress but may also potentially harm my credit rating. I believe these actions violate the FDCPA and request the CFPB 's assistance in investigating and resolving this matter.

I kindly request that the CFPB take the following actions : 1. Investigate the debt collection practices of Viking Client Services concerning this matter. 
XXXX. Ensure that XXXX XXXX XXXX corrects any inaccuracies in their records related to my account. 
XXXX. Ensure that any negative information about this disputed debt is removed from my credit report. 

Thank you for your attention to this important issue. I appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter promptly and fairly.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text:

TransUnion ( 115 F.3d 220 ) standard, delete this tradeline under 611 ( a ) ( 5 ) ( A ). Failure will prompt CFPB/FTC/AG complaints and civil action under 616617.

complaint_text:
XXXX XXXXXX/XX/1151 XXXX XX/XX/year> EXPERIAN ExperianXX/XX/XXXXXXXX XXXXXX/XX/XXXXXXXX Subject : Dispute of Inaccurate Information on Credit Report Dear Sir/Madam , I am writing to formally dispute certain information that appears on my credit report dated [ insert date of credit report ]. I have reviewed my report and noticed several inaccuracies that I believe are affecting my credit score and overall financial standing.

1. Closed Accounts : I have observed accounts that were closed, and yet they still appear as open. This is incorrect information and could mislead potential creditors regarding my creditworthiness. 

2. Unrecognized Accounts : I also find accounts listed under my name that I do not recognize. These accounts may potentially be a result of identity theft or reporting errors, which require immediate attention. 

According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), which governs the responsibilities of credit reporting agencies, I am entitled to dispute information that I believe is incomplete or inaccurate. Under Section 1681i of the FCRA, you are required to investigate my disputes and correct any inaccuracies within 30 days of receiving this letter.

Furthermore, the Fair Credit Billing Act ( FCBA ) also provides me with the right to dispute inaccurate or unauthorized charges, which can extend to accounts listed on my credit report. 

The items I am disputing are as follows : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXX/XX/2025XX/XX/year> I would appreciate your prompt attention to this matter and expect a written response regarding the outcome of your investigation within the timeframe specified by the FCRA. 

Thank you for your cooperation. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX
