complaint_text: Hello, I purchased a home in XXXX of 2020. My original loan documents, my closing disclosure had a monthly payment of $ XXXX/month. For the 1st year I made the payments of {$1200.00}, but over the course of the year my loan was transferred to multiple different companies. It is now currently with ESSEX MORTGAGE, and recently they reached out to me stating that my monthly payments would be going up to $ XXXXmonth. I reached out to my city, which is the city of XXXX, GA. They told me that they don't see any significant change in my taxes. My mortgage company is telling me that increase is due to my city 's taxes going up & my insurance payments increasing every month. I'm insured through XXXX, but they stated that my annual premium actually down. None of this information was given to me.

XXXX/XXXX/16 XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Experian XXXX. XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX Account Number Num : Balance {$1200.00} Dear Sir or Madam, I am writing in regards account XXXX on my credit report. I have filed a complain to the CFPB, that I do not believe I owe what you say I owe and, in accordance with the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, 15 USC 1692g, Section 809 ( b ) : Validating Debts : ( b ) If the consumer notifies the debt collector in writing within the thirty-day period described in subsection ( a ) that the debt, or any portion thereof, is disputed, or that the consumer requests the name and address of the original creditor, the debt collector shall cease collection of the debt, or any disputed portion thereof, until the debt collector obtains verification of the debt or any copy of a judgment, or the name and address of the original creditor, and a copy of such verification or judgment, or name and address of the original creditor, is mailed to the consumer by the debt collector. 
I must remind you that in my previous letter I requested the following information : ( 1 ) The amount of the debt ; ( 2 ) The name of the creditor to whom the debt is owed ; ( 3 ) Provide a verification or copy of any judgment ( if applicable ) ; ( 4 ) Proof that you are licensed to collect debts in ( insert name of your state ) ( 5 ) Provide the actual Bills Statements ( 6 ) Payment Receive I also requested that if you have reported me to any credit reporting agency, that you inform them that I have placed this debt in dispute and to provide me with proof that you have done so. Furthermore, I asked that you immediately send a copy of that dispute letter to the company ( creditor ) that you say I owe money so they are also aware of my dispute with this debt. 
As of today, you have failed to respond to my requests! For your convenience, I have included a copy of my previous letter and a copy of the mail receipt showing that you received my letter on { insert date from mail receipt }. 
Since you have failed to respond I assume that you have been unable to validate the debt and therefore, I consider this matter closed. You may consider this letter your official notification that I do not intend to correspond with you on this matter again unless you comply with my requests, the FDCPA and the FCRA. 

I must remind you that any attempt to collect this debt without validating it, violates the FDCPA and that I am recording all phone calls and keeping all correspondence concerning this matter. Be advised that I will not hesitate to report violations of the law to my State Attorney General, the Federal Trade Commission and the national XXXX. 

XXXX XXXX

complaint_text:
I have mortgage with US Bank. It is a 15 year mortgage taken out in XXXX. There have been no late payments on the loan over the term. the complaint is due to an insurance error by the bank in mortgage escrow. My homeowners insurance that is escrowed increased significantly so I found a new more competitive insurance policy. 
US Bank made the payment to the old insurer in XX/XX/XXXX. I informed US bank of the change and the payment was returned to me by the insurance company. I made a payment back to escrow to reimburse since a new insurance payment was going to be made. 
US Bank admits the returned escrow payment was made but for an unknown reason, the payment was never recorded. This caused a shortfall in the escrow amount. I disputed the recalculated escrow amount due to US bank errors from XX/XX/XXXX to current. 
My mortgage payment is an auto pay from another bank and payments have been made each month but not to the erroneous amount that US Bank claims. As a result, US Bank has continued to not apply my payment and each month holds it in " suspense '' and charged late fees and I believe has reported as late to credit reporting bureau.. 
I have tried to work with US Bank on this and have escalated to their management to no success. 
I have continually told US Bank I will continue making my old payment amount of approx {$3600.00} each month until I receive a correct escrow statement. I finally received what I think is a correct escrow statement and made a catch up payment of approx {$250.00} in XXXX and changed my auto pay to the new escrow amount. 
It is now XX/XX/XXXX and my latest payment made on XX/XX/XXXX is still showing in suspense and is reported as late. 
I wish to complain formally about US Bank and it's practice of mischarging and misreporting to my account.

I am writing to you regarding a violation of my privacy and confidentiality rights, protected under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( 15 USC 1681b ( 2 ) ). Pursuant to 18 USC 8, I have identified the following accounts that have breached these legal provisions : XXXX. Account # : XXXX XXXX. Account # : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Account # : XXXX XXXX XXXX XX/XX/year> These accounts have accessed my credit information without my explicit authorization, which constitutes a violation of my privacy and confidentiality rights. Additionally, some of these accounts contain obsolete information that should be excluded from my credit report as stipulated in 15 USC 1681c ( a ) ( 5 ).

According to 15 USC 1681, Section 602 ( A ), I have the right to privacy. Furthermore, under 15 USC 1681, Section 604 ( A ), Section 2, a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instructions. Also, 15 USC 1681c ( a ) ( 5 ) states that no consumer reporting agency may include any adverse item of information that is more than seven years old, other than records of convictions of crimes.

Finally, under 15 USC 1681s-2 ( a ) ( 1 ), no person shall furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate. Additionally, according to 15 USC 1681s-2 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( B ), a person shall not furnish information if ( i ) the person has been notified by the consumer that specific information is inaccurate, and ( ii ) the information is, in fact, inaccurate.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: Ive recently discovered several late payment notations on my credit report that are completely false, and I want to make it clear that I will not tolerate these inaccuracies being used to misjudge my financial character. These harmful entries are dragging down my credit score, affecting my access to opportunities, and putting unnecessary strain on my mental and emotional health. Some of these alleged late payments were in fact made on time, while others may stem from clerical mistakes or internal processing delays that were never communicated to me. The Fair Credit Reporting Act requires that every piece of data on a consumer report be factually accurate and verifiable by original documentation. That means if these late payment entries can not be backed up with real, dated billing statements or signed agreements, they should not be reported at all. I am demanding that these entries be immediately corrected or removed, depending on what the documentation proves. If the credit reporting agencies or furnishers continue to ignore this matter, I will interpret that as a willful and deliberate violation of federal lawand respond accordingly. I deserve better, and I will fight until this is made right.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

I received a text message stating that it was Chime, and stating that I had a fraud alert, it provided a link to check to see the alert, so I clicked on it, it took me to my Chime login page and I logged into my account, at which point I was redirected to a Chime page that said " Thank you for acknowledging ''. Shortly after that I received a phone call from Chime support asking for my first name, last name, and phone number to verify me, they told me they had cleared the fraud alert and that I was good to go. I attempted to log into my account after the phone call from support and saw that my account was locked, so I reached out to Chime support and asked why my account was locked. They helped me to unlock it, at which point I logged in and saw that my entire balance had been XXXX  out which was over {$1300.00} ( rent money ). I called Chime support back and they said that they didn't see a transaction or a balance on their end so there is nothing they can do. I have since called them 3 times to attempt to get help in getting my money back so that I can pay rent and other bills and they refuse to help, stating that they see no transactions so there is nothing to dispute.

This letter is a formal compliant that you are reporting and incomplete credit information. According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ), you are required by federal law to verify, through the physical verification of the original signed consumer contract, any and all accounts that you post on a credit report. Otherwise anyone paying for your reporting services could fax, mail or email in a fraudulent account. I demand to see verifiable proof ( I.e. : an original consumer contract with my signature on it ) that you have on file I demand that the following accounts be verified or removed immediately failure on your behalf to provide a copy of any alleged contract or other instrument bearing my signature may result in a small claims action against your company. Therefore, either provide the requested information or cease your collection efforts and reporting of this account on my credit reports immediately. Additionally, please provide the name, address, and telephone number of each person who personally verified this alleged account, so that I can inquire about how they verified without providing any proof, bearing my signature. As per FTC opinion letter from Attorney XXXX XXXX XXXX, you should be aware that a printout of a bill or itemized document does not constitute verification. I am again formally requesting a copy of any documents, bearing my signature, showing that I have a legally binding contractual obligation to pay you the alleged amount.

complaint_text:
In early XXXX I became aware of an ongoing identity theft and fraudulent debt issue against me when my legitimate Sears Credit Card, which was in good standing, notified me that they were drastically decreasing my credit limit. When I got a credit report to investigate the unexpected issue, I discovered there were several delinquent credit card debts in my name, with my Social Security Number that I had never opened or were aware of. Some of them were fraudulent and in good standing, most were delinquent and one of them was already in collections. 

An account was opened in my name under Shell CBNA on XX/XX/XXXX in the amount of {$600.00}. 

I contacted XXXX and XXXX credit reporting companies several times in XXXX and received a credit report with my legitimate and fraudulent charges and sent in paperwork to contest the fraudulent charges. They notified me that what I claimed were fraudulent charges had been verified by them as charges made by me. However, the fraudulent charges on my report are apparently being made with my actual Social Security number and from a person using my name and a middle initial, which I don't have in my Social Security record. The addresses associated with the fraudulent charges are not the same as my actual address where I currently live and have worked from for more than 10 years. While I worked to resolve this, I asked that the credit reporting companies freeze my credit in XX/XX/XXXX, which they said they could and would do. However, two more fraudulent credit charges were made after that. That is where the matter stands now and why I am contacting your agency.

Spring Oaks Capital is reporting a collection account that I did not open, authorize, or agree to. I have not been provided with any original documentation bearing my signature or any legally binding agreement establishing liability. 
Under 15 U.S. Code 1681s-2 ( FCRA Section 623 ) and 15 U.S. Code 1692g ( b ) ( FDCPA Section 809 ), furnishers of information must conduct a reasonable investigation and fully verify the debt when challenged. 
Validation does not mean providing internal records, generic account summaries, or unverifiable data. The only acceptable form of verification under the law is a signed contract or legal instrument proving I am obligated to this debt. 
Reporting this tradeline without proper

validation is a violation of FCRA 623 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ), which prohibits furnishing information that is inaccurate or unverifiable. If Spring Oaks can not produce a sign
ed agreement that proves I am legally responsible for this account, then continued reporting constitutes willful noncompliance with federal law, and I am demanding immediate removal of this account from all consumer reporting agencies.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text:
Im submitting a complaint to you today to inform you I was the victim of identity theft. I researched how to remove the fraudulent accounts in my report and found that I need to visit FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION or https : //www.ftc.gov to file a report Per FCRA section 605b Credit Reporting Agencies are required to remove/block any accounts listed on an ID theft report. complaint_text:
On XX/XX/XXXX I got the new tax bill for the property calculated after the purchase. I called my mortgage servicer Fay Servicing to make sure they will pay all taxes due as they had at the time over {>= $1,000,000} in escrow account just for that purpose ( tax and insurance amounts impounded per mortgage agreement. They assured me I have nothing to worry about. 
XX/XX/XXXX : I called again customer service and I got the same answer, that they don't show the taxes due on their system but nothing to worry about, I asked their email address and at XXXX that same day I emailed all the copies I had from the county to the email customer service provided. Immediately I got a confirmation back that the email was received from Fay servicing. 
XX/XX/XXXX : I called again customer service and got the same generic answer so I went ahead and sent another email requesting assurance that my property taxes will be paid on time, Between XX/XX/XXXX to XX/XX/XXXX : I called I believe at the least 10-12 times ( I have most times logged in ) but got the same generic answer that I can relax as all obligation that are being escrowed are to be paid on time and I have nothing to worry about. 
XX/XX/XXXX : Got a phone call back finally ( for the first time ) from XXXX XXXX and she assured me that I have nothing to worry about and the taxes will be paid " probably today '', she further assured that she will follow up with a phone call after the new year to confirm. 
I never received a phone call from her, and after verifying with the county that penalty was applied and the payment was never received I called back many times and finally XXXX answered my call and assured me that I have nothing to worry about as the mistake was done on their side and they will be fully responsible for any penalties. I confirmed in coming days time and time again why aren't they paying the bill and that in no way they should use my funds in escrow for the penalty amount. she confirmed also time and time again that that is the case. they will pay out any and all penalties from their own found and will not touch my money in trust with them for that reason. Since they will never email me back I wrote an email on XX/XX/XXXX following a conversation I had with XXXX that they will not use my money trusted with them for the penalties due. needless to say I did not get any response back. 
Today after 8 phone calls and five voicemails XXXX called me back and assured me that payment for taxes were sent and that they did not use my money in trust with them. she also added that this is the 10th time at least that she is assuring me that. 
As you can see per statement attached she emailed me after begging her to do so they ended up using my funds to pay the penalties amount of {$5300.00}. 
This company is absolutely the worst and most unprofessional company I had to deal with in years. I demand immediately the amount of {$5300.00} to be returned to my escrow amount and full investigation in how they handle clients money there. 
In may occasions when I asked to speak with my account manager she responded that an account manager will be assigned to me only if I am in default ... Is that normal?? 
I wasted a lot of my time and health on this issue and I will appreciate you looking into this matter immediately. 
Note that all phone conversations are recorded on their side and I can provide a full log of my phone calls to request. 
Thank you.

Chime has opened my case again. I will continue to fight for whats rightfully mine.

Chime denied the XXXX dollar transaction but not the two {$180.00} dollar transactions.

XXXX XXXX  XXXX REMOVAL REQUEST FORM How is this form used? 
Its used to request removal of Private Mortgage Insurance ( PMI ) from your mortgage loan. 
Note : FHA loans entail different removal criteria. The applicable form is available on our website : www.rpmservicing.com A new valuation, which can cost up to {$600.00} or more, is required* to confirm the value of the property. This can be true even when removing PMI based on the original value of the property. 
What requirements must be met to initiate cancellation of PMI? 
The loan must be current on mortgage payments. 
The loan must have a good payment history. A good payment history means : o No payments 30 days past due in the last 12 months, and o No payments 60 days past due in the last 24 months. 
The current property value must be at least equal to its original value The loan must meet the applicable loan to value ratio ( LTV ) provided in the PMI Cancellation Matrix on Page 2.

There must not be any subordinate lien ( s ) attached to the property. 
For properties located in Minnesota, the property must be owner occupied. 
For loans seasoned less than 2 years where substantial improvements are claimed, evidence of substantial improvements are required. This includes a list of improvements, contracts, and receipts ( see the FAQs on page 3 for more information ). 


I called to inquire about PMI removal which resulted in a {$500.00} charge, they sent someone for Appraisal and we didn't qualify LTV based on Original Value 80 % XXXX XXXX : 70 % XXXX XXXX : 65 % Other : 70 %. Prior they did not advise. I inquired online. Since then ( 12+ months ) they stated it would automatically come off by XX/XX/2019. 

I am still being charged {$75.00} every month. The mortgage balance is {$210000.00}, the home value is {$290000.00} and the original purchase was {$270000.00} with {$40000.00} down payment. 

They want to charge me another {$500.00} to remove this PMI!

complaint_text: An account listed under XXXX is being reported on my credit report.The Account is not mine.

XXXX XXXX was in review for a loan modification with all documentation submitted to the lender on XX/XX/2015. On XX/XX/XXXX XXXX from PNC called our office and stated that their institution was in need of a paycheck stub dated for XX/XX/XXXX as the one they had was cut off. She made it very clear that this paycheck stub dated XX/XX/XXXX was the only one to be submitted and was the only document needed. She did confirm the deadline for this document to be received was XX/XX/XXXX. The paycheck stub was sent to PNC on XX/XX/XXXX. Our office followed up and it was confirmed the paycheck stub was received. XXXX XXXX our office spoke with XXXX who stated that there was not a complete package and stated he did n't know what was missing the call was dropped. When our office called back it stated their institution was closed. On XX/XX/XXXX our office spoke to XXXX id XXXX in Florida loss mitigation. She stated the file was closed out on XX/XX/XXXX because the following documents were not received - bank statements for XX/XX/XXXX for account number XXXX, XXXX, missing utility, missing employment letter missing hardship verification. I asked her when these documents were requested as we had called on a weekly basis and never once were these items requested. In fact, I informed her their office called us on XX/XX/XXXX and only requested the paycheck stub. She confirmed XXXX called us, but stated XXXX only documented the account with her informing us of the missing item. XXXX failed to properly notate the account as to what was requested ( as she was adamant only pay stubs were needed ) and failed to do her job properly as now there is conflicting information. Calls are recorded for quality and we are demanding that that could be pulled so we can confirm that she failed to provide accurate information. Furthermore it is obvious that PNC purposely provided inaccurate information so XXXX XXXX file could be removed from loss mitigation. The number of times that we communicated with PNC to check status of the file should extinguish any opportunity to excuse PNC 's behavior. It is very apparent that PNC employees are negligent and that PNC is denying this file and discriminating against XXXX XXXX based on his race, ethnicity, language, and national origin. They would rather foreclose on his property then do a proper review of his file. We are demanding that the sale date scheduled for XXXX be postponed or XXXX XXXX will assert his legal right and name PNC Mortgage and XXXX as defendants in civil court.

I am having difficulty getting a resolution for my notice of dispute. I reviewed a copy of my credit report and I noticed that there are unauthorized accounts listed on my report. I have previously reached out to the credit bureau to rectify this affair but they have been negligent in complying with my request. I have provided a copy of a FTC REPORT, United States Passport Card, and a copy of social security card. Please use the laws and codes that all credit reporting agencies are bound to follow by law as listed and explained below. I dont take my rights being violated lightly but a serious matter. 15 USC 1681a ( q ) ( 3 ), FCRA 603 ( q ) ( 3 ) 15 USC 1681 section 604 a section 2 states that " In general Subject to subsection ( c ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : in accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates. '' ( Furnisher of information to credit agencies ) the financial institution and the Consumer reporting agencies XXXX TRANSUNION and XXXX do not have my consent to furnish this information and they surely do not have my written consent. Any and all consent to XXXX, XXXX, Transunion ( Furnisher of information to credit agencies ) whether it be verbal, non-verbal, written, implied or otherwise is revoked. 15 USC 6802 ( b ) ( c ) states that " A financial institution may not disclose nonpublic personal information to a nonaffiliated third party unless the consumer is given an explanation of how the consumer can exercise that nondisclosure option. '' ( Furnisher of information to credit agencies ) Never informed me of my right to exercise my nondisclosure option. Not only that 15 USC 1681C ( a ) ( 5 ) states '' Except as authorized under subsection ( b ), no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information Any other adverse item of information, other than records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years. '' This account is an adverse item they are reporting again without my permission which is against the law. 15 U.S. Code 1681s2 ( A ) ( 1 ) A states " A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate. 15 U.S. Code 1681e states '' Every consumer reporting agency shall maintain reasonable procedures designed to avoid violations of section 1681c of this title and to limit the furnishing of consumer reports to the purposes listed under section 1681b of this title. XXXX and XXXX are not maintaining reasonable procedures. Also 12 CFR 1016.7 states that " A consumer may exercise the right to opt out at any time. '' I am opting out of your reporting services. 15 USC 1681i ( 5 ) ( B ) ( ii ) ( ili ) ( ii ) Notice to consumer If any information that has been deleted from a consumer 's file pursuant to subparagrap ( A ) is reinserted in the file, the consumer reporting agency shall notify the consumer of the reinsertion in writing not later than 5 business days after the reinsertion or, if authorized by the consumer for that purpose, by any other means available to the agency. 15 USC 1681a ( q ) ( 3 ). 15 U.S.C. 1681b ( FCRA 604 ), 15 U.S.C. 1681a ( d ) ( 2 ) ( A ) ( FCRA 603 ( d ) ( 2 ) ( A ) ), 15 U.S.C. 1681s-3.

complaint_text:
The credit bureaus keep disrespecting the laws. I showed them multiple times of how they are violating the Fair Credit Reporting Act. 

The List of accounts below has violated my federally protected consumer rights to privacy and confidentiality under 15 USC 1681.

UNAUTHORIZED INQUIRIES : XXXX XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXX/XX/2023 Equifax XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XX/XX/2023 XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXX/XX/2023 XXXX According to 15 USC 1681i ( 5 ) the credit bureaus have to modify or delete accounts that are not reporting accurately According to 15 USC 1681b ( 1 ) the credit bureaus don't have no written permission According to 15 USC 1681 I have the right to privacy According to 15 USC 1681s-2 A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.

( B ) Reporting information after notice and confirmation of errors A person shall not furnish information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if ( i ) the person has been notified by the consumer, at the address specified by the person for such notices, that specific information is inaccurate; and ( ii ) the information is, in fact, inaccurate.

I can go on and on and on The credit bureaus have no respect for the laws.

Someone needs to hold them accountable for this

complaint_text: I understand the importance of removing any incorrect accounts from my credit report in accordance with FCRA 605B. Could you please take a look at the documents? I've observed that some of the listed accounts seem to be inaccurate, which is worrying to me.

On XX/XX/year>, I made a purchase at the merchant XXXX XXXX in XXXX, Wyoming, for a total of {$27.00}. During the transaction, I tapped my card at the first cash register, but the system froze. The cashier then processed my purchase at a second register, and that transaction went through successfully. 

However, when I reviewed my billing statement, I noticed that both transactions had gone through, resulting in a duplicate charge. I immediately returned to the merchant, provided them with all the necessary information, and they acknowledged the duplicate transaction. The merchant informed me that they were unable to issue a refund and advised me to file a dispute with my bank, SoFi.

I followed their instructions and filed a dispute with SoFi. I was provided with provisional credit for the duplicate charge. However, on XX/XX/year>, I received an email from SoFi stating that my dispute had been denied and that they would be withdrawing the provisional credit from my account. No proof or explanation for the denial was provided. I contacted SoFi for clarification, but they informed me that there was nothing further they could do.

I tried to deposit a cashiers check in the amount of {$500.00} on XX/XX/2022, the person who gifted it to me wrote " Merry XXXX '' in the memo line and per the associate on the Customer Service phone line, can't accept that in the memo line. Chime Bank refused to accept and deposit it. This is discrimination.

I want to make it clear that I didn't give written permission for these specific transactions to be included in my consumer report. So, I'm formally asking for these accounts to be blocked and removed. It's important to stress that this request is not a mistake, and it's not based on any false information regarding why I want these transactions blocked.
secondary_category: Attempts to collect debt not owed

complaint_text: There are collection accounts on my report that I believe contain inaccurate information. Under my rights pursuant to 15 USC 1681e ( b ) and 15 USC 1681i, I am entitled to an accurate credit report. I request a review of these entries, and if they can not be verified as accurate, I ask that they be removed.

My cashier 's check ( amount {$49000.00} ) was deposited to Bank of America XXXX XXXX XXXX on XX/XX/year>. Teller specified that funds will be available next day. 

I received a notice on XX/XX/year> that Bank of America has " placed a hold on your deposit because we have information indicating the check ( s ) may be returned ''. 

After repeated contact with Bank of America and its deposit verification department, no one explained what information is indicating the check may be returned. The issuing bank also confirmed with Bank of America 's manager that the cashier 's check is legitimate. Further, the ineffective deposit verification team, including XXXX and XXXX, have not been informative nor helpful, and did not provide any service to clarify the reason Bank of America is holding the cash hostage. 

According to XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, cashier 's check are considered checks that pose little risk and should be available next day ( in this case the cash from my cashier 's check should have been available to me on XX/XX/year> ). However, I still do not have the funds available as of today XX/XX/year> ). Although Bank of America 's XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX district manager has been following up with updates, no resolution is apparent. The banker from the issuing bank, XXXX XXXX, spoke with the branch district manager on XX/XX/year> to confirm legitimacy of my cashier 's check. However, I still do not have the the cash available. The deposited amount was to be immediately placed in a 4.5 % CD in a different financial institution, which I have not been able to do so. The delayed availability of funds from Bank of America is now resulting in over {$45.00} interest income lost. No one has mentioned any kind of compensation to me for this unresolved issue. 

If no compensation is to be made to me, then Bank of America seems to be extending fund available dates and absorbing all the interest income for itself, which is a scam.

In XX/XX/XXXX Loancare bought our mortgage which was 1 month after we closed on our original mortgage. In XX/XX/XXXX we recieved an Escrow refund after property taxes and homeowners insurance were paid. This refund was more than {$2700.00} They kept our escrow account funded with more than {$1200.00} Our Homeowners Insurance and Property taxes are approximately {$1100.00} per year total. 
In XX/XX/XXXX I called Loancare customer service and asked for a new Escrow Analysis so that our monthly escrow payments would be corrected so we are not paying a gross overpayment every month in our mortgage payment. They asked me to mail them a copy of our homeowners Insurance bill and our property tax bill which we did. We did not recieve a reply at all. 
XX/XX/XXXX I called Loancare 's customer service department and asked if I could have a new Escrow Analysis and I was told I could. XX/XX/XXXX I recieved in the mail an analysis statement which shows a projected amount for property taxes as {$2900.00} and the actual amount paid is {$300.00} I am a XXXX XXXX XXXX  XXXX Veteran and XXXX   charges me minimal property taxes. 
Loancare is charging us {$310.00} per month to fund our escrow account which only needs about {$120.00} per month. 
I would like for Loancare to recalculate our escrow payment and adjust our mortgage payment accordingly. Why they feel the need to overcharge our escrow account when our property taxes and insurance costs are in black and white is beyond me. Don't they have competent accountants? I do not need Loancare as a savings account. 
If Loancare can not correct this I will file a complaint with the XXXX and XXXX  AG. 

Thank you.

complaint_text: The Fair Credit Reporting Act ( 15 U.S. Code 1681 ) says ( 1 ) The banking system is dependent upon fair and accurate credit reporting. Inaccurate credit reports directly impair the efficiency of the banking system, and unfair credit reporting methods undermine the public confidence which is essential to the continued functioning of the banking system. So whenever there is a violation under the FCRA, it impairs the efficiency of the banking system. This is a violation of TILA US Code 1666B since I was never late. " I recently reviewed my consumer report and noticed an incorrect late payment record. I have always maintained timely payments on this account. Under the Fair Credit Billing Act ( FCBA ) and the Truth in Lending Act ( TILA ), creditors are required to accurately report consumer transactions and provide a mechanism for correcting errors in a timely manner. Please conduct an investigation into this matter, and if you can not provide documentary evidence of these supposed late payments, I demand these payments to be updated to on time as they should be as I was NEVER late. I expect these updates to be made promptly, in compliance with the law.

complaint_text: My name is XXXX XXXX, I enrolled in XXXX University online in XXXX I borrowed {$7500.00} to continue my education. After the first semester I withdrew from the course and decided it would be cheaper to take classes on campus. I only used {$5000.00} of the {$7500.00}. The original lender was XXXX. I paid approximate {$3800.00} to this lender the debt was sold to Sallie Mae around XXXX where I paid approximately {$1600.00}. Sallie Mae then turned the debt over to NAVIENT where I paid over {$4000.00} dollars to this debt. I have repeatedly tried to contact XXXX, Sallie Mae and NAVIENT concerning my payments. The payments were auto drafted from my bank account. Over the course of several years i tried contacting these companies. I never received a reply from any e-mails and nor was any of my phone calls returned. In XXXX I was able to contact some one from XXXX concerning my account and was told that they would have look in the archive for my account since the debt was sold to Sallie Mae. I was told that it would take a couple days but someone would contact me. I was requesting a statement from XXXX as to the amount of the original loan and the balance when it was sold. I was never contacted concerning this matter nor was able to contact anyone else from XXXX, Sallie Mae never replied to any of my requests neither did NAVIENT. In XXXX of XXXX I received an e-mail stating that my account was paid in full. I estimate that I paid {$9400.00} on a {$5000.00} debt. To pay the debt off quicker, I increased payments to {$150.00} each month which was automatically withdrawn from my account to pay it off early, My payment was changed to {$57.00} each month by the lender. It took me over 11 years to pay this off.

I have never received any communication from this debt collector prior to them reporting to my XXXX credit report on XX/XX/year> a collection of {$3000.00}. I did dispute online. Additionally, per : A collection agency is not allowed to report medical debt to your credit bureaus under a new rule finalized by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau ( CFPB ) on XX/XX/year>, this medical debt is NOT allowed to be reported to ANY of my credit bureaus.

Despite submitting copious documentation proving the fraudulent nature of these accounts, your bureau seems content to let them fester on my report without any valid verification or effort to rectify the situation. This negligence on your part is not only unacceptable but also a blatant violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), which mandates accurate and fair reporting. I was the victim & Im not sure why the FCRA is not complying with the law. Allowing these fraudulent accounts to stained my credit report and decreases my credit score has caused too much distress. 
XXXX  XXXX XXXX XXXX DELETE!!!! 
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX PLEASE DELETE!!!! 
XXXX XXXX XXXX PLEASE DELETE!!!! 
XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX PLEASE DELETE!!!! 
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX DELETE!!!! 

I demand immediate action to rectify this situation and a thorough explanation as to why your bureau allowed these fraudulent accounts to exist without proper verification. The burden of proof lies with you, and your lack of diligence in ensuring the accuracy of my credit report is inexcusable.

complaint_text:
I recently obtained my credit report from AnnualCreditReport.com and found several errors that need to be corrected. I am formally asking for a complete reinvestigation of the accounts and personal information listed below, as allowed under the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( 15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ). This letter also serves as a dispute, a request for the method of verification, and a request for full file disclosure under 15 U.S.C. 1681e ( b ), 1681g, and 1681i.

To be clear, this is a specific and valid dispute. I am not requesting generic responses or pre-written form letters. I personally prepared and submitted each of my disputes, including the necessary identification and documents to help process them correctly. Under the Fair Credit Reporting Act, you are required to perform a full and honest reinvestigation of the item in question, including all related information, codes, and data, not just the tradeline.

The inquiry was not authorized XXXX XXXX  Date of inquiry : XX/XX/XXXX XXXX. Charge Off XXXX XXXX Account Number : XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Charge Off XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Account Number : XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. Late Payment ( Closed/Paid ) XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Account Number : XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. The following personal information is incorrect Current Address ( es ) : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX MI XXXX XXXX. The following personal information is incorrect Previous Address ( es ) : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX MI XXXX XXXX. The following personal information is incorrect Previous Address ( es ) : XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX MI XXXX XXXX. The following personal information is incorrect Employers : XXXX XXXX XXXX. The following personal information is incorrect Employers : XXXX XXXX XXXX. Charge Off XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Account Number : XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  These items are reporting inaccurately and/or can not be verified as required by law. If any aspect of these tradelinesincluding balance, status, payment history, remarks, or date openedis inaccurate or unverifiable, you are legally obligated to delete them entirely under 15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ( 5 ). 


FCRA Compliance Requirements 15 U.S.C. 1681e ( b ) : You must follow reasonable procedures to ensure maximum possible accuracy. Failure to do so violates federal law.

15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ( 1 ) : You must conduct a reasonable, good-faith reinvestigation.

15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ( 7 ) : You must provide me with a clear method of verification.

Demands and Consumer Rights I am requesting : A full reinvestigation of each disputed item. 
Deletion or correction of any unverifiable or inaccurate data. 
The method of verification, including : Description of procedures used ; Name and contact of all individuals or entities contacted ; Documentation relied upon for verification. 
A full consumer file disclosure under 15 U.S.C. 1681g, including : All information in your file at the time of this request ; A list of all soft and hard inquiries, the date and reason for each ; A copy of certifications provided by all third parties who accessed my report.

Correction of Personal Information You are also required to maintain accurate identifying information. As such, I demand that all outdated, incorrect, or unverifiable personal identifiers be removed immediately. This includes : Variations of my name ; Any incorrect SSN digits ; Former addresses, phone numbers, or employers.

Correct Personal Information to Retain Only : Full Name : XXXX XXXX XXXX Date of Birth : Date of Birth : XX/XX/XXXXXXXX  Last XXXX SS # : XXXX Current Address : XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX, Michigan XXXX Response Requirements and Deadlines You are required to respond within 30 days to this dispute per 15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ).

You must respond within 15 days with a full method of verification under 15 U.S.C. 1681i ( a ) ( 7 ). 
Send all responses by mail only. I do not authorize electronic communications regarding this matter. 
Failure to comply may result in regulatory complaints to the CFPB, FTC, and state Attorney General, as well as legal action for statutory and actual damages under the FCRA.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter. I expect full legal compliance.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text:
Experian has consistently violated my federal rights for going on over a year now. It has gotten to the point I have had to hire a lawyer. I have tried to communicate directly with Experian and show them in writing where they have violated federal law and still they have refused to acknowledge these laws. The federal laws Experian has chosen to ignore are 15 USC 1681b as well as 15 USC 1692g. I have sent certified letters, I have sent screenshots of the laws they have violated, I have asked for proof which is required according to federal law, and they still have not complied. I advise Experian to cease and desist collecting and reporting the accounts until they have provided and supplied the full, thorough details surrounding their reasoning for keeping the accounts on my report against my wishes as a consumer. This is not only harming my credit report, it is also harming my chances of owning a home. Experian should not be allowed to get away with breaking federal law and that is why I am here in hopes that these accounts be removed from my credit report.

Once their reinvestigation is complete, I would like for Experian to mail me a copy of my new and updated credit report pursuant to 15 USC Chapter 41.

In fact, that is not the case for this lawyer. XXXX XXXX XXXX ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) and his associates, XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) and XXXX XXXX ( XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ), are crooked, dishonest, greedy. They conspired to commit approximately multiple felony counts of California Penal Code 115 by viciously and intentionally inflicting harm to my family and me to take away everything that I had worked hard for the past thirty years. It was like pointing a XXXX at my head in a robbery incident compared to the foreclosure proceedings scheduled for XX/XX/XXXX. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, when the fraud was discovered with the help of a judge in XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX for checking at the Recorder Office, I immediately filed a complaint with the District Attorney 's Office. I swore to the investigator, XXXX XXXX XXXX, " I bet my life that I am a victim of fraud. '' He looked at my eyes and told me he was a criminal investigator, but he had no experience in real estate crimes. 

Anyway, I intend to fight this case until justice prevails. XXXX XXXX XXXX and his associates risk felony charges, banning from practicing laws, and a hefty jail time and fine if all of you are still pretending to act viciously to massive fraud due to greed and dishonesty. 

Sent from my XXXX

complaint_text:
We are trying to have an opportunity to have the PMI removed from our loan from Chase Bank. I sent a request to their PMI team in writing on XX/XX/XXXX to requesta BPO from chase. I included major repairs and details of improvements to the home in the packet along with a check for XXXX dollars to pay for the BPO. In the mailer it said I should hear from a broker within 5-7 business days of receivingthis communication. I called chase customer service on Wednesday XX/XX/XXXX to check on this. I was told there was a work order put out on XX/XX/XXXX and that a BPO had been ordered and I should expect a phone call from the broker within the next few days. I received an email from the PMI team at chase on XX/XX/XXXX3rd stating " We are contacting you regarding your significant improvements. Please provide a list of improvements you made as part of both bathroom remodels as well as your kitchen remodel. Thank you for confirming these details. Your prompt response will help us process your order as quickly as possible '' I called chase to ask for clarification about what other details they would need since I already provided those in the mailer on XX/XX/XXXX. I was disconnected with the first person, and after 30 minutes of unclear instructions or answers, I was sent to escalations management. I spoke with XXXX and he did not seem to know the specifics I was supposed to provide in the email. I also asked if the BPO was ordered because the employee the day before said it was and received on XX/XX/XXXX, but now days later I am being sent a vauge email with no ability to speak directly to the PMI team to ask about specifics. XXXX gave me some guidance, but he does not work in the PMI department, and could not speak with them directly since they are a back office. He also said I would not be able to speak with them directly, even though I stated I felt his guidance on how to give specifics was unclear and speaking to the PMI departmentdirectly would resolve this quicker. I responded to the email under XXXX 's guidance and the PMI team responded within a minute on XX/XX/XXXX stating " thank you for your response, we have provided this information to the vendor '' at XXXX. I then received a phone call Monday XX/XX/XXXX from a Broker who was set up to do the BPO. We made a mutually agreed upon date and time. The broker also confirmed she received the list of significant improvements I sent to chase while we had that phone call. I then received a voicemail from the same broker Tuesday XX/XX/XXXX at XXXX stating that my bank cancelled the BPO and she had no idea why but advised me to call my bank and ask. I called chase on XXXX XXXX the following are notes from my conversation with XXXX the escalations manager from customer service. XXXX is unable to speak directly with the PMI team so she messaged them. I asked her at different times to share the timestamp of the messaged and what the PMI team responded via messages. XXXX XXXX ID number and extension. ext : XXXX XXXX to PMI team at XXXX Inquired about status of loan and BPO schedule, BPO was cancelled, chase cancelled the visitPMI team responds at XXXX Doing their research, they said it was not cancelled and they were investigating. XXXX to PMI XXXX XXXX Sent name and phone number of the broker to thePMI team so they could reschedule the visit.Kate to PMI team XXXX Advised them, wanted them to call XXXX XXXX the broker ) and let them know that we never cancelled.PMI team responds XXXX to their research indeed it was cancelled.We apologize for the inconvenienceneeded to resubmit the order due to corrections on the significant improvements.Kate to PMI team XXXX : Got an emailThursday XX/XX/XXXX confirming they receivedthe information and sent it to the vendor. The broker called me Monday she also confirmed she received the information about the significant improvements. Why are you claiming she did not receive it, whenyou sent an email confirming it was sent to the vendor, and the broker themselves also confirmedthey got the information.PMI team at XXXX According to the PMI team the new order was submitted earlier today. They have advised me, the reason for the cancellation was that we needed to resubmit the corrections because they were not sent to the broker. However the broker herself confirmed that she did receive XXXX XXXX : why did they confirm they were sent to the vendor on XX/XX/XXXX? 
At this point I asked XXXX for a more clear and trasparent process to be able to track the status of the BPO because this felt like there have been several mistakes from cofnirming it was ordered XX/XX/XXXX, to sending a clarification email XX/XX/XXXX, to canceling a BPO without notifing me on XX/XX/XXXX. I told her at this point this process was not transparent and I was not receiving timely and clear communication from the bank, and I wanted a direct line to the PMI team. XXXX said she could not do that but she would connect me with the executive office. The exectuive office person was XXXX, she gave me her direct line as well as an email. I asked her again to get me more communication and transparency in this process, and at this point these mistakes were unacceptable and customer service has not been able to address my needs and advised me incorrectly 3 times. She said again they had no direct line because they were a back office, but would advocate for me on my behalf.
I had a XXXX XX/XX/2020 and wasnt notified that I owed the bill. I have a copy of a letter where the hospital states all financial obligations have been negated due to financial assistance program.

THE COMPANIES ARE EXPERIAN, XXXX, XXXX, AND XXXX XXXX There are unauthorized inquires, collections, and charge off accounts on my profile. 
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  I have never received a XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX code 18 USC 1028A, they did not provide me evidence stating that I have signed any sort of agreement with the said companies. They don't have my wet signature and they have not sent me the debt from the original collector, | sent out countless disputes to these companies stating 15 US. Code S 1681C-2 A consumer reporting agency shall block the reporting of any information on file of a consumer that the consumer identifies as information that result from an alleged Identity theft, no later than 4 business days after the date of receipt. It has been 30 days, and they are in violation of this law because | am a victim of Identity theft. Please! just want these deleted immediately! These accounts should not be furnished on my consumer report as they are in violation Under, 15 US Code 16818, 15 U.S.C 1681 section 602 A. States I have the right to privacy. 15 U.S.C 1681 section 604 A section 2. 15 USC 16816 states " Any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other in accordance with the written instructions of the consumer. That is Aggravated Identity Theft 18 uSc I028A because they have possession of my information, and they are also using it without consent from the consumer me. 15 USC 6802 A Financial Institution may not disclose nonpublic personal information to a nonaffiliated Third Party unless - They give you the consumer the opportunity to exercise your right to opt - out They dont have a CONTRACT WITH THE ORIGINAL CREDITOR WITH MY WET SIGNATURE. I REQUESTED PROOF OF THE DEBT ASSIGNMENT.

I REQUEST THE PAYMENT HISTORY WITH ASSIGNED OR PURCHASED DEBT AND THEY DID NOT SEND. ITS been far longer than 30 DAYS and it is still not deleted off of my credit profile.

complaint_text: I understand the importance of removing any incorrect information from my credit report according to FCRA 605B. Could you please review the attached documents? I've observed discrepancies in several accounts, which is quite concerning to me.

My Mortgage ( with my escrow account ) was sold to Wells Fargo 8 months ago and they have been mismanaging it ever since. I would like to get compensated by them for costs I incurred and time wasted due to their mismanagement.

-Wells Fargo didn't pay my property tax on time, incurring a {$45.00} late fee that came out of my escrow account -Wells Fargo didn't process the insurance document I provided them ( a few times ) and that caused them to buy supplementary insurance policy for {$1400.00}, which later they refunded to my escrow. Dealing with that took me close to two hours on the phone with them -Wells Fargo is miscalculating my insurance costs, resulting in my monthly payment being {$300.00} higher than it should be -Wells Fargo phone agent are providing very low level of service, most calls result in them needing to further research but they never follow up as they promise to. This results in me having to call many times.

-Wells Fargo refused to cancel the escrow on my mortgage. Despite the fact I made multiple requests to manage my own tax and insurance payment, in light of their severe incompetence in managing my escrow account

I am writing as a debt validation process. 

In my report there appears an alleged debt that I have with XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. I do not recognize that debt and I need documentation to validate it. The documents I require are the following.

Account statements with my full name. 


They are showing late payments on collection, but they do not give me information, they do not validate the debt.

I thought 30 days late meant I would pay a bill on or after XX/XX/XXXX for a XX/XX/XXXX due date. it is not fair. Also, I feel discriminated against because I am woman with a stay at home husband and children too support. My score would be higher if I was a man with a stay at home wife. I own my home, keep a current mortgage and make a XXXX figure salary as an ICU nurse and I go to school. The credit reporting companies are always for big business and rich people. Not people who work like dogs to provide for their families.

My loan was transferred from XXXX to XXXX XXXX ( with out my being notified ) sometime around XXXX XXXX. I went to pay my payment in XXXX with XXXX and it showed my loan had been paid off. When I contacted XXXX they said it was sold to XXXX and that they had sent me a notice ( which they did not ). I then called XXXX and they said they could not find my loan. I was on the phone for over 2 hours with them trying to find my loan. They finally were able to give me a loan number and told me to pay the payment online. When I went online and made the payment I noticed they did not have my insurance information which I had given to them previously. I called back and gave them the homeowners information again. I was then sent a notice by my Home Owners Insurance Company stating my insurance was going to be cancelled due to non payment. I called XXXX XXXX again and was on hold again ... I finally spoke with a Manager XXXX XXXX and was told the check would be mailed out immediately. Today I had to pay the Home Owners Insurance myself out of my pocket as the check has still not been sent. I also went online again today and the Home Owners Insurance is still not listed. The loan was transferred without my notification and the transfer has now cost me over {$1500.00} due to my having to pay the Home Owners Insurance Policy myself. 
I received the Welcome Package on the XX/XX/XXXX ( I have included the package although it is dated the XX/XX/XXXX) ... I also received an escrow analysis from XXXX on the XX/XX/XXXX ... it is also dated the XX/XX/XXXX.

I had checked XXXX XXXX around XXXX XXXX as I prefer to stay on top of my reports, and then again around XXXX XXXX to find that all my inquiries had been removed and then reinserted. I also was NOT notified in writing within five ( 5 ) days of the reinsertion which is actually against Federal Law. The inquiries were removed and put back on, and I had called and spoke to numerous reps who just assume hang up on you, or tell you repeatedly that they can help you with the inquiries, but also tell me that no one was affected by the glitch. Even with proof in hand, and they flat out absolutely REFUSE to connect you to a supervisor or anyone in American offices to handle this matter per your request. After 5+ calls, I gave up. None of the Reps were remotley helpful or even knowledgeable, some knew and would say more or less sucks to be you, and some were even belligerent and knew of the issue but told you too bad.

complaint_text: My account has been a victim of fraud. Its a business account and I have complied with everything. Chase has directed me to do. They can clearly see by my banking history that all my purchases are done by debit in XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  And any ACH payments that come out of my account are limited to three. The kind of payment came out of my account for XXXX I never ever have made a kind of payment for that much. I have contacted XXXX XXXX office. Spoke to XXXX and they are reopening it with no guarantee. This is not fair and unwarranted. They they told me that I have to go after the merchant who I dont even know and only information I have is gas station in XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX  and then if I want any document that they have, I have to get a subpoena. I never authorized any ACH payments for that gas station and I did not authorizethe other fraudulent charges that they have returned. They asked me to go into the branch and get a new account because this was compromised I can not do that because my account is a negative balance and when I ask them to put a stop payment XXXX, who I dont even use his insurance they never did it and the vendor hit my account again. This is gross negligence on the part of Chase Bank. I want the last 3 fraud charges reversed.

XX/XX/XXXX EXPERIAN XXXX Experian XXXX XXXX, TX XXXX This complaint is filed against Experian for the harm caused to my credit as a result of the lack process in investigating the disputes filed against XXXX XXXX at least 7 times in the last year. I was most appalled yesterday XX/XX/XXXX after I received the XXXX results of the 2 disputes that EXPERIAN issued for 2 XXXX XXXX cards starting with XXXX and XXXX submitted on XX/XX/XXXX where Experian concluded on XX/XX/XXXX that the information in my dispute were verified as accurate despite, I submitted evidence of the credit card statements being issued as business credit cards under a business name, XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX as the account holder and I was just the signor. 

XXXX XXXX sent me a letter dated XX/XX/XXXX that I have attached where it is stated that XXXX XXXX can not provide me the proof that I requested them to provide to support their claim that I bare personal responsibility for the business credit cards. They can not provide such proof according to them because they only keep records for 5 years. XXXX XXXX has no records to prove their claim, yet they keep abusing me and keep violating the Fair Debt Collection Practice Act by reporting false information they can not support with either a personal credit card application or business credit card application and credit card agreement that shows that I applied for the cards under my name or I agreed to pay for the business credit cards. Without any documents to support their claim, EXPERIAN can not continue to keep contacting XXXX XXXX who continues to provide false information each time. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, the same day the XX/XX/XXXX dispute was completed by EXPERIAN, my credit score dropped from XXXX to XXXX and went up to XXXX after I complained. The score further went up to XXXX, then on XX/XX/XXXX, the same day the last dispute submitted on XX/XX/XXXX was completed, my score dropped 47 points from XXXX to XXXX. Nothing changed in my credit file, not a thing. There a pattern of being victimized by EXPERIAN for no reasons when nothing in credit file changed and they do so each time a dispute about XXXX XXXX is completed. 

Experian decided to intentionally ignore the proof provided on XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX that I submitted and insisted the business credit cards are individual responsibility by simply contacting XXXX XXXX and did request nor obtain any proof XXXX XXXX such as a signed consumer credit card application and signed consumer credit card agreement to support their confirmation statements. So, Experian concluded despite evidence I submitted showing the XXXX  Statements showing thee 2 cards in question are business credit cards and not consumer credit cards, yet XXXX XXXX words of deceit by passing business credit cards as consumer credit cards were taken over the evidence submitted while the evidence is XXXX XXXX own statements which I am resubmitting. In their own letter attached, they admitted that the credit cards were business credit cards and not personal credit cards. This abuse must stop. My score should be restored to XXXX and EXPERIAN must stop manipulating my credit file every time, they contact XXXX XXXX who continues to falsely confirm that these credit cards are personal credit cards. 
EXPERIANs conduct is harming my ability to get credit currently. I had mortgage applications that were declined on XX/XX/XXXX and were reconsidered by the lender after I informed them that my score went up to XXXX. Now my score being maliciously dropped by 47 points when there is no new derogatory information added and my pending mortgage will be aborted for sure once the lender performs another credit check before I close the mortgage later this month. 

The 2 XXXX XXXX business cards must be deleted since XXXX XXXX confirmed to me on XX/XX/XXXX that they can not produce any proof to support their claim that these credit cards are my responsibility. Experian should look into their own records to observe that these two cards were never reported under my credit file in XXXX and XXXX when these two cards were opened, instead XXXX XXXX decided to charge off these two cards under my personal credit file in XXXX when the business closed and stopped paying XXXX XXXX for payments owed on the 2 cards.

Experian must exercise good judgment to decide who is honest and dishonest in this dispute. They were not reported because they were not mine and when the business failed to pay XXXX XXXX after it closed in XXXX, in XXXX, XXXX XXXX wrongfully decided to charge off the corporate cards under my credit file. My credit was stellar at XXXX prior to XXXX and since XXXX, I have been badly damaged and abused by XXXX XXXX for 4 years with a false claim which they continue to confirm every time EXPERIAN contacts them for my disputes. Now, there is enough proof provided to delete these two XXXX XXXX accounts immediately, regardless of XXXX XXXX continue to mislead and lie about the facts. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

complaint_text:
XX/XX/22 I discovered the debt on my credit report XX/XX/22 I reached out to the original creditor, XXXX XXXX XXXX, to confirm the debt. They confirmed that the amount had been owed, but that I would need to call Consumer Collection Services to determine current balance owed. 
XX/XX/22 I reached out to the current creditor Consumer Collection Services ( CCS ) at XXXX Upon reaching the current creditor, I offered to make a settlement. They advised that doing a settlement instead of a full payment would negatively affect my credit report. So I made a full payment. During this process, however, I advised that I needed some sort of proof that I made a payment to the company in question. They advised that proof of payment wasnt available for 8 days after the payment processed. They did offer to give me a confirmation number, which I thought was going to be electronically provided to me because they asked me to enroll in their email notification program. 
Once the payment processing was complete, I found out that they were not going to provide the confirmation number electronically, and they would only provide it verbally. 
I escalated to a supervisor, because I needed proof of payment to provide to an apartment complex I am trying to live at. Once at the supervisor, I advised of the situation and she said there was no way for her to provide that information. I thought this was kind of weird, so I asked for proof of payment. She refused to provide me proof of payment saying that now that the account has been paid for she had no way of providing me the requested documents. 

She did offer me to send a letter by mail to CCS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX however that was only after I started demanding proof of debt, and that again doesnt help me prove even that the debt is real much less that the debt was paid within the 5 days I have to move into a new apartment. According to the supervisor, once an account is closed there is no way for them to provide records whether or not I mail them anyway so why would I waste my time.

It has been well over three weeks and the PNC BANK has not given me a reason as to why I can not access my funds. Every time I call to find out what is going on they say my account is under review and that they will call me within 24 hours which they never do. At which point I call again to get the same response over and over. They will not even allow me to close my account. When ever I call no one knows what is going on and they claim not to be able to see it or be able to give me a reason. I have called numerous amount of times both before and after the BBVA and PNC Bank merger and neither banks have been able to provide proper care.

By failing to adhere to both California law and the rules under CFPB, The party ( ies ) complained of in my initial complaint are not compliant with rules regarding dual tracking. The Parties are " covered '' under both California Homeowner 's Bill of Rights and the CFPB 's strict guidelines. 

I have a valid and complete loan modification package that has been acknowledged as received and no notice of deficiency of documentation has been received by me. I just received another Notice of Trustee during the pendency of my application. 

The Parties have also failed to respond to the initial complaint with competent and reliable evidence that supports all facts contained within all recorded title documents that were used against my contract rights. Specifically, the assignment ( s ) of deed of trust to an un-verified entity, Notice of Default, Notice of Trustee Sale. No authenticated evidence has been offered by the offending Parties by any person with personal, first-hand knowledge of those facts. I am not in default to an unknown, un-authenticated party that is currently in my chain of title without competent evidence to support the beneficial interest.

I submitted a CFPB complaint XXXX and the complaint was improperly responded to. The outcome simply states they will re-investigate. TRANSUNION 's lack of proper investigation is the reason for this dispute. 

I have submitted two disputes regarding the same item on my credit report. Account Name : XXXX XXXX XXXX- Collection Account- Alleged Account Balance : {$4000.00}. Both investigations failed to provide verification as I requested per my legal rights to do so, with the final investigation results being provided today. I have no knowledge of this account or debt. Research indicates the agency is a property management company, yet the debt is clearly listed as a medical debt on my credit report. This is ILLEGAL to make misrepresentation in order to list items on a credit report!! I have submitted disputes outlining this error, lack of knowledge of this debt or whom it belongs to. TransUnion claims it belongs to me, but provides no verification in the form of any such contract indicating I owe any funds to this entity. Under Section 611 ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA CRA 's are required to promptly DELETE all information which can not be verified. If this has been verified, I want the name of the person providing the verification as well as their contact information and a copy of any evidence or contract with my signature as this does not exist. I am a victim of fraud and TransUnion is not protecting me according to my legal rights as a consumer. I fully intend to seek damages through legal counsel if TransUnion does not rectify this issue by deleting this damaging item from my report immediately. The law is very clear as to civil liability and the legal remedies available to me. This is most likely a result of TransUnion 's use of automated software ( XXXX ), which has incorrectly tied me to this debt or item on my credit report. 

PLEASE EXPLAIN HOW A RENTAL COMPANY CAN LIST DEBT AS MEDICAL DEBT ON MY CREDIT REPORT AND SUPPOSEDLY VALIDATE THIS. THIS IS IMPOSSIBLE. 

I am aware of civil and legal remedies. If this dispute is not rectified immediately, I will file a complaint with the XXXX and hire a lawyer.

complaint_text: I 'm receiving absolutely no assistance from the credit bureaus and I really need some help. I 'm specifically stating my disputes and I 'm receiving the same result each month when I am clearly pointing out where they are inaccurately reporting my accounts. HOW can they be verified when I am looking right at my credit report and getting the information from there? Please see the attached letters which clearly state where they are wrong. I need someone to help me because this is exactly why the FCRA was enacted - to protect people like me from people like them who do n't give a crap about anything and blatantly and willfully violation the law!

I am a victim of identity theft and inaccurate credit reporting. My personal information was compromised in the Equifax Data Breach and the National Public Data Breach, and since then all three nationwide consumer reporting agencies ( Equifax, Experian, and TransUnion ) have published unauthorized inquiries and derogatory account information that are false, unverifiable, or contradictory to Metro 2 compliance standards.

Despite my written disputes and submission of an FTC Identity Theft Report ( FTC Report XXXX XXXXXXXX ), the CRAs continue to verify items without producing original signed applications or verifiable source documentation. They are violating FCRA 1681b, 1681e ( b ), 1681i ( a ), and 1681c-2, and their failure to block, delete, or correct this data has caused material harm to my credit standing.

complaint_text: Upon reviewing my credit report, I have identified inaccurate accounts that need reporting and correction through your company.

I am writing to follow up on my previous correspondence regarding several negative accounts appearing on my credit report due to identity theft, as detailed in my last letter. 

In my initial statement, I outlined the unauthorized transactions and accounts that have been fraudulently opened in my name, which have severely impacted my credit standing. I kindly requested the removal, blocking, or updating of these inaccurate entries, as well as a prompt response regarding the dispute 's timeline and process. 

Please provide an update on the current status of my case and confirm the steps that have been or will be taken to resolve this matter. If there is any additional information or documentation required, please let me know, as I am committed to assisting with the verification and correction process to ensure an accurate reflection of my credit report. 

I appreciate your time and consideration in addressing this issue. I look forward to your response and a timely resolution to restore the integrity of my credit record. 

Thank you once again for your assistance.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: This account, reported by Credence Resource Management, does not belong to me. I was never contacted or notified regarding this debt before it was reported to the credit bureaus. This is a violation of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, specifically under section XXXX, which requires debt XXXX to provide a written notice containing details about the debt within XXXX days of initial communication. Additionally, under the Fair Credit Reporting Act, you are required to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the information you report. Because I was not notified of this debt and have no knowledge of it, I am disputing its validity and requesting that it be removed from my credit report.
