complaint_text:
I have lived in the XXXX County area most of my life, and I want to continue to live here and do so in my home. I have seen many good times, and recently I 've seen rough times. Unfortunately, I may be forced out of my home by my mortgage note holder, Select Portfolio Servicing ( SPS ), since they have been uncooperative and even deceptive when I try to work out a solution with them. 

My hardship began in XXXX when unfortunately my father passed away and 8 months later my daughter ran away from home. This emotional turmoil tore my family apart, and then my XXXX collapsed in XXXX. In XXXX, my husband and I got divorced ; and to top it off, I even lost my beloved dog in XXXX as well. The combination of all these events is what caused me to fall behind on my mortgage. 

When this run of unfortunate events began in XXXX, I reached out for help and was offered a rather unfair trial modification. I decided to go forward with in order to keep my home, but I was denied for a permanent modification once I completed the trial period due to missing documents that I had submitted many times to them. They kept making me start over with the process using the same reasoning for denial ( missing documents ), always taking my payments for three months before telling me they could n't move forward and that I had to start over. This continued for 3 years (!!! ) until they told me my arrears were now too high and I did n't qualify for assistance. It appears to me that this was their plan all along ... they had no interest in helping me, they just wanted to take my home away via foreclosure. I have being denied access to options that are supposed to be made available. They deceived me, lied to me, and frankly, stole from me while I was acting in good faith!!!!!!! 

Furthermore, I have serious issues with my property value. My property 's present value is below {$600000.00}, which is disturbing when you consider the purchase price we paid was {$1000000.00} with a {$90000.00} down payment. Plus, I 'm in what could be considered a predatory loan. I was somewhat forced into a 3-Year ARM with a high interest rate when I was looking for a 30-Year Fixed Rate loan. 

If I could get SPS to handle this fairly, I 'm sure I would be able to keep my home and make good on my mortgage. I do n't want or need a handout, but considering my financial recovery I am certain that there is a solution that I could qualify for. Is n't that what all this bailout money ( my tax money!! ) passed down from the government to these banks was for? Are n't these modification programs designed for people who had a hardship ( or in my case many hardships ) and have recovered and just need a little assistance restructuring their mortgage in order to move forward? 

I want Select Portfolio Servicing to stop the foreclosure process, review my loan in earnest for retention options, and stop playing games that prevent this problem from being solved.

15 USC 1666b ( a ) Time to make payments A creditor may not treat a payment on a credit card account under an open end consumer credit plan as late for any purpose, unless the creditor has adopted reasonable procedures designed to ensure that each periodic statement including the information required by section 1637 ( b ) of this title is mailed or delivered to the consumer not later than 21 days before the payment due date. 

XXXX XXXX never sent the periodic statement along with the disclosures from section 1637 ( b ).

I have requested proof that this information was mailed or delivered 21 days before the payment due date and this information was requested in good faith pursuant rule 1002 and It was never provided. 

This is unfair, illegal, fraudulent, and not equitable to me as a consumer! 

Delete the late payments from my consumer reports

To whom it may concern : I am filing a complaint against : Experian, XXXX. XXXX XXXX, XXXX, Texas, for inaccurate information and not following the law, FDCPA section 807 ( 8 ) and FCRA section 623 ( a ) ( 3 ). I have attached multiply registered letter to both Experian and XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. 

What am I looking for you might ask? Information showing when I received this late payment. 

Not only have they ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) failed to furnish me with any information or statements they ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) continue to put remarks on my credit file via Experian Credit Bureau. I have sent several certified registered letters to them asking for evidence of this late payment. They ( Experian ) have only said to me that they have as per my credit report We have completed the processing of your dispute : Outcome : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Remains the company that reported the information has certified to Experian that the information is accurate. As of XX/XX/XXXX. So, how can that be, because I still have not received any information from XXXX of proof or Experian for that matter. 

Verified : The collection agency or creditor may provide you with what they call proof, such as an itemized printout of what they claim is your account or billing statement. The FTC has issued an article on this subject, and concludes that an itemized printout does not represent verification. 
Unverifiable - you may want proof that a creditor or debt collector has the right to collect from you, and you find out that they dont have your original hand- signed contract on file anymore - paperwork gets lost. No proof of contract means no authority to report or collect from you. 

I also sent Experian Credit Bureau information about the company in question. Experian has not been forth coming either, saying that they have spoken with and validated the information to be true. Yet, I still have not received any evidence to prove that fact. I have asked time and time again as you will see in my attached letters to Experian and XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX to do what is right. So, Please validate this information with ( Experian ) and provide me with copies of any documentation associated with this account. 

I would appreciate any help in this matter would be great. I have been trying to get to the bottom of this matter for well over a year now. 

Thank you Reference to : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Closed Account showing late payment from XX/XX/XXXX.

Regarding : Complaint ID XXXX Creditor : Bounce AI , Inc . 
Reference : XXXX Account Number : XXXX Dear CFPB, I am writing to dispute the response provided by Bounce AI, Inc. dated XX/XX/XXXX, regarding the alleged debt referenced above. Bounce AI , Inc. claims to have " purchased all rights, title, and interest to this debt from XXXX XXXX XXXX '' on XX/XX/XXXX. However, their response fails to provide any verifiable evidence of this purchase, as required under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ), 15 U.S.C. 1692g ( b ). Without such proof, Bounce AI , Inc. has no legal authority to collect this debt or report it to my credit file, and I demand that they either provide conclusive documentation or immediately delete this item from all credit reports. 

In my initial complaint, I requested validation of the debt, specifically proof of Bounce AI , Inc. 's legal right to collect on this account. While Bounce AI , Inc. provided a copy of a Line of Credit Agreement, they have failed to substantiate their claim of ownership with a chain of title, purchase agreement, or any other legally binding document proving the transfer of the debt from XXXX XXXX XXXX to Bounce AI , Inc . Under FDCPA 1692g ( b ), debt collectors must provide proper verification of the debt, including documentation establishing their legal authority to collect. A mere statement claiming purchase is wholly insufficient and does not meet the legal standard for validation.

I demand that Bounce AI, Inc. provide the following to the CFPB : A complete chain of title or a legally binding purchase agreement unequivocally proving that Bounce AI , Inc. acquired the debt from XXXX XXXX XXXX on XX/XX/XXXX, as claimed. 

A detailed accounting of the debt, including a clear breakdown of how the current balance of {$18000.00} was calculated, specifying principal, interest, and fees. 

If Bounce AI , Inc. can not provide this documentation, they must immediately cease all collection activities and delete this account from my credit file, as required by FDCPA 1692g ( b ) and the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), 15 U.S.C. 1681s-2 ( b ). The FCRA obligates debt collectors to ensure the accuracy of reported information, and without proof of ownership, any reporting of this debt is inaccurate and must be removed. Failure to provide this evidence or delete the item violates my consumer rights and constitutes a breach of federal law.

I urge the CFPB to compel Bounce AI , Inc. to either produce the requested proof of debt ownership or permanently delete this account from all credit bureaus. Thank you for your assistance in enforcing my rights under federal law. I look forward to your intervention to ensure Bounce AI , Inc. complies with these requirements.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text:

I was supposed to be provided evidence of the case, and more than one year later, have still not received any information from the debt collection agency, from paypal, or from any other source. 

I am a XXXX XXXX XXXX and have no clue 1 ) why my account was suspended, 2 ) why it has been on placed for collections, and 3 ) what is being done about the situation. I provided all needed information and requested clarity on why my account was locked and what this was for. 

Unfortunately, more than a year later, paypal will not speak to me, and transfers me ( continually ) to  an outside debt collection agency for charges I have yet to have seen, while simultaneously locking me out of my account with no explanation. 

I have no clue what charges are being referenced and have a perfect FICO score. I can no longer tolerate paypal to lock me out of my financial account with 1 ) no comment on why my account was locked, 2 ) use of a debt collection agency which can not confirm on charges posted, and 3 ) prohibit access to my account and funds. 

I need to access to my account, the funds held within the account, and interest on those funds that have been inaccessible for more than a year.

complaint_text:
Dear Consumer Financial Protection Bureau Representative, I received an alert from XXXX and XXXX credit monitoring that Medical Data Systems INC has reported a negative item regarding an alleged debt. I have reason to believe I do not owe this debt to this company. 
Under The Disputed Debts clause of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, I am allotted XXXX to dispute any alleged debt in writing. Also, request that the collector provide more detailed information about the debt and documentation showing that they have verified that they are in fact owe the alleged debt. It also states, until the collector provides this written verification, it may not continue to collect on the debt or seek judgment in court or report any negative items to the credit bureaus ( i.e. XXXX, XXXX, and XXXX. 
However, my rights have been violated since Medical Data Systems INC did not notify me of this alleged debt nor allow me, as the consumer, the opportunity to gain knowledge, investigate, or dispute this item I am unaware of.

I am seeking your assistance in immediately having Medical Data Systems remove the negative reporting from the credit bureaus and discontinue any adverse and negative reporting on this item until the following are provided : I request all of the following information be provided to me by mail : 1. The amount of the alleged debt ; 2. The full name and mailing address of the original creditor for this alleged debt ; 3. Documentation showing you have verified that I am responsible for this debt, or a copy of any judgement ; 4. Documentation showing you are licensed to collect debts in GA.

Because I am writing in assistance to help enforce my rights within the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act, please have the company cease attempting to collect this alleged debt until after they have provided the requested information. Upon receipt of any of requested information, I request 30 days to respond. Also, please ensure the creditor and the debt can not accrue any fees or interest beyond what is allowed by state law or by contract with the original creditor. 
Sincerely, XXXX XXXX

States I have the right to privacy. 15 U.S.C 1681 Section 604A Section 2 : it also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish an account without my written instructions. section604 15U.S code 1681B, Section605A 15U.S code 1681C-1, Section 605B 15 U.S code 1681 C2

complaint_text: I am formally disputing several inaccuracies currently appearing on my credit report, specifically unauthorized and inaccurate accounts and credit inquiries that I did not initiate or approve. These entries represent a violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act, particularly 15 U.S. Code 1681i, which requires a proper reinvestigation of disputed items, and 1681e ( b ), which mandates that information reported must be accurate to the maximum extent possible. In addition, I am disputing a potentially misreported late payment. According to 15 U.S.C. 1666b, creditors must allow at least 21 days between the statement date and the payment due date before classifying a payment as late. Based on my records, this standard may not have been met, or the payment was submitted on time and inaccurately reported as delinquent.

complaint_text: Mortgage was paid off to Homepoint on XX/XX/2020. Company claims check to refund the escrow account was issued on XX/XX/2020 and sent out on XX/XX/2020. I called Homepoint on XX/XX/2020 and was advised the new check still had not been issued. I called Homepoint on XX/XX/2020 and got the same response which prompted me to ask for a supervisor. The supervisor I spoke with ensured me she was escalating the claim and that she would contact me back via phone to tell me when a new check would be sent ... ..I never received a return phone call. I called Homepoint on XX/XX/2020 and the representative I spoke with told me the check was SENT on XX/XX/2020. I made sure to verify the check was actually SENT and was told it was sent! After waiting over a week for the check to arrive and it hadn't, I contacted Homepoint again on XX/XX/2020 and was told that the check had been issued on the XXXX but as of the XXXX had not been sent out ... ..over a week later!!! I was sent to the escalating department where I was told by the representative that he would email me back which never happened as of this time. It will be 2 months on Sunday since this mortgage was paid off and I still do not have a refund check for my escrow funds in the amount of {$3300.00}. I have been given a run around for 2 months now with excuses and wrong information. I asked if the money could be wired and was told no because it cost money to do so. I also asked if they could put tracking on it and they said no. At this point I don't have much faith that a check was ever mailed out in the past 2 months!!

I contacted Select Portfolio Services several times over the last 2 years to find out if we would qualify for a loan modification, due to financial hardship from house repairs and other unexpected expenses. I was unable to make a full payment every month, yet they would not take partial payments. I provided all the documentation ( so I thought ) to them, over a year and a half ago. We then filed a personal bankruptcy in XXXX XXXX to help get us back on track, which did help, but we were still unable to pay the mortgage. We did not include the mortgage in the bankruptcy because we were still waiting to hear regarding the modification. In that 6 months prior to the bankruptcy, SPS asked for additional information ( some of which I had already provided ). After the bankruptcy, they continued to say they needed updated information, new signed docs, new hardship letters, etc. 
This continued for all of XXXX. While they still had n't approved or disapproved me, they referred my account to a legal team to move forward with a foreclosure. Luckily there is no sale date yet, however, they did finally get back to me stating that I was not approved. While they base it on your gross income, they decided we made enough money to be able to pay the loan. 
Well, we do n't with all the expenses and still trying to pay off loans for house repairs. Then they said I did n't make enough money, however, to qualify for the repayment option. So, it took them almost 2 years to tell me that. Now, I am in complete default, so no one will lend me any money, and if I want to keep my house, I will have to file Chapter XXXX so that means legal fees that I do n't have and they will put me on a repayment plan that I ca n't really afford. 
Oh, but if I can come up with at least $ XXXX, they will reinstate my mortgage. 
What a bunch of XXXX! After letters, upon letters, upon letters, stating how much they want to be able to help you. " There may still be something you can do. '' Yeah, you can put me off for almost 2 years so that you can just move ahead with the foreclosure you knew you were going to move forward with anyway! Thanks!

Why should our credit be ruined if we can not even sell the home because of a student loan from my sons fiance ( XXXX XXXX XXXX ), we are not related to this girl, we have no control over her student loans, but we are being penalized! I have tried getting this off of our credit reports but they wont budge. Like I said, cant even sell the home to satisfy this mortgage!! This has been through the courts I am to understand and forclosed on. I even tried talking to the bank, they will not talk to me.Thank you

complaint_text: I did not authorize this inquiry and I did not speak with this lender on the date indicated. Accordingly, I respectfully request that you remove this inquiry from my credit report as soon as possible.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: In the quiet humdrum of everyday life, a sudden jolt shattered the tranquility : I had become a victim of identity theft. Like a thief in the night, unseen hands had stolen my personal information, plunging me into a bewildering maze of uncertainty. With each fraudulent transaction and unauthorized account, the breach of trust cut deep, leaving me grappling with the unsettling reality of a violated identity. Yet, in the midst of chaos, a glimmer of resilience emerged, a resolve to reclaim what was rightfully mine and restore the harmony stolen by unseen adversaries. These are the following accounts need to be removed :
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
secondary_category: Problem with a company's investigation into an existing problem

complaint_text: XXXX is assigning a mortage. XXXX has no right since it does note own the note. XXXX only keeps track of mortgages. The bank representative acting as a XXXX reperesentative is assigning the mortgage. XXXX can not assign mortgages. It does not own the note and therefore can not assign the mortgage. The bank representativce does not work for XXXX, or have the rights to assign the mortage without owning the note.

The servicing of my mortgage account was transferred from XXXXXXXX XXXX to Select Portfolio Servicing , Inc. ( SPS ) on XX/XX/year>. At the time, I had Flood Insurance and Homeowners ' Insurance, as it was required since we purchased our home. I always paid Taxes and Insurance separately and on time. The Homeowners ' policy did not include Wind Insurance because it was not a requirement by the state of Florida or the prior Mortgage Company. On XX/XX/XXXX, I received a letter from SPS requesting that I obtain Wind Insurance. I had to get new inspections and contacted my insurance agent to add Wind Coverage to the current policy, as SPS was threatening to place their own policy with a premium of more than {$20000.00} per year. I was eventually able to obtain wind coverage, which is not an easy task, but now SPS is charging {$4500.00} to our account for less than three months of lapse in wind coverage. There is no such lapse in coverage because Wind insurance was never a condition on my loan. This is something SPS is imposing after we purchased the home. It is incredibly challenging to speak with someone from SPS, and I have not been able to settle this issue. This charge is outrageous and predatory ; I need your assistance in resolving this issue.

I am writing to delete the following information in my file. The items I need deleted are listed in the report.I am a victim of identity theft and did not make the charge. I ask that the items be deleted to correct my credit report. 
I reported the theft of my identity to the Federal Trade Commission and I also have enclosed copies of the Federal Trade Commissions Identity Theft Affidavit. Please delete the items as soon as possible.
primary_category: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports

complaint_text: I have not supplied proof under the doctrine of estoppel by silence, Engelhardt V. Gravens ( MO ) 281 SW 715.719. I pressume that no proof of the alleged debt, nor therefore any such debt, in fact therefore exist.

complaint_text: I am writing to formally document that the debt collector failed to inform me of my right to dispute the alleged debt, as required under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act. No details were provided regarding the origin, amount, or validity of the debt. Instead, the communication solely consisted of repeated demands for payment accompanied by threatening language, which I believe constitutes harassment.
